Umhlahlandlela wamehlo abukeka kahle
BONA ZULU – July 2007
Ezobuhle
Yiba namehlo amahle abukeka kahle. Sikuphathele umhlahlandlela ozokusiza ukuze ukhethe imibala ezozwana nawe ongayisebenzisa emehlweni akho…
BONA ZULU – July 2007
Ezobuhle
AKUSIBO bonke abantu abangasebenzisa ama-eyeshadow a-grey namnyama anemibala ezothile esiwabona esetshenziswa kule sizini, khetha umbala o-brown. Umbala o-brown ubukeka kahle kakhulu kunalowo o-charcoal noma omnyama ngoba uphelelisa ubuhle bamehlo nobesikhumba esingagqamile.
Khumbula ukuthi i-eyeshadow ihlala isikhathi eside uma uqala ngokufaka i-foundation emehlweni (noma i-concealer) kanye no-powder. Kubuye kube ngumqondo omuhle ukukama izinkophe zakho ngaphambi kokufaka i-mascara. (Gcoba kome kuqala ngaphambi kokuphinda okwesibili.)
I-eyeshadow enombala osashokoledi ibukeka kahle uma uyisebenzisa ne-blusher enombala ompofu, ezindebeni ungasebenzisa
i-liner egqamile ngaphambi koku-gcoba i-lipstick enombala onsundu.
Yiba namehlo azothile
Step 1
Brasha i-eyeshadow engagqamile ngenhla emehlweni. (Khetha umbala ofana nesikhumba sakho ongacwebezeli kakhulu ngoba ocwebezelayo uzogqama.)
Step 2
Sebenzisa ibrashi uma ufaka i-eyeshadow.
Uma unamehlo amise okwe- almond, umbala wakho wufake ugcwale ngenhla emehlweni, kuze kufike ekupheleni kwezinkophe ezingezansi.
Ukuze amehlo abukeke emakhulu, faka i-eyeshadow emaceleni emehlweni akho.
Uma unamehlo amakhulu, faka i-eyeshadow ngenhla emehlweni kuze kufike ngezansi kwamashiya.
Step 3
Gqamisa amehlo akho nge-eyebrow pencil e-brown. Yifake ngemuva kwezinkophe nangezansi. Yithambise ngovolo noma usule kahle ngomunwe.
Faka okwasemini ebusuku
Umbala o-brown asiwuboni ufanele ukufakwa ebusuku kodwa uma uzowufaka nokucwebezelayo ungenza ubukeke usesitayeleni uqhakazile ebusuku.
Gqamisa amehlo akho nge- pencil egqamile ozoyifaka ezinkopheni ezingenhla. Faka umbala o-brown ocwebezelayo uwuhlanganise nowasemini.
Okunye ongakwenza wukusebenzisa umbala osagolide noma omunye ocwebezelayo emaceleni emehlweni. (Lokhu kuvuselela amehlo akhathele.) Faka okunombala ogqamile ngezansi kwezinkophe.
Uma ufake okunombala ogqamile emehlweni kungcono usebenzise i-gloss ezindebeni. Yifake yodwa noma uyifake ne-lipstick yakho oyisebenzisa emini. [z]
nguCHRISTINE HAMMANN

Ukuphepha kokudla
Sebenzisa lezi zeluleko ezilandelayo ukuze amagciwane angangeni ekudleni nasemndenini wakho...
UMA ufuna ukuphepha ezifweni, beka upheke ukudla ngendlela efanele. Gcina opheka ngako kuhlanzekile.
Ukuthenga ukudla
uThenga ukudla okufakwa efrijini emva kokuthenga okungaboli;
uUngayithengi inyama esemaphaketheni adabukile noma avuzayo;
uUngakuthengi ukudla osekuphelelwe yisikhathi.
Ukubeka ukudla
uUkudla okubolayo kufake efrijini;
uPheka noma ufake kwi-freezer inyama yenkukhu, inhlanzi ne-mince efreshi ezinsukwini ezimbili ukuthengile; inyama yenkomo, yemvu noma yengulube yisebenzise ezinsukwini ezintathu kuya kwezinhlanu uyithengile;
uUkudla okubolayo kumele kugoqwe;
uUkuze inyama yakho ihlale ikahle kwi-freezer, goqa iphakethe elinenyama nge-foil;
uUkudla okusemathinini okune-acid eningi kungagcinwa izinyanga ezingu-12 kuye kwezingu-18;
uUkudla okusemathinini okungenayo i-acid eningi kungahlala amasonto amabili kuya eminyakeni emihlanu uma ithini lisesesimweni esikahle. Lahla amathini apoqokile, avuzayo, aqumbile noma ane-rust.
Ukulungisa ukudla
uGeza izandla ngaphambi nangasemva kokuphatha ukudla;
uUngahlanganisi inyama engaphekiwe nokunye ukudla. Geza izandla emva kokuqoba inyama ugeze nezinto ozisebenzisayo.
uGeza izithebe ngamanzi angangelitha afakwe i-teaspoon le-chlorine bleach.
Ukuncibilikisa
uIfriji: Ukuncibilikisa ngefriji kuthatha isikhathi kuphephile. Qiniseka ukuthi ujusi ophuma enyameni awungeni kokunye ukudla.
uAmanzi abandayo: Faka okuncibilikisayo epulasitikini engavuzi ukufake emanzini abandayo. Shintsha amanzi emva kwemizuzu engu-30.
uI-microwave: Pheka inyama emva kokuyincibilikisa
kwi-microwave.
Ukudla okusalile
uChitha ukudla okusalile obekubekwe ngaphandle kwefriji.
uFaka ukudla ezitsheni ukufake efrijini noma
kwi-freezer.
uUkudla okusalile kusebenzise
zingakapheli
izinsuku ezine
kuphekiwe. [z]
Izeluleko zokupheka

UKUZIPHAPHATHA ngokwendalo kusuka emithanjeni yegazi engaphansi kwesikhumba uma ikhukhumala lapho sithokozile, sisemdlandleni noma sizizwa sinamahloni kumbe siphoxekile. Lokhu kwenza igazi eliningi lihambe ngenkululeko neziqhomo zicwebezele.
Uma uziphaphatha ngokunemibala, isikhumba sakho siyagqama, ngakhoke kungakuhle usebenzise i-face scrub kanye ngesonto ukuze uvuselele isikhumba sakho nebala kugqame. Esikhumbeni esomile sebenzisa i-nourishing mask bese ufaka i-moisturiser eshubile (hhayi kodwa enamafutha).
I-Blusher iba ngukhilimu, i-gel, indukwana noma ibe luketshezi noma uphawuda. Indawo enhle ongayifaka kuyo, kulapho uphophotheka khona ngokwendalo. Kwabaningi bethu lokhu akwenzeki ngezansi nobuso noma ngenhla kwamashiya.
Iphutha elivamile wukufaka i-blush ngezansi kwezidlathi nokungayihlanganisisi kahle. Inhloso wukuthambisa lapho kuqine khona.
Uma usebenzisa i-blush kaphawuda, kungcono uthenge ibrashi elikhulu leziphaqulo. Malibe nekhanda elikhulu licije phambili ukuze ukwazi ukulisebenzisa kahle. Uma kuyi-blush kakhilimu noma ye-gel, iminwe yakho noma isiponji seziphaqulo, nako kuzokusebenzela.[z]

MASIBONISANE
Ngabe mangaki amadoda
okufanele alwe nobugebengu?
MNUMZANE uDube Othandekayo... Igama lami nginguPule wa Sekano. Awungazi. Kungenzeka sigcine singahlangananga. Noma kwenzeke ukuthi ungayifundi le ncwadi.
Uma ubheka isimo sezwe esiphila kulona, kungenzeka ukuthi kuthi ungakalifundi leli phephabhuku ngibe sengilele kobandayo.
Mhlawumbe kube nguwena lowo.
Kungenzeka ukuthi sobabili sibulawe ngendlela okwabulawa ngayo umakhelwane wakho uBashimane Mofokeng. Wayengenacala "wahlomula" embonini yaseSA ekhulayo.
Awekho amagama angasetshenziswanga uma kukhulunywa ngobugebengu - abunamqondo, bungubulwane, abulawuleki, buyacasula, buyinkohlakalo... Phezu kwalokho, busaqhubeka nokuthatha izimpilo zabantu, izimoto nama-cellphones.
Kukhona neziphathimandla zikahulumeni ezizenzela umathanda emalini yokusiza abantu zenze nokunye ukukhohlakala.
Zingalwa kanjani nobugebengu ngoba ziyahlomula ngabo?
Kodwa Mnuz. uDube ubugebengu buyolokhu buyinkinga ebantwini abanjengami nawe. Buyisihlava okufanele silwe naso.
Walusukumela lolu daba wagqugquzela izinkumbi zabantu ezikhathazekile ukuba zizwakalise ilaka lazo kwabaphethe.
Izinkulungwane ngezinkulungwane ezazibuthene e-Union Buildings zaziyingcosana yesizwe esopha amanxeba esifuna ukuba kuphele ngobugebengu.
Sesikhathele! Babesho ngazwi linye.
Ngeshwa, ngalowo mkhankaso kwasizakala nabakhuthalele ukukhala kodwa bangenzi lutho. Kwakuthi uma bekhuluma ngawo bathi "kuthiwa yiMillion Man March."
"Kuthiwa." Ngezikhathi zobandlululo iSABC yayithanda ukusebenzisa lelo gama. Yayithanda ukuthi, "kuthiwa wumzabalazo wenkululeko."
Leli gama alizwakali kahle. Alinamqondo - lizwakala linokungabaza.
Odabeni lweMillion Man March, kungenzeka ukuthi ababemasha abafikanga kuleso sibalo. Ngisho noLouis Farrakhan wahluleka wukuhlanganisa isigidi sabamashi.
Abezindaba kwakufanele bagxile ebugebengwini obabuyisisusa saleyo mashi, bangazihluphi ngesibalo sabantu ababemasha.
Mnuz uDube, awugcini ngokuba yiphimbo elifuna buphele lobu bulwane, elifuna kuphele ukuhlupheka kwethu. Ngikholwa wukuthi umele inamuhla. Ngikufanisa noBarack Obama omele uguquko okufanele ukuba ngabe kade lwaba khona eMelika.
Ulwa nezingqinamba zeSA eyakhahlanyezwa wubandlululo. Siyisizwe esibhekene nenkinga yezomnotho, esicwasa ababhace kuleli nesizabalazela ukuba kucace ukuthi singobani siphile impilo ekhomba ukuthi sesikhululekile.
Kufanele ukuba bakwethulele isigqoko abantu abahlushwa wubugebengu. Kufanele ubalwe namaqhawe alwela uguquko.
Nginesifiso sokubhala enye incwadi, incwadi ezoqala ngokuthi "Thabo Mvuyelwa Mbeki Othandekayo..." Kodwa ngeke ngiyibhale. Kufanele ukuba naye useyazi ukuthi uzolwa kanjani nobugebengu.
Kunalokho, ngizothi: Dube for President! [z]

indaba nguDOUG GORDON
UBongani Nchang uphawula ngothando, ucansi nokuzithiba
Ngabe kuhle ukuzithiba"
Yebo!
UBONGANI NCHANG oyisihlabani seMalaika usezoshada emva kokuzithiba iminyaka emibili. Ukubheke ngabomvu ukushada. "Bekunzima. Sibasha futhi siyathandana kodwa sifunde okuningi ngothando ngokuthi sizithibe," kusho yena.
UBongani oneminyaka engu-30, wakhetha iNkosi ngo-1997 lingakadumi leli qembu acula kulona noJabu kanye noTshedi. I-Malaika isidayise ama-albhamu angu-600 000 yahambela namazwe omhlaba. Kodwa uBongani uyagcizelela ukuthi ukuzinikela kwabo kuNkulunkulu kwenze bangazihlanganisa nezidakamizwa baphepha nakubalandeli abafuna ukuya nabo ocansini.
"Ngesikhathi ngifika eGoli ngisuka eKlerksdorp ngenhloso yokuzakhela igama emculweni, ngangizibona lezi zinto zenzeka," kusho uBongani. "Kodwa mina noJabu sasebenza ngokubambisana saxhumana noNkulunkulu - sasihlala mahhala emishini sikhokha ngokusebenza esontweni.
"Esasikholelwa kukona kwasikhuthaza ukuba sicule. UNkulunkulu Wayenenjongo ngathi esasizimisele ngokuyifeza."
UBongani wahlangana nesithandwa sakhe ngo-2004, ngesikhathi iMalaika iqala ukuduma. UNthabiseng Mphela uyisiphathimandla sezokuxhumana emnyangweni wezemvelo nezokuvakasha. Bahlangana ekhonsathini laleli qembu elaliseGarankuwa lapho kudabuka khona uNthabiseng.
Ukuthandana kwabo
"Sathandana siqala ukubonana kanti ngaleso sikhathi izinto zazingasihambeli kahle sobabili ngakwezothando singakayicabangi eyokubheka engxenye.
"UNthabiseng wayengakazi ukuthi ngiyacula ngaleso sikhathi. Kwathi lapho esengibona esteji wamangala kakhulu. Wayengathandi ukuthandana nomculi kanti saqala ngokuba abangani saze sathandana sesikulungele ukuba sothandweni," kusho uBongani.
Indodana yabo u-Onthatile ("UNkulunkulu Uyangithanda") yazalwa ekupheleni kuka-2005 emva kokugula kukaBongani.
Ngo-2005 akakwazanga ukuhamba neMalaika eyayiyocula e-Europe ngoba kwadingeka ukuba ayohlinzwa inhliziyo.
"Kuyakhulunywa uma kugula abaculi abadumile. Mina nganginamahlule kwelinye lamashubhu asenhliziyweni. Kwadingeka ukuba ngiphumule amasonto ambalwa ngabuya sengingumqemane," kusho yena.
"UNkulunkulu wangisindisa kanti kwakusemahlombe ami ukuba ngimbonge ngothando Lwakhe ngokunikela konke okwami Kuye."
Kwakungelula, ikakhulu kuNthabiseng owayeneminyaka engu-22 ngaleso sikhathi esanda kubeletha. "UNthabiseng wasithola singelula isinqumo sokuba sihlale ngokuzithiba. Kodwa sakhuleka sacela ukulalela iZwi leNkosi. Ngangilala naye kodwa kungangifikeli ukuba siye ocansini," kusho uBongani.
Ukukhetha inkanuko nocansi njengokusho kweBhayibheli kufana nokubambelela entanjeni. "UNkulunkulu uyakuxolela uma kwenzeka ulingeka ngokuya ocansini," kusho uBongani, "kodwa ngabona ukuthi ukuhlala kwethu ngokuzithiba kwaluvuselela kakhulu uthando lwethu."
Bahlala ngokuhlukana
Lezi zithandani zathatha isinqumo sokuhlala ngokuhlukana zize zishade. "Ucansi lwenza ukuba ningagxili ezintweni ezibalulekile othandweni kanti ngaphandle kocansi sifunde okuningi ngathi. Esikhundleni sokuya ocansini besithintana sangane sixoxe ngothando lwethu isikhathi eside.
"Saqala ngokuba abangani abagcina bethandana, manje sesiphindele ekuqaleni."
UBongani wakubeka kwacaca ukuthi ukudalula kwakhe izindaba zakhe zothando akusiyo ingxenye yokuthuthukisa iCD yeMalaika entsha.
Akazwani nabaculi abakhumbula uNkulunkulu ngoba befuna ukudayisa umculo wabo.
"Impumelelo yeMalaika yakhelwe phezu komkhuleko kanti sisazoqhubeka nalokho," kusho yena.
"Angizwani nabaculi okuthi uma kunemicimbi yama-awards basukume babonge uNkulunkulu ngokunqoba kwabo.
"Sekufana nesiqubulo abasikhohlwayo uma bengasekho esteji."
Akahlosile ukuthi ngempilo ayiphilayo kubandlululeke abalandeli beMalaika abasaphila impilo esheshayo.
"I-CD yethu yokugcina yadayisa amakhophi angu-50 000 emva kwezinsuku ezimbili ikhishiwe. Umculo wethu uzikhulumela wona. Abalandeli bethu nabo bayazithiba ocansini - lokho kuhambisana nemikhankaso yokuqwashisa nge-AIDS exhaswe yithina sonke." [z]

Usizi lwabesimame nezingane
Isihluku esenzeka emngceleni osempumalanga yeCongo asichazeki kanti okubuhlungu kakhulu wukuthi elase-Africa - nomhlaba wonke - aliyilungisi le nkinga
BONA ZULU - December 2007
U-OMBENI useshiywe yisikhathi. Kusele imizuzu engu-20 ngaphambi kokuba kukhale insimbi esikoleni kanti kusadingeka ukuba aqoqe izincwadi zendodana yakhe uDaniel, enze umphako neminye imisebenzi yasekhaya. Umuzi wakubo owakhiwe ngodaka unamagumbi amabili kanti useBukavu, empumalanga yeDemocratic Republic of Congo (DRC).
Kuthatha ingxenye yehora ukusuka ekhaya eya esikoleni sikaDaniel.
Uma eseshiye uDaniel esikoleni, uhamba u-500m aye lapho efunda khona.
Unyaka wokuqala lona ebuyele esikoleni kanti uthishanhloko walapho efunda khona uyamncoma.
Ngokomthetho kufanele ukuba ngabe u-Ombeni uqedela ukufunda enyuvesi. Imfundo yakhe nempilo yakhe kwathikamezeka eminyakeni emihlanu edlule.
Ngaleso sikhathi wayeneminyaka engu-15. Kwakuthi uma engayile esikoleni asebenze emasimini akubo.
Wayesebenza ekhaya mhla ethunjwa amavukela-mbuso. Kwaphela izinyanga eyisigqila sawo, emhlukumeza ngokocansi nangokomzimba ehamba ehlala naye ezinkanjini ezisemngceleni waseRwanda.
Wayekhulelwe esengozini yokufa ngenxa yokungadli ngesikhathi ephindiselwa ekhaya kubazali bakhe.
Ngenhlanhla akazange afe. Manje useqhubeka nempilo yakhe.
U-Daniel uyasithanda isikole kanti unabangani abaningi.
Ngonyaka ozayo umama wakhe uyobe efundela ukuba nguthisha enyuvesi.
U-Ombeni ufuna ukuyishiya indawo yangakubo uma esesebenza athenge umuzi kwenye indawo ephephile.
Phezu kwazo zonke izinto ezamehlela, uzibona enenhlanhla. Baningi abantu baseDRC abaphila ngokuhlukunyezwa abangakaphumeli obala ngako.
Ukwesaba
Ukwesaba kubhalwe emehlweni abantu abahlala emngceleni osempumalanga yalesi sifunda. Kubahlaseli kukhona ama-Interahamwe, amaHutu abaleka eRwanda ngo-1994 emva kokubulala abantu; umbutho wamasosha aseCongo; abahlaseli abahlukahlukene abahlomile; kanye nabahlaseli abayizakhamizi.
"Bonke badlwengula abesimame," kusho uChristine Deschryver, osebenzela inhlangano yaseGerman esiza abantu. "Wonke umuntu obonakala egqoke izingubo zombutho wezempi uyisitha kwabesimame."
Le nkinga yaqala emva kwesibhicongo sokubulawa kwabantu eRwanda ngo-1994. Iningi labahlaselwa nabahlaseli leqa umngcele. Abalelwa ku-10 000 amasosha eFDLR ahlala emahlathini ahlukumeza abantu.
ElaseRwanda alisabafuni kanti nabo abafuni ukuphindela emuva. Sengathi namasosha aseCongo awazimisele ngokubaphoqa ukuba bahambe kanti njengoba iningi lamasosha like lihlale izinyanga lingaholi, libona kungcono ukuphanga lithumbe abantu.
Abahlukumezi basaqhubeka nokucekela phansi impilo yabantu kanti siyanda isibalo sabahleli kabuhlungu ngenxa yabo. Abantu bahlaselwa nsuku zonke.
"Usizi lwaseDarfur luwubala uma uluqhathanisa nolwaseCongo," kusho uDeschryver, osaqhubeka nokuphumela obala ngosizi lwabesimame baseCongo phezu kokwesatshiswa ngokubulawa.
Intukuthelo
Akukuphela kwakhe othukutheliswa yilesi simo. UDkt. Mukwege osebenzela eBukavu oseneminyaka engu-20 enza umsebenzi wakhe ubhekene nomsebenzi wokusiza abahlukunyezwa ngokocansi.
Uphethe ePanzi Hospital, isibhedlela esavulwa ngo-1999 esineziguli ezingaphezulu kuka-350.
Ngosuku, kulaliswa iziguli ezingu-10 kulesi sibhedlela kanti ezinye zisuke zineminyaka engu-9. Ezinye zisuke zidlwengulwe kabi kuze kudingeke ukuba zihlinzwe.
UDkt. Mukwege akazi noma siyakhula yini isibalo seziguli zabo.
Sebeyakwazi ukuhlukanisa abahlaseli ngenxa yendlela abahlasela ngayo - abanye bashutheka umbhobho wesibhamu esithweni sowesimame sangasese emva kokumdlwengula, badubule isitho sakhe sangasese ophe kakhulu.
Abanye baphoqa amadoda bathi awadlwengule omama bawo nodadewabo bewakhombe ngezibhamu kubuka umphakathi. Iningi labahlaseli lineHIV.
Okwenzeka eMpumalanga yeCongo kucekela phansi isizwe sonke.
Kuncane okwenziwayo ukukunqanda. "Ngike ngibone amadoda adidekile," kusho uDkt. Mukwege. "Awakwazi ukuqhubeka nempilo emva kokuhlukunyezwa kwamakhosikazi awo nemindeni yawo.
"Asikwazi ukungakushayi mkhuba okwenzeka kule ndawo sizikhohlise ngokuthi kuwubuqaba njengoba abanye besho."
Uma uDkt. Mukwege esecelwa ukuba ayosiza iziguli zakhe, kusuke sekumi ezinye iziguli ngaphandle zilindele ukusitshela izigameko zokuhlaselwa kwazo.
Babulawa
UMugoli Muhamiri wayelindele ababemenywe emshadweni wakhe ngesikhathi evulela ababengqongqoza emnyango ezinyangeni eziyisithupha ezedlule. Kwangena idlanzana lamadoda esikhundleni sezihlobo zakhe.
Waboshwa izandla kwavulwa imilenze yakhe amadoda ashintshana ngaye emdlwengula.
Kwathi uma ephonsa amehlo kubahlaseli, wabona benquma umqala wendoda yakhe, izingane zakhe ezimbili zabulawa. Zazineminyaka emibili. Uthi wababala baze baba yisikhombisa abesilisa abamdlwengula emva kwalokho waquleka.
Manje usesele nendodana yakhe uStephen ongazi ukuthi umama wakhe uneHIV. "Ngixhaswe kakhulu ngosizo lokwelashwa kule ndawo kanti ngiyazi ukuthi ngelinye ilanga ngizofa," kusho yena.
"Imithi yami angiyiphuzi kahle ngoba anginakudla. Okungiphatha kabi wukuthi ingane yami izosala ingenamama ingenababa uma sengifile."
Owokugcina esakhuluma naye nguFuraha Tajiri oneminyaka engu-15 wasesifundeni saseNinja. Amasosha amhlasela ebusuku ambopha izandla amshaya kanye nabazali bakhe.
"Ngawabona ebulala abazali bami," kusho yena. "Emva kwalokho angithatha aya nami ehlathini. Ayengu-17. Ngahlala ehlathini izinyanga eziyisithupha ngidlwengulwa amadoda amabili ngosuku."
Umhlatshelo
Uzwa kukhulunywa ngento eyodwa eMpumalanga yeCongo. Kuzwakala noma bekhuluma abantu bakhona ukuthi balahle ithemba. Sebephenduke umhlatshelo.
Ngesikhathi uKofi Annan ese-museum yesibhicongo sokubulawa kwabantu eKigali, eRwanda, kuthiwa wezwakalisa ukuphatheka kwakhe kabi ngesigameko sokubulawa kwabantu ngo-1994. Bayisigidi abantu baseRwanda abafa ikhona iNhlangano yeZizwe. Ngokusho kwakhe, kukhona eyayingakwenza le nhlangano.

UKUBHALA
I-CV
Ukufaka isithombe
Abanye bathi ukufaka isithombe sakho kwiCV izoyenza ivelele.
Ngabe kufanele ngikwenze? Ukufaka isithombe sakho mhlawumbe ngeke kube namthelela kubaqashi abafuna ukunika bonke abantu ithuba elilinganayo ngaphandle kokubukeka kwabo, kusho iWebsite my-cv.net. Ukubukeka kwakho akubalulekile ekukutholeleni umsebenzi.
Kodwake imisebenzi efana nokumodela, ukudlala ezithombeni nokuba ngumsizi emabhanoyini - kungadinga mhlawumbe ukuba uthumele isithombe.
Umthetho omile ngothi thumela isithombe uma uceliwe ukuba ukwenze lokho.
Enza ngendlela eyiyo: "Uma uceliwe ukuba uthumele isithombe sakho, qiniseka ukuthi ubukeka kahle," kusho uDeborah Gage ongomunye wabaqashi kwi-agent eqashayo.
Uma ungowesimame faka i-make-up kancane. Uma ungowesilisa, shefa uma kunesidingo.
Kungcono futhi ukuba yisithombe owasithatha ugqoke kahle. Ungathumeli isithombe sakho owasithatha useholidini ebhishi ushaye izibuko ezinkulu.
Ama-font amahle
Maningi ama-font ongawasebenzisa uma u-typer iCV yakho. Ama-font angumndeni wezinhlamvu zamagama. I-font ngayinye - noma umndeni - unokubukeka kwawo. Ukwenza isibonelo, i-font esetshenziswa kuBONA yiyo lena ebizwa ngokuthi yi-"Arial".
Kufanele ngikwenze? Bambelela kwi-Arial noma i-Times New Roman. Uma unomuntu okwenzela iCV yakho, mtshele asebenzise lawa ma-font nokuyiwona kuphela (afika nawo wonke ama-PCs).
Enza ngendlela eyiyo: I-font oyisebenzisayo akufanele ibe ncane kuno-10 points futhi ingabi nkulu kuno-12-points:
Ukwenza iCV yakho ibukeke kahle
Abanye abafuna umsebenzi baye bacabange ukuthi ukuhlobisa amaCV abo ngezithombe ezinhle nangemihlobiso, iyona ndlela.
Kufanele ngikwenze? Cha! Lokhu ngeke kukhombise umqashi noma i-agent yokuqasha ukuthi ungumuntu owufanele lo msebenzi. Kunalokho, kungabacasula kubenze mhlawumbe bayeke ngisho nokubheka iCV yakho.
Enza ngendlela eyiyo: I-CV yakho kufanele icace ingabi nama-cartoons noma imidwebo yama-rainbow. Sebenzisa iphepha elimhlophe kuphela.
Ulimi olungajwayelekile
Uyakholwa noma cha, abanye abantu bacabanga ukuthi ukusebenzisa ulimi lwamaSMS kuzokwenza ubukeke uhlakaniphile.
Kufanele ngikwenze? Cha! Ngisho nasencwadini ehambisana neCV yakho imbala. Gwema futhi izifingqo zamagama (abbreviations).
Enza ngendlela eyiyo: Bingelela ngokuyikho, kanjalo nesiphetho - ngokusho kweWebsite ethi: usingenglish.com.
Ukwenza isibonelo, isibingelelo kufanele kube nguDear Sir noma Dear Madam hhayi ukuthi Hi noma Howzit noma Eita.
Vala incwadi yakho ngokuthi Yours faithfully (uma ungalazi igama laloyo muntu) noma Yours sincerely (uma ulazi igama laloyo muntu).
Uma umqashi esebenzise izifingqo zamagama, wena sebenzisa indlela elula, kodwa usebenzise amatemu afanele lapho kukhona okuchazayo.[z]

Indlela yokulwa nobugebengu
Njengoba izibalo zeziphathimandla zikhomba ukuthi liyehla izinga lobugebengu, iningi labantu baseMzansi aliboni kanjalo - abantu abasazihluphi ngokubika ngobugebengu ngoba bakholwa wukuthi amaphoyisa ngeke abasize ngalutho. Kodwa ikhona indlela esingalwa nabo ngayo futhi sinqobe... indaba NguGAVIN FOSTER
UBUGEBENGU bulibulele leli lizwe, kodwa singakwazi ukuyinqoba le nkinga uma abantu abanjengami nawe bebambisana ekulweni nayo. Izinhlaka zababhekele ukuphepha kwezakhamuzi endaweni (neighbourhood watches), ama-community policing forums nama-community safety forums zingasebenza ngokubambisana ekwenzeni ukuba impilo yezigebengu ibe nzima zikhuthaze namaphoyisa okufanele ukuba avikele abantu.
Uma kukhulunywa ngabaqaphi bendawo kusuke kuvumelene abantu abahlala endaweni ngokuthi akuqaphelwe abantu ababukeka besolisa. Baxhumana bodwa babuye bathinte namaphoyisa, amavolontiya enza lo msebenzi aphume umkhankaso wokuhlola izitaladi kusihlwa ukuze izinswelaboya zingazenzeli umathanda.
Uma kukhona oya eholidini, omakhelwane bamgadela umuzi wakhe umphakathi ugade nezimoto ezisolisayo ezilokhu zibonakala zizulazula endaweni, kuthathwe nama-number plates azo, lolo lwazi ludluliselwe nakwabanye.
Uma bebamba izigebengu, mabazidlulisele emaphoyiseni zijeziswe ngendlela efanele - mabangaziphatheli umthetho.
AmaCommunity Policing Forums (CPF) yizinhlaka ezinamandla athe xaxa kunababheki bendawo kanti uyancomeka umsebenzi awenza ezindaweni ezinjengaseWestern Cape.
AmaCPF, okufanele ngokomthetho axhaswe yileso naleso siteshi samaphoyisa, anekomiti elakhiwe amalungu omphakathi, amaqembu ezenkolo, amaqembu entsha, amaqembu ezemidlalo, yizinhlangano zamatekisi, amakhansela nosomabhizinisi abasebenza bebambisene nesiteshi samaphoyisa neziphathimandla ezisebenza kuleso siteshi.
I-CPF ihlangana kanye ngenyanga ibonisane ngokwenzeka endaweni.
Kudingidwa izihloko ezithinta ubugebengu nezinto ezibhebhezela ubugebengu njengokungakhanyi kukagesi emigwaqweni namashibhi angekho emthethweni kwenziwe nezincomo ukuze kuqedwe izinkinga.
Okuhle kakhulu ngeCPF wukuthi ibheka ngisho nokusebenza kwamaphoyisa uma kunemihlangano, kutshelwe iziphathimandla uma amaphoyisa engaziphethe kahle, engawenzi kahle umsebenzi noma engawugcini umthetho.
I-CPF ivame ukumela bonke abaqaphi bendawo abasebenza nesiteshi samaphoyisa ababambisene naso.
I-Community Safety Forum (CSF) wuhlaka olusanda kwethulwa olusebenzela endaweni ebanzi kuneCPF - ingasebenza endaweni esizwa yiziteshi zamaphoyisa ezinhlanu kuye kweziyisithupha kanti igxila kakhulu ekulweni nobugebengu.
NgoMay ngonyaka odlule, uCharles Nqakula onguNgqongqoshe wezokuPhepha nokuVikela wathi izinhlangano ezintsha zizosebenzela ezindaweni ezisabalele kunabaqaphi bendawo namaCPF.
Zizosebenza neminyango kahulumeni njengowezaseKhaya ukuze kuqashelwe izifika-namthwalo ezingena kuleli ngokungemthetho, basize abezokwaKhiwa kweziMilo ohlelweni lokufakwa kweziboshwa eziphuma emajele emphakathini, basebenze noMnyango wezobuLungiswa ekuqinisekiseni ukuthi umphakathi uyawazi futhi uyawaqonda amalungelo awo.
Kukhona okubuye kulubhedise lolu hlelo. Maningi amaphoyisa akhohlakele angawenzi kahle umsebenzi wawo kodwa angaphansi kwalolu hlelo. Uma engabambisene nabantu abenza okusemandleni abo ukuthi iSA ibe yindawo engcono, ngeke itholakale imiphumela encomekayo. [z]
BONA ZULU June 2008
GETTING INVOLVED
Ukuqala
Xhumana nesiteshi samaphoyisa esiseduze uthole ukuthi kulezi zinhlaka esizibalile lukhona yini asebenalo (ukuze ungachithi isikhathi sakho usebenzele phezu kwento evele isikhona). Uma lukhona, thola izinombolo zocingo ubathinte ucele ukuba yingxenye yalo.
Qala ngeCommunity Safety Forum uye kwiCPF nabaqaphi bendawo, ngaleyo ndlela uzothola ukwesekwa ukhomishana weSAPS noMnyango wezaseKhaya neminye iminyango kahulumeni. UNgqongqoshe uNqakula wakhipha nesethembiso sokuthi amaCommunity Safety Forums aziwayo azoxhaswa ngemali ukuze abe namahhovisi awo. Buza ngalokhu ubahluphe uma ungalutholi usizo.
Khetha abantu abafanele ozobabeka ezikhundleni. Qoka abantu abanolwazi ngalo msebenzi kunokuthola okusazodingeka ukuba ubaqeqeshe. Uma ufuna amaphoyisa ozosebenzisana nawo, xhumana nalusizo anesikhathi enza lo msebenzi.
Ningakuvumeli ukuphelelwa wumdlandla uma seniqalile ukusebenza. Abantu bavame ukuqala izinto ngomdlandla bagcine sebekhathele.
Uma isiteshi samaphoyisa enisebenzisana naso singabambisene nani, xhumanani noMnyango wokuPhepha koMphakathi nokuXhumana ozonisiza ukuze izinto zenzeke . Bhalelani abaphethe kwiSAPS nibhalele nasemaphepheni uma nibona ukuthi imizamo yenu ayishaywa mkhuba. Ngakolunye uhlangothi, uma amaphoyisa ebambisene kahle nani, watsheleni nincome ningawafihleli.

Kungani kuKUHLE ukuzonda isikole...
AKUMANGAZI neze kukhona abantu abasizondayo isikole. UFat Charlie ubezokhathazeka ukube bekungenjalo. Isikole siyacasula kakhulu, kodwa futhi yinto okumele yenziwe kuhle kohambo lokuya kudokotela wamazinyo - sona sehluke ngokuthi siluhambo oluthatha iminyaka engu-12.
Njengamanje isikole sesiphenduke indawo yeziqhwaga neyokuhlukumeza ngokocansi, enothisha abangamavila nezindlu zokufundela othi lapho uzibuka ubone ukuthi nemijondolo ingcono.
Bafowethu nodadewethu, akufanele ukungasithandi kwethu isikole kume endleleni yethu yokuba sifunde.
Singaphambanisi izinto ezimbi ezingenzeka esikoleni nokuthola ulwazi.
Sekuphele iminyaka engaphezu kweyikhulu ochwepheshe bezemfundo begxeka indlela izinto ezenzeka ngayo ezikoleni. Kulokhu angikhulumi nje kuphela ngento eyenzeka eS Africa - ngikhuluma ngento eyenzeka emhlabeni jikelele.
Izindlela ezintsha sezike zazanywa kule minyaka edlule kodwa azithelanga zithelo. Uma siza ngasemfundweni, kukhulu kakhulu ukungaphumeleli okukhona, kangangoba baningi abagcina bengakwazi ukufunda nokubhala, ikusasa labo lize lilungiswe ngezombusazwe.
Kuyo yonke le ndlela yemfundo sonke esesiyazi nesesiyijwayele - akukho esingakwenza ngaphandle kokubambelela kuyona.
Ngenxa yalokhu, okuhle wukuba sisebenzise wonke amathuba esinawo. Kufanele sikwenze lokhu ngoba noma yisiphi isikole esikhona ezweni, siyindlela ebange kweliqhakazile ikusasa.
N JENGAMAJELE nezindawo zokugcina abantu abakhubazeke ngokomqondo, izikole nazo zifana nazo zonke izindawo ezinjalo okufanele zibhekane nabantu abaningi abakhuliswa ngezindlela ezihlukene. Izikole zidinga imithetho ukuze yonke into ihambe kahle.
Akulula ukufundisa uma kukhona abantu abanganakile abazenzela izinto zabo noma abazixoxelayo.
Nakhu okunye bafowethu nodadewethu: uma ungomunye walabo abahlale bephazamisa ukuqhubeka kwezinto, izingane ezihlakaniphile zizobambelela entweni ezayizela. Kodwa khumbula ukuthi uzilimaza wena hhayi abanye abantu.
Noma yikuphi lapho uya khona uzohlangabezana nemithetho ebekwe ngabanye abantu. Ngakhoke lokhu makube ngenye yezinto noma yezifundo ozifunda esikoleni - nokuthi ungaphila kanjani phezu kwemithetho eshayiwe.
Ake ubuke labo bantu abaqhuba kahle esikoleni. Kungani beqhuba kahle" Yingoba bona behlakaniphe kakhulu kunawe"
Cha akunjalo. Yingoba bayakwazi ukulandela imithetho. Lokhu kungaba yinto enhle kube yinto embi futhi.
Okuhle futhi wukuthi abangeni ezinkingeni. Okubi wukuthi labo bantu abaqhuba kahle esikoleni, ngokuvamile bafike bazabalaze kanzima enyuvesi ngoba lapho kufanele ukwazi ukuzifundela ngokwakho uyiqonde kahle into kunokuyifaka enhliziyweni.
Kodwa lokhu makungabi yisizathu sokuba wenze kabi esikoleni ngethemba lokuthi uzokwenza ngcono enyuvesi.
Ngeke ufinyelele lapho uma ucabanga kanjalo. Inyuvesi inemithetho yayo, omunye wemikhulu ngothi akekho onendaba uma ungayi ezifundweni ufeyila. Akekho futhi ozwa izikhalazo zakho ngisho noma uxolisa.
Ngakhoke funda kulabo abenza kahle esikoleni. Engikushoyo wukuthi buza kubona ukuthi benza kanjani ubacele bakucacisele lapho ungezwa khona.
Ngaphezu kwakho konke uzokwazi ukuzitholela abangani abasha - uthole nokuthi kunezinto abazizondayo ngesikole.
Mhlawumbe ningakwazi lapho seninonke ukubuyisana ehlathini nakhane ngokuyikho. Mhlawumbe abanye bazibona bebandlululekile ngenxa yokuthi bakhaliphile - mhlawumbe ungabasiza nabo babe yingxenye yabangani bakho.
MASIBHUKULE sizibambele ngokwethu bafowethu nodadewethu sizitshele ukuthi abekho abantu abahlakaniphe kunabanye, nathi singafana nabo.
UFat Charlie ngeke umdide nakancane ngoba uyazi ukuthi ziningi izikole ezingenazo izidingo ezifanele ekuqhubeni imfundo noma ezinothisha abangamavila abehluleka wukufundisa.
Into ekhathaza kakhulu uFat Charlie yimimoya abantu abasha abazithatha ngayo izinto - bahlale bengenakho ukwenama - ningakwenzi lokho uma sekuziwa ngasesikoleni.
Lokhu uma usukucabanga, kufana ncamashi nomfaniswano wesikole nokuyilapho bonke abafundi bebukeka befana uma bewufakile kodwa ngaphakathi bangabantu abehlukene.
Ngisho kungaba khona okukucasulayo esikoleni ongakuthandi, kodwa makungakuxabanisi nemfundo ngoba iyona ebalulekile.
Ngisho ngabe uzimisele ngokuba yini lapho usukhulile kufanele uzimisele ngokuphasa uphumelele ngendlela efanele ukuze kufezeke amaphupho akho.
Uma isikole sakho singenazo izinto ezisezingeni elifanele lokuqhuba ukufunda, nguwe okumele ubone ukuthi wenzenjani, ungavakashela kuma-library, ucele abangani bakusize ukuze nawe uphase.
Ngaleyo ndlela yokuzisiza uzokwazi ukufunda amanye amakhono ngoba ubuhle bempilo emhlabeni wukufunda amakhono amaningi sizazele ngokwethu izinto.
Ngakhoke bafowethu nodadewethu akulona icala ukungasithandi isikole - kodwa nihlale nazi ukuthi siyisisekelo sekusasa eliqhakazile lezimpilo zethu.[z]

SAHLANGANA esitolo eMalamulele eLimpopo. NgoFebruary, 2008 ngethembisa uTsakane umshado wavuma. Izinto zazihamba kahle ekuqaleni. Ngangineminyaka engu-28 futhi ngizinikele kakhulu ngoba ngangifuna umshado.
Emva kwalokho, zaqala izinkinga. Kwakuthi lapho ngimnike imali, athi ayanele. Njengoba ngangiyimenenja enkampanini yezokuvakasha, ngangingeke ngithi isimo sami sezezimali sasingesihle, kodwa ngangiqaphela kakhulu uma kuziwa ngasezimalini ngoba ngangifuna ukongela ikusasa lethu.
Ngangicabanga ukuthi uzoqonda ukuthi ngakha umuzi wethu futhi ngongela nelobolo. Kodwa ngicabanga ukuthi njengoba wayeneminyaka engu-21, izinga lokucabanga kwakhe lalingekho eqophelweni eliphezulu.
Kukaningi siba nezingxabano ngenxa yezezimali. Wayenokungidelela engishawoda ngisho naphambi kwabafowethu abadala. Ngamthatha ngamusa kuMfundisi wethu owafike wangicela ukuba ngimxolele - nami ngakwenza lokho.
Kwathi ngasekupheleni konyaka odlule, wathi useyangishiya. Saphinde sabuyelana ngoFebruary kodwa saphinde sehlukana futhi emva kokuxabana ngenxa yemali. UTsakane waqala ukufika endlini ebusuku angingqongqozele emnyango. Kwakuthi lapho ngingavuli, ashaye emafasiteleni, kuthi lapho futhi ngimziba ahlale emnyango ubusuku bonke alinde kuze kube yisekuseni ukuze akhulume nami.
Kwakuthi lapho ngenze iphutha lokushiya ifasitela livulekile, angene ngalo.
Ngelinye ilanga wazama ukuzibulala ngokuphuza umuthi wokwelapha ngokweqisa. Kwathi uma kungaphumeleli lokho, wathatha ibhande wathi uyozikhunga ehlathini uma ngingamamukeli futhi.
Angesatshiswa kalula, kodwa ngaqala ngakhathazeka ngicabanga ukuthi mhlawumbe ungenwe yimimoya emibi. Ngabona kungcono ukuba ngithole incwadi engivikelayo (protection order) emaphoyiseni. Afike angeluleka ngokuthi kungakuhle ukuba ngiyobikela nabadala abaphethe endaweni.
Abaphathi abadala basendaweni bambiza uTsakane bamtshela ukuthi ulahla amathuba okuba sibuyelane futhi bathi bazomkhipha inyumbazana uma bephinda bezwa izindaba ngaye.
Useyekile ukungikhathaza. Manje sengishaywa umoya kalula nakuba ngingakabi nesiqiniseko ngokuphelele ukuthi ngeke ngiphinde ngisamuzwa efasiteleni ebusuku.

Isihogo esisemhlabeni
BABEHAMBA ngamahhashi. “Ngangisesikoleni ngesikhathi behlasela. Umzala wami uMona wayegijima phambi kwami ngesikhathi edutshulwa. Ngama ngambamba ngesandla. Isandla sakhe ngezwa sidedeleka kwesami ngesikhathi kuphuma umphefumulo wakhe. Abanye abafana bathi angiqhubeke ngibaleke. Ngenza njengokusho kwabo,” kusho uSumaya oneminyaka engu-15.
Endleleni uSumaya wahlangana nogogo wakhe nomfowabo uMozamel oneminyaka emine. Wathatha umfowabo babaleka.
“Sagijima ngaze ngakhathala,” kusho yena. Wayesecabanga ukumfihla otshanini uMozamel ngoba wayesinda kodwa ugogo wabo wathi mabahlale ndawonye.
Kwaphela amasonto amabili ngaphambi kokuba bahlangane nomndeni wabo.
Bahamba ibanga elingu-150km beya eKalma Camp, okuyinkambo eseningizimu yeDarfur yabantu abaxoshwa yisihluku samasosha aseSudan nombutho wezempi weJanjaweed.
Babalelwa ezigidini ezimbili abantu abagcwele ezinkanjini zababaleki okungelula ukuba bafinyelele kuzona abanika abantu usizo.
“Kungcono ugibele indiza ube phezulu emoyeni ukuze ulubone kahle usizi lwaseDarfur,” kusho enye intatheli.
“Uma ulapho ubona izinkulungwane zamatende asezinkanjini zababaleki.”
Bangu-200 000 asebefile – babulawa yizifo noma yindlala. I-United Nations ayikazitholi izibalo zabafa ngenxa yezimpi kanti isimo saseDarfur isichaza njenge “nhlekelele embi kunazo zonke emhlabeni.”
Ezinye izinhlangano zisola elaseSudan ngalesi sibhicongo.
I-DARFUR – igama lesi-Arab elichaza “ikhaya lamaFur” – yisifunda esisentshonalanga yeSudan, esisemngceleni weCentral African Republic, Libya neChad. Izinxushunxushu kuleli lizwe zaqala nge-13th Century. Ngaleso sikhathi amaBaggara – ama-Arab anesikhumba esimnyama – athuthela kulesi sifunda okwakuhlala kusona amaFur, Masalit namaZaghawa.
Nakuba lezi zinhlanga kungezamaSulumane, zazivame ukungaboni ngaso linye. I-Darfur yayiphambili ekuhwebeni ngezigqila kanti izigqila zamaFur nama-Arab zazibanga ukungena ezifundeni ezingomakhelwane.
Njengamanje, okwenza ukuba lezi zinxushunxushu zingapheli, wukwehluka kwezidingo zamaqembu athintekayo ngasohlangothini lwezomnotho. AmaFur namaMasalit angabalimi, kanti ama-Arab angabelusi abahamba behlala noma kuphi nokuyinto esidale ukuba kube nokungqubuzana kubangwa umhlaba namanzi.
Emva kokuba elaseSudan lithole inkululeko ngo-1956, kuhulumeni kwakwande uhlanga lwama-Arab kanti sekuqubuke izimpi zomkhaya ezimbili esezidonse isikhathi eside kuliwa nabangewona amaSulumane abahlala eningizimu.
Ekuqaleni kuka-2003, izinhlangano ezimbili zamavukela-mbuso eDarfur – iJustice And Equality Movement (JEM) neSudan Liberation Movement (SLM) – zagxeka uhulumeni ngokucindezela abangewona ama-Arab.
I-SLM yinhlangano edlelana namaFur namaMasalit, kanti iJEM yona izwana namaZaghawa asenyakatho yeDarfur.
NGO-FEBRUARY 2003, amavukela-mbuso eJEM neSLM ahlasela amasosha nezakhiwo zikahulumeni. I-Khartoum yaphendula ngokuhlasela isemoyeni isiza ama-Arab ngombutho weJanjaweed, owawuhlonyiswe nguhulumeni.
Leso sigameko saphenduka saba yindlela “yokushatshalaliswa kohlanga” phezu kokuba lezo zinhlanga zombili zimnyama zingamaSulumane.
“Abantu abafika eDarfur bavame ukuthi, ‘Aphi ama-Arab? Kwenziwa yini ukuba laba bantu babe nebala elimnyama?’” kusho uMahjoub Mohamed Saleh, umhleli wephephandaba laseSudan i-Al-Ayam.
“Lezi zinhlanga ziyashada eDarfur. Indoda iba nonkosikazi ongum-Arab nongum-Africa. Lokhu zakwenza eminyakeni eminingi edlule ngenxa yezizathu zepolitiki.
“Akucaci ukuthi ngubani ozaziyo izinhlanga zaseDarfur.”
I-Darfur ayinakiwe uhulumeni waseKhartoum. Zincane kabi izikole nemitholampilo kulesi sifunda uma uqhathanisa nezinye zaseSudan.
Ngesikhathi elaseDarfur lihlaselwe yindlala ngo-1984, abasinda lapho babephila ngezitshalo zasendle nezithelo. Kulezi zinsuku abakwazi nokwenza lokho ngoba abasinda endlaleni bayahlaselwa, badlwengulwe noma babulawe.
ISIVUMELWANO sokubekwa phansi kwezikhali esasayinwa ngo-April 2004 asisizanga ngalutho kanti ne-UN yabika ukuthi izindawo ezinabantu abangesiwo ama-Arab yizona ezihlaselwayo. Kwezinye izindawo uthola ukuthi ibanga elihlukanisa indawo ehlala amaFur ecekelwe phansi neyama-Arab lingaphansi kuka-500m.
Lesi sibhicongo sathatha elinye igxathu ngesikhathi izifiki ezingu-100 000 zibalekela emazweni angomakhelwane anjengeChad. Zaxoshwa umbutho weJanjaweed owatholana phezulu namasosha kahulumeni waseChad emngceleni walawa mazwe.
NgoJuly 30, i-UN yanika uhulumeni waseSudan umnqamula juqu wezinsuku ezingu-30 ukuze iphuce iJanjaweed izikhali. Akuzange kwenzeke lokho.
“Okukhathaza amazwe ngamazwe ngalolu daba lwaseDarfur wukuhlaselwa kwendawo enamaSulumane eSudan,” kusho umongameli waseSudan u-Omar al-Bashir.
NgokweHuman Rights Watch, azisekho izindawo okuhlala kuzona uhlanga lwamaMasalit angama “islam” namaFur eDarfur. “Konke abangaziphilisa ngako okunjengemfuyo, ukudla, imithombo, izingubo zokulala nokokugqoka kushabalalisiwe.
“Ezinye izindawo zithungelwa ngomlilo.
“Ukucanasa kweJanjaweed kwenza abantu bangaphephi nasezinkanjini ngoba iyabulala, idlwengule intshontshe nezimpahla zokusiza ababaleki.”
Ngo-August 2004, i-African Union yathumela amasosha angu-300 ayezovikela abaqaphe ukuthula – lawo masosha ayenganikwanga umyalo wokuvikela abantu.
Umbiko weWorld Health Organisation owakhishwa ngenyanga eyalandela leyo wakhomba ukuthi bangaphezulu kuka-10 000 abantu abafa nyanga zonke eDarfur.
Uhulumeni waseSudan akasishayanga mkhuba isexwayiso se-UN sonswinyo kanti ngo-October amazwe anjengeLibya, Sudan, Egypt, Nigeria neChad ayichitha eyosizo lwamazwe asetshonalanga.
NAKUBA izingxoxo zokuzama ukuba kube nokuthula zase ziqalwe kabusha, amasosha aseSudan aqhubeka ahlasela izinkambo zababaleki i-Abu Sharif ne-Otash. NgoNovember 10, 2004 emva kokuba iJEM neSLM besayine izivumelwano ezimbili zesikhashana zokuzama ukuxazulula le nkinga, kwahlaselwa izindawo ezinababaleki phambi kwabaqaphi be-UN ne-African Union.
NgoNovember 22, emva kokuba iJanjaweed inqabe ukukhokhela imfuyo edolobheni laseTawila enyakatho yeDarfur, amavukela-mbuso ahlasela iziteshi zamaphoyisa eziphethwe nguhulumeni. I-Khartoum yaphendula ngokulicekela phansi ngamabhomu leli dolobha.
Ngo-April 2005, kwezwakala ukuthi iMelika yakhe “ubuhlobo kwezobunhloli” nohulumeni waseSudan.
Uhulumeni kaBush wayeka ukuyibiza ngesibhicongo sokubulawa kwezinye izinhlanga eDarfur le nhlekelele wathi izibalo ezikhishwa i-UN zinkulu kakhulu.
Phakathi kwabagxeka uMongameli uBashir kukhona noHassan al-Turabi, obiza u-Osama bin Laden ngeqhawe. Kulula ukuthola isizathu esenza iMelika ingakuboni okubi kuBashir phezu kokuhlukumeza kwakhe amalungelo abantu ngoba phela wanika uTurabi isigwebo sokutokela ekhaya.
NgoJuly isimo saba ngcono kulesi sifunda. I-Senegal, Gambia, Kenya neSouth Africa bathumela amasosha eDarfur kanti ngoJuly 10, owayehola amavukela-mbuso uJohn Garang wagcotshwa njengesekela likamongameli waseSudan kwadwetshwa nomthetho-sisekelo omusha.
Ngo-August 1 uGarang wafa engozini yokuphahlazeka kwendiza. Lokho kwathikameza imizamo yokugcina ukuthula kulesi sifunda.
Ngenyanga eyalandelayo, iJanjaweed yahlasela i-Aro Sharow okuyindawo ehlala ababaleki nokwaba yisenzo esabhebhezela izimpi.
Kwabuye kwahlaselwa naBaqaphi bokuThula be-African Union intshonalanga yeDarfur yaba yingozi ngisho nakwabasiza ababaleki.
UDABA losizo lwamazwe asentshonalanga luseyindida. UMongameli uMbeki wathi “kusemqoka ukuba izwekazi lase-Africa lixazulule izinkinga zalo.
“Asicelanga mazwe angaphandle ukuba atshale amasosha eDarfur, elase-Africa okumele lenze lowo msebenzi nokuyinto elingayenza kahle.”
“Lokho kukhomba ukuthi ohulumeni base-Africa banesifiso sokuxazulula izinkinga zabo,” kubhala uSusan Rice owayengumsizi kanobhala wesizwe e-US kwezithinta elase-Africa ebhala kwiWashington Post.
Wengeza ngelithi, nakuba ukushiywa kweMelika ngaphandle kungayithokozisa, ungqongqoshe wezangaphandle eSenegal uCheikh Gadio uyakuchitha ukuthi amasosha e-African Union angakuqeda ukubulawa kwabantu eDarfur.
Njengoba elaseSenegal linomlando omuhle wokugcina ukuthula, amazwi kaGadio kumele abhekisiswe.
“Akubambisane i-UN Security Council, European Union, African Union, ne-United States ukuze sithole elinye ikhambi lokuxazulula inkinga yokuhlupheka kwabantu eDarfur,” kusho yena.
“Ukuthatha izinyathelo zokuvikelwa amazwe omhlaba akusho lutho kunokubulawa kwabantu bezinye izinhlanga,” kuqhuba uRice.
“Ukubulawa kwabantu akusilo udaba oluthinta izifunda. Uhulumeni okhuthaza leso senzo akahlukile kulowo ocindezela abantu.
“Umhlaba wonke uyathinteka ngokubulawa kwabantu…”
Lesi senzo siyicala eliyisihluku esenzeka kwabanoma yiluphi uhlanga, inkolo noma isifunda kanti kusemahlombe omhlaba wonke ukukuqeda lokho.”
Kuzocaca ngokuhamba kwesikhathi ukuthi izivumelwano zokuthula ezasayinwa ngoMay zizoba yimpumelelo yini kodwa osiza abantu kulesiya sifunda wakubeka ngamafuphi ukuthi “kusemqoka ukuthola usizo lwamazwe angaphandle ngoba abantu bayafa.”
“Yimpi ebhekiswe kubantu baseDarfur lena. Abahambisani nayo.” [z]

Amandla olwazi
U-MOSES uyakuthanda ukufunda – uma afunda nabo bedlala ngesikhathi sekhefu, yena umthola ehleli ngaphansi kwesihlahla efunda incwadi. “Ngikukhonzile ukufunda ngoba kusho lukhulu empilweni yami,” kusho yena. Uneminyaka engu-11 kanti ufunda uGrade 4 epulazini eliseTzaneen eLimpopo.
Babili othisha kulesi sikole esinegumbi lokufundela elilodwa. Leli gumbi lisetshenziselwa ukufundisa uGrade 1 no-3, kanti izingane ezenza uGrade 4 no-6 zifundela ku-verandah. Kodwa uMoses Modau nezingane afunda nazo basenhlanhleni...
Isikole sabo sakhelene neMerensky High. NgoLwezine, abafundi baseMerensky badela ikhefu labo bathathe izincwadi e-library yabo baye esikoleni soModau bayobafundisa ukufunda izincwadi.
Abafundi baseMerensky – okungabafana namantombazane – basiza izingane ezincishwe amathuba. “Alukho uhlelo lokusiza olube nesasasa elikhulu kangaka esikoleni sethu,” kusho u-Ellen Labuschagne ofundisa eMerensky.
Ngo-2004, uMargaret Freestone onguthisha, noChristine Nel oyi-librarian kumasipala weGreater Tzaneen, babona isidingo sokuba kucijwe ikhono lokufunda kubafundi abasezikoleni ezisemapulazini. Baqala uhlelo lwe “Paired Reading” lapho izitshudeni ezifunda ezikoleni ezingamaModel C zazizofundisa khona izingane ezisezikoleni ezisemapulazini.
“Othishanhloko babewungabaza lo mbono ngoba lezi zikole zazingaxhumene kahle,” kusho uChristine.
Namuhla zingaphezulu kuka-200 izingane ezithola ukufunda ngenxa yalolu hlelo ezisezikoleni ezinhlanu ezisemapulazini.
INGANE ngayinye efunda esikoleni esisepulazini inikwa umfundi ozoyifundisa. Ofundisayo nomfundi bahlangana kanye ngesonto uma kuvalwe izikole kufundwe incwadi.
Ofundisayo ufunda aphimisele kulandele umfundi ogcina esefunda yedwa ngokuzethemba. Uma kukhona igama angalifundi kahle, omfundisayo uyamfundisa aze alisho kahle.
Le ndlela yokufunda yasungulwa nguDokotela uKeith Topping, weDundee University eseScotland, ngenhloso yokusiza abazali ukuze bacije abantwana behleli ngokunethezeka emakhaya abo.
“Lolu hlelo luyimpumelelo ngoba akugxekwa muntu kuphela nje abafundi bayakhuthazwa,” kusho uChristine.
Lolu hlelo lwaseTzaneen lwethulwa emhlanganweni weLibrary And Information Association Of South Africa owawuseNelspruit ngonyaka odlule. Lwaluyingxenye yezingxoxo emhlanganweni wamazwe ngamazwe wokuthuthukiswa kokufunda owawuseGent, eBelgium ngoDecember ngonyaka odlule.
LOLU hlelo alugcini ngokufundisa izingane zasemapulazini ukufunda kuphela kodwa lubuye lusize ngokuphucula ubudlelwane bezinhlanga ezihlukene nokuqonda abafundi bezinye izinhlanga, amasiko abo, ulimi abalukhulumayo kubonakale nezidingo zabo kwezezimali.
Ngesikhathi kubhalwa lolu daba, abafundi baseMerensky babeqoqa izingubo zokulala nezokugqoka emakhaya abo bezinika abafundi abantulayo abasezikoleni ezisemapulazini. Babuye babhake amakhekhe abawadayisa esikoleni sabo kuthengwe izincwadi ngemali etholakala lapho.
“Kuyintokozo ukuba yingxenye yalolu hlelo olusinika ithuba lokwenza umehluko,” kusho uPaula Ferreira-Jorge ofunda uGrade 12 eMerensky.
Kodwa zikhona izinkinga kanti enkulu kakhulu eyokushoda kwama-library.
“Ukuze konke kuhambe ngendlela, izikole ezithintekayo kumele zibe nama-library. Kusemqoka ukuthi izincwadi ezizotholakala kulawo ma-library zilungele izingane ngoba kusuke kungezokuqala ezinezithombe nezixoxa izindaba izingane ezithola ithuba lokuzifunda,” kusho uChristine.
Ngokusho kwakhe, lolu hlelo lusanda kuthola iminikelo yezincwadi ezisetshenziselwa ukuvula ama-library amancane ezikoleni ezisemapulazini eziyingxenye yalo.
“Sizama ngawo wonke amandla ukuqoqa izincwadi ezibhalwe ngolimi olukhulunywa yizingane sibuye senze nohlelo lwePaired Reading ngolimi lwazo - ikakhulu kuGrade 1 kuya ku-3. Ukufunda izincwadi ngolimi olwaziyo kulula futhi kuyazithokozisa izingane,” kusho uChristine.
U-Emily Lekodi unguthishanhloko e-Inzana Primary School, esinye sezikole ezisemapulazini ezizibandakanye kulolu hlelo. Uthi izingane sezilwenza umdlalo eziwudlala uma zisekhefini lolu hlelo.
“Mkhulu umehluko esiwubonayo ezinganeni. Abanye abafundi bagoduka nezincwadi bayofundisa izingane nabazali emakhaya. Okusho ukuthi sikhulu isibalo sabasizakala ngenxa yalolu hlelo,” kuqhuba yena.
Kuyinhloso yabalusungula ukulusabalalisa kwezinye izikole ezisemapulazini ukuze izingane ezingenazincwadi noma ezingakwazi ukuya ema-library zifunde ukufunda zikuthande.
“Kuyisifiso sethu ukubona leyo naleyo ngane iphila ngokufunda,” kusho uChristine Nel. [z]

lUmkakho nendodakazi babengekho egcekeni lomnini muzi ngokungemthetho.
Umkakho wayekuvakashele njengoba ayekade enza phambilini. Ukuthi phambilini le nja ayikaze ikhombise ukuba nolaka akusho ukuthi kumele ithethelelwe ekuziphatheni kwayo noma lokho kube yinto umnini muzi angazivikela ngayo kuwena.
Umthetho ukucacisa ngokusobala ukuthi, uma isilwane siziphatha ngendlela ehlukile kuneyezinye izilwane zohlobo olufanayo, nokuyilapho siziphatha ngokungafani nokwendalo yaso ngokuhlasela umuntu. Umnini wesilwane nguye okumele abhekane nezindleko zamademeshe alowo muntu ohlaseliwe.
Uma ungakhipha ubufakazi bokuthi le nja ngeyomnini muzi, nokuthi yahlasela ingasukelwanga muntu, unelungelo lokufuna amademeshe kumniniyo.
Ukufuya isilwane wukusenza silungele isimo sokuhlala nabantu ekhaya. Ngokwencwadi yakho kuyacaca ukuthi le nja yayifuyiwe.
Ukuze ukhombise ukuthi amademeshe akho angakanani, kufanele uthole amakhophi ama-akhawunti abo bonke odokotela owahambisa kubo indodakazi yakho.
Ngaphezu kwalokho, kufanele ubuyisele indodakazi yakho kudokotela ukuze ubone ukuthi idinga ukuba yenziwe i-plastic surgery (ukupheshwa emzimbeni) yini ukuze kuncishiswe izibazi okungenzeka ukuthi zikhona.
Izindleko zakho obhekene nazo nezinye zesikhathi esizayo zizoba yingxenye yamademeshe akho.
Okubalulekile futhi, wukuba udokotela wakho akubhalele umbiko wezokwelashwa.
Kulowo mbiko kufanele achaze ukuthi wabonani ngesikhathi ehlola indodakazi yakho okokuqala, iyiphi imithi ayinika yona, ukwelashwa kuqhubeka kanjani, izinhlungu nokuhlupheka indodakazi yakho edlule kukho, izindleko zayo zaba ngakanani nokuthi ezesikhathi esizayo zingaba malini.
Kufanele futhi wenze uhlu lwemithi namaphilisi adambisa izinhlungu indodakazi yakho eyawasebenzisa nokuthi konke kwabiza malini bese ubonana nommeli ozokucubungulela isamba sonke bese ekhipha isamanisi lokufuna amademeshe.

UKUTHOLA abesilisa kulo mfundi waseGoli akusiyo inkinga - inkinga wukuba bamshiye. "Engakapheli amasonto ambalwa bayaqala bashintshe bangiphathe kabi kugcine ngokuphela kothando," kusho yena. "Manje sengiyesaba ukuba sothandweni kangangoba sekuphele cishe iminyaka emine ngingathandani namuntu."
Akuyena kuphela okulesi simo esingathokozisi. "Amasoka ami angishiya ngaphandle kwesizathu," kusho kubhala umfundi wasePort Elizabeth. "Ngabe kukhona mhlawumbe engingakwenzi kahle"" kusho yena egcizelela ukuthi uyalihlonipha isoka lakhe azame nokuba alenze lihlale lithokozile.
Kodwa kubukeka sengathi akukho okumsebenzelayo. "Abanye baze benze nezethembiso zomshado, kodwa bonke bayangishiya. Manje sengididekile," kubhala yena.
"Ngabe kukhona okonakele kimina" Kungani ngihlale ngiba sothandweni nabantu abangathembekile""
Isangoma samtshela ukuthi abesilisa baxoshwa wutikoloshe. "Lokho ngikuthola kunzima ukukukholwa ngoba angikaze ngihlukunyezwe wutikoloshe."
Labo abehlulekayo wukuhlalelana nabantu abathandana nabo isikhathi eside bahlale bezwa amagama afana nesinyama noma isichitho.
Akusikho nje ukungabi nenhlanhla othandweni. Isinyama nesichitho yizinto ezimbili ezingafani. Isinyama ungasehlukanisa ngokwezigaba.
Ukwenza isibonelo, kunenhlobo yesinyama esisebenza ngokufa kwesihlobo segazi. Ukungabi nanhlanhla kwakho othandweni ngeke kudalwe yinoma yini wena noma nophathini wakho eniyenzayo noma eningayenzi.
Kukhona nokungabi nanhlanhla okuhambisana nokuya ocansini nomuntu ongazange agezwe emva kokushona komuntu ayezwana naye. Isichitho, sifana ncamashi nesiqalekiso kunokungabi nanhlanhla ngoba yinto eyenziwa ngamabomu.
Senziwa ngabantu abanezinhloso ezimbi kanti futhi singaba yisifo esithathelana ngokocansi. Lokhu kufa njengegama lako kunganabela kuzo zonke izingxenye zempilo yakho, kubandakanya nothando uqobo.
Kukhona futhi nokunye okungakwenza ungabi nanhlanhla othandweni. Amadlozi athukuthele, ukwenza isibonelo, nawo angadala ingabikho inhlalakahle othandweni. Kungenzeka athukutheliswe wukuthi awusawalandeli amasiko amadala noma awubahloniphi abadala.
Xhumana nesangoma esizokusiza sikubhulele ukuthi kungani ediniwe.
Labo abangenayo inhlanhla othandweni nabo kufanele bahlanzisiswe.
Ngeshwa ngeke ngikwazi ukubanika amagama amakhambi abawadingayo ngoba umuntu onesichitho noma isinyama kungadingeka athole omunye umuntu ukuba amlungisele umuthi. Ngeke ukwazi ukuzigeza. ABANTU abanandaba nokuchitha imali ngesikhathi sikaKhisimusi. Imali yakho isebenzise ngobuhlakani, ungayilahli emagundaneni. Ukudlala ngemali kufana nokuyidabula uyilahle.
Ngiphawula ngamagundane ngoba esinye isifundiswa esesiphelelwe wumsebenzi sabuza sathi: "Ngicela ukwazi ukuthi ngabe izimanga ziyenzeka yini empilweni yomuntu ngosizo lwamagundane aletha imali eningi ngoba ngifuna ukuya kwabazongisiza!"
Ngabe akukwethusi ukuzwa isifundiswa sonke sicabanga ukufaka imali yaso entweni engacacile kanje"
Kodwa akusona sodwa kuphela, bakhona nabanye abathembele entweni efile neyindida njengalena yamagundane.
"Ngifuna izimpuku (amagundane) ezithengiswa ezindaweni ezithile eThekwini," kubhala omunye umfundi wasePort Elizabeth.
"Ngabe la magundane angakwenza isicebi""
Abafuna ukuzama izindlela eziwumbhedo njengalezi kufanele bathole isifundo kokwehlela omunye umfundi.
"Ngangidinga imali ngabona isikhangiso somunye umuntu owelapha ngamakhambi owayethi angabasiza abantu abanenkinga yemali.
"Ngasiphendula leso sikhangiso sakhe wathi kufanele ngithenge 'amagundane emali' amabili ngoba elilodwa ngeke lisebenze."
Amabili abiza u-R1 700. Wayithola imali wahamba waya eMthatha lapho kuhlala khona lona owelaphaya.
Esefikile watshelwa ukuthi olaphayo uzokwenza imigilingwane ethile ukuze amagundane aqale ukwenza umsebenzi wawo.
Ngalokho kwakuzodingeka ukuba akhokhe u-R5 000 ngaphezulu.
"Ngayiboleka kumama leyo mali," kusho owesimame.
Umama wakhe kwadingeka ukuba aye edolobheni ukuze ahlangane nolaphayo amnike imali.
Wamthembisa ukuthi indodakazi yakhe izothola umvuzo omuhle.
"Emva kokuba sengimkhokhelile wathi sesiyobonana ngosuku olulandelayo ukuze enze izinto zakhe anginike namagundane.
"Kodwa osukwini olulandelayo washaya ucingo wathi idlozi lakhe alivumi ukumnika imvume yokuba anginike amagundane nokuthi angelaphe."
Nakuba lo wesimame ayeseqala ukusola ukuthi kukhona okushaya amanzi, walindela eMthatha ebheke ukuba idlozi "likhulule" ongumelaphi.
Umelaphi akazange aphinde axhumane naye.
Ekugcineni, waphindela ekhaya ngoba nemali yayisimphelela.
"Kwakuthi uma ngimshayela ucingo angihleke, aluvale," kusho umfundi.
"Uma kwenzekile saxhumana, wayevele abe nolaka angidelele."
Imali eyakhokhwa ngumfundi ayikaze ibuye.
"Iyangigulisa yonke le nto," kusho umfundi.
"Angilali ebusuku ngicabanga ngayo. Okungikhathaza kakhulu wukuthi le nyanga isaqhubeka idlala ngabantu."
Qaphelani "oklebe" abafuna ukuceba ngani.
Badlala ngani ngoba bazi ukuthi nifuna imali, ngeshwa, imikhuba enjengalena ijwayelekile emsebenzini wokwelapha kanti iyasithunaza isithunzi sabelaphi.
Kungenzeka ukuthi laba bantu abazi lutho ngokwelapha nangobungoma.
Ngisho noma ngabe uyifuna kangakanani imali, ungalokothi uthathe imali yakho yebhonasi, yempesheni noma oyithole emva kokuphelelwa umsebenzi uyinike izinswelaboya.
Kudlalwa ngani kanti futhi ningalahlekelwa yimali yenu!
Ningavumi ukwenziwa iziwula! [z]

BONA ZULU July 2008
ZIVIKELE NGOKWAKHO
I-INSURANCE yemoto yinto enesidingo. Ukukhokha njalo ngenyanga kungaba yinto ebuhlungu, kodwa nguwe osizakalayo lapho untshontshelwe, kuvele ingozi noma okunye nje. Kuningi okungakudida kulokhu.
Kodwa akufanele kube njalo. Ukulandela izinto ezimbalwa ezifanele ongazenza nokubuza imibuzo efanele kungakusiza ekutholeni i-insurance efanele ngemali enhle...
STEP ONE: UKUZILUNGISELELA
1. Buza kwabaseduze
Buza abantu obaziyo ukuthi yinhloboni ye-cover (insurance policy) abanayo, nokuthi obani asebeyithathile, yini labo bantu abayithandayo nabangayithandi nge-insurance plan yabo, noma leyo nkampani bayithola ithembekile yini nokuthi ama-claims bawaqhubekisa ngokushesha kangakanani noma bawenza kanjani.
2. Khombisa izinhloso zakho
Ziningi izinhlobo zama-insurance ahlukene. Ezijwayelekile yilezi:
I-Third Party: Lapha uthathe i-insurance yokulimala okwenzeka kuphela kwenye imoto noma kwenye into uma ingozi kuyiphutha lakho.
I-Third Party, Umlilo nokuNtshontshelwa: Lapha uthathe i-insurance yokulimala eyenzeka kwenye imoto noma impahla uma ingozi kuyiphutha lakho, kanjalo nomlilo nokuntshontshwa kwemoto yakho.
I-Comprehensive Cover: Lapha uthathe i-insurance yokulimala eyenzeka komunye umuntu (third party) - ngengozi, umlilo, ukuntshontshelwa, ukuthathwa kwayo ngenkani kuwe (hijacking), ukulimala kwayo, nokulimala ngendlela yendalo (ukwenza isibonelo, isichotho, ukuwa kwesihlahla siwela phezu kwayo).
Ama-comprehensive amaningi nawo abandakanya izinto ezifana nosizo oluyi-24 emgwaqweni nosizo lwezokwelashwa. Konke lokhu kusuke kwakhelwe phezu kwama-premium akho - ngakhoke bona ukuthi kubaluleke kangakanani kuwena ngaphambi kokuba uqale ukhokhe.
3. Azi imibuzo okufanele uyibuze: Ngesikhathi ukhuluma noyi-insurance agent, ungakhohlwa wukubuza le mibuzo...
Yimaphi ama-plans akhona, nokuthi akunikani kuleyo insurance?
Ngabe abiza malini?
Iyini i-excess?
Ngabe siyaba khona isephulelo uma umuzi wakho nemoto yakho - kokubili kune-insurance enkampanini eyodwa?
Ngabe ikhona indlela yokwehlisa ama-premium akho? (Ukwenza isibonelo, ngokufaka izinto zokuyivikela imoto (security) njengama-gear lock noma i-tracking system.)
Ngabe wonke umuntu osendlini yakho naye ungaphansi kwe-insurance ukuze akwazi ukushayela leyo moto? (Ezinye izinkampani azinendaba ukuthi ngubani oshayela imoto yakho - kuphela nje lowo muntu uma ethole imvume kuwena. Ezinye ziyagcizelela ukuthi, uma kukhona abashayeli abancane, ukhokha ama-premium aphezulu. Kubalulekile ukwethembeka ngalokhu ngoba ukuqamba amanga kuleyo nkampani kungenza i-claim yakho ingaphumeleli.)
Ngabe sikhona isaphulelo uma i-insurance ikalelwe umshayeli oyedwa?
Ngabe le cover ibandakanya nokuqashelwa imoto uma kwenzeka eyakho intshontshiwe noma ibandakanyeka engozini?
Ngabe kuzokwenziwa nini ukukhokha kokuqala, wena ube usungaphansi kwe-insurance (cover) nini?
Ngabe le cover ibandakanya ukwehla kwesikweleti? Lowo yiwona mehluko phakathi kokubiza kwemoto nokuthi uzosalelwa yimalini kuyona. Uma imoto yakho ikhokhelwe ngokohlelo oluthile lokuyikhokhela (payment plan), kungakuhle ukuthola kabanzi ngemali esele.
4. Lungisa imininingwane yakho
Inkampani ye-insurance izokubuza imibuzo eminingi, ngakhoke hlala ulungile ngezimpendulo.
Izinto abadinga ukuzazi zibandakanya lokhu: iyinhloboni imoto yakho, eyayiphi i-model nonyaka wayo, umlando wokushayela kwakho, umlando we-insurance yakho, okwe-security okukhona nokunye.
Khumbula: Ukwehluleka ukudalula yonke le mininingwane kungakudalela izinkinga lapho usufaka isicelo se-claim - ngakhoke nika izimpendulo ezigcwele nezithembekile.
STEP TWO: AZI KONKE NGALEYO INSURANCE
Manje usukulungele ukuthatha leyo insurance ezwana nawe. Indlela elula wukushayela izinkampani ezimbalwa ucingo, ubhale phansi ama-terms azo nezimali abazibizayo bese le mininingwane uyiqhathanisa neyezinye izinkampani.
Kubalulekile ukwenza lokhu ngoba amanani angahluka kakhulu. Cabangisisa ngaphambi kokuthatha isinqumo.
Uma futhi ukhulumisana ne-agent ungadidwa yindlela ezibeka ngayo izinto nezinombolo. Uma ungenaso isikhathi sokuyibuza kwekukhulumayo, bhala phansi bese uyibuza kahle lapho usunesikhathi esanele.
Khumbula nguwena umuntu ozokhokhela lolo sizo - ngakhoke uma i-agent ingakuniki usizo oludingayo, kusho ukuthi leyo insurance ayikulungele neze.
STEP THREE: ZIVIKELE
Kuzothi lapho usutholile ukuthi iyiphi i-insurance oyifunayo bese ugcwalisa amaphepha. Ngaleso sikhathi kuzodingeka ikhophi ye-ID yakho, i-registration yemoto yakho ne-identification yayo.
Namuhla izinto sekuvamile ukuba zenziwe ngocingo, i-fax noma i-e-mail.
Kodwa uma ufuna ukubonana ne-agent yakho mathupha, kungakuhle uhambe uye kuyona.
Kulabo abanika imininingwane ngocingo, kubalulekile ukuba uthole amakhophi abhalwe phansi kwikontileka ye-insurance nakho konke okuqondene nalokho ukuze ukugcine endaweni ephephile.
Ngaleyo ndlela, kuzothi lapho ufake i-claim - ube nolwazi ngemininingwane yekontileka yakho. Ngalokho nawe uzobe uzivikela ezingxabanweni phakathi kwakho nabaphethe i-insurance yakho. [z]

Ama-excess aphezulu noma aphansi ayatholakala kwezinye izinkampani kanti ama-premium (okuyimali oyikhokhayo) ayashintshashintsha.

Usuke wezwa ngezinyoka ebhanoyini, manje yizwa ngezinyoka zasefemini...
BONA ZULU - May 2007
Onogada abangcono kunabo bonke
indaba nguFORCE KHASHANE
izithombe nguPAPI MORAKE
NGENXA yokugqekezelwa njalo, usomabhizinisi waseGoli uWayne Keogh wathatha isinqumo sokufuya izinhlwathi ezimbili ogama lazo nguNgwenya noSathane.
Sekuzwakele ngaleli lisu lakhe - kwehla izinga lobugebengu.
"Ngangikhathazekile ngokuthi isimo sase siba yingozi kubasebenzi bethu," kusho uKeogh.
"Laba bantu babesiqola. Ngesinye isikhathi balandela umshayeli wethu ebuya ebhange bangena badubula. Abantu babengafa kulokho. Manje sesiphephile kakhulu," kusho yena.
U-Agnes Soul naye uyavumelana nalokhu. "Ngaphambi kokuba lezi zinyoka zifike, le ndawo yayingaphephile."
Nguye onakekela lezi zinyoka ezithathwa njengabantwana bakhe.
Ukhala izinyembezi uma eyodwa yazo igula.
"Kuyiqiniso, ngizikhonze kabi, ngihlale ngizinakekela."
"Ngihlale ngizihlola ngokuvula imilomo yazo. Enyokeni ephilile kufanele umlomo ube-pink."
Nakuba lezi zinyoka zingobobulili obuhlukene kodwa azihlangani ngoba "ubhuti nosisi," kusho u-Agnes waseKhayelitsha eWestern Cape.
"Ngesikhathi sizithenga, satshelwa ukuthi zazalwa wumama oyedwa, ngakhoke kuhlale kukhona ukuthula phakathi kwazo zombili."
Lezi zinyoka azimthandi nje-kuphela u-Agnes kodwa futhi ziyawazi namagama azo.
"Uma ngizibiza ngamagama azo, zikhombisa ukuzwa," kusho yena.
"Uyazibona futhi uma zilambile azibi nakho ukuphumula - ngaleyo ndlela ngiyazi ukuthi sekuyisikhathi sokuba ngithume umshayeli wethu ayozithengela amagundane esitolo esidayisa izilwane."
Izinhlwathi azizidli izilwane ezizifele. Zifuna ukuzibulalela ngokwazo ezizokudla," kusho u-Agnes.
Amakheji azo anogesi, iziqu zezihlahla nokhaphethi ofudumele. "Ngihlale ngihlola izinga lokushisa ukuze ngiqiniseke ukuthi akushisi kakhulu. Izilwane ezinegazi elibandayo azikudingi ukushisa okukhulu," kusho u-Agnes.
Ngesikhathi abakwaBONA befika, u-Agnes wayenenkinga yokuthola amagundane njengoba izitolo ezidayisa izilwane eziseduze zase ziphelelwe yiwona.
Njengoba uNgwenya wayebukeka elele, uSathane wayeyaluza ehla enyuka ekhejini lakhe.
"Uba nolaka uma elambile," kusho u-Agnes.
"Uma uSathane esekhipha umoya njalo efutheka eba mkhulu ngesidumbu, ikhanda lakhe eselimise phezulu, ubokwazi ukuthi usengahlasela noma nini."
Lezi zinhlwathi ziyayekwa zizigcaluzele ngaphakathi kule femu emva kwezikhathi zomsebenzi nangezimpelasonto.
Esikhathini esedlule, lezi zinhlwathi zazigezwa kobhavu abakhulu ababili ngaphandle kwefemu, kodwa lokho kwakudala ukuba kube khona abantu abaningi ababukayo kuvaleke nomgwaqo.[z]

Amawele adlala i-rugby
Elinye lidlalela amaBulls, elinye amaSharks, kodwa enza okufanayo – sikwethulela amawele aseSA adlala i-rugby
BONA ZULU – September 2007
Bahlose
lukhulu
indaba ngu-ERNEST MOTEBEJANE
ABAFANA bakwaNdungane bakhule bedlala i-rugby hhayi ibhola. Kwakuhlale kukhulunywa nge-rugby njalo ekhaya lakubo eMthatha. Nabo babelimala bahuzuke uma beqhakambisa ithalente labo enkundleni.
Kodwa okuka-Odwa Nzuzo no-Akhona Zilindlovu kwehluke kakhulu.
Abagcini ngokuba amawele – kodwa banethalente elifanayo.
Ithalente labo lagqama emva kweminyaka embalwa begadulisana nabanye abadlali enkundleni ewubhuqu befaka ama-try.
U-Akhona uqale ukudlala ngaphansi kwe-Eastern Province Rugby Union edlalela ama-Elephants. Wadlala emdlalweni weVodacom Cup beqhudelana ne-South Western District ngo-2003.
U-Odwa yena wabizwa yiBlue Bulls ngo-2004 bedlalela iCurrie Cup esigabeni esasibizwa ngeSuper 12 ngaleso sikhathi.
Umqeqeshi weBlue Bulls uHeyneke Meyer wabuye wabiza u-Akhona ukuba abajoyine.
U-Akhona wabajoyina u-Odwa ehlelwe yifomu yakhe kanti wadlala kahle njenge-winger emdlalweni owawuseLoftus Versfeld.
Izinwele eziphothiwe
“Angikaze ngisebenze ne-winger enjengaye. Uyagijima uyahlonipha. Uyazifeza izethembiso zakhe,” kusho uMeyer.
U-Akhona ubuye washintsha nemicabango yabanye.
“Ngangizizonda izinwele eziphothiwe,” kusho umlandeli wamaBulls ngesikhathi u-Akhona esisayinela igama lakhe emva komdlalo. Wayekhuluma ngesitayela esenziwe yile-winger sezinwele eziphothiwe.
“Kodwa ngiyasithanda manje. U-Akhona washintsha umcabango wami ngezinwele eziphothiwe,” kusho yena ehleka.
U-Akhona waqala ukudlalela amaBulls ngo-2006. Indlela adlala ngayo kweyeSuper 14 kulowo nyaka yathatha amehlo abakhetha abadlali bamaSpringbok wagcina ekhethiwe ukuze adlale eqenjini leBoks elalidlala neWallabies ePerth ngoNovember nyakenye.
Wabonga abamkhetha ngokufaka i-try.
Kulo nyaka udlale indima emqoka esiza amaBulls ukuze abe yiqembu lokuqala eSA ukuwina kwiSuper 14 emva kokushaya amaSharks eThekwini.
“U-Akhona usazithobile phezu kwemisebenzi engaka aseyenzile,” kusho u-Ian Swartz imenenja yamaBulls. “Sengike ngaya naye e-Australia naseNew Zealand kanti kumnandi ukusebenza naye.
“Ubukeka enekusasa eliqhakazile!”
Uyathembisa
U-Odwa, waqhubeka wazabalazela ukudlala kahle eseseThekwini.
Wadlaliswa kabi umdlali weNSW Waratahs eqala ukudlala kumaSharks kwi-2006 Vodacom Super 14 ephikelele ukuyofaka i-try yakhe.
U-Dirk Muir ongumqeqeshi wamaSharks omusha wamyekisa ukudlala njenge-winger.
Kodwa u-Odwa akazange aphele amandla. “Kwangithokozisa ukudlala kwifayineli yeVodacom Super 14 kulo nyaka,” kusho yena.
“Angizange ngidlale isikhathi eside kodwa okuncane engakwenza kwaba nomthelela empumelelweni yeqembu.” Wafaka enye yama-try enza ukuba amaSharks anqobe ngo-32-25 ngesikhathi edlala neBlues e-Auckland.
“Kufanele ngizame ukwenza okungcono kwiCurrie Cup. Anginaluvalo. Ngiyokwenza okungangamandla ami.”
Kwacishe kwafezeka isifiso sakhe sokudlalela amaBhokobhoko njengomfowabo u-Akhona emva kokukhethwa kwabo ukuba bayoziqeqesha naleli qembu eBloemfontein ngoJune.
“Ngelinye ilanga siyobonakala sobabili enkundleni sishaye
ijezi leqembu lesizwe,” kusho
u-Odwa. [z]

KWAPHELA iminyaka emithathu ubuso bakhe bubonakala kuSABC 1 azisa izigidi zabalandeli bakhe ngezinhlelo abangazibuka. Manje useyadlala kanti akazimisele ngokubheka emuva.
“Kwafika isikhathi sokuba ngiqhubekele phambili,” kusho uKedebone Mkhabela. “Kuyingozi ukuhlala emsebenzini owodwa kwiTV. Ugcina usuyisicefe kubabukeli.”
Ngeke aba naleyo nkinga njengoba esedlala kwiMuvhango kuSABC 2 lapho edlala khona indawo yommeli kaDoobsie onguKatleho ozama ukusiza ikhasimende lakhe ukuze libe negama ebhizinisini lakwaMukwevho-Sasko.
Kukhona nodaba lwemali yefa eyisigidi samarandi okumele aluxazulule.
Abalandeli balo mdlalo bazokuthokozela ukubona lezi zintokazi ezisezincane ezinekhono nesibindi zidlala ndawonye.
UKedebone wavuma ukuthi wayenovalo ngosuku lokuqala lokubonakala kwakhe kwiMuvhango. “Nganginovalo lokuba phakathi kwabadlali abangosaziwayo kanti ngake ngafikelwa umqondo wokucasha lapho kushintshelwa khona.”
Waba novalo kakhulu lapho sekumenyezelwa ukuthi sekuyisikhathi sesidlo sasemini. “Ngangingazi muntu,” kusho yena. “Ngangithi ngizoba yinkomo edla yodwa.”
Kodwa lokho akwenzekanga. UKhabonina Qubeka (uDoobsie) noKedebone babesohlwini lwababegaqele ukuthatha indawo kaKhanyi Mbau ngesikhathi kufunwa ozodlala indawo kaDoobsie.
“Kwaphumelela uKhabonina kanti ngathenjiswa ukuthi ngizoyithola nami eyami indawo kwiMuvhango,” kusho uKedebone.
“Ngangingazi ukuthi ngizodlala indawo yokuba ngummeli. Nginomoya ophansi kanti ukuba ngummeli akungifanele,” kusho yena.
UKEDEBONE uneminyaka engu-26 kanti uthi nguConnie Masilo- Ferguson omkhuthazayo, naye owaqala ngokusakaza wazakhela igama kwiGenerations.
Esafunda e-high school eNelspruit, uKedebone wayevame ukubukela uConnie eshayela uhlelo olwalukuTV4 kanti emva kokuqeda u-matric amabombo wawabhekisa eGoli.
Kwakungu-1998 ngesikhathi uSABC 1 esethulela abethuli bezinhlelo abasha abahle emkhankasweni wawo weSimunye.
UKedebone waqala ukuzicijela ukuqokwa emzuliswaneni wesibili wokuhlolwa kwabethuli bezinhlelo kuSimunye ngokudansa emakilabhini abuye acule.
“Ngangidansa nodadewethu uFlorence kanti ziningi izigameko esedlula kuzona ukuze sizakhele igama embonini yezomculo,” kusho yena.
“Sasicula no-Ishmael. Mina ngadansa nakwi-video yengoma kaThembi Seete ethi Sure Ntombazana ngesikhathi esekwiYizo Yizo.
“Ayekhona nama-shows ayengakhokheli njengoba amabhendi ayesitshela ukuthi kumele sibonge ukuthi kukhona esikwenzayo ngoba sithola ulwazi.
“Kwakungelula kodwa saba nesibindi sazimisela ukuze siphumelele.”
Ngo-2002 wathola ucingo olwamjabulisa edansa emcimbini wokuvulwa kweWorld Summit For Sustainable Development eGoli.
“AbeSABC 1 bangishayela ucingo bangitshela ukuthi ngisohlwini lwababezokwethula izinhlelo zabo,” kusho yena.
“Lokho kwakuzowenza umehluko empilweni yami. Ngaleso sikhathi uConnie wayedlala indawo kaKarabo kwiGenerations. Inhloso yami enkulu kwakungeyokudlala.”
Sekukaningana uKedebone ehlangana noConnie Masilo. “Unobubele uyakwazi ukusiza umuntu kanti nami ngiyazama ukuzehlisa,” kusho uKedebone.
UBUHLE bomuntu yibona obusemqoka kakhulu kwiTV kanti yize noma uKedebone ebalwa kulabo bantu abahle, akazithwele.
“Kunethimba lochwepheshe abasicwalayo,” kusho yena. “Uma udlala akufanele uzithwale ngenxa yobuhle bakho.
“Uma ngingekho estudiyo ngigqoka ama-jean namateku. Uma ngihlangana nomuntu engingamazi e-mall ngiyamnika indawo yakhe.
“Singaxoxa ngomsebenzi wami kodwa angikhulumi ngokuthinta impilo yami.
“Ayikho into engiyifihlayo kodwa angithandi ukudalulela abantu engingabazi izindaba zami.”
UKedebone akakashadi kanti uyavuma ukuthi angathanda ukuthola abantwana ngelinye ilanga. Akukaze kubhalwe ngempilo yakhe emaphepheni.
“Abantu bathi akulula ukuxhumana nami kodwa lokho akusilo iqiniso,” kuchaza yena. “Angibhemi, angiphuzi kanti ngigxile emsebenzini wami.
“Uma ngingazinakekeli abantu ngeke bangihloniphe. Angizwani noku ‘khishwa’ kanti angizwani nabesilisa abangiyenga ngemali nezimoto.
“Abesilisa abaphumelelayo nabazithembayo abanasikhathi sokukhuluma ngalezo zinto.” [z]
Ungummeli ongabhedelwa uma edlala kodwa sibona olunye uhlangothi lwakhe uma engasadlali kanti akazwani nabesilisa abamyenga ngabanakho
Kumnandi ukuphumelela
UKedebone akazithwele

BONA ZULU – March 2006
“Ngakhula kupheka abesimame,” kusho uThabang. “Kodwa mina ngiyakuthanda ukupheka.”
UNdunankulu ozibambelayo emabhodweni!
indaba nguFIONA MACLEOD
izithombe nguGRAEME BORCHERS/AENS
UMA uvalelekile enkanjini ehlathini, ungadla ngisho inhlwathi - nansi indlela ephekwa ngayo: lungisa izingcezu zayo njengoba usuke wenza amagwinya. Yibhuqe kufulawa nakwi-tinned egg powder, bese uyichochombisa emafutheni ukuze ibe nalokho kuhlofozela.
“Inambitheka njengeKFC,” kusho uThabang Makwetla onguNdunankulu waseMpumalanga ehleka. Izinyoka nezingwenya ngezinye zezidlo ezazehla esiphundu afunda ukuzipheka esekudingisweni iminyaka engu-14.
Wazalelwa eMiddelburg ngo-1957, waba nothando lokupheka esemncane. Wakhula ehlala nogogo wakhe owayemphatha njengabanye abase bekhulile uma sekufanele kugezwe izitsha.
Ukufundiswa wugogo wakhe ukuzenzela izinto kwamsiza kakhulu emva kokuya ekudingisweni njengomholi wentsha ngo-1976. Iminyaka eminingi wayichitha ehlala yedwa kudingeke ukuba azinakekele. Ngaleyo ndlela wazifundisa okuningi wafunda nokunye kwabanye.
“Ngithanda izidlo ezilula - okhari, ama-casseroles nenyama ebomvu. Kodwa konke kufanele kube mnandi. Ngifuna abantu abadla engikuphekile bababaze ukunambitheka,” kusho yena.
Izidlo zokunenyama, ukwenza-nje isibonelo, kufanele zibe ne-gravy eningi namajusi. I-braai ayisho nje ukuphonsa inyama emlilweni - kufanele ilungiswe kahle ukuze inambitheke.
UMakwetla uthi wafunda ngokunambitheka kokudla komunye wozakwabo ongasekho ngesikhathi esekudingisweni - uGarnet Gordon, owayesebenza emikhunjini eCape Town eziphekela.
“Ngakhula kupheka abesimame,” kusho uMakwetla. “UGarnet wayengakuthandi ukudla okuphekwe abanye abantu. Wayebaxosha abesimame ekhishini.”
Ngaleyo ndlela lezi ‘zimpohlo’ zombili zafundisana ukupheka iminyaka emihlanu ekudingisweni eBotswana. UNdunankulu waluthatha lolu lwazi lokupheka waya nalo kwezinye izinkambo zasekudingisweni e-Angola, Lesotho naseZambia – nangesikhathi esebuyela eSouth Africa ngo-1990.
Manje ayikho into ayikhonze njengokupheka ngemiSombuluko ebusuku.
“Okuthokozisayo ngokupheka wukuthi upheka lokho okuthandayo - akufani nokuya e-restaurant uyothenga. Wukudla ozenzela wena,” kusho yena.
Ukuba sekhaya kwakhe ngoMsombuluko ebusuku yedwa, kumnika ithuba lokuphumula abuyise umqondo. “Ukupheka kunginika isikhathi sokuba ngicabange ngempelasonto edlule nangokuhlelela isonto elilandelayo.”
Ngezimpelasonto uma eziphumulele, uthanda ukuthokozisa abangani nabomndeni ngokubashayela i-braai.
Namuhla bona ngenhlanhla bakwazi ukuzitika ngokuningi okwehlukile kunezinyoka nezingwenya. [z]
Zizame ngokwakho
Izidlo ezimbili zikaNdunankulu…
UNdunankulu esikhombisa ukuthi ukupheka kungathokozeleka.

Lamb Tagine (Casserole)
Izithako
500g inyama yemvu yesitshulu
1 u-anyanisi oqotshiwe
uwoyela
1 i-teaspoon (5ml) i-paprika
1 isipuni (15ml) ufulawa
ibinzana lewayini elibomvu
1 inkomishi (250ml) i-stock
45g i-cashew nuts
2 ukherothi ocwecwiwe wasikwa izikwedlana
1 i-apula elisikwe izikwedlana
1/3 inkomishi (85ml) isitshulu se-dried fruit
usawoti nophepha
Indlela yokwenza
1. Thosa u-anyanisi nenyama epanini kuze kube nsunjwana. Faka i-paprika, ufulawa, iwayini ne-stock. Kubilise.
2. Ehlisa umlilo. Kuyeke kugxabhe imizuzu engu-20. Faka, ama-cashew nuts, ukherothi, ama-apula nama-dried fruit.
3. Kugxabhise kuze kuthambe. Faka usawoti nophepha.
4. Kuseve ne-polenta ne-blanched beans no-anyanisi. Kuhlobise nge-parsley.
Roast Chicken
Izithako
1 inkukhu
usawoti nophepha omnyama
i-rosemary
1 u-anyanisi ocwecwiwe waqotshwa
1 inkomishi (250ml) i-chicken stock
1 isipuni (15ml) imajarini
Indlela yokwenza
1. Khuhla inkukhu ngosawoti, i-rosemary nophepha omnyama. Ibeke kwi-ovenproof dish. Faka u-anyanisi ne-stock. Kubhake kuhhavini oshisiswe ngezinga elingu-180oC ihora, kuze kube nsunjwana.
2. Susa inkukhu. Sebenzisa i-stock ukwenza i-gravy. Faka isipuni semajarini wehlise umlilo kancane i-gravy ize ishube.
3. Kuseve nerayisi nosaladi oluhlaza onongwe ngeDijon mustard ne-balsamic vinaigrette.

“Umuntu onekhono likaKaka, uqhamuka kanye eminyakeni engu-50,” kusho uParreira.
BONA ZULU – June 2007
UMA ungumhlaziyi wezebhola kufanele uzilungiselele ukubiza amagama angajwayelekile abezizwe emoyeni. Kodwa… amanye amagama alula angakudalela inkinga.
Baningi abahlaziyi bezebhola abasenenkinga namanje ukubiza igama lomdlali uRicardo Izecson Dos Santos Leite uma ebambe ibhola.
Mhlawumbe uzomangala ukuzwa ukuthi igama elithi “Kaka” ngolimi lwesiPutukezi lichazani - ngempela lichaza lokhu nawe okucabangayo - engeke ngakuchaza lapha!
Konke kwaqala ngesikhathi esemncane. Umfowabo omncane kaRicardo uRodrigo, wayengakwazi ukubiza igama elithi “Ricardo” kahle, ngaleyo ndlela waqala wabiza umfowabo omdala ngokuthi wu “Caca,” nokuyigama elijwayelekile eliyisifinyezo saleli gama eBrazil.
Njengabo bonke abantu abayizelamani, uRodrigo naye waqala wabona ukuthi - ukuthi “Caca” kubizeka ngokufana nokuthi “Kaka” nokuyilona gama elachuma.
Ngesikhathi ekhula, uRicardo wazama ukukhuza abantu ukuba balibize kahle, kodwa lokho kwenza ukuba baqhubeke bamgcone. Namuhla sekuyigama eliyisidlaliso esikhulu ngenxa yokuthi naye lo mdlali wenza izimanga enkundleni.
Inhlekelele yengozi
Ngesikhathi lo mdlali eseneminyaka engu-18 - ngoSeptember ikhono lakhe ebholeni lase liqala ukubonakala. Kulapho futhi aba sengozini eyacishe yakhubaza umsebenzi wakhe wokuba ngumdlali webhola.
“Ngadayivela emanzini nokuyilapho ngafike ngashaya phansi ngekhanda ngephuka ithambo lesithupha emgogodleni,” kusho kukhumbula yena.
Abaningi babengaboni ukuthi ngilimele kangakanani.
“Ngabuyela emumva eSao Paulo ngaziqeqesha izinsuku ezimbili kodwa kunzima ukubekezelela ubuhlungu ngaleyo ndlela bangenza ama-X-ray amaningi.”
Odokotela batshela uKaka ukuthi unenhlanhla ukuba angakhubazeki nokuthi ingozi yayingakapheli.
Lesi sigameko samenza wabona ukuthi cishe walahlekelwa yinto akade engaziphilisa ngayo.
“Ngiphilela amagoli nezifiso,” kusho yena. “Ukuba seqenjini lesizwe, ukudlala kwiWorld Cup, ukuwina iLigi nokuphumelela siqu sakho? Ukushada, ukuba nezingane.”
Emva kwesikhathi esingangonyaka, wayesebuyele enkundleni. Waqala umdlalo ebhentshini kwiSao Paulo. Iqembu labo lalehlulwa ngegoli elilodwa sekusele imizuzu engu-14 ukuphela komdlalo ngesikhathi umqeqeshi emfaka.
Ingakapheli imizuzu emibili, uKaka wayeseshaye amagoli amabili.
Ukusinda kwakhe kule ngozi kanjalo nokuphumelela kwakhe emsebenzini wokudlala ibhola - uthi uBonga uNkulunkulu kanti kumanje ingxenye yomholo wakhe uyinikela ebandleni lakhe.
Amakinati
Lo mdlali wasesiswini wajoyina i-AC Milan ngo-2003 ngemali encane kakhulu eyachazwa njengamakinati ngumnini wekilabhu uSilvio Berlusconi.
Lo mdlali owayesemncane washeshe wazibonakalisa. Ingakapheli inyanga, wayeseziphendlele indawo esikimini esikhulu edlala njalo eseshaye amagoli angu-10 emidlalweni engu-30 ngaleyo sizini yokuqala ekwiMilan, wawina ne-Italian Serie A Championship ne-European Super Cup.
Wayeyingxenye yabadlali basesiswini abahlanu ngesizini ka-2004-05 edlala emva komgadli u-Andriy Shevchenko. UKaka washaya amagoli ayisikhombisa emidlalweni engu-36 yeLigi waphinde wawina i-Italian Super Cup nekilabhu.
Elinye lamagoli akhe ayohlale ekhumbuleka kuze kube yinamuhla emdlalweni ababewudlala neFenerbahçe SK wokuqala we-AC Milan kwiChampions League ka-2005/06.
UKaka waqala ukugijima kusukela esiswini senkundla wadlula abadlali abathathu ngaphambi kokuba ashaye ibhola elaphuma ngaphansi kukanozinti weFenerbahce uVolkan Demirel.
Indlela adlala ngayo yashiya ababhali bezemidlalo bengawuvali umlomo bemqhathanisa noDiego Maradonna esavutha ngezikhathi zakhe.
Ukudlalela iBrazil
UKaka waqala ukudlalela izwe lakhe ngesikhathi iBrazil idlala neBolivia ngoJanuary 2002. NgoMay 2002 umqeqeshi uLuiz Felipe Scolari wambizela eqenjini laseBrazil elalizodlala koweNdebe yoMhlaba.
NjengoRonaldo eMelika ngo-94, uKaka wathathwa kwahanjwa naye ukuze ayobuka, afunde ukuze azilungiselele umqhudelwano olandelayo, nakuba athola ithuba lokudlala kancane imizuzu engu-20 ngesikhathi iBrazil idlala neCosta Rica.
“Ukungena kwiWorld Cup uneminyaka engu-20, ukuba kanye nabadlali abaphezulu kwaba yinto enkulu,” kusho uKaka. “Ufunda okuningi kubadlali - ukwenza izinto, ukuqhubeka uzame ngisho ngabe kukhona lapho wenze khona iphutha, uze ugcine uphumelele kokuzamayo.”
“Lapho uyabona ukuthi laba bantu abangabadlali abangosaziwayo nakuba bebakhulu, kodwa bangabantu njengabanye abantu.”
“Umuntu onekhono elifana nelikaKaka namakhwalithi, uqhamuka kanye eminyakeni engu-50,” kusho uCarlos Alberto Parreira owasebenza nalo mdlali ngesikhathi esaqeqesha iBrazil.
“Uyisibonelo sesikhathi esizayo kuwo wonke umdlali oseqenjini laseBrazil.”
Kwinhlolovo eyayiphethwe ngelinye lamaphephabhuku aseBrazil lapho kwakubuzwa khona ukuthi Ngubani umdlali ongcono emhlabeni? uKaka wathola amaphesenti angu-82 amavoti, ekubeni uRonaldinho wathola amaphesenti angu-11. UKaka waphinde wathola amavoti amaningi kwinhlolovo eyabe isiyenziwa yiphephabhuku lezemidlalo lase-Italy.
UKaka ‘wabantwana’
Kukhona futhi labo abathi uKaka ungomunye wabadlali bebhola ababukekayo othandwa abesimame. Uphinde futhi aziwe ngokuthi wuWayne Rooney waseBrazil... ngaphandle kwenhlamba namahlazo ezocansi.”
“Kunzima ukucabanga umuntu ofana noDavid Beckham efika yedwa kwi-interview efake ibhengela lesiliva elaliqoshwe ukuthi ‘Jesus.’
Kodwa ukwethembeka kukaKaka kubalulekile kuyena. Kunombhalo othi I belong to Jesus nothi God is faithful othungelwe ezicathulweni zakhe zebhola kanti ukholelwa entweni ahlale eyikhuthaza.
Ukwenza isibonelo, lo mdlali wavotelwa kabili ezweni lakhe njengomdlali webhola omuhle ngokukhangayo okhonzwe ikakhulu ngabantu besimame abasebasha - asebaziwa ngokuthi amaKakazetes – uyaziqhenya ngokuzigcina emsulwa ngokocansi kwaze kwaba uyashada noCaroline Celico ngoDecember 2005.
“Ngikholelwa othandweni, ngiyakuvikela lokhu,” kusho yena. “Namuhla ucansi seluyinto enkulu kangangoba abantu baya ocansini ngaphandle ngisho kokwazana amagama - lokhu angihambisani nakho.
“Ngivikela ucansi oluhambisana nothando. Kubekiwe naseBhayibhelini: uNkulunkulu akakugxeki ukuya ocansini.”[z]
UKaka wenza izimanga!
