indaba nguWALTON GOLIGHTLY isithombe ngabePHOTO ACCESS
Wayetuswa ngobuhlakani nangobubele bakhe kanti ungomunye wababusi abayibeka induku ebandla – useyisibonelo esihle namanje…
IGAMA likaMakeba, iNdlovukazi yaseSheba liphathwa kakhulu ezincwadini zenkolo ezinjengeBhayibheli (Amakhosi 1 neziKhronike 2) kanye nakwiKoran yamaSulumane lapho ebizwa khona ngo “Bilqis.” Sekuphele cishe iminyaka engu-3 000 kubikwa ngempicabadala yodaba lwakhe emazweni ngamazwe.
Izazi zomlando zikholwa wukuthi izwe laseSheba noma iSaba (“Place Of Peace”) lalibandakanya izingxenye zendawo ebizwa ngeYemen eseningizimu-ntshonalanga ye-Arabia ne-Ethiopia manje, engxenyeni esentshonalanga yeRed Sea.
Leli lizwe lalinothe ngegolide namatshe aligugu, linama-spice abizayo ayefunwa amazwe ayakhelene nalo. Ababethengisa babehamba namakameli abo ibanga elingaphezulu kuka-2 000 kilometres beya kwa-Israel.
I-Kebra Negast incwadi engcwele yase-Ethiopia, ichaza abantu baseSheba njengababe “mnyama ebusweni” ibuye ithi babekhonza ilanga.
UMakeba wazalwa ngo-1020 BC. Waba yiNdlovukazi eneminyaka engu-15 emva kokukhothama kukababa wakhe.
Izincwadi zimchaza njengentokazi eyayiyinhle, ikhaliphile, inozwelo, iwusizo ikhonze nokuvakasha.
Nakhu akusho esizweni sakhe: “Ngiyakulangazelela ubuhlakani nokuqonda izinto.
Ubuhlakani bungcono kakhulu kunegolide nesiliva. Bumnandi ukwedlula uju. Bungumthombo wentokozo, buvula amehlo, bunika izinyawo amandla, buyihawu buvikela nekhanda...”
Wayejabula uma ababethengisa izimpahla kwamanye amazwe bebuya bemxoxela ngenkosi yakwa-Israel eyayihlakaniphile.
Leyo nkosi kwakunguSolomon, owayeyindodana yeNkosi uDavide noBathsheba.
Inkosi ehlakaniphile
Ngesikhathi elakwa-Israel lisabuswa nguSolomon, laliyizwe elalilincane kodwa amazwe ayakhelene nalo elihlonipha ngenxa yobuchule uSolomon ayebusa ngabo.
Wayemuhle, befa ngaye abesimame.
Kuthiwa ayikho inkosi eyayinothe futhi ihlakaniphe njengaye. Abantu babefuna ukuzizwela ubuhlakani bakhe ayebuphiwe nguNkulunkulu.
EBhayibhelini kunezaga ezingaphezulu kuka-3 000 ezibhalwe ngaye, kube amahubo angu-1 005 kanye noMshumayeli.
Ubuhlakani bukaSolomon babungagqamile kwipolitiki nakwezenkolo kuphela – wayebuye abe yisazi somlando wezemvelo. Wayezwana nokusebenza etshale ama-olives, ama-spice, amakinati namagilebhisi. Wayebuye acwaninge ngezicabucabu, amaqhwagi nezintuthane.
Ukuhlangana kwabo
UMakeba waphuma umkhankaso wokuyozibonela ngawakhe lo mbusi ehamba namakameli angaphezulu kuka-600 ayethwele izipho zeNkosi uSolomon.
Lawo makameli ayondlekile ekwazi ukugcina amanzi namafutha amasonto amathathu ephila ngayekuthola ogwadule.
Ayeboshelwe enqoleni ngezintambo ezazenziwe ngoboya bezimbuzi.
Amakameli ayezalwe ngesikhathi salolo hambo lwezinyanga eziyisithupha ayebelethwa amakameli ayengaphambili ukuze onina bawo babone ukuthi aphatheke kahle.
UMakeba wayelala embhedeni owawunompheme owawumvikela elangeni kukhona namakhethini.
U-Solomon wambona kanjalo-ke uMakeba. Esefikile esigodlweni, uSolomon wamnika indawo enhle ayezohlala kuyona. Nsuku zonke uSolomon wayebanika amasaka angu-45 kafulawa, izinkabi ezingu-10, izinkunzi ezinhlanu, izimvu ezingu-50 – izimbuzi, izinyamazane, izinkukhu, iwayini, uju namaqhwagi athosiwe.
Wamkhombisa izivande zakhe ezazinezimbali nabo bonke ubuhle besigodlo sakhe.
Nakuba uMakeba athatheka uma ebona umcebo kaSolomon, wayenendaba nobuhlakani bakhe kakhulu.
Abanye abafundi bathi ukuvakasha kwakhe kwakuncike kwezomnotho nepolitiki engenandaba neyokwakha ubudlelwane obuhle nenkosi.
NgokweKebra Negast, wayehlose ukucobelela ulwazi kuSolomon kanti iBhayibheli lona lithi wayezo “mvivinya”.
Okuyindida nezivivinyo
UMakeba wayebuye afune incazelo kuSolomon ngokuningi okuyindida, okunye kwako okuseBhayibhelini. Ukwenza isibonelo: “Ngabe yini embi ngaphezu kwako konke emhlabeni, yini futhi enhle kakhulu? Yini ongangabazi ukuthi iyokwenzeka, yini oyingabazayo?”
U-Solomon wamphendula ngokuthi: “Okubi wukungathembeki kwabantu ababethembekile; okuhle, wukuphenduka kwesoni. Wukufa ongeke wakungabaza; kanti ongakungabaza yisabelo somuntu kwelizayo.”
UMakeba wagqokisa abafana abahlanu namantombazane amahlanu ngendlela efanayo wathi uSolomon makasho ukuthi bangobabuphi ubulili.
Kwathi uma ebanika izindishi ukuze bageze izandla, amantombazane afingqa imikhono abafana bangakwenza lokho.
Waletha kuSolomon izimbali ezimbili ezazifana, kodwa enye kwakungeyangempela enye kungesiyo eyangempela. Impendulo kulokho wayithola ngokubona izinyosi ziya kweyangempela.
Wabuye wamnika i-emerald (uhlobo oluphambili lobucwebe) eyayinembobo, igobile phakathi nendawo, wathi makafake intambo kuyona. U-Solomon wathi makulethwe i-silkworm eyangena embotsheni yadonsa intambo.
Ubuyela e-Africa
Ngesikhathi uMakeba eshiya elakwa-Israel emva kokuchitha izinyanga eziyisithupha, uSolomon wamnika amakameli angu-6 000, izinqola ezazinezimpahla eziphambili nemiphongolo esetshenziswa ogwadule, emoyeni nasolwandle.
Njengoba uMakeba ayesekhulelwe umntwana kaSolomon, uSolomon wamnika indandatho enethemba lokuthi wayezomzalela indodana okwakungenzeka ibuyele eJerusalem iyozethula kuSolomon.
Ekufikeni kwakhe eSheba uMakeba, abantu baqhubeka bamhlonipha ngobuhlakani ayesebutholile ngoba wayezimisele ngokuba ngumholi oqotho.
Wayehlonishwa nangobubele bakhe nokuzinikela kwakhe ekuphileni ngenkolo. [z]

Indodana kaSolomon yase-Africa
UMakeba wabeletha indodana ayiqamba ngo-Ibn al-Hakim, “indodana yendoda ekhaliphile.” AmaJuda, amaSulumane nabasePersia bathi leyo ndodana kwakunguNebuchadnezzar.
Abase-Ethiopia bathi nguDavid II (igama aliqanjwa nguSolomon). Ngokuhamba kwesikhathi le ndodana yaziqamba ngelikaMenelek owaba yinkosi yokuqala ukubusa e-Ethiopia.

U-Solomon wayefuna ukuba ibuse emva kwakhe indodana yakhe njengoba yayilizibulo lakhe kodwa yanqaba. U-Menelek wahlala okwesikhashana eJerusalem efunda imithetho yamaHebheru wabuyela e-Africa njengomama wakhe.

SIXOXA NESIHLABANI
10 imibuzo kaHHP
1. Yini eyakusa emculweni?
Ngihlale ngithi umculo yiwo owakhetha mina. Umama wami ungumqambi wezingoma zamakhwaya nombhidi. Ubaba unenqwaba yamarekhodi ayehlale ewadlala. Umculo yinto eyingxenye yomndeni wami kanti nami ngisawulalela umculo omdala njengowamaTavares, Lionel Richie noStevie Wonder.
2.Walikhetha kanjani igama lakho lomculo - kanti wena elakho langempela ungubani?
Igama lami nginguJabulani Tsambo. Abangani bami bangibiza ngoJabba. Nami ngangifuna ukuzibiza kanjalo ngesikhathi ngiqala emculweni kodwa omunye umngani wami wathi angizibize ngoHip Hop Pantsula. Leli gama lakhula nami ngoba kukhona kimina lapho kuhlangana khona i-hip hop nobupantsula.
3. Wazizwa unjani uwina kumaSAMAs?
Noma ngubani oseke wawina uzokutshela ukuthi kumnandi kangakanani ukuwina ngemizamo yakho. Sekuphele cishe iminyaka elishumi ngilapha, ngakhoke kwasiza kakhulu ukubekezela.
4. Ngabe ubukhulu bomzimba wakho buyinkinga uma ucula esteji?
Isisindo sami silokhu sinjena, ngakhoke anginankinga ukuphilisana naso. Njalo emva kokucula, abantu baqonda kimina bazongitshela ukuthi sengibenze nabo bayithanda imizimba yabo emikhulu - yinhle leyo nto!
5. Uma ubhala izingoma zakho, yimuphi umyalezo osuke ufuna ukuwudlulisa?
Ngibhala ngezinto ezenzekayo empilweni yami ngaleso sikhathi. Izingoma ezifana nezithi Go Diragalang, Harambe neDafur yizingoma eziqwashisayo engicabanga ukuthi zimayelana nesikhathi sanamuhla.
6. Ungayichaza kanjani i-hip hop ngokwaseSA - sikuphi ngokwezinga lomhlaba?
I-hip-hop eSA ithola udumo ngokumangalisayo. Kuqala babengayilaleli, bengayithengi kodwa manje isinedumela. Sinabantu abangoMC abanekhono elimangalisayo nabaculi abaningi be-hip hop okuthi lapho kukhona abaculi baphesheya, kucelwe bona ukuba babavulele.
7. Wathandwa kakhulu ngesikhathi uwina iStrictly Come Dancing. Yini owayifunda kule-show, ngabe iyithinte kanjani impilo yakho noma ukucula kwakho?
Akubanga lula ukwenqaba. Emva kwalokho ngazama ngafunda esikhathini samasonto angu-8. Lokho kwangikhombisa ukuthi ngingenza noma yini engibeke kuyo umqondo wami.
8. Yini owayifunda ngesikhathi ukwiRhythm City?
Ngafunda ukuthi kimina kuningi okungaphezu kukaJabba i-rapper nomdansi. Ngesikhathi ngise-high school, ukudlala emidlalweni yasesteji ngenye yezinto engangizenza. Kodwa ukuvela emdlalweni ofana nalona, obophele izihlabani - kwadingeka ukuba ngizimisele.
9. Unazo izingane, uzoshada nini?
Nginendodana eneminyaka engu-4 uLeano Laone - nguyena muntu ongenza ngivuke ngiyosebenza nsuku zonke. Umshado ususondele, ngizokunika usuku maduze-nje.
10. Sitshele esingakwazi ngo-HHP?
Uma ngingaculi, ngisuke ngisekhaya ngidla i-sushi noma ngizidlalela i-X-Box.[z]

Uphenyo lukaBONA
UBUMNANDI bokuba nogesi ngaso sonke isikhathi bese kuyinto esiyijwayele - kodwa lokho kuphele emva kokuqalwa kohlelo lokucishwa kwawo ngezikhathi ezithile. Njengoba kubonakala ukuthi le nkinga isazophuza ukuphela, abathengi bazama ezinye izindlela ezingabasiza uma kuphele ugesi.
Ama-generator abukeka eyikhambi lokuxazulula le nkinga. Maningi asedayisiwe. Kodwa ngabe ingakusiza uma kuphele ugesi"
I-generator izisebenzela ngogesi wayo. Kodwa nawo uyingozi, okusho ukuthi kufanele uyisebenzise ngokucophelela. Baningi asebelahlekelwe yimpilo yabo ngenxa yokuyisebensiza budedengu.
"Kufanele sikhumbule ukuthi i-generator ikhipha ugesi kanti nayo ingakushokha njengogesi," kuxwayisa uBrian Bilton ongumeluleki kwa-Electrical Contractors Association.
"Ibalulekile indlela oshintsha ngayo izintambo zikagesi uma usebenzisa i-generator ukuze zingonakali kanti ukungazishintshi ngendlela kungabulala."
I-generator isebenza ngokushintsha amandla akhishwa yinjini esebenza ngo-petrol noma udizili abe ngamandla kagesi. Isebenza ngendlela efanayo nenjini yemoto egcwalisa i-battery yemoto.
Izinhlobo
Sinezinhlobo ezimbili zama-generator: sinaphathwayo, asetshenziswa kakhulu emakhaya abiza phakathi kuka-R1 800 no-R7 000; namakhulu axhunywa emakhebulini abiza phakathi kuka-R20 000 kuya ku-R100 000 nangaphezulu.
Ama-generator aphathwayo: Usayizi wamathange awo yiwona okhomba ukuthi azoduma isikhathi esingakanani nokuthi kufanele agcwaliswe nini. Ama-generator anomsindo kodwa ungcono umsindo kulawo asanda kwakhiwa.
Nakuba esinda, avame ukuba namasondo enza kube lula ukuwagudluza. Aziziningi izimpahla zikagesi ongazisebenzisa kulolu hlobo ngoba luncane alunamandla njengalawo amakhulu.
Uma uwathenga, khetha phakathi kwasebenzisa u-petrol noma udizili.
Asebenzisa udizili avame ukubiza kodwa ayonga uma usuwasebenzisa.
Lezi zinhlobo zombili zidinga ukuseviswa.
Abanye babona kungcono ukuxhuma aphathwayo emakhebulini kagesi - lokho kumele kwenziwe ngumuntu ofundele ukukhanda ugesi kanti kungabiza!
Ama-generator amakhulu: Anamandla kanti ungakwazi ukuwasebenzisa ezimpahleni eziningi zikagesi, asetshenziswa abanamabhizinisi ngoba ayabiza.
Ahlala exhunywe ekhebulini kagesi kanti kumele axhunywe wumuntu oqeqeshelwe ukwenza lowo msebenzi okufanele akunike isitifiketi esishoyo ukuthi umsebenzi wakhe uwenze kahle.
Izinga lamandla
Ngaphambi kokuthenga i- generator, bheka ukuthi yiziphi izimpahla zikagesi ozozisebenzisa kuyona ngoba leyo naleyo mpahla oyisebenzisayo ikhuphula izinga lamandla okusebenza kwayo.
Uma inamandla kakhulu ingasebenzisa izimpahla zikagesi eziningi. Lokho kukalwa ngama-kilowatts (kW), alingana no-1 000 watts i-kilowatt iyinye.
Izimpahla zikagesi ezishisisayo nezipholisayo zidla ugesi kakhulu. Njengoba iketela lidla u-2kW, i-air conditioner yona isebenzisa u-400kW noma ngaphezulu!
Amamitha kagesi akalwa ngama-kW/H, okuyinani lamandla impahla kagesi ewadla ngehora. Kodwa njengoba ezinye izimpahla zikagesi zidinga amandla athe xaxa uma zisaqala ukusebenza, zingadli kakhulu uma sezivele zisebenza, izimpahla ezinjengamafriji nemishini yokuwasha zingadla ugesi ngokuphindwaphindwe kathathu kunalowo eziwusebenzisa uma sezivele zisebenza.

Ifriji ene-freezer idla u-3kW uma isaqala ukusebenza idle u-1,2kW uma isisebenza. Umshini wokuwasha udla u-7,5kW uma uqala ukusebenza udle u-1kW uma ususebenza.

kanti ishibhile kunama-generator - kodwa ayizilungele izimpahla ezidinga ukushisa ezinjengama-toaster nama-microwaves.
Bheka i-Intellipower yakwaTedelex ezitolo ezidayisa izimpahla zikagesi. Uma igcwaliswe kahle, ungakwazi ukuyisebenzisa ezimpahleni eziningi zikagesi ezinjengamaTV, amakhomphyutha, amaDVD nokunye amahora ayisithupha kuye kwayisishiyagalombili.

Ama-battery asebenza kahle uma zimbalwa izinto ezixhunywe kuwona.

BONA ZULU - October 2007
Indlovukazi yomculo we-Afro-pop yaseKagiso, isithengise cishe amakhophi angaphezu kwesigidi ama-albhamu eMafikizolo eminyakeni emihlanu eyedlule. Njengamanje le ntokazi isiziculela yodwa futhi isiziphathele ngokwayo umsebenzi wayo...
UNHLANHLA NCIZA waphuthelwa wukuzwa indodakazi yakhe ikhuluma okokuqala ngqa nokuyibona isiqala ukuhamba. Kodwa kulokho uthi leso sikhathi uyosikhokha ngokuba ingane yakhe uZinathi ibe nekusasa eliyolingana izigidi.
"Uyoba nawo wonke amathuba angiphuthela ngiseyingane," kusho kufunga yena.
UNhlanhla (28) ushade nomunye wosaziwayo wenkampani yokuqopha. UNhlanhla naye usenenkampani yakhe entsha yokuqopha eyaziwa ngokuthi yi-NN Vintage okuyiyo ephethe izindaba zokucula nezengqephu yefeshini yakhe.
"Ngikhula eKagiso, umndeni wami awuzange ube nazo izidingo ezifanele ukuba ngihlelele phezu kwazo ngomsebenzi engiwufunayo," kusho lo somabhizinisi wesimame omncane ngomzimba. "Kwadingeka ukuba ngiwalwele wonke amathuba."
"Impumelelo yeMafikizolo ayizange ifike kalula. Saze sakwazi ukuba sizibonakalise ngokuthengisa kakhulu ngo-2002 nge-albhamu yethu yesine.
"Ngesikhathi sihamba senza amakhonsathi okuphromotha ama-albhamu amabili okugcina, ngaphuthelwa wukubona indodakazi yami uZinathi ihamba okokuqala ngqa nokuyizwa ikhuluma okokuqala ngqa. Kodwa njengamanje ngiyakhela ikusasa nokuyilapho izozikhethela yona indlela efuna ukuyithatha - ngisho ngabe kumuphi umkhakha, futhi izothola konke ukwesekwa ekudingayo."
Ephuza ikhofi eRosebank café - ikapisi nezimpahla ze-leather ayezifakile ngeke nakancane kufihle izifiso zakhe zokwenza amaphupho akhe abe yimpumelelo.
Ngesikhathi iMafikizolo ithola ikontileka kwabeKalawa Records ngo-1997, babesafana nesithunzi sozakwabo iBongo Maffin. Ngesikhathi uNhlanhla ekhubazeka ehlala unyaka wonke kwi-wheelchair ngenxa yengozi yemoto - emva kwalokho walulama waphila ngaphambi kwesikhathi sokuba leli qembu liqophe i-albhamu yalo yokuqala eyashisa izikhotha ethi Siyabonga ngo-2002.
"Lokho kujomba okumangalisayo kusukela ekuthengiseni amakhophi angu-30 000 kuya kwangaphezu kwangu-300 000 kwafika ngesikhathi esihle kakhulu kimina," kusho yena. "Ngaleso sikhathi sase sazana noTK ngaqala ngafunda ukuthi ibhizinisi lokuqoshwa komculo lisebenza kanjani."
U-TK Nciza nozakwabo uSbu Leope (uDJ Sbu) baqala ibhizinisi lokuqopha elikhula ngamakhulu amandla i-TS Records, noNhlanhla waqala wabhala nabaculi abafana noNtando, enza namakhava amarekhodi akhe futhi ethengisa kakhulu nokwaba yizinto ezaholela emiklomeleni yama-Metro namaSAMA ngo-2005/6.
"Ukuqala umndeni wakhe nakho yinto eyenziwa ngohlelo lwebhizinisi. Wakhulelwa ngo-2003 kodwa waqopha i-albhamu iKwela ngaphambi kokuba athathe i-leave yokulungiselela ukubeletha.
Le albhamu isithengise yacishe yafinyelela kumakhophi angu-400 000 kanti yinye kuphela into uNhlanhla eyamphuthela ngokuthola umntwana - wukudlala indawo yakhe yokuqala efilimini.
Wacelwa ukuba adlale indawo yeqhawekazi laseSophiatown elinguDorothy Masuku efilimini iDrum.
"Ukukhulelwa kwami kwangenza ngangakwazi ukudlala kuleli filimu, hhayi ngoba nginezinhloso ekudlaleni emafilimini, kodwa ngoba nginothando olumangalisayo lwezingubo zengqephu yezikhathi zaseSophiatown ekubeni nabaculi abafana noDorothy noMiriam Makeba yibo abangama-role models kowami umsebenzi."
I-albhamu yakhe ethi Ulieame (What Goes Around Comes Around), ibhekwe ngabomvu njengoba kulindeleke ukuba iphume ngoSeptember. Le ngoma eqanjwe ngayo yiyo ezoshisa izikhotha emalokishini nasezindaweni zasebumnandini - kodwa ningalindeli ukubona uNhlanhla oshintshile ofake izinto ezimbambayo neziveza umzimba.
"Ngikholwa wukuthi ukukhanga kowesimame kufanele kuqhamuke ekuzethembeni kwakhe, hhayi ekuvezeni umzimba," kusho yena. "I-Mafikizolo isiyadayisa amakhophi ama-albhamu ayisigidi kodwa angikaze ngifake izigqebhezane noma ngiveze amabele.
"Izingubo engizenzile engizozifaka lapho sengicula ngedwa zinhle kakhulu, kodwa futhi zenziwe nangendlela yokuthi zibukeke kahle esteji. Abesimame bangazithenga babukeke kahle futhi babe nokuzethemba."
UNhlanhla uthi abesimame abangabaculi kufanele bazibambele mathupha ezimalini zabo ezithinta umsebenzi wabo wokucula.
"Eminyakeni eyishumi eyedlule, ngesikhathi ngiqala ukuqopha neMafikizolo ohlangothini lwe-kwaito, abaculi besimame babengenazwi emaqenjini omculo besetshenziselwa ukuheha abalandeli - kungabesilisa ababedlala umculo. Namuhla ngithathe isinqumo sokucula ngedwa nokuba namandla okuzilawula ukuthi kufanele ngizimakethe kanjani. Angifuni ukusebenzisa umqondo omubi wokukholwa wukuthi ukuya ocansini yikho okuthengisa abaculi besimame. Lowo wumbhedo. Abalandeli bayahambisana nomculo oshisayo abazowuthanda.
"Indodakazi yami, ngeke ihlupheke ngendlela yaleyo mpatho, ngisho ngabe icabanga ukuthatha muphi umkhakha womsebenzi."[z]
BONA ZULU - October 2007
nguDOUG GORDON

NGISHO noHastings Kamuzu Banda wayehlale ethi akazihluphi ngokwazi ngempela ukuthi usuku lwakhe lokuzalwa lunini. “Okubalulekile engikwaziyo nenginendaba nakho, wukuthi ngiyaphila.” Sekuze kwamukeleka ukuthi cishe wazalwa ngo-March noma ngo-April 1898 eKasungu okwakuyindawo eyayaziwa ngokuthi iNyasaland iphethwe iBrithani.
Ithuba lemfundo elamvelela walibamba ngezandla zombili. “Akukho nokukodwa kwemfundo engangifuna ukuba kungiphuthe. Amathuba ayengivelela ngangiwasebenzisa.”
Wayezoba nguthisha, kwathi ngo-1915 wabhala i-exam eyayihlungela ukuqeqeshwa ekolishi lothisha kodwa kwenzeka ayengakulindele.
Imibuzo yayibhalwa ebhodini. Kokunye kwakudingeka ukuba uBanda asukume ukuze akwazi ukubona ngoba wayesithwe ababengaphambi kwakhe. Owayeyi-invigilator, uMfundisi T. Cullen Young, wacabanga ukuthi uBanda uyakopela wase emnqabela ukuqhubeka ne-exam.
Kwaba yinto eyamphoxa kakhulu. Wathatha isinqumo sokuba ahambe ngonyawo eze eSouth Africa azoqhubeka nemfundo yakhe - wafike wafunda eLovedale Missionary Institution eKapa.
Uhambo olude
Wayephethe umkhonto omncane ayewenzelwe ngumkhulu wakhe, iwisa nosheleni abambalwa wanqamula ehlathini.
“Ngikhumbula ngikhathazekile izinsukwana ezimbalwa zohambo. Ngangikhumbula umndeni wami, kodwa ngiphokophelele ukuthola imfundo noma yingayiphi indlela,” kusho kukhumbula yena emva kweminyaka.
“Ngangingesabi. Noma kuphi lapho ngangihamba khona, ngangihlangana nabantu abanobubele. Ngangicela umsebenzi noma ngisize ngandlela thile ukuze ngikwazi ukuphila…”
Wayesehambe amakhilomitha cishe angu-700 – namasonto amane – ukulimala onyaweni kwamphoqa ukuba afune usizo lokwelashwa emtholampilo owawusendaweni okumanje isiyaziwa ngeHarare. Wafike wathola umsebenzi kulo mtholampilo.
Udokotela wakulo mtholampilo uMerritt Holly, wayithanda le ‘nsizwa’ eyayisencane ikhaliphile wayenza umsizi wakhe. Kulaphoke uBanda wanquma ukuba ngudokotela.
“UDkt Holly wangikhuthaza ukuba ngazi konke ngomsebenzi wodokotela,” kusho uBanda emva kwesikhathi.
Ngo-1917, umalume kaBanda wavakashela umshana wakhe. Wayesohambweni lwakhe ebange eSouth Africa, uKamuzu wamphelezela.
ESouth Africa uBanda wafike wasebenza ezimayini kodwa esazimisele ngokuthola imfundo enhle - kodwa manje wayesenephupho elisha.
“Ngangazi ukuthi kuzodingeka ngiyifulathele indawo yangakithi ne-Africa ukuze ngiyothola imfundo esile eMelika.”
Izwe labakhululekile
Ekugcineni, ngoJuly 1925, ngosizo lokuxhaswa imiphakathi yezenkolo waphumelela ukuyofundela ubudokotela ngenhloso yokuba aphinde abuyele ezweni lakubo ayosiza abantu bakhona.
Wafikela eLondon. “Ngafike ngama eduze kwethuna likaDavid Livingstone nokuyilapho ngamemeza ngathi: ‘Dkt Livingstone, yimina uKamuzu Banda ngiliqhamukisa eKasungu, eNyasaland. Ngiyobuyela emumva eNyasaland ngelinye ilanga ukuyothatha umsebenzi wakho. Ngiyethembisa.’
“Abantu bangibuka - kodwa kwakufanele ngenze leso sithembiso kuyena nokuyisithembiso engasigcina.”
UBanda wafika eNew York ekupheleni kuka-August wahamba waya e-Ohio, nokuyilapho ayeyophothula khona imfundo yakhe yase-high school. Wayeqhuba kahle kakhulu esikoleni.
“Kwengakufunda ngenkululeko nentando yeningi eMelika yinto engingazange ngiyibone yenzeka khona.”
“AbabengamaNegro babengaphethwe kahle kodwa okuxakayo wukuthi abantu bakhona abamhlophe babengiphethe kahle ngoba ngangehlukile emehlweni abo, ngingumAfrica.”
Kungesikhathi ayesefundela ubudokotela eNashville eTennessee lapho uBanda abona isehlakalo esasizomhlukumeza ngokomqondo impilo yakhe yonke - iqulu labantu libulala umlisa onsundu.
“Lo mlisa onsundu waseMelika bamshaya baze bamphanyeka esihlahleni ephanyekwa amalungu eKu Klux Klan.
“Angisoze ngikhohlwe yileso sehlakalo, ngisho nayindlela engaphatheka kabi ngayo.”
Ngo-May 20, 1937 eseneminyaka engu-39, uHastings Kamuzu Banda, MD, waqeda cishe ephezulu kunabo bonke ekilasini lalabo ayefunda nabo.
Wayesefuna ukubuyela ekhaya azosiza abantu bezwe lakhe kodwa watshelwa ukuthi izikhulu zaseBrithani ngeke ziyamukele imiphumela yemfundo yakhe.
Ethola lokho kuphoxeka, wabhalisa enyuvesi yase-Edinburgh, eScotland lapho ahlala khona iminyaka emithathu nohhafu esebenza ngenkulu impumelelo ukuze izikhulu zaseBrithani ziyamukele imiphumela yemfundo yakhe.
Ngo-1941 wathola iziqu ezazimgunyaza ukusebenza njengodokotela ngaphansi kweBritish Empire kodwa wanikwa isikhundla sokuba yi-junior medical officer eNyasaland. “Lokhu kwakwehlisana isithunzi, kodwa kwangenza ngabona ukuthi into abayifunayo abamhlophe wumAfrica ofundile.”
Izinzululwazi zakwelase-Africa nabaholi baqala bahlangana njalo emzini kaDkt Banda - abaholi abafana noJomo Kenyata, Julius Nyerere, Kwame Nkrumah, Kojo Botsio nabanye. UBanda naye ngokwakhe waba yilungu eliqavile le-Nyasaland African Congress.
Ngenxa yokwentuleka kobuholi obuqotho, kuningi okwenza iCongress ingasimami.
Ngokwakwenzeka, umbono kaBanda kwakungukuthi: “Abamhlophe beningizimu yeRhodesia banenhloso yokusebenzisa umnotho wokumbiwa phansi njenge-copper nezithukuthuku zabantu bakithi eNyasaland ukuze bazakhele (abamhlophe) ‘izulu labo elincane’ lapha e-Africa.”
Ngesikhathi kusungulwa iCentral African Federation ngo-August 1953, uDkt Banda wasuka eBrithani eseyohlala eGold Coast (manje osekuyiGhana): “Ngangingeke ngiqhubeke nokusebenza njengodokotela ezweni elalingenandaba nabantu okwakufanele libavikele.”
I-Kwacha!
Waphinde wawenza umsebenzi wobudokotela. Kodwa iCentral African Federation yayisezinkingeni nokwathi ekuqaleni kukaMarch 1958 wathola amasamanisi aphuthumayo. Waqokwa njengosihlalo weNyasaland African Congress nokwadingeka ukuba abuyele ekhaya.
Noma kuphi lapho ayehamba khona kwakuzwakala abantu bethi “Kwacha! Kwacha! Kwacha!” (okusho inkululeko).
Wakhankasa ephikisana neCentral African Federation, eyahlakazwa ngo-1963, waholela leli lizwe enkululekweni waliqamba igama elithi Malawi - nokuyigama alikhetha emva kokubona i“Lake Maravi” emephini endala yesiFulentshi.
Wazakhela udumo kwabaningi ngamasudi akhe ayisitayela saseNgilandi angama-three-piece ayemesha amadukwe kanye neshoba ayeliphatha.
Wakhombisa ukuthi uyindoda edida abaningi.
Ngo-1971 wazigcoba njengomongameli ongephikiswe wazibukela phansi izidingo zokwakhiwa kwemigwaqo, izikhumulo zezindiza, izibhedlela nezikole eMalawi.
Waphinde washaya umthetho wokulawula indlela yokugqoka ezweni lakhe kubandakanya nalabo abangabavakashi - abesimame bengavunyelwe ukufaka izingubo ezimfishane eziveza amathanga nezinwele ezinde zingavunyelwe kubantu besilisa - wawubanjwa uphoqwe ukuzigunda ngokubonelela kwezikhulu zamaphoyisa emngceleni.
UBanda nguyena kuphela umholi wase-Africa owayesebenzisana neSouth Africa ngezikhathi zobandlululo.
Ngaso leso sikhathi wayehamba phambili ekulweleni amalungelo abesimame wasungula iChitukuko Cha Amai m’Malawi, nokuyinhlangano eyayikhuthaza abesimame ukuba benze kangcono emfundweni nakuhulumeni nokuba badlale indima enkulu emphakathini wabo, emabandleni nasemindenini.
UBanda wedlula emhlabeni esesibhedlela saseSouth Africa ngo-1997.
“UHastings Kamuzu Banda kwakuyindoda emadodeni, indoda eyayingakuvumeli ukwehluleka,” kusho uDkt Donal Brody onguchwepheshe wezomlando futhi omazi kahle uBanda.
“Ngumuntu owayengezwani nento enganiki mqondo - ekukhuthaza njalo ubuhlakani.”[z]

U-LETTI ayikho imali ayibekile kanti akakaze kube khona isamba semali enkulu anayo. Wethemba ukuthi umndeni wakhe usazomsiza uma kukhona isimo esiphuthumayo azobhekana naso.
"Ngaphumelela ukungcwaba amadodakazi ami amabili ngoba isoka lendodakazi yami lakhokhela owodwa kwathi ubaba wendodakazi wakhokhela omunye."
Ngonyaka odlule bekunzima kubantu abaningi ukuthenga ukudla, ukungcwaba izihlobo, ngisho nokuthola imali yokugibela uya emsebenzini.
Abantu bakuleli babhekene nenkinga yokukhokhela izikweletu. Lokhu kubandakanya nokukhokhela amakhadi ezitolo ngisho nezikweletu ezibucayi ezifana nezemizi yabo. Lokhu kungenxa yesimo sokuntenga kwamandla emali esikhona emhlabeni jikelele.
Cishe ikhaya elilodwa kwamane liyathengiswa ngenxa yengcindezi yezezimali ngokusho konguchwepheshe uJohn Loos wezokuthengiswa kwezezindlu kwaFNB. Phakathi nonyaka cishe abantu abangaphezu koyedwa kwabangu-100 abangama-bond holders eSA basemumva ekukhokheni kwabo.
Isibalo sabantu abangama-bond holders ezinyangeni ezimbili ezedlule babhekane nale nkinga ngokuphindwe cishe kathathu.
Le nkinga akuyona eyabahluphekayo kuphela ngoba nabacebile bathwele kanzima. Ngesikhathi isimo somnotho esimbi sihlasela umhlaba wonke sashaya kakhulu iNingizimu Afrika esigabeni sonyaka wesibili onyakeni odlule, abantu abathinteka kakhulu yilabo ababanesikweletu phezulu kwesinye. Bathatha ngesikweletu nangemali ebolekiwe bese belahlekelwa yifenisha, imoto nendlu konke okwakuthathwe ngemali ebolekiwe. Iningi lalezi zikweletu zenzeka ngaphambi kokusebenza kwe-National Credit Act, eyenza kube nzima ukuthi izinkampani ziboleke imali ngendlela engalungile.
Imindeni eminingi isebunzimeni bokukhokha imali yesikole baphinde bakhathazwe wukufakwa ohlwini lwabangakhokhi kahle. Ngokusho kukaPeter Setou oyimenenja eNational Credit Regulator (NRC), cishe uhhafu wabantu baseSA abathatha ngezikweletu usengozini yokungakwazi ukuphinda bathathe ngaso. Lokhu kuchaza ukuthi uhlelo lwabo lokukhokha izimali ezibolekiwe, amakhadi ezikweletu, amakhadi asezitolo, isikweletu semoto nesendlu lusalele ngemumva ngezinyanga ezintathu. Leli zinga likhula cishe ngesigidi sabantu ngonyaka. Njengoba abantu abaningi bezama ukulungisa le nkinga, izinto zikhuphuke kakhulu kubandakana nentengo yokudla, ukulahleka kwemisebenzi kanye nenzalo ephezulu. I-National Credit Regulator, ebhekelela ezokubolekisa iphinde ilekelele nabantu abayisebenzisayo, isibe nezinkulungwane zabantu abasezikweletini befuna usizo kubeluleki bakhona kusho uPeter Setou.
Izithandani zingena ngobuningi bazo zicela usizo ukuze ziqinise ubudlelwane osebuntenga ngenxa yezinkinga zemali, kusho uLiz Dooley we-Family And Marriage Society Of SA (FAMSA).
Ngaphezulu kwalokho, cishe u-100 000 wabantu baseSA bakhahlanyezwe yizinkinga zokukhokhela izikweletu. Amabhange - anikezela ngo-80% emalini yokuboleka nezikweletu ezweni - asenohlelo olusha lokulwa nengcindezi ezinhlangothini zombili. Bazimisele ukukhuluma namakhasimende ahlulekayo ukukhokha imali ayibolekile. Ngokujwayelekile bakunika "i-debt holiday" - okuyisikhathi enivumelane ngaso ngesikhathi bemisa ukukhokha kwakho noma beqhubeza imali oyibolekile behlise ukukhokha kwakho ukuze kube lula.
Inkinga yokwehla komnotho ingaphezulu kokulahlekelwa kwemindeni yizindlu. Ishintsha indlela esiphila ngayo eSA. Ukuze bagcine benayo indawo yokuhlala nabaqoqi bentela bekude nabo, abantu banciphisa lapho benganciphisa khona.
Ngo-April kulo nyaka, i-SA retail sales (kuzozonke izitolo) yehle kakhulu futhi basaqhubeka nokuwa njengoba abantu bezibamba ekuthengeni. Ukwehla komnotho kulimaza nendlela abantu abasebenza ngayo. Abantu bakhiqiza kancane uma abantu bethenga kancane, lokhu kulimaza ukuthuthuka komnotho, kusho uMantshimuli ongusomnotho e-Liberty Life.
Izikhathi ezinhle ebesizijwayele kungenzeka zingaphinde zibuye. Ungqongqoshe omusha we-planning e-SA, uTrevor Manuel, kudingeke ukuba ashintshe indlela yokuhlela yeminyaka emithathu kuya kwemihlanu ukunika iSA isikhathi sokubuyela esimweni esejwayelekile. UTshediso Matona, umqondisi jikelele womnyango we-Trade And Industry, usecele bonke abasebenzi abadilizwa ukuba bahlangane basebenzisane ukuze bavule amafemu basize izwe ukuba lisimame. Kodwa siseduze isikhathi esizoba ngcono kusho uJohn Loos, uthi siyangokuswela kakhulu manje kunaseminyakeni edlule. Abantu abangenza umehluko kungaba uwena, amalungu omndeni wakho noma abangani bakho bakudala basesikoleni. Sikhuluma ngalabo ababizwa ngama-Black Diamonds. Yilaba abasakhula, abase-Afrika abamnyama abanezifiso ezinkulu abazitholele imisebenzi emikhulu enemali engcono abaziyo ukuthi izimpilo zabo zizoqhubeka zibe ngcono.
Bangu 57% abase-Afrika abamnyama cishe abangabahwebi kwa-FNB, kusho uRobert Keip ongumphathi we-investment ebhange.
Abahwebi abamnyama abasebasha - baneminyaka ephakathi kuka-25 no-34 - bafundile. Ngokocwaningo lwabakwaCapitec Bank sisazokwanda isibalo sabo ngoba abaseSA abasebasha abane kwabahlanu (abaneminyaka ephakathi kuka-17 kuya ku-23) bafisa ukuhlanganisa iminyaka engu-30 behola u-R10 000 ngenyanga.
Bangaphezulu kwengxenye abaneminyaka engu-17 kuya ku-23 abathi wukuzinza ngasemnothweni okumqoka kakhulu ekusaseni labo kunokushada bathole abantwana noma ukuphila impilo entofontofo.
Okwamanje yenza noma yini engakusiza njengoba sisabhekene nalesi simo. Ngesikhathi uTrevor Manuel ethula isabelo-mali sakhe okokugcina ngci ngoFebruary kulo nyaka wathi: "Liduma lidlule." [z]

ABAZALI bami babengamaKholwa bezinikele kuNKULUNKULU. Sasithandaza kabili ngosuku, ekuseni nakusihlwa. Sasiya esontweni nsuku zonke kanti ngeke ngikhohlwe mhla bengishaya kunguLwesithathu ngoba ngingayanga esontweni ekuseni ngalolo suku.
Kwathi lapho sengifunda ekolishi sengenza izinto ngokuthanda kwami, ngaMhlubuka UNKULUNKULU.
Ngangingasalubhadi esontweni ngamaSonto. Ngangiwasha ngenze imisebenzi yami.
Njengomuntu omusha, ngangenza noma yini engiyithandayo.
Kodwa phezu kwalokho ngangisafuna ukwakha ubudlelwane obuhle noNKULUNKULU. Ngangingazi ukuthi lokho ngizokwenza kanjani ngaphandle kokuya esontweni ngizame ukuziphatha kahle.
Kuningi engangizijabulisa ngakho ngichitha isizungu. UkuKhonza iNkosi kwakubukeka ku 'bhora'.
Onyakeni wesibili ngisekolishi, ekilasini lethu kwakunomfundi owayengazenzi izinto esasizenza.
Wayengaphuthelwa wukuya esontweni engahlukani neBhayibheli.
Phezu kwalokho, wayebukeka eyithanda into ayenzayo. Wangimema wathi asiye enkonzweni ukuze ngizibonele ukuthi benzani.
Lokho kwaba wukuqala kwami ukubuyela kuNKULUNKULU. Sekuphele iminyaka engu-20 ngihamba le ndlela kanti ngeke ngisabheka emuva.
Ngaqala kulowo nyaka ukwakha ubudlelwane noJesu Khrestu kanti lokho kumqoka kakhulu empilweni yami. Impilo yami ishintshile. Ngizimisele ukuyiphila kuze kube phakade.
Ake ngikutshele ukuthi yini ongayenza ukuze uvuselele ubudlelwane bakho noMdali.
UMENZI WEZINTO ZONKE UFUNA UKWAKHA UBUDLELWANE NAWE!
Yinto yokuqala leyo okumele uyazi. UNKULUNKULU Mkhulu kunomhlaba ngoba wawudala. Kodwa Ufuna ukuxhumana nawe. Akakubizelanga ekwenzeni izinto zesonto - Ukubizele ekutheni umkhonze.
Ufuna ukuhamba nawe, ukukhuluma nawe Akunike isiqiniseko sokuthi Ungowakhe.
Ufuna ukufeza izidingo zakho. Ufuna uqale ukhulume Naye ekuseni ukuze ezwe izidingo zakho.
Ufuna ukukuHolela ensindisweni.
KULULA KABI UKUBUYELA KUNKULUNKULU
UNKULUNKULU uqale wasenzela okulukhuni wasishiya nokulula. Vuma ukuthi uyamdinga nokuthi ngaphandle Kwakhe uyisoni. Kholwa wukuthi uJesu wafa wavuka njengoba kusho umbhalo. Vuma ukuthi uJesu uyiNkosi ubusa impilo yakho.
THEMBEKA
Uma ukholwa ngokwethembeka kukhona izinto ezizokwenzeka empilweni yakho. Okokuqala, uzozwa ubumnandi ongeke ubuthole kulo mhlaba noma obungapheli.
Izwi leNkosi lithi: "ubumnandi obungachazeki." Intokozo incika ezintweni ezenzekayo, kodwa lolu hlobo lwentokozo, intokozo yangempela, luncike ebudlelwaneni bakho noNKULUNKULU.
Okwesibili, uzoba noxolo okokuqala ngqa empilweni yakho. Uxolo alusho ukungabi nazinkinga, uxolo luyisibonakaliso sokuba noNKULUNKULU.
Lolu xolo esikhuluma ngalo aluchazeki. Wuxolo olukwazi ukubhekana nokufa, olushabalalisa ukweswela nolungashaywa yindlala.
Kunoxolo oluvela kuNKULUNKULU, olukaNKULUNKULU noxolo noNKULUNKULU.
Okwesithathu, uzobona umehluko ezintweni ozidingayo nozilangazelelayo. Angikhulumi ngokudla neziphuzo kodwa ngikhuluma ngezinto ozenzayo.

PATRICK SHAI
1. Ephathini yimuphi umculo owudanselayo"
Kuze kufike isikhathi sokudlala kuMoferefere, abantu babecabanga ukuthi ngiphila impilo yendawo kaNkwesheng engangiyidlala nokuyindawo yomuntu owayekhonze abesimame emdlalweni wami wokuqala kwiTV ngeminyaka yo1980. Kodwa abazi ukuthi ngaqala njengomunye wababeshaya indlamu eqenjini lendlamu kanti namanje ngisakuthanda ukudansa. Ngikhonze i-soul ne-funk - ne-hip-hop ne-kwaito.
2. Uwubhiyozela kanjani uNyaka oMusha"
NgeHansa noma iGlenfiddich.
3. Iliphi iholidi owalithokozela kunawo wonke osewake wawathatha"
Amaholidi awabantu abanemali - hhayi mina. Kodwa njengomdlali wezithombe, ngizwa sengathi ngiseholidini lapho ngisebenza. Ngilandwa ngemoto, nginakekelwe abantu abangigqokisa kahle. Ngiya ezindaweni engingeke ngikwazi ukuzikhokhela ngokwami nginikwe nokudla okuphambili.
4. Ubani omshayela kakhulu ngocingo lwakho"
Ngingathokozela ucingo oluvela kuNelson Mandela - ngisho ngingamuzwa ethi, "Hello ndodana yami." Kodwa ngiyazi ngeke ngadlala ngesikhathi sakhe njengoba efana nobaba. Ngakhoke enhliziyweni yami ngizwa sengathi usewakwenza lokho nokuyinto engenza ngijabule.
5. Uma kuyiSonto - yikuphi othanda ukukugqoka nothanda ukukwenza"
Yimi engiba sekhishini ngeSonto. Ngiye ngiqale ngokuya ezitolo ngifake ama-shorts ami neT-shirt ngiyothenga engizokuphekela umndeni wami.
6. Yikuphi okuthandayo"
Ngithanda izitshulu - mhlawumbe esenyama yemvu noma yenkukhu nerayisi noma i-spaghetti, ama-veg, hhayi iziqholo eziningi nogaligi. Noma inyama ebrayiwe - ngizinongela yona ngobhiya, uviniga neziqholo.
7. Kunini lapho ukhuluma khona okungesilo iqiniso - ngani"
Anginalo ikhono lokukhuluma amanga. Kodwa ngingalikhuluma iphutha ngenhloso yokuhlenga umshado wami. Ngingakhuluma iqiniso lapho sengivaleleke ekhoneni, kodwa futhi ngixwayisa abantu ukuba babheke ngoba kungenzeka bangakuthandi abakuzwayo, nami futhi angizimisele ngokubazwisa ubuhlungu. Kufanele uthole isikhathi esifanele nendawo efanele yokukhuluma iqiniso.
8. Uyayidlala i-lotto. Uma uwina ungenzani ngemali yakho"
Ngifuna ukubamangalela abe-lotto. Ngiyayidlala kodwa angikaze ngiwine. Uma ngingawina R20 million, u-R5 million nginganikela ngawo enhlanganweni yabantulayo bese ngakha i-theatre emphakathini ukuze izingane nabadala bakwazi ukusilandisa izindaba zabo.
9. Uyakuthokozela ukubuka imidlalo ovelayo kuyona"
IMoferefere iwona mdlalo wokuqala wamahlaya esengike ngadlala kuwo, ngiyawuthanda futhi. Ngiyakuzonda ukuzibuka ngidlala kuwona. Uma usuqoshiwe, akukho ongakwenza ukwenza ngcono indlela odlale ngayo. Kodwa ngiyakuthanda ukudlala emdlalweni weshashalazi esteji kusukela emdlalweni wami wokuqala iSophiatown.
10. Uma UNKULUNKULU Engakwengezela isikhathi sokuphila, yini ongayenza"
Ezinsukwini zami ezedlule, akukho okutheni engakwenza ekwenzeni ngcono impilo yami. Njengoba sengineminyaka engu-53, ngibonile ukuthi abanye bethu bakhula ngokuhamba kweminyaka. Ngineminyaka emibili ngikwiNational Arts Council kanti ngangiyingxenye yokusungulwa kweMapungubwe Arts Festival eLimpopo, nokuyilapho ngiliqhamukisa khona. Ayikho imali kwezobuciko, ngakhoke ngingathanda ukwenza intuthuko kulo mkhakha.[z]

Ukuzibambela mathupha kuyabasiza!
UTHOKO uvuka ekuseni andlule akhiphele ibhala namanye amathuluzi emnyango ukuze umndeni wakhe ube nendawo eyanele lapho usulungiselela ukuya esikoleni. Ibhulakifesi yingxenye yezinsalela zephalishi langayizolo ebusuku alifaka ushukela.
Emva kokudla bonke bayaphuma bahambe. URolinda ongumntwana ophakathi nendawo kulo mndeni uqhuba ibhala elinyusa endaweni ewumqansa nokuyinto ayithola ingelula nakuba uThoko emsiza uma ebona kunesidingo. Ukuzimela yiyona into afuna ukuba izingane zakhe ziyifunde.
Uhlale ekhumbuza izingane ukuba zihlale zindawonye ikakhulu lapho zihamba ibanga elide kanti nendodakazi yakhe endala uhlale eyitshela ukuba njalo uma ibuya esikoleni iyokukha amanzi.
UThoko ubuya ekhaya emva kokuyofundela umsebenzi wezandla namanye amakhosikazi. Sekuphele iminyaka emihlanu umyeni wakhe ahamba. Kusukela lapho akakaze aphinde ambone.
Babehlupheka kakhulu kulo mndeni ngaphambi kokuba bathole lo msebenzi besizwa omakhelwane futhi bamukeliswa namaphasela okudla.
Ngesikhathi izingane ziqonda esikoleni, uThoko yena ulibangisa emgwaqweni lapho esebenza khona.
Umsebenzi awenzayo unzima kodwa usumnike inkululeko neqholo lokunakekela izingane zakhe.
Izinkontileka
UThoko usebenzela uhlelo lezokulungiswa kwemigwaqo KwaZulu Natal iZibambele Road Maintenance Programme, nokulusizo lokuvulela abangasebenzi amathuba omsebenzi - cishe amaphesenti angu-95 nokungabantu besimame.
Lolu hlelo lubhekele ukulungiswa nokunakekelwa kwemigwaqo ewubhuqu KwaZulu Natal.
Lwasungulwa ngo-2000 kanti luphethwe futhi lwesekwe ngezimali ngabeKwaZulu-Natal Department Of Transport (DoT).
I-DoT yethemba ukuqasha osonkontileka abangu-40 000 ukuze kuthi ngo-2009 babe sebelungise cishe imigwaqo engaba ngamakhilomitha angu-17 000.
AbeZibambele bakhuculula imisele, ama-culverts namapayipi, bavale nemigodi basuse udoti bacente nokhula emigwaqweni.
Amathuluzi okwenza umsebenzi, ama-safety vest nama-plastic cones kunikezelwa umsebenzi wenkontileka ngamunye. Uma lezi zinto zidinga ukushintshwa, imali yazo ibanjwa emholweni walowo muntu.
Izinkontileka zezinyanga ezingu-12 zivuselelwa minyaka yonke - uma nje leyo migwaqo isadinga ukunakekelwa kanti imali yanyanga zonke yomsebenzi ingaphansi kuka-R1 050.
Kuthathwa ikakhulu imindeni kunabantu abangabodwana.
Kulokhu kusizakala nemizi ephethwe yizingane nokwenza uqhubeke umsebenzi.
Ukuqhubekela phambili
Izinkontileka ngezamahora angu-60 nyanga zonke nokuyinto ekunika nesikhathi sokufunda. Abezinkontileka bahola R370 ngenyanga kanti banakekela umqwaqo ebangeni elingu-500m kuya ku-800m.
Kunamakomiti amele yonke imikhakha yomphakathi asebenzisana nabe-DoT ekuboneni imigwaqo edinga ukunakekelwa, nemindeni okumele ibe yingxenye yalolu hlelo.
Sekusungulwe amakilabhu okonga imali asiza osonkontileka bakwazi ukuphatha imali. NgoMarch 2006 kwase kusungulwe amakilabhu angu-889 sebebeke imali engu-R6,2 million.
Umnyango wezaseKhaya nowezokuThuthukiswa koMphakathi isiza abeZibambele ukuba bathole ama-ID kanti bethemba ukuthi nabomnyango wezoLimo bazozibandakanya kulolu hlelo lwabo - ngasohlangothini lokudla, ekuphakeleni amanzi nokuchelela ngenkasa.
Lokhu kubambisana kungasiza ekusabalalisweni kwemishanguzo ye-AIDS (antiretroviral) nasekwelashelweni iTB.
Imiklomelo
IZibambele ngo-2002 yawina umklomelo Impumelelo award. Ngo-2003 yatuswa nguMongameli uThabo Mbeki njengohlelo oluphambili lwemisebenzi yomphakathi.
IZibambele isisize abaningi yabaphendlela indlela ebange empumelelweni.
UThoko useyakwazi ukondla nokuyisa izingane zakhe esikoleni.[z]

ELINYE lamabhilidi adume umhlaba wonke yiBuckingham Palace okuyindawo eyisiGodlo sobukhosi baseBrithani nesikhulu esisasebenza emhlabeni.
Njengoba kuyikhaya leNdlovukazi u-Elizabeth II, iBuckingham Palace yindawo yemicimbi kahulumeni neyasebukhosini baseBrithani kanjalo nendawo enkulu edonsa abavakashi.
Lesi siGodlo esaqala saziwa ngokuthi yiBuckingham House, sakhelwa i-Duke of Buckingham ngo-1703 sathengwa wuKing George III ngo-1762 njengendawo yakhe yokuhlala.
Sanwetshwa eminyakeni engu-75 eyalandela kanti kumanje sinamagumbi amathathu indawo eyigceke.
IBuckingham Palace yaba yisiGodlo sasebukhosini ngokusemthethweni ngesikhathi uQueen Victoria ethatha izintambo zokubusa ngo-1837. Ushintsho lokugcina olukhulu ukwenziwa kuyo lwenziwa ngeminyaka yo-1800, ngokwengezwa kwegumbi elikhulu elibheke entshonalanga nokususwa kwendawo yokungena uhulumeni iMarble Arch, yenziwa iHyde Park njengoba isinjalo namuhla.

WAYEGQOKE i-jean, eshaye iT-shirt namateku amhlophe nesigqoko seKangol esiyisitayela saselokishini ngesikhathi emisa imoto yakhe e-grey yohlobo lweBMW ngaphambi kwaseJohannesburg Central College nokuyilapho efundisa futhi eqophela khona.
“Mfowethu kunjani?” kusho yena elula isandla exhawula. “NginguSy Ntuli. Lapha kulapho ngisebenzela khona ngiqamba umculo wami. Kodwa ngesinye isikhathi “kuvele kucime izibani!”
Kunzima ukukholwa ngoba uSy Ntuli akusiye umculi we-jazz owawina umklomelo kuphela, kodwa futhi unguthisha womculo ohlonishwayo nongumhlaziyi wezinto ezithinta impilo.
Kodwa le nsizwa yaba yisihlabani somculo ngengozi.
Kwakuse-University Of Zululand, nokuyilapho abhalisela khona iziqu zemfundo.
“Kwase kuphele isonto ngiya kuma-lectures ngesikhathi siba nohambo lokubona i-campus,” kusho kukhumbula uSy. “Ngesikhathi sifika egumbini lomculo, ngezwa uMthunzi Namba noJabu Hlongwane bedlala ingoma engangiyithanda ngaleso sikhathi kaJoe Cocker ethi Up Where We Belong.
“Ngaso leso sikhathi ngaqonda kumphathi walowo mnyango ngabuza ukuthi ngingabhalisa yini.
“Kwaphela iminyaka emibili yonke ngingabatsheli abazali bami ukuthi ngenza izifundo zomculo, ngoba ngesaba ukuthi ngeke bahambisane nalokho.
“Kwathi lapho ngibatshela, ubaba wangeseka kodwa umama wangayizwa kahle le ndaba.
“Ngisho nodadewethu nabafowethu bethuka kakhulu.”
Nakuba eseke wawina omunye wemiklomelo womculo we-jazz kuleli, ukubeke kwacaca ukuthi akafuni ukuthathwa njengomculi we-jazz kuphela.
“Ungasho ukuthi cishe u-60 percent womculo wami uyi-Afro jazz kuthi omunye u-40 percent kube yi-Afro pop,” kuchaza yena.
“Umculo wami uchaza iminyaka yami. Ngiyazama ukuvala igebe phakathi kwe-jazz ne-pop.
Ucula ngezinto ezenzeka empilweni kanti engomeni ethi Uyivila, unxusa abantu ukuba bayeke ukuba amavila kodwa baqale kubekhona abazenzela kona.
“Njalo uma ngibuka iTV ngiye ngibone abantu befuna lokhu nalokhuya ngibone ukuthi lapha ezweni lethu sisabuswa wusiko lokuthanda ukwenzelwa. Lento yimbi!”
Uma engekho estudyo okaMphemba ufundisa umculo eJohannesburg Central College, nokuyilapho sekuphele iminyaka emihlanu ekhona.
Ngesikhathi simbuza ngenhloso yakhe enkulu empilweni uthe: “Ukuthungatha amakhono omculo abengeke atholakale!” [z]

Safe as houses
Phemelo Ngcobo has the idea of using her fame to feed her fortune down to a fine art…Story by Doug Gordon
SHE’s Dr Lerato Thibela, SA TV’s hottest heart specialist in SABC 2’s Hillside. She’s the face of Sof ‘n’ Free. She made her name as Khensani in Generations. But offscreen her big role is building her fortune the entrepreneurial way, just like every politician and economist tells us we should.
When we first got to know her, playing Archie Moroka’s troubled daughter, she was Phemelo Motene. The tabloid fanfare over her departure from Generations in 2002 drove Phemelo to take cover.
“I don’t make a good TV celebrity,” she admits. “So being on a show that’s so much public property, like Generations, was a problem for me.
“I love acting, but I don’t like being marketed as a ‘TV star’. It intrudes on my personal life.”
And her life quickly got very personal as she got down to business in every sense in 2003.
There was a low-key wedding, completely the opposite of soapie hype, to her fiance, Mthandeni Ngcobo, an accountant in IT and communications.
Then Phemelo had done a course in advertising course and even been appointed as an accounts executive at an advertising agency – but instead of doing what she knew, she made the decision that would change her outlook on life.
THIS child of Soweto made her below-the-radar lifestyle pay off big time for her when she decided to invest her savings in the property market.
“I’d never used my income from Generations trying to live up to a celebrity lifestyle,” she explains. “Instead of buying fancy cars and outfits, I saved my money.”
The beautiful young actress had also boosted her savings with an annual contract to promote Sof ‘n’ Free hair products.
“I had substantial working capital by the time I decided to put it to work for me,” she says. “When I looked around for where to invest I could take my pick.”
What she picked was property, an investment that gives great returns, providing you’ve got nerves of steel to ride the highs and lows and can manage your cashflow like Trevor Manuel. Phemelo’s first investment was a one-bedroom in Jozi’s sought-after Sandton. But she didn’t move in and start enjoying luxury living – instead, she rented it out to cover the bond.
Within months Phemelo knew she’d found an investment that suited her personality and her dreams. After Generations, Phemelo did One Way – and that’s the way her investments have gone thanks to careful planning.
“The value of my first flat went up R200 000 in just six months,” she laughs. “But the two-bedroom flats next door were selling for twice as much.
“At 24, I realised it was time to get serious about my business decisions. So I swapped my 4x4 and Civic for a Corsa Lite and began learning about financing from banks and lawyers. I put every cent I could raise into property.”
SHE LEARNT fast – and one key thing she learned was to play the safe odds, going for long-term returns rather than a fast buck. She’s taken just six years to create for herself a portfolio of upmarket townhouses for the buy-to-let market.
She furnishes to the taste of clients in the upper income bracket – and then rents out to executives working in SA on contract.
“Beautiful houses that I wouldn’t necessarily buy for myself are perfectly suited for clients from overseas,” she says. “I’m not personally hooked on material possessions but I relish meeting my clients’ demands – and they’re on a level with the lifestyle they’re used to in cities like London, Paris or New York.
“I invest up to the first six months’ rent on the contract furnishing and equipping the home for a tenant. It’s new beds for each contract, a very fine thread-count on the sheets, Persian carpets, state-of-the-art appliances, satellite TV, Internet access and high-level security, plus housekeeping and gardening services. My clients expect no delays, no excuses – and top-quality standards delivered 24/7.”
Not that Phemelo and Mthandeni live like that themselves. In fact, she admits, with interest rates where they are at the moment, they believe it’s better value to rent than to buy.
“If you’re wanting top-end, the rent on a R5-million property is the same as the repayment on a R2-million bond. And if settling down isn’t a priority, you can take advantage of the best properties up for rent.”
To make it happen for herself and Mthandeni, Phemelo works closely with lawyers and accountants. She’d make someone a great apprentice because already she monitors every cent she spends.
“I can’t even buy a packet of sweets without thinking about it,” she laughs
The only real luxuries Phemelo allows herself are business-related – a great car that screams, “I’ve arrived,” and fact-finding trips to investigate overseas property markets.
“Financing is international,” she points out. “If a project is viable, of course I’m interested.
“There are plenty of previously undeveloped countries now developing their infrastructure to compete in the world economy. And for companies it’s cheaper to rent than buy homes for consultants and project executives on contract.
“Until I eventually find time to have children – and that does bother me a bit – it’s the most exciting, exhausting life I can imagine.”
WHEREVER she is, Phemelo wants to do the best job she can. “The medical terms Dr Lerato throws around in Hillside are difficult to learn,” she says. “But we have medical experts on set to make sure we stay accurate.
“I believe more of our young people should aspire to become doctors. They shouldn’t be intimidated by the maths and science necessary to graduate.”
And Phemelo knows what she’s talking about. After launching a successful TV career with a matric certificate, she’s now studying maths at degree level herself. But she’s got more planned.
“It’s time I did my MBA (Master of Business Administration) degree,” she believes. “I want to move my business to the next level before I start a family and now I’m strong enough in my mind and my career to tackle a major new challenge.” [e]

Intokazi entsha kwiTsha Tsha
INDLELA eyindida obhalwe ngayo lo mdlalo iTsha Tsha yiyo esiwenze waba nezigidi ngezigidi zabalandeli wathola nemiklomelo yamazwe omhlaba kwezeTV kusukela ngo-2001. Inhloso yalolu chunge wukwazisa izigidi ngezigidi zababukeli abasebancane ngezinto ezithinta ezocansi ne-HIV/AIDS.
Kodwa indaba yokuthandana komfundisi nentokazi efaka ama-overall anogrisi ngenxa yomsebenzi wayo wokukhanda yiyo ezokwenza lo mdlalo udlule eminye yeTV yansuku zonke - ikakhulu njengoba indawo yomfundisi idlalwa yisihlabani seTV uHlomla Dandala, owayekwiSidingo nasohlelweni lwezothando i-All You Need Is Love.
“Ngesikhathi le nsizwa uLungi ifika kule ndawo, yaba ngundabamlonyeni kuwo wonke umuntu. Bonke omama baseLubusi babenesifiso sokuthi sengathi ingashada amadodakazi abo,” kuchaza uZiki.
“Kungakhoke kwaba yindaba enkulu isithandana nomuntu ofana noZukiswa.”
Kade kwakuyisifiso sikaZiki ukudlala indawo enjena kumabonakude. Uneminyaka engu-23, kanti wakhula endaweni yomphakathi omncane KwaZulu Natal. Emva kokwenza izifundo zokuphathwa kwamabhizinisi nezobuchwepheshe (IT), walibangisa eGoli.
Ubuhle nobude bakhe yikho okwamtholela imisebenzi yokukhangisa ngengqephu neyezikhangiso zikamabonakude.
Ngonyaka odlule wavela kwiGenerations, edlala indawo yomthwebuli wezithombe zephephabhuku owayeqashwe uNgamla (Menzi Ngubane). Wadlala izigcawu ezimbili kuphela.
Emva kwalokho uZiki wahlolelwa ukudlala indawo yentombazane yeqembu lezigelekeqe uThandeka emdlalweni Isidingo – owayesesitokisini esisodwa nentokazi exegelwa isimilo uCherel de Villiers, abagcina sebesebenzisana ochungeni lokuqola amabhizinisi izimali ezinkulu.
UZiki yamlahlekela le ndawo yathathwa nguKholeka Qwabe. Waphoxeka kangangoba wazicija kabusha ukuze abukeke ngenye indlela kumabonakude wagunda izinwele wabuya eseshaye imbungculu.
“Kwashintsha izinhlanhla zami ngokuphazima kweso lokho,” kusho yena. “Ngesikhathi ngiqala ukumodela, ngangine-Afro engayishintsha ngayenza isitayela esisha ngokuba ngiyiluke. Ukugunda ikhanda lami kunginika lokho kuzethemba nesibindi sokuba lezo zindawo engazidlala zangihlukumeza phambilini, ngizidlale ngempumelelo.”
“NjengakwiTsha Tsha kwathi lapho benza indawo yomuntu oyi-tomboy njengoZukiswa, angizange ngicabange ukuthi bangayinika umuntu ofana nami.”
Ongu-executive producer uTracy Clayton uthi uZiki imfanele impela le ndawo - ikakhulu njengoba edlala ndawonye nosemnkantshubomvu kulo mkhakha uHlomla.
“Ngiyathanda ukudlala indawo kaZukiswa,” kusho uZiki. “Ngakhula ngibahlonipha abantu besonto.”
UZukiswa wumuntu ongabhedelwa: usebuyele ekhaya eLubusi emva kokusebenza enkampanini yezimoto ePort Elizabeth.
Uwazi kahle umsebenzi wakhe wezimoto, kodwa usekhathele abesilisa abangadlulwa siketi abafuna ukucekela phansi umzimba wakhe.
Ufuna ukuziphathela impilo yakhe. Ubaba wakhe wabaleka ngaphambi kokuba azalwe - kungakhoke yena eya ocansini ngokusebenzisa ikhondomu. Umama wakhe akaphuzi ulala kubona, kanti uZukiswa yena akabulokothi utshwala.
ULungi ufuna ukusiza umphakathi ngendlela yakhe. Akanqeni ukwenza noma yini ngenhloso yokusiza abantwana bakaNkulunkulu. Ngesikhathi ehlangana noZukiswa, wayehambisela abampofu ukudla (uZukiswa).
Into yokugcina abayidingayo ezimpilweni zabo wukuba bathandane, kanti uZiki uthi leyo iyonanto eyenza indaba yabo yothando kube ngevuthayo kwiTV. uthando lwabo aludalwanga ubuhle. UZiki wazi kahle ukuthi ubuhle abuwona ukhiye wothando lwesikhathi eside.
“Abesilisa abanemali futhi abadumile, bathanda izingubo ezinhle, izimoto zikanokusho nokubonakala nabesimame abahle,” kusho yena.
“Abanye besilisa bahamba nanoma ngubani ofake isiketi, kanti abanye baze bahlongoze uhambo lwaseFrance. Ngiyathanda ukuba yingxenye yomphakathi ngixhumane nabantu emaphathini nasemicimbini - yilokho okubalulekile ukuhlale usondelana namathuba omsebenzi.
“Kulo msebenzi wami, angisebenzisi ithuba lokuvela kumabonakude ukuzitholela isoka elinemali.” [z]

BEQA emingceleni egadwe abahlome ngezibhamu. Kungenzeka kuqhume amabhomu besanqamula ehlathini, bomele amanzi noma babulawe yindlala ogwadule.
Uma sebesogwini, kungenzeka bathunjwe benziwe izigqila njengoba kwenzeka kulabo bantu abeqa eminyakeni engu-200 edlule.
Beqa ngezikebhe ezincane kanti abakwazi kuphatha lutho ngaphandle kwabasuke bekugqokile.
Uma sebegibele ezikebheni, bathandazela ukuthi zingacwili noma zibe nenye inkinga. Okunye abakuthandazelayo wukuthi kungavuki iziphepho, bangaphelelwa wukudla namanzi...
Ngabe yini eyenza babeke impilo yabo engozini engaka"
Basuke belibangise e-Europe, okuyizwe, ngokusho kwesisebenzi esibhekele inhlalakahle yabantu, "elingeke labacwasa noma lakubukela phansi abakumele."
KWATHI lapho u-Abdi Salan Mohammed Hassan oneminyaka engu-23 esekhathele yizimpi zomkhaya eSomalia esezidlule nemiphefumulo yabangaphezulu kwesigidi kusukela ngo-1991, walifulathela elaseSomalia. Wabeka imali ayeyithole ngokudayisa indawo yama-veg ayeyiphiwe abazali bakhe engakahlanganisi iminyaka engu-20 ezelwe.
Amabombo wawabhekisa e-Europe kanti indlela yakhe yayizodlula eLibya, agibele isikebhe esasizodlula kwiMediterranean.
Umama wakhe wazama ukumbonisa ngokuthi makangaluthathi lolo hambo. Lwaluyingozi kanti nempilo yayingeke yaba lula uma esefike lapho ayephikelele khona.
"Manje sengiyindoda okumele ithwale kanzima empilweni," kusho yena kumama wakhe.
Wayephethe isikhwama, izinsuku ezinhlanu wazichitha esebhasini elaliya e-Addis Ababa, e-Ethiopia.
Indlela eya eLibya idlula eSudan kodwa kuyingozi ukudlula kuleyo ndawo ungawaphethe amaphepha akugunyazayo. Kwaphela inyanga u-Abdi Salan elinde lawo maphepha kwaze kwadingeka ukuba agwazele isiphathimandla saseSudan ukuze simnike i-visa ayeyidinga.
Emva kwezinsuku ezine ehamba ngebhasi, wafika eKhartoum enhloko-dolobha yaseSudan. Wahlala enyuvesi alaliswa kuyona yizitshudeni zaseSomali. Zabuye zamxhumanisa nabanye abashushumbisi.
Ebusuku ngelinye ilanga, u-Abdir Salan nabanye baseSomali abangu-24 bagibela elolini badlula ogwadule lweSahara.
Abalisa ababili baseSudan babenika abagibeli amanzi ababewathela ezinkomishini zepulasitiki njalo emva kwamahora ambalwa.
Osukwini lwesikhombisa lwalolo hambo lwabo okwakumele luthathe amahora angu-48, bafelwa yimoto.
Ukubhajwa ogwadule kufana nokubhekana nokufa.
Emva kwamahora imoto ifile, yaduma baqhubeka nohambo.
Bafika eLibya emva kwezinsuku ezintathu.
Kwakuzodingeka ukuba u-Abdi Salan alinde izinyanga ezintathu ukuze athole indawo esikebheni.
BABENGU-85 abantu ababempintshene esikebheni - ababili kungabase-Egypt, oyedwa waseTunisia, oyedwa waseLibya noyedwa wase-Ethiopia kanti abanye kwakungabaseSomali, kukhona nabesimame abangu-13 omunye wabo ekhulelwe.
Ngowesilisa wase-Egypt onikwa umsebenzi wokuhola leli thimba. Wayethe uyakwazi ukushayela isikebhe kodwa uzoludinga usizo uma injini inenkinga.
Injini yesikebhe yaba nenkinga bephakathi olwandle kanti kwathi uma kuphela isonto besabhekene naleyo nkinga, u-Abdi Salan wabona ukuthi ngeke batholakale.
Emini babeyibona imikhumbi inqamula kude nabo. Abesilisa bazama ukwenza izinduku zokugwedla isikebhe.
Enye indoda kulawo ayesesikebheni yaziphonsa olwandle, kwaba eyokuqala eyazibulala ngalolo hlobo.
Alandela namanye. Ababesaphila baphuza ulwandle lwabagulisa. Izinsuku ezingu-13 zaphela sekufe abangaphezulu kuka-40.
"Ngangilindele ukufa," kusho u-Abdi Salan.
"Abanye babequlekile, abanye belahlekelwe yingqondo," kusho omunye wabahlengikazi abelapha abasinda emva kokutholakala kwesikebhe ogwini lwesiqhingi iLampedusa e-Italy.
Lolu daba lwashaqisa izwe. Imeya yaseRome yahlela ukuba umngcwabo wabafi wenzelwe ehholo laleli dolobha lapho amabhokisi angu-13 ayembozwe khona ngamafulegi aseSomali anombala omhlophe noluhlaza.
U-Abdi Salan walala amasonto amathathu esibhedlela ngenxa yokukhathala nokuphelelwa amanzi emzimbeni.
Kwathi lapho esenamandla okukhuluma nomndeni wakhe owawuseMogadishu ocingweni, wachazela umama wakhe konke okwamehlela.
ZINGAPHEZULU kwengxenye yesigidi izifika-namthwalo esezitheleke eWestern Europe eminyakeni emibili edlule.
Enye indawo ezingena ngayo yiFuerteventura, enye yamaCanary Islands aseSpain.
Ezinyangeni ezimbalwa ezedlule kwabikwa ukuthi sekufika nezikebhe zokudoba eziliqhamukisa eSenegal.
Zibalelwa ku-300 izifika- namthwalo ezifika eCanary Islands ngosuku kanti kulo nyaka, baphakathi kuka-1 000 no-1 700 abantu okuthiwa bafa bezama ukweqa.
E-Fuerteventura, usuku alupheli kungazange kubonakale sikebhe.
U-Aurora Hernandez wathi sekukaningi ebona izikebhe olwandle ngaphandle kwe-restaurant yakhe.
Uvame ukubanika okuya ngasethunjini abantu abayizifika-namthwalo.
"Basuke begodola, bengazi ukuthi bakuphi nokuthi bazophathwa kanjani," kusho yena.
UMA sebefikile ezweni labo le "nkululeko" bahlala ebhilidini elingasasetshenziswa elisesikhumulweni sezindiza okungangeni moya nalanga kulona.
Abaningi baliqhamukisa eMorocco nasemazweni akwi-sub-Sahara anjengeCameroon, Togo, Ghana neGuinea-Bissau. Kwande abesilisa kulaba bantu.
Amaqembu alwela amalungelo abantu athi impatho abayitholayo ayigcini ngokudabukisa nje kuphela kodwa ayikho nasemthethweni.
Abagqunywa ezitokisini abakwazi ukusebenzisa ucingo, ukuvakashelwa nokuphumela ngaphandle, kanye nokuthola abammeli.
Baphindiselwa emakhaya noma bashiywe eMadrid nakwamanye amadolobha.
"Abangakwenza wukuphila ngobugebengu nokuqwayiza," kusho ophethe iRed Cross eFuerteventura.
Kukhona okwehlukile abangakwenza labo abagcina befikile e-Europe.
U-Aurora Hernandez ukhumbula amazwi esifika-namthwalo esasiliqhamukisa eSierra Leone: "Sathi sikhetha ukufa sizama ukubaleka kunokuhlala ezweni lakubo.
"Sathi inhlalo ayiyinhle neze khona." [z]

USamantha Forbes wayesanda kuqeda isikole esezimisele ngokuhlelela ikusasa lakhe
IBAHAMAS yizwe elineziqhingi ezingaphezu kuka-700 kwi-Atlantic Ocean. Alikude kakhulu neMelika futhi kulapho osozimali nosaziwayo bethanda ukuthatha amaholidi baye khona.
USamantha Forbes wayengesona isihlabani samafilimu, engesiye usaziwayo waseHollywood, engesiye umvakashi kodwa kwakungowasendaweni.
Nakuba ukufa kwale ntombazane eyayineminyaka engu-19 kungadonsanga abezindaba, kodwa kwashiya abantu bakulesi siqhingi beshaqekile.
Le ntombazane eyachazwa ngumama wayo "njengemnene nenothando" yatholakala ngelinye ilanga ekuseni ifile ngo-October 1999.
Isidumbu sayo sasinqunu inqunywe uqhoqhoqho, kubekwe kuso i-dollar.
Abaseshi bathola izingubo zakhe umufi ebangeni elingamamitha ambalwa kanye nekhondomu eyase isebenzile.
USamantha wahamba waya e-bar nomngani wakhe uMarjorie ngobusuku obalandelwa yilesi sehlakalo. Lapha laba besimame bobabili baba nokuhilizisana ngesikhathi uSamantha efuna ukuhamba nabesilisa ababili ahlangana nabo lapho.
"Nanamuhla ngisazisola. Kwakungafanele ngimyekele ahambe nabo," kusho uMarjorie.
Kwakukade kunetha ngalobo busuku nokusho ukuthi ayekhona amathuba okulahleka kobufakazi.
Lokhu kubandakanya iminwe, izinwele nezingubo okungenzeka ukuthi kwagezwa yimvula ngamahora aphakathi kokufa kukaSamantha nokutholakala kwesidumbu sakhe. Imvula yayingayisusa nembewu yangakwezocansi eyayikwikhondomu eyatholakala eduze.
Kwathi lapho izindaba zokufa kukaSamantha zizwakala ephepheni lendawo, kwaqhamuka ufakazi nobufakazi bokuqala obasiza amaphoyisa.
Odayisa e-bar watshela abaseshi ukuthi ngesikhathi uSamantha efika e-bar wayenokuqophisana nabesilisa ababili.
UKeith Lotmore, owayemazi uSamantha wayekhona e-bar ngaleso sikhathi. Wangenelela wazama ukumehlisa ulaka wamtshela ukuthi angakhathazeki ngalaba besilisa.
Emva kokuba laba besilisa sebehambile, uSamantha wajoyina uKeith nomngani wakhe uDominic Moss ukuze kuphuzwe ndawonye.
Bobathathu laba bahamba ndawonye baphuma e-bar.
Lokho kwenza uKeith nomngani wakhe baba abasolwa abakhulu.
Amaphoyisa abalanda bobabili ezobaphenya. Bashaywa beseshwa ngokwahlukana kodwa basho indaba efanayo.
Bathi bagibelisa uSamantha ngesikhathi eya ekhaya nokwathi emva kokumehlisa babuyela e-bar beyothenga ukudla.
Amaphoyisa awazange futhi abe nenhlanhla ngalaba abanye besilisa ababili ababenoSamantha ngobusuku afa ngabo.
Amaphoyisa abafuna abathola bavuma ukuthi baqophisana nalo muntu omusha kodwa bathi bamshiya e-bar yesibili base bebuyela ekhaya ngokushesha.
Emva kwalokho abaseshi kukhona abakukhumbula. Ngesikhathi kuhlolwa isidumbu sikaSamantha, owayesihlola waqaphela utshani kusona.
Into yokuqala ososayensi abayithola, utshani obabusezicathulweni zomsolwa. Isidumbu satholwa enkundleni yegalofu i-Emerald Golf Course.
Ebhekene nalobu bufakazi obungakholakali, umsolwa uKeith Lotmore wavuma ukuthi wayengakawatsheli amaphoyisa konke okwenzeka ngobusuku uSamantha afa ngabo.
Ngesikhathi besendleleni eya ekhaya likaSamantha, uDominic wayeseqalile ukusondela kulo muntu omusha - ngokusho kukaKeith. Emva kwalokho wathi mabamise imoto enkundleni yegalofu ukuze yena noSamantha bazingcebelekele.
UKeith wamlalela. Ngesikhathi imoto ima, uSamantha waphuma wabaleka.
UDominic wamlandela uKeith wase ebalandela. Kwathi lapho ezama ukunqanda uDominic ekuhlaseleni uSamantha, wamesabisa ngommbese.
UKeith watshela amaphoyisa ukuthi emva kwalokho uDominic wamdlwengula wambulala wamnquma uqhoqhoqho. I-dollar bill eyabekwa phezu kwesidumbu sakhe kwakuyindlela yokugcina yokumethuka.
Yena uDominic wathi nguKeith owabulala uSamantha.
Obunye ubufakazi babukeka beseka uKeith: utshani batholakala ezicathulweni nasemasokisini akhe kodwa hhayi ehembeni lakhe.
UKeith kwacaca ukuthi akazange aye phansi ngamadolo ngoba lokho kwakuzokhomba ukuthi nguye owadlwengula uSamantha.
Akuzange kumsize uDominic ukungakwazi ukukhipha izingubo ayezigqokile ngalobo busuku ngoba ethi akasakhumbuli ukuthi wayegqokeni.
UDominic Moss watholakala enecala lokudlwengula nelokubulala uSamantha Forbes owayeneminyaka engu-19.
Wagwetshwa iminyaka engu-25 ejele. Ngesikhathi ithimba lababephethe icala livumelana ukuthi uLotmore akazange abe nesandla ekudlwenguleni nasekubulaleni, lamgwebela ukwesabisa ngoba wayekhona ngesikhathi lokhu kwenzeka. Wagwetshwa iminyaka emithathu ejele.[z]

IZANGOMA nezinyanga zikutshela amagama azokusabisa uma zifuna imali yakho ngokusho komunye umhlengikazi othi izangoma zithi amadlozi akhe afuna ukuba abe yisangoma.
"Sinazo izangoma zangempela lapha, kodwa ezinye zihlose ukwakha imali ngalolu bizo," kusho yena.
"Njalo uma ngiya esangomeni ngenkinga ephathelene nomsebenzi noma ngezinye izinkinga zami, sivele singitshele okunye nje."
Kudalwa yini lokho" "Sisuke sifuna ukungisabisa ukuze ngivume ukuthwasela ubungoma," kusho yena.
Kukhona ezibiza u-R10 000 uma zikuthwasisa. Kufanele-ke ukuba abafundi bethu bangabaze uma kuthiwa izinkinga zabo zidalwa wukungafuni ukuthwasela ubungoma.
"Ngineminyaka engu-22 kanti ngiba nenkinga uma ngisezinsukwini zami," kubhala owesimame waseNorth West Province.
"Ngopha kakhulu igazi lehle ngemilenze," kuchaza yena.
"Ziningi izinyanga esezingitshele ukuthi ngingasizakala uma ngivuma ukuba yisangoma."
Kodwa iyamhlupha indlela aphoqwa ngayo ukuba amukele lolu bizo.
"Kudalwa yini ukuthi amadlozi ami enze into efana nalena kimina"
"Ngezwa kuthiwa umama wayenesiphiwo sokwelapha kodwa wanqaba ukuba yisangoma. Ngabe ngijeziselwa lokho""
Kungenzeka ukuthi le nkinga ayidalwa wubizo...
Ukuze asizakale akazame umkhurushane nentolwane kuqala.
Makahlanganise lawa makhambi ndawonye awabophe ngokotini awabilise. Makaphuze uhhafu wengilazi kabili ngosuku isonto lonke. Okunye, makahlanganise isipuni salo muthi nephalishi alidle njalo ekuseni.
Omunye owesimame oneminyaka engu-66 uhlushwa amaphupho.
"Ngivame ukuphupha amanzi nezinyoka ezinkulu," kubhala yena.
Izinyoka ziyambiza zithi akangene emanzini.
Lawa maphupho akhe akhomba ngokusobala ukuthi unobizo lobungoma. Kufanele azame noma kanjani ukuthwasa.
Ukubangwa
"Ngidinga usizo lwakho ngoba nginenkinga yamadlozi ami," kubhala umfundi wesilisa.
"Umama wami nomkhulu bafuna ngiqhubeke ngenze umsebenzi wokwelapha ababewenza besaphila.
"Manje ngisejele kanti abathandazi bangitshela ukuthi umkhulu nomama abenze ukuba ngivalelwe ejele.
"Babuye bathi umkhulu uyathanda ukungisiza ukuze ngiphume ejele kodwa umama yena ufuna ngigqunywe khona."
Bobabili bayambanga.
"Kudalwa yini ukuthi bona bangafinyeleli esivumelwaneni mayelana nomsebenzi okumele ngiwenze"" kubuza umfundi.
Kuyenzeka ukuthi amadlozi alwe ebanga ukusebenzisa umuntu oyedwa.
Abadala emndenini kumele benze umsebenzi obizwa ngokuthi wukuphahla.
Uma benza lowo msebenzi bacela amadlozi ukuba angabangi umuntu oyedwa ekubeni bekhona abanye angakhetha kubona ukuba benze umsebenzi ofanayo.
Iqiniso lithi akusizo zonke izangoma ezisuke zidlala ngawe uma zithi izinkinga zakho zidalwa wukungafuni ukuba yisangoma.
Ukuthatha isinqumo sokwamukela ubizo lobungoma akusiyo into elula.
Kukhona isisho esithi: Umuntu osuke egqoke isicathulo esimpintshayo ozwa ubuhlungu.
Kodwa ungadeli ngokuzwa esangomeni esisodwa. Hamba uyozwa nakwezinye ukuthi inkinga yakho idalwa yini. Bheka nomlando womndeni wakini ukuze uthole ukuthi akekho yini owayeyisangoma kokhokho bakho. Lokho nje kukodwa kungenza ukuba usithathe kalula isinqumo... [z]

Balwa nobugebengu
EZITALADINI
BONA ZULU June 2008
Laba besimame balwa nobugebengu behlome ngezinduku, ama-bat e-baseball, izinduku zamagalofu nezimvubu... Indaba nguBrenda Nkuna
EZOBU GEBENGU 3
NJALO ngoLwesihlanu nangemiGqibelo ebusuku zisuke ziduma eKhayelitsha. Ubumnandi obunjalo buhambisana nokwenyuka kwezinga lobugebengu.
Kwathi ngobunye ubusuku kunguLwesihlanu ngiseKhayelitsha endaweni okuthiwa yiHarare ngazizwa ngiphephile sengathi ngiseSontweni ngesonto ekuseni.
Kulokhu sibonga abesimame abangu-60 beminyaka esuka kwengu-17 kuya kwengu-60, nabesilisa abangu-30 abazinikele ekulweni nobugebengu ngenhlangano yabo Imbizo kule ndawo iHarare.
Lokhu kugada ebusuku kule ndawo kuqala ngo-8 ebusuku kwi-container esiphenduke ikomkhulu laleli qembu labe-Imbizo.
Awukho ugesi namanzi kanti nefenisha yakhona inemifantu ngenxa yokuguga.
Kodwa kulokho akekho okhalazayo. Ongusihlalo uNonkoliseko Mcaleli (35) ukhipha ibhuku lakhe elimnyama abize amagama ukubona ukuthi ngobani abakhona. Lokho ukwenza ngosizo lwekhandlela.
Emva kwalokho kungena ucingo - olubika ukuthi kukhona lapho kugqekezwe khona - kwacelwa bonke abesilisa ukuba baphuthume khona.
Ngesikhathi abesilisa besahambile, abesimame baqala bazincokolela. Abanye babo besho ukuthi kungani bencamela ukudela ubuthongo babo bezozulazula ezitaladini baqaphe nabe-Imbizo.
"Siyathanda ukuhamba sizulazula sigadile kule ndawo yethu," kusho uNomsa Mthuwekhala (68) bonke banqekuzisa amakhanda bekhombisa ukuvumelana naye.
Uyachaza ukuthi bazama kanjani ukwenza inhlalo kube ngephephile ngokuqinisekisa ukuthi wonke amajoyinti nezitolo kuvalwa emva kancane kuka-7 ebusuku ukuze kuthi labo abangabantu bothuthuva bakwazi ukuya emakhaya.
Amaphathi enziwa ezindlini, nomculo onomsindo nako kuyamiswa emva kuka-7. Abesimame be-Imbizo baphelezela abanye besimame babase emakhaya bebasusa emarenki amatekisi ukuqiniseka ukuthi abahlukumezeki endleleni.
UMthuwekhala uthi kokunye bahlangana nabantu abadelelayo kodwa futhi bayakwazi ukuba babhekane nesimo ngokukhuluma nabo kahle noma ngokubaqondisa izigwegwe ngezimvubu nezinduku.
Ongunsumpa wamaphoyisa esiteshini samaphoyisa eHarare uRodger Rikhotso uthi izinga lobugebengu lehle kakhulu kusukela leli qembu le-Imbizo lasungulwa.
UMSEBENZI wabo ubonakala kahle ngezibalo ezigcinwe emaphoyiseni zobugebengu. Izibalo zobugebengu bonke eKhayelitsha kusukela ngo-April kuya kuSeptember ngo-2002 zazifinyelela ku-7 835.
Ngaso leso sikhathi ngo-2007 zehla zafinyelela ku-3 308, nokungukwehla ngamaphesenti angu-57,8%.
Phakathi kuka-2002 no-2007 ubugebengu behla ngo-37,5% endaweni yaseGugulethu, behla ngo-27,3% eNyanga.
Ngokuqhathanisa lezi zibalo, liyabonakala ngempela igalelo labe-Imbizo njengoba futhi behamba endaweni eyingxenye encane eKhayelitsha.
Phezu kwempumelelo yabo ekulweni nobugebengu - ngabe akufanele yini ukuba abesimame bazihlalele emakhaya nabemindeni yabo njengoba bona beqoma ukudala ukuthula emigwaqweni ebusuku emakhazeni?
"Ukuzulazula ezitaladini siqaphe - yiyona into engiyithandayo," kusho uMthuwekhala ehleka.
"Izingane zami zingidalela i-stress nokungcono ukuba ngibe lapha. Iyona into engiyithandayo," kusho omunye wesimame.
Kodwa phezu kokuzinikela nangaphezu kwempumelelo yabo, bayakudinga ukwesekwa.
Amalungu alo mbutho awanamathoshi, awanazo izinsimbi zokubopha, amajazi emvula noma amajakhethi kanti ngesikhathi sasebusika, labo abanezinkinga zenhliziyo noma isifo sikashukela bakuthola kunzima ukuhamba emvuleni lapho kunomoya ebusuku.
Ngaphezu kwalokho, amalungu amaningi awasebenzi awakwazi ngisho nokuba aziphathele ukudla noma ukuzithengela i-airtime ukuze akwazi ukuxhumana namanye amalungu esilisa e-Imbizo noma amaphoyisa uma kwenzeka ezithola esesenkingeni.
Leli qembu labesimame lihamba emgwaqweni lizulazula liphethe okokuzivikela okufana nezinduku, ama-baseball bats, izinduku zegalofu nezimvubu.
Ngesikhathi laba besimame bezulazula ezitaladini kuphela izindaba nokuncokola ngoba bafuna ukulalelisisa ukuthi ngabe akukho yini abakuzwayo okusolisayo.
Ekhoneni lomgwaqo sahlangana nendoda esencane idakiwe bayibuza ukuthi iyakuphi. Yayidakwe kakhulu, bayisesha ukuthi ayiphethe sikhali yini base beqiniseka ukuthi ifika ekhaya iphephile.
Emva kwesikhathi sahlangana nentsha embili ifake amajakhethi esikhumba nama-jean iphuza iSavannah neBlack Label.
Omunye wesimame wabaqonda wababuza ukuthi bahlala kuphi.Bamnika amakheli abo bathi baya ekhaya. Nabo futhi baseshwa beseshelwa izikhali batshelwa ukuba bahambe baye emakhaya ngaphambi kokuba bagcwelezwe.
Emva kancane kwamabili ebusuku, ngase ngikhathele ngifa kodwa laba besimame bengakhombisi kukhathala besazimisele ngokuqhubeka bagade kuze kube ngu-4 entathakusa.
Njengoba ngithatha i-leave yami, ngicabanga ngokuba nenhlanhla kwami yokuba ngichithe isikhathi sami nalaba besimame ababeka impilo yabo engcupheni ngenhloso yokuvikela izimpilo zabanye abantu. Okubuhlungu wukuthi laba besimame bancamele ukushiya abemindeni yabo ngenhloso yokuzinikela ekulweni nobugebengu ekubeni bengasebenzi.[z]

Izicabha ezibomvu zezindlu zangasese ezisanda kwakhiwa eduze komgwaqo wasemaphandleni.
UCLIVE Mashele nsukuzonke uphuma ekhaya kwakhe eTzaneen ngo-5 ahambe 250km ngemoto eya emsebenzini.
Wanikwa inkontileka yokwakha izindlu zangasese ezingu-1 500 ezindaweni ezingu-21 ngaphansi komkhandlu waseVhembe emngceleni weSA neZimbabwe.
"Njalo ekuseni, ngihamba ngiye ezakhiweni ukuqinisekisa ukuthi konke kuhamba kahle," kusho yena.
Kule minyaka emibili eyedlule usakhele abantu abangaphezu kuka-10 000 izindlu zangasese ezweni lonkana. Uhlelo lwakhe lomsebenzi seluvulele abantu abangaphezu kuka-20 000 amathuba omsebenzi.
Ngo-2007 wawina iWomen In Water, Sanitation And Forestry Award ngokwakha kwakhe izindlu zangasese nokukhuthaza inhlanzeko.
"Lo mklomelo kazwelonke uhlonipha abesimame abasebenza kanzima ukuthuthukisa izimpilo zabanye abantu futhi wangikhuthaza kakhulu ukuba ngisebenze kanzima ngokwedlulele ukuze ngisize ekwakheleni abantu bakithi impilo engcono."
Le ntokazi eneminyaka engu-41 yaselokishini eNkowankowa eduze kwaseTzaneen iyayithanda inselelo.
Namuhla inkampani yakhe iqashe abasebenzi abasebenza ngokugcwele abangu-26 basemahhovisi kanti igxile kakhulu ekuthuthukiseni umphakathi, ocwaningweni nasekulawuleni umsebenzi wokuhanjiswa kwendle.
Isiza futhi imiphakathi yasemaphandleni eyasuswa ezindaweni zayo ngenkani ngezikhathi zobandlululo ukuze ikwazi ukufaka izicelo zokubuyiselwa imihlaba. Ngokubambisana neminyango kahulumeni, iphinde yethule ama-workshop okuqwashisa umphakathi ngobhubhane lwe-AIDS ikhuthaze namakhono okuziphilisa.
Kunomncintiswano wezikole ezihlanzeke ukuzedlula zonke ezinye - i"cleanest school competition" nokungumncintiswano oxhaswe yinkampani yakhe uMashele.
"Imiklomelo isukela kumakhomphyutha kuya kuma-desk nasezihlalweni. Inhloso yawo wukukhuthaza izingane zesikole ukuba zinakekele indawo yazo ziyigcine ihlanzekile."
Umsebenzi wakhe wokwakha izindlu zangasese yiwo owamzuzisa isheke lika-R12 000 kuNgqongqoshe uLindiwe Hendricks eGoli ngomhlaka 31 August ngonyaka odlule.
"Ngeke ukholwe ukuthi kukhona abantu abahluphekayo abangakaze basebenzise izindlu zangasese empilweni yabo," kusho lo mama onezingane ezintathu ongusomabhizinisi.
"Kwadingeka ukuba siqashe abasebenzi bethu bezempilo ukuba bahambe baye emiphakathini bayofundisa abantu ngokubaluleka kokusebenzisa izindlu zangasese.
"Izindlu zethu zangasese zisebenziseka kalula ekubeni kulula futhi nokuzihlanza," kusho yena. "Siphinde sifake nama-container amanzi ukuze abasebenzisa izindlu zangasese zethu bakwazi ukugeza izandla.
Njengoba emsebenzini wokwakha kusakhonya abesilisa, uClive yena ukholwa wukuthi njengoba uhulumeni evulela abesimame amathuba, lokho kungenhloso yokubasiza bakwazi ukungena kule mboni.
"Ngalibamba ngazo zombili lelo thuba, ngakhoke ngingajabula ukubona abanye besimame benza lokho."[z]

Wakhela umphakathi amathoyilethi
Lona wesimame ozibandakanye kwezamabhizinisi, uvulela abanye besimame ithuba lokuzibandakanya embonini yokwakha - aphinde asize imiphakathi yasemaphandleni
INDABA NEZITHOMBE NGUNEVILLE MAAKANA
UCLIVE Mashele nsukuzonke uphuma ekhaya kwakhe eTzaneen ngo-5 ahambe 250km ngemoto eya emsebenzini.
Wanikwa inkontileka yokwakha izindlu zangasese ezingu-1 500 ezindaweni ezingu-21 ngaphansi komkhandlu waseVhembe emngceleni weSA neZimbabwe.
"Njalo ekuseni, ngihamba ngiye ezakhiweni ukuqinisekisa ukuthi konke kuhamba kahle," kusho yena.
Kule minyaka emibili eyedlule usakhele abantu abangaphezu kuka-10 000 izindlu zangasese ezweni lonkana. Uhlelo lwakhe lomsebenzi seluvulele abantu abangaphezu kuka-20 000 amathuba omsebenzi.
Ngo-2007 wawina iWomen In Water, Sanitation And Forestry Award ngokwakha kwakhe izindlu zangasese nokukhuthaza inhlanzeko.
Lo mklomelo kazwelonke uhlonipha abesimame abasebenza kanzima ukuthuthukisa izimpilo zabanye abantu.
"Lo mklomelo wangikhuthaza kakhulu ukuba ngisebenze kanzima ngokwedlulele ukuze ngisize ekwakheleni abantu bakithi impilo engcono."
Le ntokazi eneminyaka engu-41 yaselokishini eNkowankowa eduze kwaseTzaneen iyayithanda inselelo.
Namuhla inkampani yakhe iqashe abasebenzi abasebenza ngokugcwele abangu-26 basemahhovisi kanti igxile kakhulu ekuthuthukiseni umphakathi, ocwaningweni nasekulawuleni umsebenzi wokuhanjiswa kwendle.
Isiza futhi imiphakathi yasemaphandleni eyasuswa ezindaweni zayo ngenkani ngezikhathi zobandlululo, ukuze ikwazi ukufaka izicelo zokubuyiselwa kwayo imihlaba. Ngokubambisana neminyango kahulumeni, iphinde yethule ama-workshop okuqwashisa nge-AIDS ikhuthaze namakhono okuziphilisa.
Kunomncintiswano wezikole ezihlanzeke ukuzedlula zonke ezinye - i"cleanest school competition" nokungumncintiswano oxhaswe yinkampani yakhe uMashele.
"Imiklomelo isukela kumakhomphyutha kuya kuma-desk nasezihlalweni. Inhloso yawo wukukhuthaza izingane zesikole ukuba zinakekele indawo yazo."
Umsebenzi wakhe wokwakha izindlu zangasese wamzuzisa isheke lika-R12 000 kuNgqongqoshe uLindiwe Hendricks eGoli ngomhlaka 31 August ngonyaka odlule.
"Ngeke ukholwe ukuthi kukhona abantu abangakaze basebenzise izindlu zangasese empilweni yabo," kusho lo mama onezingane ezintathu ongusomabhizinisi.
"Kwadingeka ukuba siqashe abasebenzi bethu bezempilo ukuba bahambe baye emiphakathini bayofundisa abantu ngokubaluleka kokusebenzisa izindlu zangasese.
"Izindlu zethu zangasese zisebenziseka kalula kanti siphinde sifake nama-container amanzi kuzona ukuze abazisebenzisayo bakwazi ukugeza izandla.
UClive ukholwa wukuthi uhulumeni uvulela abesimame amathuba ukuze bakwazi ukungena kule mboni ebithathwa njengeyabesilisa.
"Ngalibamba ngazo zombili lelo thuba, ngakhoke ngingajabula ukubona abanye besimame benza lokho."[z]

Sikhulu isibalo sabantu asebesishiyile ngenxa yezingozi zomgwaqo ngokukaMoira Haarhof ongumcwaningi kwezokuthutha eSA. Leli lizwe lingelesithathu kwangaqikeleli ezokuphepha emgwaqweni emhlabeni.

I-Road Accident Fund yabona ukuthi umsebenzi wayo wukukhokhela abalimala emgwaqweni nemindeni yabo kunokuthi ixhase imikhankaso yezokuphepha emgwaqweni. UMnyango wezokuThutha wagcina ungasenayo imali eyanele yokuxhasa imikhankaso ye- Arrive Alive kwehliswa izindleko.

Lokho akwanele emindenini yabantu abangu-20 000 abafa emgwaqweni minyaka yonke. Akusiniki nethuba lokufeza inhloso yeMillennium Development Goal yokuthi ngonyaka ka-2014 izingozi zomgwaqo zibe sezehle ngengxenye.

Shayela kahle: Amaphutha enziwa abantu emgwaqweni nokushayela budedengu kudala u-90% wezingozi. Qiniseka ukuthi ushayela kahle uzifundise ukuvikela nabanye uma ushayela, wazi ngokwenzeka emgwaqweni nalapho uphikelele khona ukuze usheshe ugweme ingozi.
Yehlisa ijubane: Ijubane lidala u-30% wezingozi - zingu-75% eziba zimbi kakhulu ngoba abantu bayalimala noma bafe kuzona.
Isibalo sabashona ezingozini zomgwaqo ngo-1974 sehla emva kokushoda kuka-petrol eSA ngenxa yenkinga eyayikhona emhlabeni wonke kanti umgomo wejubane wehliselwa ku-80km/h okwesikhashana.
Ukukhushulwa komgomo wejubane eMelika kwakhuphula izingozi zomgwaqo ngo-34%, kanti ukwehliswa kwawo eSwitzerland naseSweden kwehlisa izingozi zomgwaqo ngo-21%.
Ungashayeli uphuzile: Ukushayela uphuzile kudala u-40% wezingozi. Njengoba utshwala buqeda amandla, kungcono ukuthi kube khona oyedwa ongaphuzi uma nihamba ozoshayela.
Qaphela izidakamizwa nemithi engenza ukuba ungashayeli kahle.
Bopha ibhande: Ukubopha ibhande kwehlisa izinga lokulimala nelokushona kwabantu ngo-40%.
Imoto mayilungele ukuba semgwaqweni: I-SA ihlukile kwamanye amazwe ngoba ayinawo umgomo wokuhlolwa kwemoto ngaphambi kokuba uthole ilayisensi yayo yonyaka. Kodwa ngokocwaningo, baningi abahambisana nokuthi izimoto zihlolwe ngoba ezingakulungele ukuba semgwaqweni zidala u-30% wezingozi.
Phumula: Ukukhathala kudala u-10% wezingozi. Uma kudingeka ukuba uhambe ibanga elide, qiniseka ukuthi uyama uphumule emva kwamahora amabili.
Shiya isikhala: NgokoMnyango wezokuThutha, abashayeli abane kwabahlanu bashayela balandele imoto eduze kakhulu. Abacwaningi bathi kuthatha cishe umzuzwana nengxenye ukwenza ingozi uma uphazanyiswa yingxoxo, wumculo noma wukubuka indawo. Isikhala ozosishiya sikale ngesigxobo, ngesihlahla noma ngebhilidi elidlulwa yimoto oyilandelayo, ubale uthi, "One-thousand-and-one, one-thousand-and-two." Uma ufika kuleyo ndawo ungakaqedi ukubala, kusho ukuthi usondele kakhulu kuleyo moto.
