Ngabe usendleleni ebange ku-2007?
I-winger ebhekwe ngabomvu!
NJENGABO bonke abafana abancane abasakhula elokishini, noCedric Mkhize wayedlala ibhola nabangani bakhe. Imigwaqo ewubhuqu yaseHammarsdale eduze kweTheku yiyo eyayiyinkundla yabo yebhola. Babebancane beneminyaka eko-9 no-10 benesifiso sokudlalela izwe labo.
KumfokaMkhize lelo phupho lizofezeka. Ekuqaleni kwalo nyaka wayeyingxenye yeqembu lakuleli lika-U21 elawina indebe yomhlaba e-Argentina.
Yinye kuphela into esishintshile kumfokaKhabazela, wukuthi usedlala ibhola lombhoxo.
Lolu shintsho kuCedric lwaqala ngesikhathi bemthumela kwi-private school eneminyaka engu-11. Lo mdlalo wawuthanda eqala ukuwudlala.
UCedric (20) ongowokuzalwa eMpangeni ukholwa wukuthi yinhlanhla nothisha wakhe uMnuz Lombard okumenze wafinyelela kuleli zinga.
“Ngangisese-primary school ngesikhathi uMnuz Lombard ebona leli thalente kimina engangingazi nokwazi ukuthi nginalo,” kukhumbula uCedric.
E-high school, waqokelwa i-Natal Academy U16.
“Ngajabula kakhulu ngesikhathi ngiqokwa ukuba ngiyomela isifunda sami. Kodwa ngangingakazi ukuthi uthando lwami lwe-rugby lungahamba lugcine lapho lukhona namuhla,” kusho okaKhabazela.
Emva kokuphothula u-matric wakhe, uCedric nalapho wayengazithathi njengomdlali we-rugby oyi-professional. Esikhundleni salokho wahamba wayokwenza izifundo zobunjiniyela eDurban Institute Of Technology.
Waqala ukudonsa amehlo abaningi ngendlela ayedlala ngayo nokwathi lapho ithuba lokujoyina iNatal Sharks livela, walibamba ngezandla zombili waze wama isikhashana ezifundweni zakhe.
Lo mdlali oyi-winger wathatha isinqumo esiyiso. Usewuhambile umhlaba, waze wadlala eNew York. Kodwa konke lokhu kwanqanyulwa wukumenywa kwakhe ukuba ayoziqeqesha neSpringbok Sevens.
Lokhu kuzomholela eqenjini eliphezulu. UMkhize namanje akakakholwa ukuthi konke lokhu kwenzeke kuyena ngesikhathi esifishane kangangoba ngezinye izikhathi uze azincinze efuna ukubona ukuthi akaphuphi yini.
Kodwa kwaba yingesikhathi umqeqeshi wamaSharks uDick Muir embiza ukuba azoziqeqesha naleli qembu nokuyinto uMkhize athi wazibona ngayo ukuthi ungumdlali we-rugby oyi-professional.
Eyingxenye yeqembu leSuper 12, wadlala imidlalo eNew Zealand nase-Australia ekuqaleni kwesizini kulo nyaka.
“Ngakuthokozela kakhulu ukuthola leso sipiliyoni,” kusho yena.
UMuir akangabazi ukuthi uMkhize uya kude. Lo mqeqeshi umchaza lo mdlali njengomuntu okwaziyo ukusebenzisana nabanye. Ukholwa wukuthi le nsizwa iyakwazi ukudlala emazingeni aphezulu.
“Uhlale ekhona kanti futhi kumnandi ukuba naye. Njengomdlali ungumuntu osheshayo onomqondo okhaliphile kulo mdlalo,” kusho uMuir.
UCedric uphuma emndenini omkhulu, unodadewabo abahlanu nomfowabo kanti abazali bakhe bobabili basaphila. Uhlala eDurban North, umndeni wakhe uwubona kanye ngenyanga.
“Umndeni wami ungiseka kakhulu, kanti nomfowethu ufuna ukuzibona ngelinye ilanga edlala i-rugby emazingeni abe-pro,” kusho uCedric.
Le winger yamaSharks ikholwa wukuthi uma isebenza kanzima, iyoba ngomunye wabadlali abayoqokelwa iqembu lesizwe eliyodlala kwiRugby World Cup ngo-2007. Kodwa uyazi ukuthi lokhu ngeke kwenzeke kalula.[z]

ESIKOLENI ingane yakho izohlangana nezinye eziningi bachithe amahora amaningi begqumelene ndawonye ekilasini. Noma yingasiphi isikhathi eyodwa noma ngaphezulu kungenzeka zingaphili kahle nokuyinto engabeka ezinye engcupheni yokwamukela izifo namagciwane afafazeka ngokukhulu ukushesha.

n Chicken pox. Lesi ngesinye sezifo ezidlange kakhulu ezinganeni zeminyaka ephakathi kwemibili neyisishiyagalombili. Sithelelana ngamagciwane asemoyeni nangokuthintana.
Izimpawu: Lesi sifo siqala ngemfiva, ikhanda, umphimbo obuhlungu nokungavumi ukudla. Uyaqubuka ebusweni, okhakhayini, esifubeni, emumva, ezingalweni nasemilenzeni - emva kosuku noma ezimbili. Ngokushesha ukuqubuka kuba namanzi, kuqine uma sekoma bese kuxebuka.
Siyingozi kangakanani" I-paracetamol yemfiva nokokwehlisa ukuluma yizona zinto ezidingekayo. I-Aspirin akufanele isetshenziswe ngoba ingenza ingane yakho igule kakhulu.
Uma ukuqubuka kushisa, kuba bomvu noma kuthamba, kungenzeka ukuthi ingane inokufa kwamagciwane okudinga ama-antibiotics kudingeke ukuba iyiswe emtholampilo noma kudokotela. Ukwelashwa okuyikho kuyadingeka uma ingane yakho ikhombisa ukwethuka, iphalaza, intengantenga uma imile noma ilala njalo.
n Diphtheria. Lesi yisifo esifafazeka ngomoya, amathe noma amafinyila omunye esimphethe.
Izimpawu: Uma i-diphtheria isemakhaleni kuphela, iqala njengomkhuhlane. Emva kwalokho amafinyila aba wubomvu obunuka kabi obungenza isikhumba emakhaleni nasodebeni olungenhla sibe nezilonda.
Uma igciwane liba emumva emphinjeni usuku olulodwa noma ezimbili, kuba yinto ejwayelekile kwenze umphimbo ube buhlungu uhambisane nomkhuhlane, kuvele untwentwesi olumhlophe noma olu-grey emphinjeni lumboze amathansela, olwangeni nasemaceleni. Lolu ntwentwesi lungahamba luye lufinyelele emankankeni noma epayipini lomoya.
Siyingozi kangakanani" Uma usola i-diphtheria, yelaphe ngokushesha. Izingane kufanele zihlukaniswe ukuze kugwemeke ukubhebhetheka kwalesi sifo esiyingozi. Wonke amalungu omndeni nabanye abasondelene nawo kufanele abhekwe kakhulu, asebenzise ama-antibiotics ukuze angangenwa yilesi sifo.
n I-measles. Lona ngumkhuhlane odala isifo esimandla esikhumbeni nasemgudwini wokuphefumula. Lesi sifo sisabalala uma umuntu esimphethe ethimula amagciwane engena komunye emakhaleni noma emphinjeni.
Izimpawu: Ingane ingakhombisa izimpawu zokukhwehlela okomile, amakhala anamafinyila, amehlo abomvu avuvukele, ukucinana emakhaleni, ukuthimula nemfiva ephezulu.
Ukuqubuka kuvame ukuvela ebusweni nasemqaleni izinsuku ezimbili kuya kwezine emva kokuqala kokugula, bese kusabalala esifubeni, ngemumva kugcine ezingalweni nasemilenzeni.
Siyingozi kangakanani" Njengoba kungekho ukwelashwa okuqondene ngqo ne-measles, ebaphethe bahlaliswa bodwa - bavame ukulala belashwe nge-paracetamol, umuthi wokukhwehlela nokhilimu wesikhumba ukuze kwehle imfiva, ukukhwehlela nokuluma.
I-measles yehlisa izinga lokusebenza kwamasosha omzimba enganeni kanti lokhu kuthatha amasonto ambalwa kwenze ingane ibe sengcupheni yokungenwa yizifo kalula.
Uma kuyimfiva eqhubekayo, hambisa ingane yakho kudokotela noma emtholampilo ngokushesha.
n Meningitis. Lesi sifo siyingozi kakhulu, sidala ukushisa ontwentwesini olumboze umqondo nomgogodla. Singesinye sezifo eziyingozi ezinganeni ngoba singabulala.

Yazi IZINOMBOLO ZESIROMA
Hlela lezi zinhlamvu zamagama ngendlela efanele.
IZINOMBOLO ZESIROMA yindlela yokubhala izinombolo yakudala emandulo kwelaseRome. Kwahamba kwahamba le ndlela yaphuculwa kancane ngezikhathi zeMiddle Ages ukuze kube yilezi esizisebenzisa namuhla.
Kule ndlela ezinye izinhlamvu zamagama zisetshenziswa njengezinombolo. Ukwenza isibonelo: I (i) = 1; II (ii) = 2; X (x) = 10; M (m) = 1000.
Ezindaweni lapho singalindela khona ukubona imibhalo yesiRoma:
Bhekisisa kuma-credits amafilimu noma kwawama-show eTV uzobona ukuthi unyaka eyenziwa ngayo uhlale ubhalwe ngemibhalo yesiRoma.
Isebusweni bamanye amawashi nalapho isikhathi sibhalwe ngesiRoma.
Amagama amakhosi - ukwenza isibonelo, George VI, nokuchaza ukuthi wayengowesithupha obizwa ngokuthi wuGeorge.
Singakhuluma ngeFirst World War noma iSecond World War njenge "World War I" noma "World War II," noma sithi i-WWI noma i-WWII.
Amaqembu ezemidlalo, ikakhulu asezikoleni ahlukaniseka ngezinombolo zaseRoma nokuhambisana nenombolo yabadlali bawo - "1st XV" kungaba yiqembu lokuqala le-rugby (XV = 15) kuthi u-"1st XI" kube yiqembu elokuqala lebhola lezinyawo (XI = 11).

Yayinemilenze emibili iphila ngezinye izilwane inomsila omude oqinile inezinzipho ezigobe njengesikela nokucatshangelwa ukuthi yayizisebenzisa ekubulaleni izitha zayo.
I-"raptor" ijwayelekile kubantu abaningi. Kulokhu sibonga ama-movie eJurassic Park - nakuba yakhonjiswa ibukeka inkulu kunalokhu eyayiyiko isaphila futhi ingenazimpaphe.
Empeleni ama-raptor asekhulile cishe angu-2m ubude kanti angu-50cm ukuphakama. Angaba nesisindo cishe esingu-15kg.
Imihlathi yayo inamazinyo angumugqa kanti angu-26 kuya kwangu-28 agqagqene ezinhlangothini zombili kanti wonke anamandla ngasemumva - cishe nokuyinto eyenza izilwane zakwazi ukuthuthukisa nezindlela zazo zokubamba ezinye izilwane ngisho ngabe lezo zilwane zigijima ngesingakanani isivinini.

Ukubambezeleka phakathi kwesikhathi obona ngaso umbani nokuzwa kwakho ukuduma, kwenzeka ngoba umsindo uhamba kancane kakhulu kunokukhanya.
Umsindo uhamba emoyeni ngesivinini esingu-350m/second ekubeni isivinini sokukhanya sihamba 299 792 458m/second.

bheka isibhakabhaka ubheke umbani.
bala ukuthi mingaki imizuzwana ngaphambi kokuba uzwe ukuduma. Kwenze lokhu ngokuba ubale kakhulu: "One-one-thousand, two-one-thousand" uqhubeke uzwe ukuduma.
Hlukanisa inombolo yemizuzwana ngo-3 ukuze ubale ibanga ngamakhilomitha. Ukwenza isibonelo: uma ubale imizuzwana eyisithupha kusukela ngesikhathi ubona umbani, kusho ukuthi ukushaya kombani kwakuqhele ngamakhilomitha amabili kunalapho wawukhona (6 ÷ 3 = 2).
Uma ukukhanya kwenzeka kukuningi kusondelene, kunganzima ukusho ukuthi ukuduma kungokwakuphi ukubaniza. Uma ukuphepha kuyinto ekubusayo, qala ukubala kusukela ekukhanyeni kokugcina okubonayo.

Bald Eagle
Anomzimba onsundu, ikhanda elimhlophe, umsila kanye nomlomo ogobile. Le nyoni isetshenziswa njengophawu lwaseMelika.
I-Bald Eagle yinyoni enkulu enomzimba ongubude obungu-70-95cm, umsila ongu-170-240cm nesisindo esingu-3-6kg.
Ukudla ekuthandayo yizinhlanzi ezibambela ngokwayo emanzini.
I-Bald Eagle inyoni enamandla kakhulu ekundizeni engandiza 48km/h iphethe inhlanzi ngomlomo.
Empilweni yoqobo, amaBald Eagle ayashwashwada answininize. Awakhali ngendlela ongawezwa ekhala ngayo lapho uwabona kuma-movie - lokho kukhala kusuke kungokokhozi okusetshenziswa ukuze kuhambisane nomnyakazo.

Uma isisu sakho singenakho ukudla sinamathuba amaningi okuba singenwe wumoya. Lawa mabhamuza omoya azophusheka aye emumva naphambili esiswini "esingenalutho" - kungakhoke ngesinye isikhathi isisu sakho siye sikhale.

Sinethulela inkosi yokuqala yesimame yabesizwe saseValoyi…
NGESIKHATHI bemembesa isikhumba sengwe bemgcoba njengenkosi, kwaphakama abantu bonke bekikiza bethokozela inkosi yabo entsha.
UPhillia Nwamitwa (67) usesithathe ngokusemthethweni isihlalo sobukhosi njengenkosi yokuqala ngqa yesimame yabantu baseValoyi okuyisizwe samaShangani eduze kwaseTzaneen eLimpopo.
“Lokhu kunqoba akusikho okwami, kodwa ngokwabesimame bonke baseSA,” kusho inkosi itshela uBONA.
Ungugogo wabazukulu abangu-10 owathatha iminyaka cishe engu-40 elwela ukuba yinkosi. Uyinkosazana yenkosi uFofoza owakhothama engenayo inkosana ngo-1968.
Ngaleso sikhathi uPhillia wayeneminyaka engu-27 futhi engathathwa njengomuntu ongathatha ubukhosi ngoba engumuntu wesimame. Umalume wakhe uRichard nguye owaba yinkosi wabusa lesi sizwe waze wakhothama ngo-2001.
Emva kwalokho indodana kaRichard yayifuna ukungena ezicathulweni zikayise kodwa ngaleso sikhathi uPhillia wayezimisele ukulwela isihlalo sobukhosi.
Lolu daba lwayiswa enkantolo, kodwa lamlahla uPhillia ePretoria High Court naseSupreme Court Of Appeals eBloemfontein. Lezi zinkantolo zombili zanquma ukuthi kwakuphambene nesiko labangamaShangani ukuba owesimame abe yinkosi.
Inkantolo yoMthetho-sisekelo yona yathi uPhillia unelungelo lokuba yinkosi ngokuhambisana nomthetho-sisekelo omusha neBill Of Rights engakuvumeli ukucwaseka ngenxa yobulili.

NGANGIDONSWA OKUTHILE
"Ngangingakwazi ukuhlala ngingayi eMofolo Super Bowl. Ungathi kwakukhona into eyayingidonsela khona. Kwakuthi lapho kukhona okwenzekayo khona njengekhonsathi, ngangima ngasocingweni ngibuke esiteji," kusho kuchaza uManaka. Wayeziphupha ngelinye ilanga ekuso leso siteji. Namuhla uBONA wenze lelo phupho lakhe lafezeka!
ILOKISHI LAMI, ISIHLABANI SAMI
ISoweto ka-
anaka
ISIPOKI ESASITHANDA UTAMATISI
UManaka nobaba wakhe owayengumthwebuli-zithombe kaBONA uClifford Ranaka bengaphandle komuzi onamakamelo amane kuMadikoe Street eZone Two eMeadowlands nokuyilapho uManaka azalelwa khona ngo-1979.
Umalume kaManaka uSerame osahlala kuwo lo muzi, usitshele ngesipoki wathi: "Njalo ekuseni sasivuka sithole ukuthi kukhona okungajwayelekile okwenzekile kutamatisi ekhishini."
UManaka wayithatha le ndaba waqhuba wathi: "Kwakunezimbobo kutamatisi kubonakala ukuthi kukhona obekuwumunca, womile ngaphakathi. Ngikhumbula bonke abantu abadala bephikisana bekhombana ngeminwe ngalesi senzo. Ekugcineni bavumelana ngokuthi kusho ukuthi kukhona isipoki.
"Kodwa sasingekho isipoki. Leso 'sipoki' kwakuyimi. Abazali bami babengilalisa phakathi kwabo ebusuku. Ngangivuka ngicathame ngiye ekhishini ngifike ngimunce ujusi kotamatisi."
ISANGO LAKHE
Isango ayevame ukuma kulo abuke okwenzekayo. Abakanye noManaka (kusuka kwesobunxele) ngumzala wakhe u-Ayanda, umalume wakhe uSerame, u-anti wakhe uHenrietta nobaba wakhe uClifford.
IPHALISHI LIKA-KOKWANI
Kusukela eMeadowlands abazali bakaManaka bathuthela elokishini laseMofolo. Lapha lawa mantombazane ayebhasobhwa ngumama ayembiza ngokuthi ngu"Kokwani".
"Engikukhumbula kahle ngaye yindlela ayesifunza ngayo iphalishi," kusho uManaka esimbona lapha esikhombisa ukuthi lo mama wayeqale athele iphalishi esandleni sakhe. "Emva kwalokho wayelihlohlela emlonyeni wakho ngeminwe yakhe," kusho uManaka.
"Kwakuthi uma ungaligwinyanga, avale amakhala akho uhhafu womzuzu ngeminwe yakhe uze uphoqeke ukuba uligwinye. Sasingakuthandi lokhu kodwa sasisutha."
UNGUMHOLI
E-Diepkloof Extension, kulapho umndeni kaManaka wawuqashe khona amakamelo amabili. Kwakulapha eDK lapho uManaka angenwa wuthando lokudlala emidlalweni yeshashalazi emva kokubonana nochwepheshe wezeshashalazi uSaul Rachilo.
"UBaba uRachilo wayesithokozisa esixoxela izindaba esifundisa ukucula nokudansa," kusho uManaka.
"E-DK iningi labangani bami kwakungabafana kuyimi umholi weqembu lethu," kusho uManaka.
"Sasihamba sehla senyuka ezitaladini sivunule ngezomdabu esasizenzele zona sidansa sicula izingoma zeShaka Zulu, okwakuluchunge lweTV okwakudlala kulo uHenry Cele enguShaka.
"Ngangenza konke ababekwenza. Ngemva kwalapho sasihlala khona kwakunendawo eyisigange esasivame ukuzingela khona izinyoni namagundane ngemikhonto yokuzakhela kanye nezihlilingi.
"Ngangidubula ngingageji. Sasibasa umlilo lapho endle sibhraye sidle izinyoni. Ngaphandle kwalokho, odadewethu nami sasizi 'ngcwaba' egcekeni lasekhaya senze iziphambano ezincane esasizihloma phezu kwalawo 'mathuna' emva kokuthandaza," kusho uManaka.[z]
Indaba: Force Khashane

Inkulisa uManaka nodadewabo uNompumelelo ababefunda kuyona. "Engikukhumbulayo wukuthi ngangineminyaka emihlanu ngikhonze ukudweba. UNompumelelo wayefika njalo ekilasini lethu ekhalela ukuba abe nami afike one umsebenzi wami wezobuciko ngokuba awudwebe ube mahliphihliphi yonke indawo," kusho uManaka.

SIYAKUKHUTHAZA
SONKE sinabantu abayizibonelo ezinhle kithina. Abantu esibathathisa okwamaqhawe ethu. Kungenzeka ukuthi lowo muntu uyisihlabani, umlingisi noma umdlali webhola, noma kube wumuntu esimaziyo osondelene nathi. Labo bantu bayasikhuthaza. Basinika umkhondo wento esingayenza. Ubuhlakani babo buyasiqondisa. Sifunda - noma sizwe ngezinselelo ababhekana nazo ezisinika amandla okubhekana nezinkinga zethu.
Yingakho nje sithi laba bantu "bayizibonelo ezinhle." Ngala mazwi singasho ukuthi laba bantu sifunda kubona. Ngokuba yisibonelo esihle amaqhawe ethu asikhombisa izinto okumele sizenze, indima esingayidlala empilweni.
Kodwa kumele siqaphele uma sikhetha amaqhawe ethu...
Uma ukhetha iqhawe ofuna ukuhamba ezinyathelweni zalo, zibuze lokhu kuqala: yini eyenza umbone eyiqhawe lowo muntu?
Khumbula ukuthi umuntu oyisibonelo esihle wenza izinto ezinhle! Lo muntu angakusiza ukuze uzithuthukise!
Okwesibili okufanele ukwenze wukuzihlolisisa. Yini onamandla okuyenza? Yini ongenamandla okuyenza? Yikuphi ofuna ukukulungisa empilweni yakho? Yikuphi ofuna ukukushintsha?
Isibonelo, kungenzeka ukuthi ungumuntu onamahloni. Yinto yokuqala ongathanda ukuyishintsha. Kodwa kanjani? Umuntu oyiqhawe lakho ungena lapho. Kungenzeka ufunde ngomuntu olingisayo owayenamahloni engakabi ngumlingisi nokuthi wawaqeda kanjani amahloni akhe. Lowo muntu uba yisibonelo esihle kuwena.
Kodwa umuntu oyiqhawe lakho kungenzeka angadumi. Kungaba wumuntu omaziyo, onolwazi wena ongenalo.
Akunankinga ukuba nabantu abaningi abayisibonelo esihle kuwena. Akekho umuntu ofana nawe kanti ngeke ukhuthazwe umuntu oyedwa. Khumbula ukuthi akufanele uzikhohlise. Uma ungenalo iphimbo elimnandi, mancane amathuba okuba wumculi ocula umculo woKholo odumile emhlabeni. Kungcono ubheke ukuzethemba komculi omthandayo, noma ukuzinikela kwakhe entweni ayenzayo ukhuthazwe yilezo zinto kufezeke amaphupho akho.
U-Oprah Winfrey oyisibonelo esihle kwabaningi ubeka kahle uma ethi: "Ungazami ukuba ngu-Oprah. Ngeke ulunge. Yenza onamandla okukwenza!" [z]
Indaba: Neliswa Mzimba
U-Jonathan Butler uthathwa njengomuntu oyisibonelo esihle ngoba ungumuntu ophumelele phezu kokukhula empofu.
U-Oprah uyisibonelo esihle kwabaningi emhlabeni.
QAPHELA!
Qaphela "ungenzi abantu izithixo zakho" uze ubabone bebaluleke kakhulu kunalokho abayikona - noma ulindele lukhulu kubona. Uzophoxeka. Ungamniki umuntu amandla angaphezu kwawakho. Uma ukhetha umuntu oyisibonelo esihle kuwena ukhetha akwenzayo okudinga ukuze uphumelele noma ube ngumuntu ongcono.

Abakushoyo ngocansi
UKUYA ocansini kuba ngcono kakhulu uma ukhula! Lokho kuzwakale ku-56 percent wabesimame abaneminyaka eko-40 abasanda kubamba iqhaza ocwaningweni olusanda kwenziwa. Bathi abanankinga nakancane ngocansi.
I-Female Nation Survey, eyakhishwa abeWomen24, yagxila kwabesimame abaneminyaka ephakathi kuka-15 no-65 kanti iveza nokunye okuthokozisayo…
Iningi labesimame ababamba iqhaza kulolu cwaningo lathi ucansi liluthokozela zikhathi zonke.
Ngaphandle kokuthi abesimame abaneminyaka eko-40 bayaluthokozela ucansi, kwatholakala nokuthi ukuthola ingane kwenza ucansi luthokozeleke kakhulu. U-90 percent wabesimame abanezingane ezingakawuhlanganisi unyaka zizelwe uthi uhlale uluthokozela ucansi.
Abesimame abayizinkonkoni abayi ocansini njalo njengalabo abangezona, kodwa u-90 percent wabo uthi uhlale uluthokozela ucansi.
U-four percent wabesimame uthi ushaya sengathi uyafinyelela kuvuthondaba uma usocansini kanti ingxenye yabo ithi ayikaze idlalise isitho sangasese.
Abayisithupha kwabayikhulu bathi abakaze baye ocansini onyakeni odlule.
Uma kukhulunywa ngotshwala nokubhema, ingxenye yabesimame yathi ayibhemi, kanti abahlanu bathi abakaze babulokothe utshwala.
U-13 percent wabesimame baseSA udla kakhulu noma awudli nhlobo. NgokweWomen24, abesimame abansundu baba nenkinga yokungadli kahle, kanti amaKhaladi wona awabi nazinkinga.
Abesimame abayingxenye yokubili kokuthathu bahlushwa yisimo sezezimali kanti u-64 percent awuholi imali eyanele. U-three-quarter wabesimame unezikweleti kanti u-70 percent awuyibeki ngokwanele imali yomhlalaphansi.
Abesimame abahlanu ekhulwini bathi ukonga imali kuyimfihlo yabo kanti abangasebenzi bathi banemali abayonga ngokuyimfihlo… [z]
Abesimame baseSouth Africa badalula izimfihlo zabo ngezocansi

WEZINGANE EZIPHILILE
Ukukhuthazwa nokuklonyeliswa komama abanothando
Kwakumnandi kudelile ngesikhathi kulungiselelwa umcimbi wamafayineli eHealthy Baby Initiative. Lolu hlelo luneminyaka engu-10 kanti lwasungulwa abakwaJOHNSON’S® Baby bebambisene noMnyango wezeMpilo ukuze kukhuthazwe omama ukuba baqinisekise ukuthi izingane zabo zizithola zonke izidingo zempilo. Enye inhloso yalolu hlelo wukwazi nokuklomelisa omama abanakekela izingane zabo ngokomzimba, ngokomphefumulo nangokwengqondo. NgokukaKaren Hansen wakwaJohnson & Johnson, “Izingane eziphilile ziyisisekelo sesizwe esiphilile esizoba wusizo emphakathini. Akukuhle ukuthi singalibongi igalelo labesimame nelabahlengikazi ekukhulisweni kwabantwana.”
AMALUNGISELELO...
Imincintiswano ehlukahlukene okwakukhethwa kuyona umntwana ophilile yayibanjelwa kumaCommunity Well Baby Clinics ngo-August ngaphansi kwalezi zigaba zeminyaka: 0-6 months; 7-12 months; 13-18 months. Abafinyelela kuma-semi-final bakhethwa ukuze bathamele umcimbi wamanqamu.
AMAFAYINELI...
Lo mncintiswano wavalwa ngokubanjwa kwamafayineli ezifunda ayebanjelwe eGauteng, Western Cape naseKZN. Amajaji ayengabheki izingane ezinhle kodwa ayefuna ezithokozile eziphilile. Ukukhethwa kwazo kwakuncike ekhadini lasemtholampilo leRoad To Health, kubhekwa ukuthi ingane isiye kangaki emtholampilo, ukugonywa kwayo, ukuthola kwayo u-vitamin A kanye nesisindo kanjalo nempilo yayo. Amajaji ayethwele kanzima ngoba zonke izingane zaziphile kahle! Izingane ezawina kanjalo nomama bazo zathola imiklomelo ka-R20 000. Kuleyo miklomelo kwakukhona amahampa akwaJOHNSONS® Baby, amavawusha akwaPick n Pay, ama-pram, nama-cot nezihlalo ezinde. Kwabuye kwahlonishwa nabasebenza kumaCommunity Well Baby Clinics. U-Karen Hansen wathi, “Kube mnandi ukubona injabulo yomama neyabasebenzi basemitholampilo abawinile. Njalo ngonyaka ngiyagculiseka wumsebenzi womama base-Africa. Bawumgogodla ekunakekelweni komndeni, kanti lokho kuyisisekelo sesizwe esiphilile.”
U-Karen Hansen wakwaJ&J uneminyaka engu-10 ehlela le micimbi.
Usomahlaya ejabulisa izingane emcimbini waseThekwini.

Ezezimali
Ungakuvumeli ukukhohliswa ngokutshalelwa imali
Abanye abatshali bezimali abayizalisi imali yakho - kunalokho bayayidla. Nansi indlela ongababona ngayo...
UMA kukhulunywa ngokutshala imali, ayanda namathuba okuba sengozini yokuba idliwe. Kodwa ezinye izindlela zokutshala izimali ziyingozi kangangoba zisebenza ngokungekho emthethweni.
Lokho akusiwo umbono weBONA kuphela kodwa nohulumeni ubona ngaleyo ndlela kanti uzimisele ngokukuqeda nya lokhu.
Uhlobo lokutshalwa kwemali oluyingozi kakhulu yilolo oluqalwa abantu abambalwa bagcine sebedle imali yabantu abaningi abajoyina kamumva.
Abajoyina kamumva bajoyina benethemba lokuthi bazothola imali eningi kodwa bagcine bekhala ezimathonsi basale bengenamali.
Lawa masela angenanembeza avame ukulutha abantu abangenawo amandla okuzilwela njengabahola impesheni nabazali abathwele kanzima empilweni.
UBONA washicilela ucwaningo lwawo olwalumayelana nabantu abatshalela abantu izimali zabo eminyakeni emihlanu edlule. Abanye abanjengeMiracle 2000 balutha ngisho nabantu abahlonishwayo abanjengoMfundisi uKenneth Meshoe.
Manje amaphoyisa aseGauteng asanda kukhipha esinye isexwayiso ngabatshali bezimali. Aphenya izinkampani ezingu-17 ezitshala izimali zabantu ezinjengeYoung Stars, iSilverton Assets ne-Eagle Forex, esezidle imali elinganiselwa ku-R15 million ezinkulungwaneni ngezinkulungwane zabantu.
Ukufaka imali yakho kulolu hlelo lokutshala imali kufana nokuthatha imali yakho eningi uyilahle. Ubani ongenza into efana naleyo"
Kodwa ngesikhathi uthatha imali yakho uyifaka ezinhlelweni zalolu hlobo usuke ungakucabangi lokho. Abantu bazitshela ukuthi basuke bebhekwe elakubo uma becelwa ukuba bajoyine uhlelo lokulondoloza imali olunjengalolo.
Umehluko wukuthi zonke izinhlelo zokulondoloza imali ezisemthethweni zilawulwa yimithetho ethile eshaywa nguhulumeni ukuze kuqinisekiswe ukuthi uvikelekile. Kodwa lezo ezithembisa abantu umnotho osheshayo azikho emthethweni kanti zenzelwe ukuxhaphaza wena.
Kodwa njengamanje, nakuba kungekho emthethweni ngaphansi kwe-Unfair Business Practices Act, bangavumbuka kalula abathembisa abantu ukubazalisela imali ngoba lo mthetho awubavikeli abathengi kanti lokho kuvunywe nguSipho Tlaene, umqondisi wokulawulwa komthetho eMnyangweni wezoHwebo nezeziMboni.
"Usinikeza igunya lokuba sithathe izinyathelo uma sithole isikhalo esiphuma emphakathini," kuchaza yena. "Kodwa kukhona umthetho omusha ozayo obizwa ngeConsumer Protection Act osinika amandla okusebenza ngaphandle kokulinda izikhalo zabantu."
"Uma lo mthetho usuqala ukusebenza, okungenzeka kube ngoJune ngonyaka ozayo, sizobe sizenzela olwethu uphenyo sibe nophiko lwethu lokushushisa. Kodwa okwamanje sizokhuthaza abashushisi ukuba baqhubeke nokubheka amacala esiwafakayo - sicele nomphakathi ukuba ubike uma kukhona okusolayo." [z]

I-RUGBY
Bayawuthanda umdlalo we-rugby
ILOKISHI laseMdantsane phakathi kwe-East London neKing Williams Town, lingelesibili kwamakhulu eSA – kungenzeka ukuthi lokho uyakwazi. Okungenzeka ukuthi awukwazi – ikakhulu uma kungukuthi ubukholwa wukuthi abamnyama baseSA bathanda umdlalo webhola kuphela – wukuthi abantu abahlala emalokishini bayazifela nge-rugby!
Uma ufuna ubufakazi balokho, bheka iqembu le-rugby leWinter Rose.
UBONA wahlangana noSimon Mlonyeni ongumongameli waleli qembu endaweni eyikhaya lalo enezithombe zabadlali, amaqembu nabalandeli ababambe elikhulu iqhaza kuleli qembu.
Yiqembu elinomlando omuhle leli – eselake labhekana nezingqinamba ezinkulu kodwa lanqoba.
Phakathi kwalezo elazinqoba kubalwa nokuphumelela kwalo ngeminyaka yobandlululo.
UMlonyeni wabeka ukuthi kufanele kubongwe iWinter Rose njengoba abadlali bamaBhokobhoko abanjengoMalawu Solomon, Maboyce Mbiza, Boy Mandla noLizo Solomon kanye nabambalwa abadlala kwiBorder XV bakwazi ukudlala kahle ngezikhathi zobandlululo.
Leli qembu lisaqhubeka nokukhiqiza abadlali abahle abanjengoLuntu Rara, Ziniko Dumaphi, Mzimasi Mlilwana noLuyolo Thobezweni.
Laba badlali kanye nabanye base-Eastern Cape bakhuthazwa wukuthanda lo mdlalo ocishe ube neminyaka engu-200.
UMA uhamba ngemoto emaphandleni endaweni eyayibizwa ngeCiskei uzobona kudlalwa lo mdlalo.
NgokukaMlonyeni, ukuthandwa kwalo mdlalo kwaba yimbangela yokusungulwa kweWinter Rose ngo-1933 abasebenzi basezimbonini ababengabokuhamba ababehlala eStutterheim.
Ngaphambi kwalokho, abefundisi abafika nomdlalo we-rugby ne-cricket kule ndawo.
“Ezikoleni zase-Eastern Cape bekudlalwa i-cricket ne-rugby. Ibhola lidlalwe kamumva,” kuchaza uMlonyeni osebe ngumongameli waleli qembu iminyaka engaphezulu kuka-25.
Wayengumngani kaSteve Biko eyingxenye yeSouth African Students Organisation (SASO) kanti waboshwa ngo-1977 – wachitha iminyaka emihlanu eRobben Island lapho ayengukaputeni weqembu leziboshwa elalidlala i-rugby.
Akayikhaleli iminyaka ayichitha ejele kanti waphawula ngokukhuthazwa abanye ayeboshwe nabo.
“Abaholi esasiboshwe nabo abafana noGovan Mbeki noNelson Mandela, babevame ukusitshela ukuthi sizochitha impelasonto ende ejele,” kusho kukhumbula yena ehleka.
Ubuyele kwiWinter Rose ekuqaleni kweminyaka yo-1980 waba ngumongameli waleli qembu. Uyaziqhenya ngokuhola leli qembu lisabhekene nezingqinamba eziningi kuze kube yimanje njengoba sesisembusweni wentando yeningi.
LELI qembu lakwazi ukuncintisana namaqembu ahlonishwayo kwiligi yaseBorder ngo-1992 emva kokuhlanganiswa kwezinhlangano ze-rugby.
Empeleni iBorder Rugby Union yayiyihlonipha kakhulu iWinter Rose kangangoba yaze yahlela ukubolekisa ngabadlali bayo abashisayo nokwakuluphawu lobunye nokubuyisana.
“Sasingawahloniphi amaqembu amakhulu,” kusho uMlonyeni.
Kusukela ngaleso sikhathi iWinter Rose isikhule yaba yiqembu elixhaswe ngendlela efanele elikwazi ukushaya amaqembu anamandla.
“Ngisho noma abadlali bangalahlekelwa amaphuzu angu-100 namuhla, bayabuya kusasa bazozilolonga,” kusho uMlonyeni.
“Abadlali bawudlala ngothando lo mdlalo.
“Baningi abangamangala uma bebona indlela abantu balapha abawathanda ngayo amaBhokobhoko!”
NgokukaDavid Dobela ongumqeqeshi weWinter Rose First XV (obuye aqeqeshe iqembu lesizwe lase-Uganda) leli qembu lingaphezulu kweqembu elidlala i-rugby.
Emalokishini abadlali abaxhaswa neze ngendlela abaxhaswa ngayo kuleli qembu. “I-Winter Rose ihlukile ngoba kuleli qembu singumndeni. Uma umdlali noma abalandeli benenkinga, siyaxhasana,” kusho uDobela.
Yizinto ezinjengalezo eziheha abadlali abasafufusa ngokukaLuntu Rara oyi-scrumhalf nokaputeni weWinter Rose First XV.
“Baningi abadlali abaliqhamukisa emaphandleni nasemalokishini esibafake kuleli qembu,” kusho yena. “Sidlalela umphakathi, sidlalela abantu.”
UZolani Mpendu oliqhamukisa eMasele Village ngaseMiddledrift ongukaputeni wesibili waleli qembu ungomunye walabo badlali.
Okwamdonsela kwiWinter Rose wukuhlonipha kwayo abadlali ngisho noma sebengaphandle kwenkundla.
“Bafana nomndeni wami,” kusho yena. “Ngizizwa ngiphephile lapha.” [z]

NGO-2004 ngesikhathi uSue Sishange eyofuna umsebenzi eGoli, wahlolwa nguMongane Wally Serote, inkakha yembongi yaseSA ebuye ibe ngumbhali wezincwadi. Baxoxa okwesikhashana wayesethi kuSue: “Phindela eStanderton wenze umsebenzi owuthandayo. Ngeke ube ngaphansi kwesandla somqashi.”
Awukwazi ukusishaya indiva iseluleko osuke usinikwa omunye wabantu abahlonishwayo eSA. U-Sue waphindela ekhaya kanti manje useyimenenja yeLekwa Designers inkampani yezefeshini esizakhele igama.
Emva kokuba esefikile ekhaya, abantu bendawo abanothando lwezefeshini bahlela umcimbi wokuqoqwa kweminikelo. U-Sue wazithola esephambili ekwenzeni izinhlelo zokugqugquzela lowo mcimbi.
“Saqoqa imali eyayizoya eZithobeni Care Home ikhaya elisiza abaneHIV/AIDS. IZithobeni izimele kanti ibaxhase kakhulu abaneHIV/AIDS. Ukuqoqa iminikelo sisebenzisa ifeshini sakubona kungumqondo omuhle,” kusho yena.
Lowo mcimbi wahamba kahle ngoba kwatholakala imali eyanele eyayizosiza eZithobeni.
Emva kwalowo mcimbi kwasungulwa iLekwa Designers, iqembu labasiki bengqephu abangu-12 abahlala eStanderton. Abasiki bengqephu baqala ukuthola ama-oda baze bathola nawombukiso owawuzoba ngo-2005.
“Bonke abantu babesafuna ukuphinda bayibone ingqephu yethu kodwa ngangingazi ukuthi imali yokwenza lowo msebenzi sasizoyithathaphi,” kusho uSue.
Bathatha amehlo abantu
UNelly Ndlovu woMnyango wezamaSiko, ezemiDlalo nezokuNgcebeleka eMpumalanga wayephakathi kwabantu ababesembukisweni ka-2004. Izingubo okwakubukiswa ngazo lapho zawathatha amehlo akhe kanti yilokho okwamenza washayela uSue ucingo ekuqaleni kuka-2005 ebuza umbuzo abaningi ababewubuza: unini omunye umbukiso?
Wenza izinhlelo zokuba kutholakale izimali kanti lokho kwabasiza kakhulu abasiki bengqephu ababengu-15 abakwazi ukukhombisa ngengqephu yabo. Baningi abantu abaqala ukubabuka ngamanye amehlo.
“Sakhethwa wumnyango wezobuciko namasiko ukuba sibambe iqhaza kuma-workshop eSanlam SA Fashion Week Fusion ayebanjelwe eNelspruit ngo-2005,” kusho uSue.
Kulo mcimbi waminyaka yonke ohlelwa ngabeSA Fashion Week, abasiki bengqephu asebezakhele igama kulo msebenzi baba nama-workshop behlangene nalabo abasuke besafuna ukuqhakambisa amathalente abo. Ukuqokwa ukuba ube yingxenye ye-workshop yeFusion kusuke kusho into enkulu kumsiki wengqephu ngoba yilapho ethola khona ithuba lokukhangisa kahle ngomsebenzi wakhe.
Ukuvakashela kukaSue eNelspruit kwamsebenzela – manje usethola ama-oda amacici awenzayo kanti a-odwa ngumnikazi we-boutique eseNelspruit.
Ingqephu enokwase-Afrika
Kulama-workshop kwakukhona noMpume Nyoka. UMpume uyi-control officer eTutuka isiteshi sakwa-Eskom esiphehla amandla kagesi esingaseStanderton.
Uma echaza umsebenzi wakhe, uthi ulawula amandla kagesi aphehlwa yisiteshi saseTutuka ihora ngehora.
Uma engematasa nomsebenzi wakhe, usuke ezidelisa ngokubheka ifeshini esemabhukwini aseBritain nawaseMelika. Emva kwalokho uzenzela esakhe isitayela esinokwase-Afrika.
“Ngiyazithanda izingubo ezinhle. Ngangivele ngikuthanda ukusika ingqephu kanti nginethemba lokuthi ngisazokwenza okungaphezulu kwalokhu. Ngiyayithanda ifeshini,” kusho yena.
U-Betty Coetzee oneminyaka eyevile kwengu-50 usemnkantshubomvu kulo msebenzi wokusikwa kwengqephu kuleli qembu labo kanti nomphakathi waseStanderton unolwazi ngekhono lakhe. Ingqephu uyisika eyisusela ekhanda akasebenzisi phethini.
“Sekuphele iminyaka engu-24 ngenza lo msebenzi. Izingubo ngizenza ngendlela umama ayezenza ngayo.” Ibhodi elibekwe ngaphandle ekhaya likaBetty lifundeka kanjena: “Proudly South African Creations.”
Emva kwe-2006 Lekwa Fashion Expo, uSue waqala ukugxila ezinhlelweni zekusasa lalaba basiki bengqephu.
Kulezo zinhlelo kukhona uhlelo lokwakha isikhungo lapho abantu abanamakhono ehlukahlukene bezokwenza khona izinto ezinhle ngezandla zabo bazidayise.
Kuyokwamukelwa abenza izicathulo, abasebenzisa isikhumba, abenza ubucwebe nabahlobisa izindwangu. “Sinalo ithalente eStanderton. Lidinga ukuvunjululwa kuphela,” kusho yena. [z]

Ngabe ingane yakho ine-dyslexia"
Lesi simo sizobambezela ingane yakho esikoleni kodwa futhi singanqobeka, nayo ikwazi ukuphila impilo efana neyabanye...
ESIKOLENI uDumisani (7) kwadingeka ukuba azabalaze ukuze akwazi ukumelana nezingane afunda nazo. Wayenenkinga ekufundeni kanti nakubhalayo kwakungafundeki. Abazali bakhe nothisha babedidekile ngalokhu.
Ngesikhathi eseneminyaka engu-9, uDumisani base bemthatha njengomfundi ongasheshi ukubamba ezifundweni futhi ongahlakaniphile.
Okubuhlungu wukuthi abanye bozakwabo ayefunda nabo ekilasini base bemgcona ngokuthi uyisi "domu."
Ngenhlanhla omunye wothisha bakhe owayemusha, waqaphela ukuthi uDumisani unenkinga yokungasheshi abambe ezifundweni nokuyinkinga eyaziwa ngokuthi yi-dyslexia. Ngosizo lwaloyo thisha bakwazi ukuba bayibone inkinga kaDumisani.
Kwathi lapho eselutholile usizo lochwepheshe, wakwazi ukuxazulula ubunzima ekufundeni.
"Uma i-dyslexia ingazange itholakale ukuze ilungiswe, ikhathaza lowo muntu impilo yakhe yonke," kusho u-Marj Arslanian wakwa-Audiblox, okuluhlelo oluyisipesheli lwemfundo olusetshenziswa umhlaba wonke ukuze kulungiswe izinkinga zobunzima ekufundeni.
Abaningi banenkinga ekufundeni nasekubhaleni, ekubeni ezimweni ezedlulele kuyenzeka bangakwazi kwanhlobo ukufunda nokubhala. Iningi lalaba bantu abaphethwe yi-dyslexia linenkinga nasesifundweni se-maths.
Isebenza kanjani
Uma uqaphela ingane ene-dyslexia noma umuntu omdala ungabona into efana nalena...
Amagama alula afana noRAT angaphambana abukeke njengoTAR. Noma u-WON ubukeke njengo-NOW.
Umusho ungaxoveka unganiki mqondo njengokuthi: The tactas on ethtam (the cat sat on the mat).
Ezinye izinhlamvu zamagama ziyaphanjaniswa. Ukwenza isibonelo, u-b no-d, uze uthole ukuthi igama elithi BAT selingelithi DAT kanjalo namanye amaningi.
Izinkomba nezimpawu
Ezinye izimpawu ezijwayelekile noma izinkomba ezichaza ukuthi ingane ine-dyslexia idinga usizo:
t Ukungabi nasiqiniseko ngesokunxele nesokudla nokugcina kunomphumela wokuxova izinhlamvu zamagama, amagama wonke noma izinombolo.
t Abantu abane-dyslexia banenkinga ngokulandelanisa izinto ngokuyikho. Ukwenza isibonelo: 1-2-3-4-5, noma uMsombuluko, uLwesibili, uLwesithathu. Kungenzeka bangakwazi ukuqonda noma ukukhumbula indlela lezi zinsuku ezilandelana ngayo.
t Ukufunda nokubhala ngendlela engajwayelekile kukhomba ukwedlulela kwesimo se-dyslexia nokubonakala ngokuba uwacabangisise amagama ungabi nasiqiniseko ngawo.
t Ukukhuluma emva kwesikhathi noma ukukhuluma okungavuthiwe. Ucwaningo lukhomba ukuthi kunokukhulu ukuxhumana phakathi kokungakhulumi kahle nokungakwazi ukufunda kahle.
t Ukufunda kancane okuhambisana nokungabaza.
t Ubunzima ekubhaleni.

Indlela entsha yokulwa nobugebengu eSA
Ngabe usukhathele ubugebengu? Kukhona ongakwenza. Unaso isikhali sokulwa nezaphula-mthetho. Abantu abahlome ngama-cellphone nje kuphela abasiza ngokubamba izigebengu eziyingozi kulo lonke elaseSA
BONA ZULU - May 2008
U-BEN KHUZWAYO wayeshayela ephuma ePietermaritzburg ngesikhathi umshayeli wemoto yohlobo lweFord ephazamisa iVW Polo eyayiphambi kwakhe. Wabuka ngokumangala ngesikhathi iPolo iphuma emgwaqweni umshayeli wayo eshayeka kwi-windscreen.
I-Ford yayisingaphambi kukaBen. Inhliziyo yakhe yashaya ngamandla, wazama ukuyidlula le moto ukuze naye angenzeki isilo sengubo.
Wabona ukuthi kwakushayela owesilisa owayephuzile. Kwakungabonakali moto yamaphoyisa. U-Ben wathatha i-cellphone washayela amaphoyisa ucingo wawatshela indawo ayekuyona wawanika ne-number plate yeFord. Amehlo akhe akawasusanga kwiFord kwaze kwafika amaphoyisa.
Imoto yakhishwa emgwaqweni umshayeli wabanjwa waboshwa.
"Siyalubonga usizo lwakho," kusho iphoyisa kuBen. "Kukhona enye ingozi lo muntu ayidalile namuhla!"
Njalo ngenyanga abantu abanama-cellphone eSA bashaya izingcingo ezingu-50 000 bebika ngabashayeli abashayela bephuzile, ngokudayiswa kwezidakamizwa, ukugqekeza nokudunwa kwezimoto.
Amaphoyisa athi abasebenzisa ama-cellphone bangamehlo nezindlebe zawo.
Ukuxhumana
Cishe bonke abantu baseSA banama-cellphone kanti bayavuma ukuthi abalulekile alusizo.
Abatakuli bathembela kuma-cellphone asiza uma kunezikhukhula, ukuzamazama komhlaba, imililo neziphepho.
Amaphoyisa asebenzisa wona esikhundleni semisakazo ephathwayo.
Abantu bona bawasebenzisa uma bebika ngabashayela bephuzile noma ngezaphula-mthetho.
Esinye isibonelo. Ekuseni ngoJanuary, iTazz eluhlaza yayihamba iqondene netekisi eyayithwele abafundi.
Umshayeli weTazz wathatha isibhamu wavulela ngenhlamvu ebhekise kuleyo tekisi kwalimala kabi umfundi oyedwa.
Khona manjalo omunye umshayeli owayehamba ngemoto wathatha i-cellphone yakhe washayela amaphoyisa ucingo.
Owayedubula wanyamalala khona lapho. Emva kwalokho, izakhamizi zabona imoto eyayingenalo iwindi ipake egalaji.
Zakhumbula umbiko ezaziwuzwe phambilini lapho kwakukhulunywa khona ngemoto eyayingenawindi eyayishayelwa wumuntu odubule abafundi zase zibiza amaphoyisa.
Isigebengu saboshwa engakapheli amahora angu-18.
Ukugwema
Ama-cellphone angasiza nangokugwema ubugebengu kanti alusizo kakhulu kwabesimame uma beshayela behamba bodwa ikakhulu kusihlwa.
U-Grace Mhlongo une-cellphone ayiphiwa ngubaba wakhe uJacob mhla egubha iminyaka engu-24 azalwa.
"Uhamba kakhulu ngemoto. Thatha le-phone uyisebenzise uma udinga usizo," kusho ubaba wakhe.
Engakapheli amasonto amathathu uGrace ethole isipho sakhe, wayesendleleni elibhekise ekhaya ngesikhathi i-truck eluhlaza eyayinabalisa ababili izama ukumsika. Owayeshayela wayefuna ukumkhipha emgwaqweni.
Kwathi lapho isingaphambi kwakhe yahamba yagcwala umgwaqo izama ukumvimba.
U-Grace wayethi sekuphelile ngaye.
Emgwaqweni kwakucwebile kungekho moto. Wathatha i-cellphone yakhe washayela inombolo yezimo eziphuthumayo wabika inkinga ayebhekene nayo.
"Yehlisa umoya," kusho owaphendula ucingo. "Ungami, amaphoyisa asendleleni."
I-truck yama uGrace waphoqeka ukuba naye ame.
I-phone yakhe wayesayibambe ngesandla amehlo akhe ekumshayeli.
Kwathi uma umshayeli ebona ukuthi uGrace ukhuluma ocingweni wahamba.
U-Grace wanikeza ayekhuluma naye ocingweni i-number plate yayo washayela imoto yakhe wahamba.
Wayengqangqa ngesikhathi eshayela ubaba wakhe ucingo.
"Umshayeli ubonile ukuthi ngishayela amaphoyisa ucingo lokho kwamsabisa," kusho yena kubaba wakhe esemchazela ngokumehlele. "Ngibonga kakhulu ngesipho ongiphe sona."
Ababehamba nge-truck bagcina beboshiwe.
Kuphephile
Ngesikhathi ama-cellphone efika, amaphoyisa ayenovalo lokuthi azokwenza ukuthi abashayeli bangashayeli kahle badale izingozi emgwaqweni.
Kungukwephula umthetho ukusebenzisa i-cellphone ushayela. Lokho kuyingozi. Kodwa uma uyisebenzisa ngendlela efanele, uyisebenzisela nezizathu ezizwakalayo - enza ukuba kuphephe emgwaqweni, ikakhulu aphephisa nabantu kwabashayela bephuzile.
Ngonyaka odlule, ngesikhathi uFreddie Mkhize eshayela eNyakatho yoGu lweKZN, wabona izikhangiso zohlelo lukazwelonke lokumpimpa abashayela bephuzile ubike noma kukhona inkinga emgwaqweni.
Uma abashayeli befaka izinombolo zezimo eziphuthumayo ezingcingweni zabo bangangena ngokushesha lapho besuke beshayela khona.
U-Freddie osebenza kumasipala waba nesifiso sokusungula uhlelo olufanayo esifundazweni sakhe.
Ngolunye usuku ngoMay nyakenye, wayehamba nendodana yakhe uVusi ngesikhathi elandela imoto eyayihamba igcwala umgwaqo.
"Asiyilandele," kusho yena kuVusi.
U-Freddie wathatha inumber-plate yayo washayela inombolo yomnyango wezokuthutha wabatshela ngemoto ababeyilandela.
Wayilandela yaze yama egalaji, lapho umshayeli wayo wabanjwa khona amaphoyisa ambopha. Wahlolwa kwatholakala ukuthi wayephuzile.
"Senze umgwaqo waba yindawo ephephile namuhla," kusho uFreddie kuVusi sebelibhekise ekhaya.
Zibanjwa oqotsheni
Ziningi izigebengu eziyingozi ezibanjwe oqotsheni ngenxa yosizo lwezakhamizi zaseSA ezinjengawe nami.
Ekuseni ngoDecember, uRobert Dlamini waya ebhange eyokhipha imali emshinini eVerulam.
Kwathi uma elunguza ngewindi wabona indoda eyayiphethe isibhamu ipequlula amashalofu okufakwa kuwona imali. Emva kwalokho izigebengu zaphuma ngomnyango ongaphambili zabaleka.
U-Robert wakubona ukubaluleka kokuba abavimbe laba balisa. Kwathi uma bengena emotweni, uRobert wabalandela eshayela amaphoyisa ucingo kwi-cellphone yakhe.
"Ngisemotweni yami ngilandela izigebengu ezimbili ezisanda kuntshontsha imali ebhange," kusho yena etshela obamba izingcingo eziphuthumayo owadlulisela umlayezo emaphoyiseni.
Kwaphela imizuzu embalwa uRobert ejaha imoto eyagcina isimdukele. Ekugcineni kwafika amaphoyisa.
"Asihambe," kusho iphoyisa ligibelisa uRobert emotweni.
Kwathi uma befika emgwaqweni onguthelawayeka bazithela ezigebengwini ezazikhonjwe elinye iphoyisa ngesibhamu.
"Yibo kanye laba," kusho uRobert emaphoyiseni.
Kwathi lapho uRobert esesemotweni yakhe, wabuka i-cellphone yakhe ngentokozo.
Wayeyithengele ibhizinisi lakhe. Wayengazi ukuthi ngelinye ilanga iyosebenza emva kokubanjwa kwezigebengu oqotsheni.
Kungenzeka ukuthi ubona sengathi akukho ongakwenza ekulweni nobugebengu. Kodwa kukhona, sebenzisa i-cellphone yakho! [z]

BONA ZULU - October 2005
UKUBA nomasingcwabisane womndeni wenu kunganenza ningabi nokukhathazeka kokuthi wubani onganinika usizo lwezimali lapho kukhona othandiweyo owedlula emhlabeni. Uma lokhu kuqhubeka kahle, lowo masingcwabisane ungaqinisa ubudlelwane phakathi kwamalungu omndeni.
Nakhu okunye okufanele ukubeke engqondweni lapho uqala nalapho usuqhuba uhlelo lwenu lokonga...
Ukwethembeka nokuzihlonipha kuzoletha ukuzinza enhlanganweni. Labo abaphethe ikilabhu kufanele bakhuthaze bakwazi nokwamukela ukugxeka okwakhaya ngenhloso yokwenzela inhlangano okungcono.
Hlalani nikhumbula njalo ukuthi ningumndeni ukuqophisana nokungaboni ngaso linye akufanele kuvumeleke.
Amalungu omndeni anezimpawu zobuholi yiwo okufanele niwakhethe kuqala uma sekuziwa ngasekutheni ngobani okufanele baphathe le kilabhu yokonga. Kodwa bayodinga ukwesekwa ngamanye amalungu omndeni, okufanele nawo azithathe njengabantu ababalulekile hhayi nje abangabagibeli.
Labo abakhethiwe ukuba baphathe izikhundla ezisemqoka neziyingcuphe ezifana nokuba ngumgcini-mafa, usihlalo nonobhala kufanele bathembeke babone nesidingo sokugcina amarekhodi ayikho, wonke amalungu abe nawo.
Abaphathi behhovisi bale nhlangano yomndeni, kungaba ngusihlalo, unobhala, umgcini-mafa namanye amalungu okwengeza amabili asekomitini eliphezulu aqokwa amalungu omndeni minyaka yonke.
Wonke amalungu kufanele abe nezwi ezingxoxweni zokubonisana ekuthatheni izinqumo ngemithetho ezolawula inhlangano. Wonke amalungu kufanele athokozele amalungelo alinganayo kanti futhi adinga ukuba wonke akusayinele lokho akuhlongozile.
Imali ekhokhwayo kufanele kube yimali wonke umuntu ongayimela. Ukukhula kwesibalo samalungu kungasiza ekwehliseni imali ekhokhwayo njalo (premiums).
Imithetho okuqondwe ngayo ukuqondiswa kwezigwegwe kulabo abanhlanhlathayo kufanele iphoqelelwe. Kufanele futhi kube nemali ekhokhwayo lapho kuhlawuliswa abangenasizathu esiphathekayo ngokungabikho kwabo emhlanganweni noma ngokujwayela ukufika emva kwesikhathi.
Imali eqoqwe ngale ndlela, ngeyenhlangano. Empeleni, ukuhlawulisana ngemali iyona ndlela yokuqoqa ezinye izimali zenhlangano.
Ibhange iyona ndawo enhle yokubeka izimali. Bheka izindlela ezihlukahlukene zokulondoloza imali ukuze uthole ukuthi iyiphi ezonilethela inzuzo.
Imihlangano yazinyanga zonke yokuqoqa imali ekhokhwayo ibalulekile. Yonke imali eqoqwayo kufanele ikhokhwe zingakapheli izinsuku eziyisikhombisa kuthi labo abangaphumeleli ukubambelela kule mithetho, bahlawuliswe kanzima. Ikhaya loyedwa kwabaphethe ihhovisi kuyofanele liqokwe njengehhovisi elikhulu nokuyilapho kukhokhwa khona izimali. [z]

Akekho noyedwa ongeke akuqaphele uma uhamba ngeChrysler 300C Touring Hemi
NGESIKHATHI siyishayela, okokuqala esakuthanda ngale moto eyi-station wagon ye-Chrysler V8 saloon ibukeka ibiza kunalokhu eyikho. Ibiza R469 900 kanti futhi ingcono kakhulu kunalezo ezinye ezibiza R200 000. Izinto esizithandile ngale moto:
1 UZIZWA NJENGENKOSI.
I-leather ne-walnut engaphakathi ziyenza ibe sezingeni eliphezulu kanti futhi inezinto ezifana nezihlalo ezifudumala ngogesi ezikhavwe nge-leather, umsakazo osezingeni eliphezulu, ama-headlight washers, i-traction control nama-anti-skid brakes.
Kukhona nama-parking sensors akhalayo uma kukhona into ozoshayisana nayo.
2 INE-CRUISE CONTROL
Uma usuphumile edolobheni, uvele uvule i-switch ye-cruise control - ukwenza isibonelo, mhlawumbe ufuna ihambe ngo-110 km/h bese wena uyahlala uthokozele ukuzihambela kwayo. Ungasusa izinyawo zombili kuma-pedal imoto izozihambela ngokukhululeka usuku lonke ngesivinini osikhethile.
Uma kwenzeka uzithela kwi-traffic ehamba kancane, ama-sensors emoto yakho ayakutshela ikhomphyutha bese iyayivala ngenhloso yokuba ihambe ngezinga elivikelekile kwezinye.
Uma ama-sensors ezwa ukuthi indlela ngaphambili ivulekile akukho okuyivalile, okusebenzelana nekhomphyutha okukuphethiloli kuyibuyisela kulelo jubane obukade ulikhethile.
Konke lokhu kwenzeka ngaphandle kokuba wena unyathele amabhuleki noma i-accelerator.
3 INAMANDLA IYAGIJIMA
Kumnandi ukushayela iChrysler uma kunguwe ozishayelelayo.
U-"300" osegameni leChrysler uchaza
u-300 horsepower okungamandla ayekhiqizwa wuhlobo lwayo lokuqala ngo-1955.
Namuhla i-300C ikhiqiza amandla amaningi - 340 hp, noma 250kW nokungamandla aphindwe kabili kwaweBMW 320.
Ijubane layo lifinyelela ku-250 km/h.
Qaphela, le moto iyawudla uphethiloli - cishe idla amalitha angu-19 ebangeni elingu-100km. [z]

Sivakashele umtholampilo abathi 'uphephile awunabuhlungu' ekukhipheni izisu
BONA ZULU - March 2008
indaba nguNTOKOZO MFUSI/MERCURY
Kukhishwa izisu ngokungemthetho
EMVA kwezinsuku ezintathu ngishayela izinombolo ezimbalwa zezingcingo engangizibona kuma-poster edolobheni zikhuluma ngosizo oluphephile lokukhishwa kwezisu, mina nozakwethu savakashela i "surgery" eyayilokhu ibalulwa njalo uma sibuza ngezindawo zokukhishwa kwezisu.
Sasizohlangana nomlisa esatshelwa ukuthi wu "Doctor Issa" ngayizolo, saba nolukhulu uvalo ngesikhathi singena kwi-lift kwelinye lamabhilidi eTheku.
I-lift yakhuphuka yaze yafika lapho sasiya khona esitezi sesikhombisa. Sayibona ne-room esasiqonde kuyona. Kwakungasekho ukubuyela emumva.
Sasesaba. Kwadingeka ukuba ngizenze intombazane eneminyaka engu-20 enamasonto ayisithupha ikhulelwe efuna ukukhipha isisu ngaphambi kokuba bazi abazali. Uzakwethu wadlala indawo yokuzongimisa isibindi."
Sase sesizongena e-surgery ngesikhathi sihlangana nomndeni owawuphuma phakathi.
Umlisa engacabanga ukuthi ngubaba wayelandelwa wumkakhe nendodakazi yabo eyayingendala kuneminyaka engu-18. Yayihamba kancane ngemumva kubonakala ukuthi akuhambeki kahle.
Ngezwa kugxabha isisu lapho ngibona ukuthi abazali bathatha amadodakazi abo bawayise kule mitholampilo yokukhipha izisu engaphephile futhi engekho emthethweni.
Ukuthula
Isithombe enganginaso ngesimo le ndawo esasizoyifica ikusona sashabalala sesingena egumbini elalisanda kupendwa, nelanga lingena ngamawindi. Lalilihle linezimbali namaphephabhuku okufunda.
Abanye esabafica lapho kwakungugogo owayehamba nomzukulu wakhe. Sahlala eduze kwabo sabingelelana ngokwesaba.
Emva kwemizuzu embalwa yokuthula, ugogo wabuza uzakwethu ukuthi ucabanga ukuthi kuzokuba yimalini.
Uzakwethu wathi sitshelwe ukuthi kungu-R600. Wabe esebuza kugogo ukuthi umlethelani umzukulu wakhe kule ndawo kunokuthi amyise emtholampilo wakwaMarie Stopes.
"Ngezwa ukuthi kuyabiza," kusho ugogo.
Nathi sathi sizwe kanjalo.
Kwaphinda kwathuleka kwaze kwezwakala yena ugogo ekhala ngokuthi uyaxakeka ukuthi asinakiwe ngani.
Ugogo wabuye wathi udokotela wayenenye intombazane ngaphakathi.
Ukuhlolwa
Kwafika ithuba lethu lokuba singene kudokotela. Sangeniswa owesilisa ngaphakathi lapho kwakukhona izitulo ezintathu ezimnyama wasicela ukuba sihlale kuzona.
Ngamkhumbuza ukuthi yimi lo owenze i-appointment. Ngamtshela ukuthi ngizihlole ekhaya ukuthi ngikhulelwe yini.
Wavula i-drawer wadonsa izinto zokuhlolela ukukhulelwa ezimbili. Wabuza ukuthi iyiphi engayisebenzisa, ngavele ngakhomba engiyithandayo. Ngangikhethe eyiyo njengoba athi: "Leyo test ayishayi eceleni."
Wathi akufanele ngikhathazeke ngoba yonke into izohamba kahle.
Ukubiza
Uzakwethu wabuza ukuthi kuzokuba yimalini. UDkt Issa wathi R600.
Waphendukela kimina wangibuza ukuthi ngilitshelile yini isoka lami ukuthi ngikhulelwe.
Ngamtshela ukuthi ngilitshelile kangangoba asisakhulumisani ngoba ligxeka mina ngokukhulelwa.
UDkt Issa wavuma ukuthi yebo kwakuyiphutha lami ngoba angisebenzisanga ikhondomu.
Ngambuza ukuthi uzokwenzani noma uzonginikani. Wathi uzonginika iphilisi okuzodingeka ukuba ngiliphuze phambi kwakhe. Emva kwemizuzu engu-20 ngase ngingaphuma ngihambe.
Ngathi ngiyesaba uma kwakuzokuba buhlungu.
Wathi kuzokwenzeka ngizwe sengathi ngifuna ukuya endlini encane kodwa futhi ngingathuswa amahluli egazi amnyama aphumayo.
Wathi akekho ozokwazi ukuthi kukhona into eyenzekile - ngisho nabazali bami imbala.
Ayikho emthethweni
Samtshela ukuthi sizobuya uma sesithole imali.
U-Issa wathi emva kokuthatha iphilisi kufanele ngibuye emva kwezinsuku ezimbili ngizokilinwa mahhala.
Akashongo ukuthi lokho kuhambisana nani.
Saphuma ngokushesha ebhilidini sesaba ngisho ukuphefumula saze safika emsebenzini.
Ayikho into ebuhlungu njengokwazi komuntu omusha ukuthi ukhulelwe.
Owesimame oneminyaka engu-22 owakhuluma nathi futhi ongathandanga ukudalulwa, wasitshela ukuthi wasikhipha kanjani isisu eminyakeni emine eyedlule esese-high school.
Nakuba aya kwi-private doctor kodwa namanje lokho kusamhlukumeza emqondweni uma ekucabanga.
"Ngangesaba kangangoba angizange ngilitshele isoka lami," kusho yena.
Uthi uma kwenzeka ezithola ebhekene nesimo esifanayo manje, angaqoma ukuba aye kweminye yemitholampilo yokukhipha izisu engekho emthethweni kunokuba aye eMarie Stopes noma kwekahulumeni.
Lokho kungenxa yokukholwa wukuthi mancane amathuba okuba abanye abantu bazi ukuthi usebenzise indlela engekho emthethweni.
"Ingozi ikhona, kodwa ukwesaba - nesifiso sokukwenza kube yimfihlo - nokukwenza ukuba kubekhona isidingo sokuphuma kuleyo nto. Umphumela walokhu uwucabanga ekugcineni."
Inkinga yokwanda kwalezi zindawo ayikho eThekwini kuphela. EPitoli ngonyaka odlule umtholampilo wokukhipha izisu ongekho emthethweni watholakala usebenza eduze koMnyango kaZwelonke wezeMpilo.
Baya ngokwanda abantu ababika lolu sizo olungekho emthethweni emadolobheni amaningi lapha eSA, kusho uJock Strachan ongumkhulumeli wemitholampilo yakwaMarie Stopes eSA.
"Sekuya kuba yinkinga enkulu. Sesenze omkhulu umsebenzi wokuqwashisa umphakathi ngokungaphephi kwalezi zindawo zokukhipha izisu."
Kuyesabisa
Emkhankasweni wokukhuculula eGoli ngoJanuary, bangu-11 abantu abenza lo msebenzi wokukhipha izisu ngokungekho emthethweni ababoshwa ezibhedlela zokuzenzela.
Amaphoyisa edolobheni ayesembhidlangweni wokukhuculula esusa ama-posters ezingela 'odokotela' ababenamathelisa amapheshana okukhangisa ngomsebenzi wabo ezigxotsheni zikagesi nasemarobhothini.
Izindlu ezisemabhilidini asenkabeni yedolobha laseGoli zaguqulwa zenziwa izindawo zokwelapha ezingekho emthethweni nokuyilapho kwatholakala amabhokisi anamaphilisi okuqhuba lo msebenzi, amakhondomu asesebenzile namagilavu, amanye anegazi.
Iningi lababoshwa laliliqhamukisa e-Uganda naseMozambique.
Lokhu kwakuhlangana nophenyo lwaseThekwini. Zonke izinombolo zocingo esazithola kuma-poster kwakungezabantu bokuhamba.
Okunye wukuthi, ezintathu zezinombolo kwezingu-10 esazishayela zakhombisa ngokusobala ukuthi babengawushayi mkhuba umthetho ovimbela noma ngubani ukuqhubeka nokukhipha isisu emva kwamasonto angu-20. Babezishaya isifuba ngokuthi bakhipha izisu ngendlela "ephephile futhi ngelanga elifanayo" ngisho ezinyangeni eziyisithupha noma eziyisikhombisa umuntu ekhulelwe.
Ngesikhathi udokotela ebuzwa ukuthi usikhipha kanjani isisu, wathi unika isiguli sakhe okuphuzwayo - emva kwalokho wangafuna ukudalula eminye imininingwane.
Kwethusa kakhulu ukucabanga ngalokho okusuke kuphuzwa," kusho uJock Strachan wabeMarie Stopes.
Wengeza wathi nakuba izimali zabeMarie Stopes zibiza kakhudlwana kunalezo zalabo abenza lo msebenzi ngokungekho emthethweni, kodwa benza konke okusemandleni ukugcina amanani ekahle.
Kodwa le mitholampilo nezikhungo zikahulumeni zinosizo olungekho kulezi zindawo - isiqiniseko sokuphepha nokunakekelwa okusezingeni lochwepheshe.[z]

SEZIZOPHELA izinsuku zokuhlushwa yizingane ezifuna ukuthengelwa ama-burger noma i-milkshake ehambisana nethoyizi - elizophuka noma lilahleke.
Uhulumeni uhlongoza ukushaya umthetho ozolwa nokudayiswa kwama-burger ahambisana namathoyizi nokudayiswa kwama-cereals anoshukela.
Njengoba kuhlongozwa ukuba kuchibiyelwe iFoodstuff, Cosmetic And Disinfectants Act Of 1972, eshicilelwe ngoJuly nonyaka, kuhloswe ukuba kuhlolisiswe izikhangiso zokudla kwezingane okungenamsoco. NgokweMedical Research Council ukukhuluphala kwabantu baseSA kanye nokukhuphuka kwesibalo sezingane ezinenkinga yesisindo kubeka impilo yesizwe sethu engozini.
Umthetho omusha uzovala izikhangiso eziheha abathengi ukuba badle ukudla uhulumeni akubalule njengokungenampilo.
Ekudleni okuthathwa njengokungenamsoco kukhona okuthoswayo, uswidi, amakhekhe, ama-cereal anoshukela neziphuzo ezingenampilo.
Lezi zidlo akufanele zikhangiswe ezinganeni ezineminyaka engaphansi kuka-16 - noma ezikoleni, enkulisa nasema-tuck shop.
Phezu kwalokho, kulezi zidlo kumele kubhalwe ukuthi "Ungakudli ngokweqile ngoba ungakhuluphala," noma "Ukukudla ngokweqile akuyilungele impilo yakho."
Ziyadukisa
Okhulumela uMnyango wezeMpilo uSbani Mngadi uthi imithetho ehlongozwayo izovimba ukuba imboni yezokudla ikhiphe izikhangiso ezidukisayo ngomsoco otholakala emikhiqizweni yokudla.
"Inqanda izimboni ukuba zingakhohlisi abathengi kanti iyindlela yokulawula abenzi bezidlo ezingabalulekile. Lokhu kuzobeka iSouth Africa ezingeni lamazwe omhlaba.
"Sekujwayelekile ukubona kuvalwa ukuphisana ngamathoyizi ezidlweni ezithile kuvalwa nokukhishwa kwemidwebo nezikhangiso ezikhuthaza abantu ukuba badle okungenamsoco," kuchaza yena.
Ukuchibiyela lo mthetho kungathatha izinyanga ezingu-18, kodwa umthetho ozobhekana ngqo nokudla okunamafutha amaningi uzoshaywa maduze nje. Lokhu kuyingxenye yohlelo lomnyango olusabalele oluzokhuthaza abathengi ukuba baphile kahle, banikwe ithuba elanele lokukhetha kuqinisekiswe nokuthi ukukhuluphala akubi yinkinga.
Amabhizinisi okudla amakhulu eSA anemibono ehlukahlukene ngalolu daba. U-Jackie Carnelly ongumqondisi wezentengiso kwaWimpy uthi bakholwa wukuthi imithetho ehlongozwayo izothinta imboni yonke.
Isitatimende esikhishwe abakwaMacDonald's sithi imithetho eluhlaka kumele icutshungulwe kuboniswane ngayo kanti baqhuba bathi "kusesekuseni kakhulu ukuthi kungabhekwa imininingwane yonke izimboni zingakahlangani ziveze uvo lwazo."
Izindleko
Abanama-spaza nabanamabhizinisi amancane bathi le mithetho izokwandisa izindleko kubona.
Kodwa ngabe uhulumeni uzokwazi ukubheka ukuthi le mithetho iyagcinwa"
Umnyango wezempilo uyavuma ukuthi kuzoba nzima ukubheka amalebuli okudla.
Ochwepheshe bokudla nezinhlangano zezempilo bayishayela ihlombe le mithetho ehlongozwayo.
U-Liezel Wiggett onguchwepheshe wokudla uthi sesihamba ezinyathelweni zeMelika ne-UK uma kukhulunywa ngodaba lokukhuluphala ngokweqile.
"Ukudla okungenamsoco kutholakala kalula. Akuchazwa kabanzi ngako ukuze abathengi bakhethe kahle," kusho uWiggett.
"Izikhangiso zeTV ezikhuthaza ukuba kuthengwe ukudla okungenamsoco zikhangisa ngezidlo zezingane ekubeni kuyizona ezichitha isikhathi esiningi zibukela iTV. Izingane ngeke zilutheke kalula uma zingekho lezi zikhangiso," kusho yena.
"Okwamanje ukudla abaseSA abakudlayo akunamsoco kanti sesifikile isikhathi sokuba kushaywe imithetho ezobhekana nalokho njengoba ingane eyodwa kwezinhlanu inenkinga yokukhuluphala ngokweqile."
U-Wigget uthi izinga lamafutha asesidlweni sayo esisodwa lingadlula izinga lalawo ewadinga emzimbeni wayo ngosuku.
Ukudla okungenamsoco kunamafutha angemahle kanti kumele kugwenywe.
U-Wiggett uthi izinhlelo ezizofundisa abazali ziyadingeka ukuze nabo bazikhathaze ngokudliwa yizingane zabo.
Umphako wezingane kufanele ube nomsoco bangaziniki imali yokuthenga ema-tuck shop. Uhulumeni kumele aphoqe ama-tuck shop ukuba adayise okunomsoco.
Kodwa phezu kwayo yonke le mizamo, kunombuzo wokuthi ngabe le mithetho izokwazi yini ukwehlisa izinga lokukhuluphala kwabantu luleli lizwe - noma izoba omunye umthwalo embonini yokudla. [z]
Kuzobhekwa ukukhishwa kwezikhangiso zokudla okungenamsoco ukuze kusizwe abakhuluphele...

UKUDLELA ababili kusho ukuthi yidla okunomsoco kakhulu kunakuqala uma ukhulelwe. Kodwa lokho kuzoba nzima kakhulu kule nyanga ngoba sizobe sidla izibiliboco zikaKhisimusi. Nakhu okumele ukwazi ukuze ugxile kokunempilo...
Hlela izidlo zakho
Unesikhathi esanele, sisebenzisele ukuhlela izidlo zakho.
Uma kungukuthi bekwenzeka ungasidli isidlo sasekuseni ngenxa yokuba matasa, qiniseka ukuthi uyadla ekuseni.
Uma uqala manje ukujwayeza umndeni wakho ukuthi nidle ekuseni, izikole zizovulwa nonke senijwayele nilekelelane.
Ukudla okunomsoco kuzokunika amandla kusize nasekulawuleni izinga likashukela emzimbeni.
Dlela ukwehlisa isisindo somzimba
Ukudla okunomsoco ukhulelwe kwehlisa isisindo somzimba ngokushesha emva kokubeletha.
Ungakhathazeki uma kukhuphuka isisindo somzimba wakho ngoba ukukhuphuka kwaso kujwayelekile uma ukhulelwe.
Qiniseka ukuthi udla okunomsoco kathathu ngelanga udle okokubamba umoya noma udle amaqoqwana okudla amancane kahlanu.
Ukudla ngale ndlela kusiza ngokulawula izinga likashukela emzimbeni kwenze ungakuhaleli ukudla okunoshukela.
Ukuzilambisa kungenza ukuba izinga likashukela lingalawuleki ugcine usudla ngokweqile.
Yidla okufanele
Uma udla zibuze lokhu, "Ngabe ngidla okufanele"" Leyo iyona ndlela yokuzifundisa ukugwema ukudla uswidi nokudla okungenamsoco. Khumbula ukuthi ingane yakho ithembele ekudleni okudlayo ukuze ikhule kahle.
Amavithamini asiza ekwakheni imisipha yengane nezinye izitho zomzimba wayo okhulayo.
Qaphela...
Utshwala: Ukuphuza utshwala ukhulelwe kudala isifo esibizwa nge-foetal alcohol syndrome. .
Inyama noma inhlanzi engaphekiwe: Amagciwane ayaphila ekudleni okungaphekiwe kanti ungagwema izifo ngokudla ukudla okushisayo okuphekwe kwavuthwa. Gwema ukudla inhlanzi engaphekiwe enjenge-sushi, ugweme nokudla ezinye izinhlobo zezinhlanzi kanye ngesonto.
Inhlanzi ine-Omega-3 fatty acids, kodwa ibuye ibe ne-mercury etholakala olwandle. I-mercury ingaba yingozi emzimbeni kanti kuthiwa yenza ukuba umuntu angakhuli kahle. Qiniseka ukuthi inyama uyipheka ivuthwe.
Ukudla ngokweqile: Kulula ukudla weqise uma usendaweni enokudla. Uma ukhulelwe, ukudla weqise kungadala isilungulelo. Uma ungumuntu ohlushwa yisilungulelo, yidla amaqoqwana okudla amancane usuku lonke.
Ukuphela kwamanzi: Phuza okungenani izingilazi zamanzi eziyisishiyagalombili ngosuku ukuze umzimba ube namanzi kanti ukuwaphuza ukhulelwe kusemqoka kakhulu.

Lezi zinkulumo zabuye zaqinisekiswa wukudlala kwakhe kwi-movie ethi Set It Off ngo-1996 lapho ayedlala khona indawo yokuba yisitabani.
Kodwa lesi sihlabani somdlali asikakakulungeli ukuphumela obala ngodaba lobulili baso.
"Angisiboni isidingo sokutshela abantu ngempilo yami kanti anginandaba nabakucabangayo," usanda kusho kanjalo.
Angenankinga ngokuphawula ngako yi-movie yakhe entsha ethi The Secret Of Bees ezobonakala eSA kule nyanga. Kule movie uLatifah udlala indawo yomnikazi wepulazi lezinyosi elibuye libe yikhaya labantu abahlangabezane nezinkinga empilweni.
Phakathi kwabo kukhona noDakota Fanning intokazi esencane eyabalekela ubaba wayo owayeyihlukumeza, kanye noJennifer Hudson osenkingeni nengalo yomthetho.
"Ngiyakuthanda ukudlala indawo yowesimame ophumelelayo, onendawo yakhe ahlala kuyona nodadewabo abuye abe nebhizinisi," kusho uLatifah.
Usezakhele imali enhle ngomculo nangama-movie akhe. Kodwa zikhona izingqinamba adlule kuzona empilweni yakhe.
Lo mdlali ogama lakhe langempela nguDana Owens, owazalwa ngoMarch 18, 1970, wakhula ehlupheka e-East Orange eNew Jersey. Uthi kwakudingeka ukuba ube yisiqhwaga ukuze ukwazi ukumelana nempilo yakhona. Kodwa lokho akusho ukuthi akanayo inhliziyo enhle.
Usamkhumbula namanje umfowabo uLancelot. Wayeyiphoyisa njengobaba wakhe washona ngo-1992 ehamba ngesithuthuthu asithengelwa nguLatifah. Ithuna lakhe liyindawo aphephela kuyona.
"Uma ngikhathele ngikhandlekile ngiya ethuneni likamfowethu engingeke ngitholwe muntu kulona," kusho yena.
"Angiyiphenduli i-cellphone yami uma ngikhon. Lokho kunginikeza ukuthula."
"U-Latifah wathola i-Oscar nge-albhamu yakhe ethi Chicago wathola i-Emmy nge-drama ye-AIDS ethi Life Support.
Lo m'rapper' obuye abe ngumdlali ukhangisa ngeziphaqulo zakwaCover Girl nezakwaJenny Craig. Kodwa uLatifah uthi yi-movie ethi Taxi abantu abamkhumbula ngayo.
"Kade ngise-Egypt kanti abantu bakhona bangazi ngisekwiTaxi.
"Ngicabanga ukuthi baningi abangazi ngenxa yeTaxi. Abanye angiluzwa ngisho nolimi abalukhulumayo ngize ngizwe ngoba sebephatha igama elithi Taxi ukuthi bakhuluma ngani."
Mayelana nezikhangiso zakwaJenny Craig, uLatifah wathola ukugxekwa ngokuvuma ukuthuthukisa uhlelo lokwehlisa isisindo somzimba. Wayevame ukuthi akanankinga ngobukhulu bakhe. Uthi isinqumo asithatha wasithatha ecabangela impilo yakhe.
"Angikaze ngibe nenkinga ngomzimba wami," kusho yena.
"Kodwa ngolunye usuku ngafunda udaba ephephabhukwini olwaluthi uma wehlisa isisindo sakho ngo-5 kuya ku-10% unganciphisa amathuba okuphathwa yisifo sikashukela nesenhliziyo ngengxenye.
"Ngavele ngathi, 'Nasoke isizathu esizokwenza ukuba ngehlise isisindo sami.'"
Nakuba uLatifah ebuye azivocavoce, uyavuma ukuthi usazifela ngokudla.
"Ngidla engikutha-ndayo kodwa ngiyajima. Bengikhuthaza amantombazane ukuze angazenyezi ngemizimba yawo. Namanje ngizowakhuthaza ngokuthi angabukeka kangcono kakhulu kunakuqala.
"Ngingachitha umzuzwana owodwa noma emibili ngiwakhombise ukuthi
angaphila kahle.
Njengoba iningi labantu besilisa libesaba abesimame abanamandla, abazimele, asalokhu eqhubeke njalo amahlebezi aphathelene nobulili bukaQueen Latifah.
"Ningacabanga noma yini eniyithandayo. Abantu abanqeni ukuqhamuka nezinto ezingesilo iqiniso. Engikwaziyo wukuthi ngeke ngishade."[z]
Bengi-hlale ngenza isiqini-seko sokuthi amanto-mba-zane ama-khulu awaze-nyezi

U-Latifah uthi wayengesabi ukubhekana nezinyosi kwi-movie.
U-Latifah nomqeqeshi wakhe uJeanette Jenkins - kunamahlebezi athi babethandana bagcina beshadile.

IMALI YEZIPOKI ingakwenza ISIGWILI"
Sibuza imibuzo eshisayo ezangomeni esezimnkantshubomvu
ABAFUNDI bethu abaningi ezweni lonke basibhalele befuna ukuxhunyaniswa nezangoma ezikwazi ukuthola "imali yezipoki" okuyimali eyagqitshwa kudala okumanje igadwe izipoki. Omunye wabafundi bethu usixoxele ngephupho ake waba nalo limkhombisa ukuthi imali yagqitshwa kuphi. "Ngiyakholwa ukuthi ikhona ngempela imali kuleya ndawo, kodwa angikabatsheli abanikazi bomuzi."
U-Archbishop Elias Mashike Pitsoane (72) nongumsunguli aphinde abe ngumholi webandla iBethlehem Apostolic uthi ayikho imali okuthiwa eyezipoki. Yimali eyagqitshwa obabamkhulu ngenxa yokuthi ayengekho amabhange ngezikhathi zabo.
"Kulabo abadinga usizo lwami lokuthola le mali ngiye ngibatshele ukuthi abathandaze kuMdali baphinde bacele nasemadlozini ukuba ababheke.
U-Archbishop Pitsoane ophinde akholelwe emakhambini uthi: "Khuluma nabo ngendlela ekahle bazoza kuwena ngephupho bakukhombise ukuthi imali ifihlwe kuphi." UMfundisi Timothy Maphosa osebe ngumphrofethi iminyaka engu-36, uyavumelana no-archbishop: "Imali egqitshiwe akusiyona eyezipoki kodwa ngeyabantu bakudala. Uqhube wathi uma unenhlanhla amadlozi akho azokutshela ukuthi imali ifihlwe kuphi." USipho Mndaweni, ongusihlalo weGauteng Traditional Healers & Faith Practitioners, uthi akulungile ukuthi kuthiwe le mali eyezipoki.
"Kwakuyimali yabantu lena," Ngokwejwayelekile yayibekwa emabhodweni amakhulu esiNtu ngoba enziwe ngensimbi futhi awagqwali bese igqitshwa emgodini ebusuku ukuze igcinwe kahle. USipho uqhube wathi, "uma lowo muntu oyisicebi, (umkhulu noma ubaba) enomuntu amethembayo emndenini, wayemtshela ukuthi imali igqitshwe kuphi. Kodwa uma kwakungekho muntu amethembayo, wayethula naleyo mfihlo aze afe."
Ukuzila ngaphambi kokuyofuna le mali kungenyusa amathuba okuthi uyithole, kusho ubaba uMndaweni esinye sezangoma engikhulume naso. "Akusiyena wonke umuntu ongayithola, kodwa kumele kube ngumuntu othenjwe ngamadlozi, ozolandela yonke imiyalo yawo!"
"Uma ngithi zila ngikhuluma ngokuzithiba kwezocansi nasophuzweni oludakayo."
"Akudingekile ukuba ungadli, kodwa kumele uqaphele izinto ozidlayo ube msulwa futhi uhlanzeke, nesangoma esikusizayo naso kumele sizithibe." Lena enye yezindlela esikhombisa ngazo ukuhlonipha amadlozi. "Empeleni konke okuphilayo kumele kuhlonishwe," kuqhuba uMndaweni. "
Uphinde wathi ngeke ukwazi ukuhlonipha amadlozi noNKULUNKULU wakho uma wehluleka ukuhlonipha abantu osondelene nabo. [z]

IMPILO kaThuli yashintsha ngesikhathi esebenzela amabhizinisi amakhulu ebuye ecelwa ukuba abe yi “Face Of Walco.” UMatshepo Maleme uthi: “Umdlali engimlingisayo ubhekene nezinselelo eziningi kanti uneshwa lokuhlangana nabantu abayizibonelo ezimbi kuyena.”
U-Frans Kalp onguphrojusa we-Egoli obuye abe ngumbhali wayo oyinhloko uthi uMatshepo wenza ushintsho kulo mdlalo, “kanti ngendawo ayidlalayo siveza nobumqoka bokubaluleka kokuba abaqashi bazi ngesimo sabasiza emakhaya uma kukhulunywa ngeHIV,” kuqhuba uFrans.
“Angizange ngikholwe ngesikhathi ngithola ucingo oluthi ngikhethiwe ukuze ngidlale ngoba nganginovalo ngesikhathi ngihlolwa. I-Egoli ihluke kakhulu kwengikujwayele. Okwenziwa kulo mdlalo kuhlelekile”
UMatshepo wazalelwa eSoweto wahlala nogogo nomkhulu wakhe eFree State.
“Ngangifuna ukwenza izifundo ze-drama emva kokuba sengiqede u-matric kodwa abazali bami bangavuma. Ngathola umsebenzi ngathatha isinqumo sokufundela ukudlala eLab eMarket Theatre.”
Waqala ukudlala emdlalweni othi Bubomi Sana, i-drama eyayidlala kuSABC 1. Emva kwalokho wadlala kuMuvhango.
NgoMay 2007, uLibe Ferreira ongumqondisi we-Egoli wahlola ababezodlala indawo kaThuli.
“Kwaphela isikhathi eside ngifuna owayezodlala leyo ndawo kodwa kwathi lapho sengihlola uMatshepo, ngakhombisa umbhali walo mdlalo oyinhloko ukuhlolwa kwakhe. Kwasikhanyela ukuthi nguye ozodlala le ndawo! Uyazethemba.”
Abathandi balo mdlalo bazomvumela. UMatshepo Maleme ngumdlali ongeke wakhala ngaye… [z]

Ngathenga imoto egaraji. Emva kokuyikhokhela futhi senginikiwe yona, yaphuka ngesonto lesibili. Ngashayela abegaraji ucingo ngatshela u-salesman ukuthi imoto iphukile ayihambi. Ngambuza ukuthi yini azoyenza ukuyilungisa. Wavele wangihleka wangitshela ukuthi ngayithenga 'njengoba injalo' wathi akuwona umsebenzi wakhe ukuba angikhandele.
Ngahamba ngaya kuyena ngiyomcela ukuba athathe imoto ngamtshela ukuthi ngifuna ukuba ngesule isivumelwano sokuthengiselana. Wenqaba ukuyithatha nokwesula isivumelwano sokuthengiselana nokuba angibuyisele imali yami.
Yini okufanele ngiyenze"

Ezigigabeni ezifuze lezi lapho izimpahla zithengiswa ngumuntu oyedwa ethengisela omunye, umdayisi uyaphoqeka ukunika isiqiniseko (warranty) sokuthi izimpahla ezidayisiwe azinakho okunye ukulimala okufihlekile.
I-warranty elinye igama elichaza i-guarantee. Lesi siqiniseko asidingi nokubalulwa noma kubhungwe ngaso ngoba siyatholakala kumuntu odayiselwayo ngokwemibandela yomthetho waseSouth Africa.
Kodwa, uma imibandela nemithetho yekontileka oyiphothule nomuntu okuthengiselayo ichaza ukuthi imoto yathengiswa njenge-"voetstoots," lesi siqiniseko noma i-guarantee kungenzeka singabikho.
Ukuthi "Voetstoots" kuchaza ukuthi umthengi uyithenga leyo moto njengoba injalo.
Kulezi zimo umthengi unelungelo lokwesula isivumelwano sokuthengiselana afune nokunxeshezelwa kumthengi uma imoto ingayifanele inhloso eyayithengelwe yona, noma uma ngesikhathi ithengwa, umdayisi wayenolwazi ngezinto ezingalungile ezazikhona emotweni kodwa wazifihlela umthengi.
Njengamanje kudingeka ukuba ucele abegaraji bakunike iriphothi ebhalwe phansi nokuyilapho kubhalwe khona konke okonakele nemali yokukukhanda.
Umuntu obhala leyo riphothi nguye ozoba wufakazi ecaleni kanti kufanele anike ubufakazi bakho.
Njengoba imoto yayingekho esimweni sokuhamba emgwaqweni, futhi ingenayo ilayisensi, kuzokusiza ukukhipha ubufakazi bokuthi umdayisi wayazi ngezinto ezazingalungile kodwa wakufihlela zona.
Uma ukwazi ukukhombisa ukuthi lokhu yinto eyenzeka kuwena, kufanele ukwazi ukwesula isivumelwano sokuthengiselana, ukwazi ukuthola imali yakho.
Uma ucabanga ukuyikhanda, bese uyigcina kuwe, uzokwazi ukufuna amademeshe azobandakanya izindleko zokuyikhanda.
Leli akusilo icala umuntu angazibambela lona ngokwakhe, kudingeka ukuba uthole ummeli.[z]
Senze yonke imizamo yokuqiniseka ukuthi isiyalo enisitholayo siyiso. Kodwa konke okuthinta lolo hlobo lwecala kudinga ukucubungulisiswa, ngakhoke aboPhiko loFezela iScorpion Legal Protection (Pty) Ltd, abethimba elimele ukucubungula amacala nabakwaBONA nabashicileli bephephabhuku labo, ngeke babekwe icala ngokulahlekelwa kwaloyo oyosebenzisa lesi siyalo ngenye indlela.
Sibhalele: Ikheli lithi: BONA Legally Yours, Box 32083, Mobeni 4060. AbeScorpion bazonika wonke umuntu obhalele le ngosi yomthetho, 'Uthini Umthetho' ivawusha yamahhala yemizuzu engu-30 yokubonana nommeli wabo kwelinye lamahhovisi abo noma baxoxisane ngocingo.

WAFUNDA ukuthi UNKULUNKULU Ufunani emva kokuchitha isikhathi ezilile esicongweni sentaba. "Ngathatha iBhayibheli ngahamba nalo ngaya esicongweni sentaba," kusho kuchaza uSimon Mokoena. "Lena kwakuyiyona ndlela yami yokuguquka ezindleleni zemikhuba yami emidala ngiqale kabusha. Ngangazi ukuthi isicongo saleyo ntaba yiyona ndawo lapho ngangizoxhumana kahle ngokwenhliziyo noNKULUNKULU," kuqhuba yena.
Ukholwa wukuthi UNKULUNKULU Wayiphendula imithandazo yakhe ngokumkhuthaza ukuba asungule ibandla iTyrannus Apostolic Church.
Walisungula eminyakeni engu-8 eyedlule, kanti linekomkhulu lalo eQwaqwa. Kumanje linabalandeli abangu-80 000. Kubikwa ukuthi ngelinye lamabandla akhula ngesikhulu isivinini eSA.
"Ngaphambi kokuba ngiyohlala entabeni, kwakunokuthula empilweni yami," kusho kuvuma uMokoena owaqeqeshwa njengomfundisi ngabesonto elizinze eGoli, kodwa kumanje uthanda ukubizwa ngoMphostoli.
Emva kokuqeqeshwa njengomfundisi, wasungula isikole sezenkolo i-Show-Tell Bible Fellowship.
"Ngangisisebenzisela ukufundisa nokushumayela Izwi likaNKULUNKULU iminyaka engu- 15."
Inhloso yebandla akusikho kuphela ukuthandazela abagulayo nokushumayela Izwi likaNKULUNKULU.
"Izinhloso zethu zibandakanya ukuthuthukisa inhlalo yomphakathi ngezinhlelo zemisebenzi," kusho uMphostoli uMokoena.
"Ukusungulwa kwamathuba emisebenzi, ngezinye zezinhlelo zethu."
Bangaphezu kuka-100 abakhonza kuleli bandla abasebenza efemini yalo. Lapha benza imifaniswano yesonto, amaT-shirt abhaliwe, amabhengela namakha.
"Ngaphambi kokuba uJesu bambethele, wagcotshwa ngamafutha namakha ngowesimame. Ngisho nasekuVukeni Kwakhe, WayesaNuka amakha," kuchaza uMokoena.
Isonto futhi ngeke lisimame ngaphandle komculo. "Umculo yindlela elula yokushumayela Izwi likaNKULUNKULU. Ukukhula kwebandla lethu ngokushesha kulele emculweni wekhwaya yethu."
UMphostoli Mokoena ukholwa wukuthi abantu kufanele basizane, nokuyisiqubulo sakhe.

Maduze nje ngike ngazama ukuthenga ngesikweleti esitolo bathi igama lami lifakwe kane ohlwini lakwa-credit bureau lwabangakhokhi kahle kanti ngeke ngikwazi ukuthatha ngesikweleti. Ngachaza ukuthi isikweleti ngasikhokha kodwa nganganakwa.

ISELULEKO SOFEZELA
Isitolo asikuphathanga kahle. Kodwa isenzo saso sijwayelekile. Ngenhlanhla, iCredit Act entsha ingasiza wena nabanye abafundi abanenkinga efana neyakho.
1 BABHALELE INCWADI
Bhalela isitolo nabakwa-credit bureau incwadi uchaze ngokwenzekile. Chaza ukuthi ukhokhile ucele ukuba igama lakho lifakwe ohlwini lwabakhokha kahle. Lokhu kwenze ngisho noma kungukuthi ubusuke wakwenza, emva kwalokho thumela izincwadi zakho ngeposi elirejistiwe ubeke amakhophi ezincwadi nobufakazi bokuthi uziposile.
Uzowadinga la makhophi ukuze uma kunesidingo abe ngubufakazi uma uthole impatho engakugculisi.
2 I-OMBUDSMAN
Sijwayele ukuzwa kukhulunywa nge "ombudsman" noma i -"ombud" kulezi zinsuku.
I-ombudsman ingukhomishana noma umuntu ojutshelwe ukuphenya izikhalo. Njengoba ihhovisi lakhe liqale ukusebenza ngoFebruary 2004, baningi abathengi baseSA asebesizakele - kanti okuhle wukuthi lolo sizo uluthola mahhala!
Noma ngubani angaluthola usizo uma isikhalo sakhe sincike kulezi zigaba ezilandelayo:
Uma i-credit bureau inombiko okungesiwo ochaphazela igama lakho.
Lokhu kwenzeka uma kungukuthi kwi-credit bureau uvela njengomuntu ongakhokhelanga isikweleti ayengakaze abe naso!
Kunombiko osuphelelwe yisikhathi ngaphansi kwegama lakho.
Ukwenza isibonelo, kungenzeka ukuthi isikweleti sakho usuqedile ukusikhokhela kodwa i-bureau ithi usakweleta.
Isitolo osikweletayo sinike i-bureau umbiko ongesilo iqiniso noma asikutshelanga ukuthi igama lakho lizofakwa ohlwini lwabangakhokhi kahle.
Awuyekanga ngamabomu ukukhokhela isikweleti (uphelelwe wumsebenzi, njengoba kwenzeke kulo mfundi) kodwa wabuye wathola amandla okukhokha.
Kukhona nezinye izigaba kodwa lezi yizona ezimqoka kakhulu.

I-Cholera
1 IYINI? I-cholera wuhlobo lohudo oluyingozi olubulalayo. Uyithola ngokuphuza amanzi angcolile anendle nomchamo. I-cholera ungayithola nangokudla izithelo nemifino egezwe ngamanzi angcolile.
2 WAZI KANJANI UKUTHI UNAYO? Ukhishwa yisisu ukhiphe into emanzi, bese uyaphalaza, kuphume amanzi amaningi emzimbeni.
Lesi sifo siba mandla kakhulu ezinganeni, ebantwini abadala nakwabavele begula noma abangondlekile kahle.
3 KUDALWA YINI UKUTHI I-CHOLERA ITHATHWE "NJENGESIFO ESIYINGOZI"? Uma singelashwanga lesi sifo, uhudo nokuphalaza okudalwa yi-cholera kwenza uphelelwe amanzi. Umzimba wakho uphelelwa yizo zonke izakhamzimba ozidingayo ukuze uphile kahle - emva kwalokho umzimba uyoma. Ungafa ngokushesha ubulawe yi-cholera.
4 YELASHWA KANJANI? Ukwelashwa kwayo kuya ngokuthi imandla kangakanani. Uma isisu singakukhiphi kakhulu ungagwema ukuphela kwamanzi emzimbeni ngokusiza umzimba ukuze ungomi. Ungaphuza ingxube ozenzele yona (bheka ebhokisini), noma uyithenge ekhemisi.
Abantu asebephelelwe amanzi kakhulu kufanele baye emtholampilo ngokushesha.
Baphuzise ingxube yamanzi ngesikhathi usabaphuthumisa emtholampilo kuze kube bafakwa i-drip banikwe namaphilisi awumjovo azobaphephisa.
Ungazami ukuphalaza uma une-cholera ngokwesexwayiso soMnyango wezeMpilo nokuThuthukiswa koMphakathi - lokho kuyingozi kakhulu.
Gwema neziphuzo ezihlohlozayo ezinjengeCoke.
5 UNGAYIGWEMA KANJANI I-CHOLERA? Akusiwe osuke uyimbangela yokuthi amanzi abe yingozi uma uhlala endaweni okubheduke kuyona i-cholera. I-cholera ingabheduka uma indawo iminyene noma uma kushoda ingqalasizinda yokuthuthwa kwendle.
Ongakwenza wukuvikela umndeni wakho ngokuqinisekisa ukuthi awusondeli emfuleni noma emanzini angcolile. Okumqoka kakhulu, qiniseka ukuthi amanzi owasebenzisayo ahlanzekile.
6 UWAHLANZA KANJANI AMANZI? Lokhu ukwenza ngokubilisa amanzi noma uwafake isihlanzi esinjengeJik.
Elitheni yamanzi faka uhhafu we-teaspoon leJik uwayeke imizuzu engu-30 ngaphambi kokuwasebenzisa.

BONA ZULU – March 2008
7 izihlabani zomculo okufanele ube nazo
Abathandi bokuqina bomculo bakhombisa ngokusobala ukuthi umculo akusiyo into yamanje kodwa yinto yakudala. Abanye abaculi bakudala babelalelwa abazali bethu kanti nanamuhla amakhono abo asavelele nokungayinto enhle ukuba ube nawo umculo wabo.
Uhlu lwabaculi olulandelayo lunamagama abaculi ababenza izimanga emculweni kanti maningi amagama angekho - sithe make sikutomulele abambalwa...
Le ntokazi yazakhela olukhulu udumo ngephimbo layo emculweni we-jazz emhlabeni. “Kwakuthi lapho kudlala ingoma ka-Ella, ikati endlini ligijime liyohlala eduze kwe-speaker,” kubhala owayengumbhali wempilo ka-Ella uGeoffrey Fidelman.
“Ngicula uma ngithanda,” kusho le ntokazi. Umculo wamsiza wamkhipha ebugqileni eseyingane - njengoba wake wasebenza eqaphe indawo okwakuthengiswa kuyo umzimba.
Kusuka ku-1956 kuya ku-1964, u-Ella waqopha uchunge lwama-albhamu eSongbook kuyona okuboshelwe abaqambi abehlukene abafana no-Cole Porter noDuke Ellington nabanye.
“Lawa ma-albhamu ayeyingxenye yamarekhodi okuqala e-pop ayebhalwe abaculi bezimele ngokwabo ngaphandle kosizo,” kusho omunye owayephawula ngalokhu.
Ngeshwa iminyaka yakhe yokugcina yayinzima njengeyokuqala. Wayesevele esevaleke amehlo ngenxa yesifo sikashukela kanti nemilenze yakhe yomibili yanqunywa ngo-1993. Ngo-1996 wedlula emhlabeni ngenxa yalesi sifo eneminyaka engu-79.
LALELA: Enye yama-albhamu eSongbook ngethi Ella And Basie!, ayenza noCount Basie. I-Ella In Rome ne-Ella In Berlin yiwona ma-albhamu awaqopha bukhoma adla ubhedu.
UTHI UBUWAZI: Lo mculi wayenamahloni. “Ngiyazi angimuhle kangangoba akulula nokuba ngime phambi kwabantu,” kusho yena.
“Lokhu kwakungikhathaza kakhulu, kodwa manje ekugcineni ngabona ukuthi UNKULUNKULU Wanginika leli thalente ukuba ngilisebenzise - ngivele ngime phambi kwabantu ngicule.”
indaba nguROBERT JOHNSON
Omunye wochwepheshe bomculo waphawula wathi: “U-Armstrong wayengomunye wabaculi be-jazz ababenza izimanga baletha nolukhulu ushintsho ekudlaleni lo mculo.
“Impilo yakhe yangaphandle komculo, yiyo kwesinye isikhathi eyayigubuzela ukuba ngumculi kwakhe.”
Ngenxa ka-Armstrong, i-trumpet yavelela njengensimbi yomculo ezimele emculweni we-jazz. Ngesikhathi eqala emculweni, wayemandla kakhulu ekuziculeleni ngephimbo lakhe.
Emva kokuphuma esikoleni eneminyaka engu-11, u-Armstrong wajoyina i-quartet yabafana ababeculela ukuzitholela imali ezitaladini. I-trumpet yakhe yokuqala wayithenga ngemali ayeyibolekwe nguKarnofskys okunguMrashiya oxube nokuba nguMjuda owayemnika amatoho. Ukukhombisa ukubonga kwakhe kuKarnofskys, owayemphatha njengelungu lomndeni wakhe, u-Armstrong wafaka isigqebhezane seStar Of David impilo yakhe yonke.
Igama lakhe eliyisidlaliso elithi Satchmo liphuma kwelithi “satchelmouth,” elichaza indlela ayewumisa ngayo umlomo wakhe nolimi lapho esedlala i-trumpet yakhe.
U-Armstrong kwathi lapho ebona ukuthi izidlathi zakhe zikhukhumala kakhulu ngenxa yokufutha i-trumpet, wagxila kancane ekuculeni kanti futhi nomlomo wakhe wawusulimele sekungaselula ukuba adlale i-trumpet.
LALELA: What A Wonderful World, When The Saints Go Marching In, Dream A Little Dream Of Me, Ain’t Misbehavin’ nethi Stompin’ At The Savoy. Emva kwalokho kwalandela ethi Hello, Dolly. Ngo-1964, u-Armstrong wakhipha amaBeatles esicongweni seBillboard Top 100 ngawo lo mucu wakhe, waba ngowokuqala oneminyaka engu-63 ukuba nengoma enguNumber One.
UTHI UBUWAZI: NgoDecember 31, 1999, i-trumpet kaLouis Armstrong yayiphakathi kwezinto ezafakwa kwiMillennial time capsule eyoze ivulwe ngo-2099.
