BONA ZULU – March 2008
Lesi sihlabani singumculi we-jazz ohlonishwayo kanti ngo-2007 sasisacula bukhoma.
Okunye aziwa ngakho yi“Lucille,” igama aqamba ngalo iziginci zakhe ngemva kwesigameko sika-1950 somlilo owaqubuka e-bar ngesikhathi edlala. Lo mlilo waqalwa ngabalisa ababili ababebanga owesimame ogama lakhe kwakungu-Lucille. Emva kokuba uKing akwazi ukubaleka, wabona ukuthi ushiye isiginci sakhe emumva wayosilanda.
Waqamba isiginci sakhe ngokuthi u“Lucille” ukuze azikhumbuze ukuba angaphinde enze into ewubulima njengaleyo futhi.
“Cishe izikhathi ezingu-15, owesimame washo wathi: ‘Khetha phakathi kwami noma uLucille.’ Kungakho ngaba nezingane ezingu-15 kwabesimame abangu-15,” kusho yena.
UBB King wayephila nesifo se-Type 2 diabetes cishe iminyaka engaphezu kwengu-20. Ungumeseki wokufundiswa komculo ezinganeni futhi uyilungu lenhlangano enikela izinsimbi zomculo mahhala yenzise nezifundo zomculo ezinganeni kulo lonke elaseMelika.
LALELA: You Know I Love You, Woke Up This Morning, When My Heart Beats Like A Hammer nezinye. Emva kwalokho waqopha bukhoma i-albhamu ethi Live At The Regal eyashisa izikhotha.
UTHI UBUWAZI: U-King wayekhonze uFrank Sinatra kangangoba wayengayi ukuyolala engayidlalanga i-albhamu yakhe ethi In The Wee Small Hours. UKing waphinde wahlonipha uSinatra ngokusiza abaculi abansundu ababengalitholi ithuba lokudlala ezindaweni ezazithathwa njengezabamhlophe ngo-1960.
Nakuba afa emva kokuphahlazeka kwebhanoyi ngaphambi kokuphumelela kwezifiso zakhe, igama lakhe uRedding liyamaniswa nelomculo we-soul - nokungumculo owaqutshulwa yizinto abantu baseMelika abedlula kuzona ngokuhlanganisa iGospel neR&B ne-funk.
LALELA: Mr Pitiful, I Can’t Turn You Loose, iTry A Little Tenderness, (I Can’t Get No) Satisfaction neRespect. Emva kwalokho kwalandela i(Sittin’ On) The Dock Of The Bay, nokuyiyo engicabanga ukuthi iphuma phambili.
UTHI UBUWAZI: IDock Of The Bay yaqoshwa ezinsukwini ezintathu ngaphambi kokuba uRedding afe. Yakhishwa ngenyanga eyalandela yaba nguNumber One wakhe wokuqala yathengisa izigidi ngezigidi zamakhophi.
Waqala emculweni we-jazz edlala upiyano ngaphambi kokuba ashintshele ekuculeni. Ekuzalweni kwakhe waqanjwa waba nguNathaniel Adams Coles eMontgomery, e-Alabama. Waqala ukucula esteji ngeminyaka yo-1930.
LALELA: IThe Christmas Song, Nature Boy, Mona Lisa ne-Unforgettable.
UTHI UBUWAZI: Ngo-1948 uCole wathenga umuzi endaweni yabamhlophe bodwa abadla izambane likapondo eLos Angeles. Inhlangano yabanini bezindawo yatshela uCole ukuthi ayimfuni umuntu ongadingeki ukuba azohlala kule ndawo. UCole naye waphendula wathi: “Nami futhi ngokunjalo angibafuni abantu abangafuneki lapha kwami. Uma kwenzeka ngibabona yimi owokuqala oyokhalaza.”
Lo mculi wayenza isiginci sakhe sohlobo lweFender Stratocaster senze noma yini ayifunayo - kanti wayevame ukuba asishise ngaphambi kokuba aphume esteji. Akekho osewake wadlala isiginci njengaye.
Ingoma ethi Star Spangled Banner ayidlala kwifestiveli yeWoodstock ngo-1969 ekhombisa ukungahambisani nempi yaseVietnam yayifana ncamashi nokushiswa kwefulegi laseMelika, njengoba uHendrix isiginci sakhe wayesishaya sizwakale yonke imisindo eyehlukene efana nokuqhuma kwesibhamu, ukumemeza komuntu - inhloso yalo mculi ongumbhali wezingoma kwakungukuhlanganisa akubiza “ngomhlaba”, i-blues, i-jazz noma umculo wesigqi se-funky, “umkhathi” kanye nolwazi lwakhe.
LALELA: Hey Joe, The Wind Cries Mary okuyingoma uHendrix ayidlala izwakale njengekaBob Dylan ethi All Along The Watchtower, nokwakuyingoma eyayikhonzwe amasosha ayeyibambile e-Vietnam kanjalo nethi Purple Haze.
UTHI UBUWAZI: Izandla zikaHendrix zazinkulu kangangoba zazikwazi ukudlala kuzo zonke izintambo eziyisithupha esigincini ngesikhathi esisodwa. UHendrix wayeyinxele edlala iziginci ezidlalwa abantu abasebenzisa izandla zangakwesokudla kodwa ezibhekise phansi.

Ukuphuza emsebenzini
INKINGA: Njengemenenja emsebenzini, kuye kudingeke ukuba ngibhekane nabasebenzi abatholakala bephuzile. Umqondisi wenkampani uye athi mabaxoshwe kodwa mina angihambisani nalokho. Ngenzenjani?
ISELULEKO SOFEZELA:
Ngokukhipha isinqumo sokuba kuxoshwe umqashwa, umqondisi wephula iBasic Conditions Of Employment Act (BCEA) neLabour Relations Act. Imininingwane mayelana necala elenziwe ngumqashwa kumele iphenywe kahle, kubhalwe incwadi emethwesa icala anikwe nenothisi yokuba eze ecaleni lokuqondiswa kwezigwegwe.
Kumele kwenziwe uphenyo oluqondile futhi lwenziwe umuntu onolwazi ngokuqulwa kwamacala ozothola nokuthi umqashwa wayephuze ngempela yini.
Lokhu kudinga umuntu ozohlolisisa kabanzi ukuthi umuntu okusuke kuthiwe ufike emsebenzini edakiwe ubebuphuze nini lobo tshwala.
Kungenzeka umqashwa afike emsebenzini enuka utshwala kodwa ebe engazange abuphuze ngalelo langa, noma kube wukuthi utshwala abuphuzile bebungeqile ku-0.05% oyisikalo esigunyaziwe umuntu angasiphuza. Umuntu ophenya udaba olunjengalolu kumele athole nokuthi isimo umqashwa atholakale ekusona besingawuthikameza yini umsebenzi awenzayo.
Kumele kubhekwe isimo somqashwa sisonke – ngabe unuka utshwala? Ngabe ukhuluma into engaqondile? Uma konke lokhu kungacaci kahle, umqashwa usengahlolwa igazi noma kuhogelwe iphunga lakhe kodwa uma evuma ukuba kwenziwe lokho futhi kube khona nomuntu ozoba wufakazi.
Uma kungukuthi umqashwa wavuma esivumelwaneni sakhe sokuqashwa ukuthi lezi zinto zingahlolwa, ngeke akwazi ukwenqaba. Uma kwenzeka enqaba, akufanele ukuba aphoqwe.
Kumele kwenziwe okufanayo futhi uma kusolwa ukuthi umqashwa usebenzise izidakamizwa. Uma umqashwa enza umsebenzi wasengadini, icala lakhe lisingathwa ngendlela efanayo nelomuntu oshayela i-forklift.
Kufanele kuqoqwe izitatimende zofakazi eziqondile umqashwa aqondiswe izigwegwe. [z]
Senze yonke imizamo yokuqiniseka ukuthi isiyalo enisitholayo siyiso. Kodwa konke okuthinta lolo hlobo lwecala kudinga ukucubungulisiswa, ngakhoke aboPhiko loFezela iScorpion Legal Protection (Pty) Ltd, abethimba elimele ukucubungula amacala nabakwaBONA nabashicileli bephephabhuku labo, ngeke babekwe icala ngokulahlekelwa kwaloyo oyosebenzisa lesi siyalo ngenye indlela.

U-Austean Phiri umpheki odume amazwe ngamazwe ufeza iphupho lakhe lokufundisa abapheki…
indaba nezithombe nguTANIA SANDBERG
AKEKHO umuntu ongadingi ukunikwa ithuba kanti sonke kukhona esingakwenza. U-Austean Phiri ukholelwa kulokho. “Angifune dumo noma ubucebi kule mboni, ngifuna ukusiza abantu kuphela!”
IMthunzini Restaurant ephakathi kweHowick Falls neMidmar Dam epulazini elibizwa nge-Amberwood eliseKZN, uPhiri wayivula ngokubambisana noWillem Buter kanti ixube okwase-Africa nokwaseNtshonalanga.
“Ngangingafuni ukupheka, ngangifuna ukukhanda izimoto,” kusho kuvuma u-Austean owakhulela eMangochi, eMalawi.
Wazalwa emndenini onezingane ezingu-12 kanti kwathi lapho eseneminyaka eyisishiyagalolunye wahlala nomndeni wamaNtaliyane eBlantyre.
Eseqedile esikoleni, lowo mndeni wathi makayofundela ukupheka. Lokho wakubona kungenankinga ngoba ubaba wakhe wayengumpheki.
U-Austean wavuma kodwa weqa esikoleni emva kwezinsuku ezimbili ngoba efuna ukufundela ukukhanda izimoto. “Ubaba wayengaholi kahle kanti yilokho okwenza ngangakuthanda ukupheka. Abazali bami bangifuna bangithola emva kokweqa kwami,” kusho u-Austean.
Bathi akaphindele esikoleni.
Umngani wakhe wamcela ukuba eze eSouth Africa ngo-1992. “Ngafika ngingenalutho eHowick! I-CV yami ngangiyishiye eMalawi!” kusho kukhumbula u-Austean.
“Ngangiwufuna umsebenzi nokwathi ngelinye ilanga ngizihambela ngabona ihhotela elibizwa ngokuthi yiCrossways Country Inn. Ngangena ngaphakathi ngacela umsebenzi. Babuza ukuthi yini engingayenza ngabatshela bathi ngisemncane kakhulu ukuthi ngingenza zonke izinto engabatshela ukuthi ngingazenza.”
Bathi bazomnika u-R600 esontweni lokuqala besamhlola. Wenza ezibukwayo.
Emva kweminyaka emibili waqashwa eKaros Capital Towers Hotel. Wasebenza iminyaka emithathu bamcela ukuba aqhubeke asebenze emva kokuba esulile emsebenzini esefuna ukuphindela ekhaya emva kokushona kukababa wakhe.
Uyisibonelo esihle
Ikhono lika-Austean lagqama kakhulu emva kokuhlangana kwakhe noYogan Demke, omunye wabapheki abangompetha eSA. Ngokubona ithalente lika-Austean, uDemke wamcela ukuba asebenze naye.
“Uyisibonelo esihle kanti wangifundisa ukuba ngithuthukise engakufunda esikoleni,” kusho u-Austean. “Wayehlale ethi umpheki okahle opheka okuthandekayo.”
Kwavuleka ezinye izikhala zomsebenzi ekhaya naphesheya. “Uma ungumpheki ungasebenza kunoma yiliphi izwe,” kusho u-Austean. Isifiso sokuba avule eyakhe i-restaurant asizange siphele.
Ithuba walithola ngesikhathi ecelwa ukuba enzele abantu abangu-500 ukudla kwase-Africa emhlanganweni owawuseSweden. “Lokho kwangikhuthaza ukuba ngizame okusha. Ngabona ukuthi ngingakwazi ukwenza okwehlukile kokwaseNtshonalanga.
“Ngacelwa ukuba ngisebenze nomunye umpheki ePietermaritzburg. Lokho kwaba yithuba lami lokuqala lokuba ne-restaurant yami,” kusho yena.
“Ngavula iMthunzini. Manje sengingafundisa abasebenzi bami ukuba babe abapheki!” Lokho kwakungezinye zezinhloso zika-Austean. “Abageza izitsha mabafunde ukupheka,” wayehlale esho njalo.
Usezovula isikole sokupheka esisemthethweni. “Ngifuna ukuvula isikole sokufundela ukupheka ukudla kwase-Africa nokwaseNtshonalanga uma uNkulunkulu engivumela ngibhale nencwadi,” kusho yena.
“Ngikholwa wukuthi sibusisiwe isandla esiphayo kunesamukelayo!” [z]

“Ungumuntu olungile onobubele okwaziyo ukunakekela abanye abantu kanti futhi ungomunye wabadansi abambalwa abazimisele ngokwedlulisela ulwazi lwabo emphakathini,” kusho ongumqondisi wabeSouth African Ballet Theatre uKaren Beukes.
Imvelaphi yakhe!
UTumi wakhulela e-Acornhoek edolobheni azalelwa kulona i-Lowveld.
Emva kwalokho, umndeni wakhe wathuthela eSoweto - kodwa uTumi wayechitha isikhathi sakhe samaholidi eLowveld.
Umfowabo kaTumi uyi-tour guide kanti ujwayele ukuletha amaqembu abavakashi eLowveld. “Sonke sisaxhumene nale ndawo ekubeni nezimpande zethu zikuyona,” kusho uTumi.
UTumi uvumile ukuthi ukhathele yimpilo yasedolobheni. “Abantu base-Acornhoek bangabantu abazithobile nabazibeke phansi. Akudingeki size sigqoke kakhulu uma silapha. Ngiyawuthanda umoya onjalo.”
Izinselelo
Uphumele obala ngezinselelo okwadingeka ukuba abhekane nazo emsebenzini wakhe wokuba ngumdansi we-ballet.
“Umdanso we-ballet ukwenza uzihloniphe futhi ukunike nenselelo yokuhamba, yokukhuluma neyokuba yilowo muntu abantu abaningi abangamqondi nokungelula ukumqaphela,” kusho yena.
“Abaningi i-ballet bayithatha njengento ‘yabamhlophe’.”
UTumi ulinganise indlela amaMasai ezweni laseKenya ama ngayo nagxuma ngayo njengendlela efanayo neyeminyakazo yomdanso we-ballet nokuthi kuyathokozisa ukubona indlela lokhu okuxhumana ngayo.
Isimo uTumi ayebhekene naso empilweni yakhe nesamhlukumeza kakhulu emoyeni yiso esamholela ekutheni aze azibandakanye nomdanso we-ballet.
“Ngadutshulwa emlenzeni ngesikhathi sitelekela ubandlululo ngeminyaka yo-1980 udokotela wangitshela ukuthi kufanele ngihlale nginyakazisa umlenze wami ukuze uqine,” kusho yena.
“Ngenhlanhla nginesihlobo esisemdansweni esabuka sabona ukuthi i-ballet ingangisiza ngomlenze wami. Okunye okwalandela lapho kungumlando.”
Izingqinamba
UTumi waqala ukuzakhela igama ngokuba azibonakalise njengomunye wabadansi abamnyama abanempumelelo emangalisayo eSouth Africa. Uthi abantu badinga ukushintsha ukucabanga kwabo ukuze bakwazi ukuzisondeza kwi-ballet.
“Kungani abantu bakhonze ama-cellphone namakhomphyutha ngaphandle kokuzibuza ukuthi okwabamhlophe noma okwabaseMelika kodwa bagxeke i-ballet?” kusho kubuza yena.
UTumi wayeyilungu elaba ngumsunguli weSoweto Dance Theatre ngokubambisana noLucky Diale, Carly Dibakwane, Ellington Mazibuko kanjalo nongasekho uJackie Semela.
Empumelelweni yakhe singabala nomfundaze awuthola ngo-1996 wokuyofunda unyaka owodwa esikoleni somdanso esidume umhlaba wonke iRambert Dance School eWest London.
Ngesikhathi esesePlayhouse Dance Company eThekwini, uTumi wenza umdanso ayewudansa yedwa nokungumdanso ayehlonipha ngawo okaMadiba ubaba uNelson Mandela. UTumi lo mdanso wamwinisa imiklomelo emibili ye-Vita Awards.
Kodwa kule nsizwa akusikho ukuthola imiklomelo okubalulekile. Kumphula umoya ukuzwa izindaba ngobunzima bezingane zaseRena le Lona Centre nokuyinto esimkhuthaze ukuba azisize zibone ukuthi yena yini aseyizuzile ngomdanso we-ballet - injabulo, ukukwazi ukuzisungulela izinto, ukuzihlonipha kanye nomsebenzi osukhombise enkulu intuthuko kulesi sikhathi seminyaka engamashumi amabili. Uzokuthokozela ukuyishayela kanti inendawo eningi yabomndeni wakho. Inazo zonke ezinye izinto ezengeziwe futhi nenani layo likahle. Engingathi akukuhle ngayo wukuthi ayijwayelekile lapha eSouth Africa
I-PROTON yinkampani yaseMalaysia ekhiqiza izimoto ezithengiswa kakhulu eSouth Africa. Enye yalezi zimoto yiPersona. Kule moto uthola ukwaneliseka ngaphezu kwezinye zezimoto ezibiza kakhulu. Inenjini engu-1,6-litre esebenza kahle kakhulu (njengoba kufanele ngoba iProton yiyo engumnini wemoto yomjaho iLotus). Iyi-five-speed ino-gearbox oyi-manual owenza amagiya ashintsheke kalula kunawezimoto ezibiza ngaphezu kwayo ngokuphindwe kathathu.
Ifika inabo bonke ubukhazikhazi nezinto zezokuphepha. Ngaphandle kwe-aircon, namafasitela asebenza ngogesi nomsakazo, iPersona inokukutshelayo ngokudleka kukaphethiloli ngosizo lwento esakhomphyutha, amalambu enkungu ngaphambili nangemumva, ukukhiyeka kwesicabha sizikhiya ngokwaso lapho ihamba kanye nokwangemumva okukutshela ngebanga lokupaka.
Izinto zezokuphepha zisezingeni eliphezulu - ama-airbag amabili ngaphambili nama-anti-skid brakes.
I-Proton Persona ibiza R155, 000 nje kuphela. Njengoba inebhuthi neminyango emine, kukhomba ngokusobala ukuthi ifanele umndeni omncane.
Uma ukhathazekile ngokuthi mhlawumbe yimoto engajwayelekile eSA, khululeka. Uchunge lwezimoto zeProton lulethwa kuleli ngabe-Associated Motor Holdings nokungabantu abanegalelo elikhulu embonini yezimoto lapha eSA.

Ngabe kubalulekile ukucabanga inani lemali imoto yakho ongayidayisa ngayo emva kokuyithenga- Lokho kuncika ekutheni wena uchithe malini nokuthi imoto uzoyigcina isikhathi esingakanani. Uma ufuna imoto endala engabizi kakhulu, imali oyidayisa ngayo ayibalulekile ukwedlula isimo sayo nokwethembeka kwayo. Akusikho ukuhlakanipha ukuyeka imoto ka-R30 000 ngoba uthi awuyithandi noma awuwuthandi umbala wayo.
Ngakolunye uhlangothi, uma uchitha R180 000 ngemoto entsha kungakuhle futhi ubheke nemali ongayithengisa ngayo.
Izimoto ezidayisa ubuthaphuthaphu uma zizintsha - cabanga iToyota Corolla noma iVolkswagen Golf - bazifuna kakhulu, kungakhoke iningi labantu elingeke limelane nazo ligcina ngokuthenga amasekeni asesimweni esihle.
Lokhu ungakusebenzisa ukuze kukuzuzise uma uthenga imoto eyisekeni. Obengumnini wayo myeke alahlekelwe yimali ukuze ubekeke ethubeni lokubuyelwa yimali yakho ngokukudayisela ngemali ephansi.

Isicelo sokubhalisa inkampani enamasheya ezimali


Izincazelo

Njengoba ukubhalisela inkampani enamasheya ezimali  kuyisixaka-xaka , kunconywa ukuthi abenzi bezicelo badinga ukusebenzisa abameli bomthetho.

I-Memorandum kanye ne-Articles zenkampani kumele zenziwe kanye nokuhlela ukuthi zihambelane nenkampani ngaphandle kokuba namasheya  kanti futhi lokhu kuqinisekiswe ngu-notary public oyiprofeshinali yezomthetho. Inkampani kawonkewonke , ingamukela iThebuli A  kwifomu lesicelo ngokuphelela noma ngokuthi liguqulwe lihambelana nesidingo sekhastama, inqaba nje uma lisalandela umthetho wezinkampani we-Companies Act, 1973. Inkampani yangasese ingamukela iThebuli B  kwifomu lesicelo ngokuphelele noma ngokuthi liguqulwe lihambelane nesidingo sekhastama ngokuphelele, inqaba nje uma lisalandela umthetho wezinkampani we-Companies Act, 1973.

Ukuze uthole olunye ulwazi, ngena kwi-website ethi Companies and Intellectual Property Registration Office.

Izinyathelo okumele zilandewe

Xhumana nabe-Companies and Intellctual Property Registration Office.
Gcwalisa amafomu alandelayo:

Yenza isicelo sokugodlelwa igama ngokufakela isicelo kwi-CM5 – Application for reservation of a name . Ifomu litholakala kwabe-Department of Trade and Industry .
Gcwalisa ifomu CM29 – Ingqikithi yerejista equkethe imininingwane yodayirektha  kanye nezikhulu . Ifomu litholakala kwabe-Department of Trade and Industry .
Umqondisi nomqondisi  kumele agcwalise ifomu le-CM47. Ifomu litholakala kwabe-Department of Trade and Industry .
Gcwalisa ifomu le-CM31 lokunikeza isigunyaziso kumuntu ukuze asebenze njengomcwaningi wezincwadi u-auditor. Ifomu litholakala kwabe-Department of Trade and Industry .
Gcwalisa ifomu le-CM44 – Isivumelwano sokusebenzisana i-Articles of association yenkampani enemasheya ezimali eyemukela isheduli 1, noma ifomu le-CM44A – Articles of Association of a company having a share capital not adopting schedule 1 . Bonke abaqondisi  kumele bagcwalise ifomu CM44C – Abasayinayo kuma-Articles .

Nikezela ngesigunyaziso somthetho kummeli womthetho, esichaza ukuthi umgunyazisa ukuthi enze izinto egameni lakho.
Inkampani ebhalisa ngemali yokuqala umsebenzi  kumele inikeze ngamadokhumende alandelayo:

CM1: Certificate of incorporation 
Lena yidokhumende esayinwa nokufakelwa isitembu ngumbhalisi wezinkampani uRegistrar of Companies, lapho onke amadokhumende okumele ahambisane nesicelo  esehloliwe aphethwa.
CM2: Imemorandamu yesivumelwano kanye nokunye  – CM2A – CM2B – CM2C uma kunabanamasheya abangaphezulu koyedwa , noma i-2D, uma kunonamasheya oyedwa.


Imithetho esetshenziswayo

Companies Act, 1973  
Business Names Act, 1960  
Share Blocks Control Act, 1980

Isicelo seMvume yokuthumela izinto ngaphandle



Izincazelo

Imvume yokuthumela impahla ngaphandle idingeka ukuqinisekisa ukuthi umuntu siqu noma inhlangano enenhloso yokuthumela izimpahla ngaphandle ilandela imibandela ethize ebekiwe kanye nokulandela imibandela yezivumelwano zamazwe omhlaba. Izivume zokuthumela impahla ngaphandle zisiza ukulawula ukuthi impahla ephumayo ingeyohlobo olubalulekile nakhona ukuthi kungashushumbisiwa impahla kanye nempahla eyebiwe.

Umgomo osebenzayo kwizimpahla ezingeniswayo nezithunyelwa ngaphandle wehlukile kumkhakha nomkhakha. Kanti futhi, izimpahla eziningi ezintsha azifakelwa kwinqubo yolawulo lwezimpahla ezingenayo. Ngakho-ke, uma udinga ulwazi ngomgomo maqondana nokungeniswa kanye nokuthunyelwa kwezimpahla ezithile, sicela unikeze ihhovisi le-Import and Export Control elitholakala kwabe-Department of Trade and Industry, imininingwane yempahla ofuna ukuyingenisa ngaphakathi noma ukuyithumela ngaphandle.

Akuyizo zonke izimpahla  noma imikhiqizo  angeniswayo noma athunyelwa ngaphandle adinga inqubo yolawulo. Kodwa-ke zonke izinto ezisetshenziselwa impahla noma udoti, kanye nezikrebhe kungaphansi kwenqubo yolawulo longenisa impahla . Uhla lwempahla engaphansi kolawulo lwezimpahla ezingeniswayo kanye nezithunyelwayo luyatholakala. Uma ufakele imininingwane yokuxhumana nawe, ungathunyelelwa uhla ngeposi, ngefekisi noma nge-email.

Isicelo sokuthatha ingane engeyona eyakho ngokuzalwa uyenze eyakho

Izincazelo


I-adopshini isho ukwamukela ukuba ngumgadi ngokomthetho wengane, ngokulandela inqubo yosiko nesemthethweni yengane engeyabanye abazali ngokuzalwa.

Ngubani ongenza isicelo somyalelo we-adopshini 

wumyeni nonkosikazi wakhe ngokuhlanganyela;

umfelwa noma umfelokazi
umuntu ongashadile noma umuntu odivosile;
umuntu oshadile, owakwakhe ongumzali wengane;
Ubaba ngokuzala wengane ezalelwe ngaphandle komendo.

Umyalelo we-adopshini  ukhishwa yinkantolo yezingane ekudistriki lapho ingane ehlala khona.

Inkantolo yezingane ingakhipha umyalelo ngemuva kokubunelela umbiko obekiwe owenziwe ngusonhlalonhle ogunyaziwe ngokomthetho .

{Ukuthola olunye ulwazi, ngena kwi-website ethi: yaboMnyango wezoBulungisa nokuThuthukiswa koMthetosisekelo, ukuthola izinyathelo okumele zilandelwe

· Yenza isicelo somyalelo we-adopshini enkantolo yezingane ekudistriki yalapho ingane ezothathwa ngokothemthetho ehlala khona. Ngoba zonke izinkantolo zomantshi zisebenza njengezinkantolo zezingane, ungenza isicelo kumabhalane wenkantolo yezingane.

· Gcwalisa i-Form 11, ye-Application for the adoption of a child , ebese usifakela kumsizi wenkantolo yezingane.

· Umsizi wenkantolo uzothi, uma lokhu kungakenziwa, acela usonhlalonhle ogunyaziwe  ukuthi aphenyisise ngesicelo.

· Ekugcineni kwesiphenyisiso, usonhlalonhle uzonkeza umbiko kwinkantolo yezingane lapho okwenziwe khona isicelo. Ngaphandle kokuba kudingwa yinkantolo, umbiko ngeke wadalula ukuthi ngobani nokuthi bakuthi abazali abafuna ukuthatha ingane ibe ngeyabo ngokomthetho – noma ingane, uma isivele ingakubo – ngaphandle kwemvume ebhaliwe.

· Uma inkantolo yeneliseka ngombiko, kanye nanoma yiluphi olunye ulwazi ngabazali abafuna ukuthatha ingane ngokomthetho bayenze eyabo, ingathi ngokubona kwayo, ibonelele isicelo ebese ikhipha umyalelo we-adopshini ngaphandle kokulalela omunye umuntu. Kodwa ingenza lokho kuphela uma kungekho ophikisa isicelo.

· Uma isicelo singakaphethwa, noma singeke saphethwa, kuyobekwa usuku lokulalela udaba lwesicelo enkantolo yezingane. Umabhalane  wenkantolo yezingane uyokhipha inothisi kwi-Form 1A Notice to prospective adoptive parents  ukwazisa abazali abafuna ukuthatha ingane ngokomthetho ukubazisa ngokulalelwa kodaba.

· Abazali bokuzala bengane ngeke babakohna enkantolo ngesikhathi sokulalelwa kodaba lwe-adopshini yengane yabo, ngaphandle kokuba inkantolo, ngokubona kwayo ibavumela ukuthi babekhona, uma inkantolo ibona ukuthi ukubakhona kwabo kuzobonelela isidingo sengane.

· Inkantolo ingacela abazali noma umgadi wengane ukuthi bakhiphe imvume ebhaliwe. Inkantolo ingacela nemvume ebhaliwe yengane uma ingaphezulu kweminyaka engu-10, kanti inkantolo yeneliseka ukuthi ingane iyaqondisisa ngodaba nokubaluleka kokuvuma.

· Uma kunoma yisiphi isigaba sokulalelwa kodaba, inkantolo ibona ukuthi kukhona izizathu ezibambekayo zokuthi ingaceli imvume ebhaliwe yabazali ngokuzala ingane, inkantolo ingacela umabhalane wenkantolo yezingane ukuthi akhiphe inothisi noma i-Form 22 ye-Notice to parent to advance reasons in terms of regulation 21 ,  21 kulowo mzali. Inothisi izocela umzali ukuthi avele enkantolo yezingane uma efuna ukunikeza izizathu zokuthi kungani ukuvuma kwakhe kumele kungabekelwa eceleni.

· Uma umzali engekho enkantolo yezingane ngosuku olubekiwe, kanti inkantolo yeneliseka ukuthi:

oinothisi yanikezwa ngokufanele kumzali kanti futhi asikho isizathu esibambekayo sokuthi umzali ehluleke ukuvela enkantolo, inkantolo ingathi ngokushesha ilalele udaba ebese ikhipha isehlulelo sodaba.

o lapho inothisi efanele ibingeke yanikezwa umzali, inkantolo ingathi, ngokubona kwayo, ikhiphe inothisi kumzali futhi, uma ingabona kufanele, noma ngokushesha ilalele udaba ebese ikhipha isehlulelo sodaba.

o Lapho inkantolo yezingane ibonelela isicelo se-adopshini, ukunikezwa kumbiko obhaliwe onikezwa ngusonhlalonhle ogunyaziwe , noma omunye umuntu onegunya, lokhu kuyoba wubufakazi obanele  ngendikimba yalokho okufakwe kumbiko.

· Noma yiluphi uhlangothi oluthinteka ngokuqonde ngqo ngombiko, lungacela uktuhi indikimba yombiko idalulwe. Lokhu kuyokwenziwa ekulalelweni kodaba.

· Uma uhlangothi oluthintekayo lufuna ukwenza kanjalo, luyonikezwa ithuba lokuphequlula  nombhali wombiko kunoma yiluphi udaba uluvela kumbiko, kanye nokuphikisa noma yisiphi isitatimende esivela kumbiko

· Ukhomishana oqondene nodaba, uyochaza ngokucacile kuhlangothi oluthintekayo imiphumela yokuhluleka ukuphikisa umbiko kanye nokuphikisa izitatimende ezivela kumbiko.

· Ekulalelweni kwesicelo, umenzi wesicelo kanye nomzali okhishelwe inothisi, bayoba namalungelo afanayo kanye namandla njengomuntu osodabeni lwesinyathelo senkantolo kamantshi engeyona eyamacala obugebengu ngokulandela ukupheqululwa nokuphequlula ngemibuzo ofakazi , ukunikeza ubufakazi kanye nokukhuluma nenkantolo.

· Lapho umyalelo we-adopshini ungakakhishwa, noma lapho ukuvuma kokuthathwa kwengane ngokomthetho kuhoxisiwe noma kungakanikezwa, umzali wengane noma umgadi, angacela inkantolo ukuthi ibuyisele ingane kuye. Lesi sicelo singenziwa kusonhlalonhle ogunyaziwe noma umuntu obekwe yinkantolo yezingane ngokusebenzisa i-Form 21C ye-Notice to prospective adoptive parent for release of child to custody of parent or guardian  Kodwa, lokhu kungenziwa kuphela uma kuyinto ebonelela izidingo zengane.

· Umyalelo we-adopshini yengane, uyokhishwa kwi-Form 14.

UTHULI Mercy Mohale, wase-Orlando East eSoweto wacishe wafa ngenxa yokudla inhlabathi. Le ntombazane eneminyaka engu-19 yamilwa yisigaxa esikhulu esiswini.
Ngesikhathi ehlinzwa esibhedlela iChris Hani Baragwanath Hospital odokotela bakhipha inhlabathi eyase imbozwe amahluli egazi.
Waqale waphathwa amajaqamba esiswini, kwalandela ukopha kwesibeletho. Emva kwalokho waba nenkinga yokuma nokuhamba waze walaliswa esibhedlela.
"Ngangiyiqalekela kangangoba ngangize ngivuke ebusuku. Ngangiyidla cishe kathathu ngosuku.
"Yayinginukela kamnandi. Lo mkhuba ngawejwayezwa wumngani wami owayekhulelwe.
Wayethenga iphakethe layo elalingu-R1 kowayeyithengisa emgwaqweni. Kwakukhona e-brown nemhlophe. Yena wayethanda emhlophe.
Inhlabathi idala umqhubukusho esiswini. "Yayidala ukuba umzimba ube buhlungu wonke ngiphathwe inzululwane. Emzimbeni ngehla cishe ngama-kg angu-15," kusho kukhumbula uThuli.
"Ngaya kwabelapha ngamakhambi bangexwayisa ngokuthi uma ngike ngaya esibhedlela ngiyohlinzwa, nomakanjani ngiyofa.
"Babenginika imithi ukuba ngiyisebenzise - kodwa kujike kwedlulele."
Emva kwesikhathi esingangonyaka uThuli ebhekene nale nkinga, waya esibhedlela wafike wahlinzwa. Ekuqaleni kwakucatshangelwa ukuthi kuzokhishwa isibeletho sakhe, kodwa ngenhlanhla bakwazi ukukugwema lokhu.
"Ngenxa yokwehla komzimba wami nokuba buthaka kwempilo yami abanye babezitshela ukuthi ngiphethwe yi-HIV/AIDS.
"Ukuhlinzwa kwami yikho okwasindisa impilo yami."
UThuli uthanda ukwexwayisa labo abadla inhlabathi ngokuthi:
"Iyekeni ngoba ayiyilungele impilo. Mhlawumbe ngeke nibe nenhlanhla yokusinda njengami."
Uthini ngalabo abayidayisayo"
"Makube khona okwenziwayo ukunqanda ukudayiswa kwenhlabathi ngoba lokhu kubeka izimpilo zabantu engcupheni yokufa."
UHester van den Heever, ongumxhumanisi nabezindaba eChris Hani Baragwanath Hospital uthe: "Abantu abaningi badla inhlabathi ngoba beyiqalekela.
"Lokhu kuqaleka kudalwa wukwesweleka kwe-iron emzimbeni.
"Odabeni lukaThuli, ukopha yikho okwaholela ekutheni alahlekelwe yigazi eliningi - ne-iron eningi nokwaba nomphumela wokuqalekela inhlabathi."
"Ukudla inhlabathi kudala ukuphathwa wumqhubukusho," kusho uMatron Linda Hlatshwayo waseTjakastad Clinic esifundeni saseMpumalanga. "Kudala nokuphathwa yi-appendix.
"Ukudla inhlabathi kungadala futhi i-haemorrhoids, noma ama-piles - ukuvuvukala kwemithambo phakathi endaweni yangasese ngemumva noma eduze kwayo kube nzima ukuzikhulula.
"Kwabanye lo mkhuba uqala ngokuba badle umlotha, bahehwe nayiphunga lenhlabathi elizwakala lapho izulu likhemezela."
"Abesimame bayayithanda le nhlabathi," kusho uSipho Magagula, waseTsakane eBrakpan odayisa inhlabathi ezitaladini. "Ngithenga istokwe sikaR35 ngenze amaphasela abiza R1.
"Abanye bathi ivikela ukukhulelwa kanti abanye bathi bayayithanda nje" [z]

NAMUHLA sebeyanda abantu abasha abafundile abenza imisebenzi ephambili ababhema ugwayi wamakhala isinemfu.
"Ngangivame ukuphathwa ikhanda elalinginqamula," kusho uNqobi (okungesilo igama lakhe) oneminyaka engu-32 othi lapho umbuka ucabange ukuthi ungunobuhle. "Odokotela bangitshela ukuthi ngingawasebenzisi amaphilisi ezinhlungu. Kule nkinga ngaze ngasizwa yisinemfu."
Akathandi ukuba abangani bakhe bazi ngalo mkhuba wakhe.
"Uma bekhuluma ngobubi bokubhema isinemfu ngivele ngizithulele," kusho yena.
Akayedwa kulokhu. UThoko uneminyaka engu-25 kanti usebenzela enye yezinkampani zefenisha edumile.
NjengoNqobi, uThoko naye akafuni ukuba abantu bambone esebenzisa isinemfu. "Ngisisebenzisa uma ngingedwa kuphela."
Uthi ngosuku usebenzisa amadosha esinemfu amabili. "Uma sengisibhemile, ngiyaneliseka kokunye ngize ngikhohlwe nawukudla. Ngesinye isikhathi singithokozisa kangangoba ngize ngikhale izinyembezi zenjabulo."
UChristine ngomunye wabesimame banamuhla abazifundele. Le ntokazi eneminyaka eko-30 yaqala ukusebenzisa isinemfu ngesikhathi isafunda.
"Ngangiphathwa yikhanda elalixakile elaliba ngcono uma ngisebenzise isinemfu," kusho kuchaza yena.
UChristine isinemfu usisebenzisa ngendlela eyehlukile kwabanye ngoba yena usifaka emlomeni.
"Ngazama ukusifaka emakhaleni ngisibheme kodwa ngaba nenkinga yokucinana kwamakhala."
Usishutheka emlomeni cishe kathathu ngosuku - ekuseni ngaphambi kokuba ageze, emini emva kwedina nasebusuku ngaphambi kokuba alale. Usifaka phakathi kwamazinyo nezindebe. "Ngisigcina phakathi emlomeni cishe isikhathi esingangehora ngaphambi kokuba ngisikhiphe ngamanzi."
Okuxakayo wukuthi amazinyo akhe awashintshile umbala phezu kokusebenzisa isinemfu ngale ndlela iminyaka eminingi kangaka.
"Anginendaba nokuthi ngobani abazi ukuthi ngibhema isinemfu. Bonke abangani bami bayazi," kusho uChristine.
Okubuhlungu ngalokhu wukuthi le ntokazi ivumile ukuthi ingancamela ukuba ingaziniki izingane zayo imali yokudla esikoleni uma kungukuthi ngeke ibe nayo imali yokuthenga idosha lesinemfu.
Kuyacaca ukuthi imboni yesinemfu kuleli neyama-toilet paper zisazosimama kakhulu.

Izincazelo

Amalayisensi okushayela akhishwe ngamanye amazwe avunywa eMzansi azoshintshwa abe ngamakhadi uma abawaphethe befaka isicelo selayisensi yaseMzansi ngokulandela umthetho wezinqola ezihamba emgwaqweni ka 1996.

Isicelo sokushintsha iphomede yakwamanye amazwe kumele iphelezelwe yilayisensi yokushayela ekhishwe yilelozwe.

Ilayisensi yakwamanye amazwe noma iphomede yakwamanye amazwe ingashintshwa ukuze ibe ngeyaseMzansi uma ofaka isicelo eyisakhamuzi sakuleli noma enephomede yokuhlala njalo .

Ilayisensi yankulelinye izwe kumele ibe ngesebenzayo ngosuku ishintshwa kanti futhi kumele ibe ibhalwe ngolunye lwamalimi asemthethweni akuleli. Uma kungenjalo isicelo kumele size nehumusho oluvela kumuntu owaziyo.

Ilayisensi yankulelinye izweiphelelwa ngumsebenzi uma oyiphethe ethola iphomede yokuhlala kuleli eqhuba siskhathi eside nomaenikezwa imvume yaloko.

Phezulu

Izinyathelo okumele zilandelwe

Woza nalamaphepha alandelayo:

umazisi omukelekile eMzansi, njengomazisi, umazisi owokwesikhashana, ipasipoti yaseMzansi, noma ipasipoti yakwelinye izwe ihamba nephomede yokuhlala eMzansi
incwadi evela kusiphathimandla esaziwayo ifakazela ukuthi lelayisensi yakwelinye izwe iyasebenza, lencwadi kumele isho isigaba selayisensi 
ilayisensi yakwelinye izwe
izithombe ezingezona zombala zencwadi yomazisi ezine

khokha imali enqunyiwe.
Uzohlolwa amehlo ngaphambi kokuba ilayisensi yakho ishintshwe.

Isaziso: ungeke udinge ukuthi ubhale uhlolo lwelayisensi yokushayela. Uzonikezwa ilayisensi yokushayela okwesikhashana ezophela emuva kwezinyanga eziyisithupha ngaphandle kokukhokha.

Uma ufuna ukwamukela ingane engeyona eyakho ngokuzalwa , kumele uhlangabezane nezidingo ezilandelayo:

Kumele ube nezindlela zokunakekela  kanye nokukhokhela imfundo yayo.
Kumele ube negama elihle, ube ngumuntu omuhle nofanele ukuthenjwa nokunakekela ingane.
Uma umzali wengane eyisakhamuzi saseNingizimu Afrika, nawe kumele ube yisakhamuzi saseNingizimu Afrika nakhona uhlala eNingizimu Afrika.
Uma ungesona isakhamuzi saseNingizimu Afrika, kumele kube ukufanele  ukuba yisakhamuzi noma usuwenze isicelo sokuba yisakhamuzi.


Ukwamukela ingane ngendlela yemfihlo , lapho khona abazali abangavunyelwe ukuwazi ukuthi ngobani abantu abathatha lengane ukuyinakekela, noma lapho abanakekeli bezohamba ngemuva kokuthatha ingane, kulawulwa yisigaba 18 somthetho wonakekelo lwezingane iChild Care Act, 1983, nakhona kungenzeka uma inkantolo yezingane yeneliseka ngokuthi lokhu kuzoba yinzuzo enganeni nokubonelela kakhulu isidingo sengane.

Uma inkantolo yezingane ibeke ukuthi ingane noma izingane zidinga unakekelo kanye nokuvikelwa, umantshi wenkantolo yezingane uzobeka lezi zingane kunakekelo, endaweni ehlala izingane, esikoleni semboni noma endaweni yokuvikeleka. Kodwa, ingane noma izingane zingabekwa ngaphansi konakekelo lomzali, umnakekeli noma umgadi, lapho ezizoba ngaphansi kweso  kasonhlalonhle. Kulesi simo, aboMnyango wezeNtuthuko yaBantu bakhokhela umzali onakekela ingane imali yosizo lomxhaso , kubazali abanakekela ingane.

Isiphakamiso sokwamukelwa kwengane kumele kube ngesibonelela isidingo sengane kanye nokuba yinzuzo ekuphileni kahle kwengane.


Ukuthola olunye ulwazi, ngena kwi-website ethi: uMnyango wesimo seNdalo nezokuVakasha, yaboMnyango wezoBulungisa nokuThuthukiswa koMthetosisekelo. 

Izinyathelo okumele zilandelwe 

Hamba uye kumabhalane wenkantolo yezingane kudistriki lapho ingane ehlala khona.
Gcwalisa i-Form 11, Application for the adoption of a child , kungane nengane ofuna ukuyamukela.
Fakela ifomu kanye nokulandelayo
isitifikedi esiqinisekisiwe sikamazisi  yomenzi nomenzi wesicelo kanye nesitifikedi sokuqala sokuzalwa , noma umazisi wakuqala wengane nengane okumele yamukelwe ngabanakekeli;
Form 12b, Adoption of foster child: I-Form 12b, Ifomu lokwamukelwa kwengane ukunakekelwa ngabanye) statement by foster parent  esiqukethe isitatimende esibhalwe ngumzali ongumbelethi wengane uukthi akafisi ukunakekela ingane; kanye
lapho kusebenza khona i-Form 12, Consent by parent or guardian to the adoption of a child  esiqukethe ukuvuma kwabazali okubhaliwe ngokwemukelwa kwengane ngomunye , kanye ne-Form 13, Consent by child to adoption , okuqukethe ukuvuma kwengane okubhalwe phansi.
Ukuvuma kokwemukala ingane ngomunye ukuze inakekelwe, kumele kutholakale kwabalandelayo:

Abazali bengane bangempela

Umama wengane ezalelwe ngaphandle komendo

Ingane ngokwayo, uma ingaphezulu kweminyaka engu-10; kanti inkantolo kumele yeneliseke ukuthi ingane iyaqondisisa ngokubunjalo kanye nokubaluleka kwalokho kuvuma.
Umzali owemukele ingane ukuze ayinakekele , onakekela leyo ngane, uma umzali engakenzi isicelo sokwamukela leyo ngane ukuyinakekela . Uma umzali owemukela ingane  ukuyinakekela ehluleka ukunikeza ukuvuma kwakhe kokwamukela ingane esikhathini esiyinyanga, ngemuva kokuba ecelwe ukwenza kanjalo ngumsizi enkantolo yezingane, inqubo ye-adopshini ingaqhubeka ngaphandle kokuvuma kwakhe okudingekayo.


Akukho ukuvuma okubhaliwe okudingekayo ngaphansi kwezimo ezilandelayo.


Uma abazali bokuzala bengane beshonile kanti kungekho muntu oqokwe ukugada ingane

uma umzali

engakwazi ukuvuma ngenxa yokuthi ugula ngengqndo;

eshiye ingane, kanti futhi engaziwa ukuthi ukuphi;

elimaze ingane noma eyiphathe kabi ingane, noma evumele ingane ukuthi ilinyazwe noma iphathwe kabi;
ebangele ukuthi noma esize ukuthi ingane ihuhwe ngezocansi, ithwale ngempoqo, noma ukuthi ingane ifakelwe kwezokuthengisa ngomzimba ; noma ebangele noma ukusiza ingane ukuthi yenze izenzo zemikhuba nezimbi;

uma umzali wengane, ngokulandela isigaba 16 ifakelwe ngaphansi konakekelo lomzali womnakekeli , noma iyingane efuna esikoleni sendawo yezingane noma esikoleni semboni; noma
egodla ukuvuma kwakhe ngesizathu esingazwakali.

Thola ulwazi kothumela kuye impahla owangaphandle noma i-agent yalelo lizwe elamukela impahla ukuthi ngabe yini izimo zokuhlolwa kwezifo zezilwane  kulelo lizwe elamukela okuvela kuwe. Abe-NPPO baseNingizimu Afrika nabo bangakunikeza ulwazi.
Abe-NPPO baseNingizimu Afrika nabo bangakunikeza ulwazi Izimo zokungenisa impahla ngaphakathi zifakelwa kwimvume yokungenisa impahla.
Ngokusebenzisana ne-NPPO of South Africa, thola ulwazi lokuthi ngabe uyakwazi yini noma kawukwazi ukuhambisana nezimo zokungenisa impahla ebuya kulelo lizwe ofuna ukungenisa impahla yalo.
Uma kwenzeka ukuthi izimo ziyalandeleka, othumela impahla  angenza isicelo sesitifikedi sesigunyaziso sokwamukela ukuthi izitshalo azinazifo , asiqondise kwabe-NPPO of South Africa.
Othumela impahla ngaphandle kumele alethe impahla afuna ukuyithumela ngaphandle kwabe-NPPO of South Africa ukuze ihlolwe kanye nokuthola isitifikedi.
Abe-NPPO of South Africa bakhipha isitifikedi esigunyazisa ukuthi impahla kayinazifo  uma impahla ihambelana nezidingo zokungeniswa kwempahla kulelo lizwe ethunyelwa kulo.
Izimpahla kumele sithunyelwe kungakapheli izinsuku ezingu-14 ngemuva kokuba zihlolwe okokugcina.
Isitifikedi sokuqala sokugunyaza ukuthi impahla ayinazifo kumele sihambe nempahla.
Uma izitshalo noma imikhiqizo yezitshalo ezithunyelwa ngaphandle zifika echwebeni lokungena kulelo lizwe ezithunyelwa kulo, izipikitele zezitshalo  be-NPPO yalelo lizwe impahla engeniswa kulo, bazogcina leyo mpahla ukuze ihlaziywe nokuhlolwa.
I-agent noma ongenisa impahla kumele abe nawo wonke amadokhumende okungenisa impahla azowakhombisa izikhulu zechweba okungene kulo impahla kulelo lizwe.

Lolu hlelo lomsebenzi aluniki nje kuphela abavakashi ithuba lokubona izinyoni ezahlukene kodwa futhi luvulela nomphakathi wendawo amathuba omsebenzi
nguMARIA SITHOLE
SINETHULELA uManah Ntuli (28) ohlala eShowe KwaZulu Natal nababili alamana nabo, indodakazi yakhe nomama nogogo. Le ntokazi yayisebenza njengo-cashier kwenye yama-supermarket - emva kwalokho yalahlekelwa wumsebenzi. Kumanje usezibandakanye ohlelweni lomsebenzi wokongiwa kwemvelo nokuyilapho enakekela khona izinhlobonhlobo zezinyoni.
Lolu hlelo lomsebenzi lwengamelwe ngabegatsha lakuleli leWorld Wildlife Foundation bebambisene nabakwaSappi kanti luseDlinza Forest, eduze kwaseShowe. Lungolunye lwezinhlelo zemisebenzi eziyisikhombisa zabeTreeRoutes ezweni lonkana. Lapha kunebhodi elikhulu elenziwe phezulu abantu abakwazi ukuba bahambe kulo babuke izinyoni ezihlahleni bezibukela eduze.
Kulula ukuhamba kuleli bhodi eliphezulu kunoma ngubani - abadala nabancane.
Lolu hlelo lomsebenzi luvulela umphakathi amathuba omsebenzi kanti kuningi futhi abantu abakufundayo kulo.
Yonke lentsha eyisithupha esebenza kule ndawo ngeyasendaweni. UThabile Khuzwayo noNomusa Ntuli baqala ukuzibandakanya kulo msebenzi ekuqaleni kuka-October 2001. Emva kwalokho bajoyinwa nguSiziwe Zungu, Zinhle Dladla, Siyabonga Mthethwa noManah Ntuli
Bonke bahamba bayoqeqeshwa kulo msebenzi wokubheka banakekele izinyoni nakwezokuvakasha beqeqeshwa enkambweni yokuqeqesha eWakkerstroom, budebuduze naseVryheid nokuyisikhungo esingamelwe ngabeBirdLife SA.
Lapho abafundanga nje kuphela ukunakekela izinyoni nokuzehlukanisa kodwa futhi bafunda nangezihlahla nama-butterflies.
Kulo msebenzi wabo babuye bathokozise abavakashi bakuleli nabaphesheya bebalandisa ngomlando weDlinza Forest.
"Ngaba nesifiso sokusebenza ngemvelo kusukela ngisemncane," kusho uThabile Khuzwayo (33) owayebambe itoho efundisa njengothisha waze wadilizwa ngo-1997.
Wayezimisele ngokwenza izifundo zokongiwa kwemvelo (nature conservation) emva kokuqeda esikoleni kodwa kwadingeka ukuba ashintshe ukucabanga kwakhe emva kokwedlula kukababa wakhe emhlabeni.
"Engikukhonze kakhulu wukufundisa izingane ngokongiwa kwemvelo," kusho yena.
UNomusa Ntuli (25) uphuma emndenini wabantwana abayisishiyagalombili. NjengoManah Ntuli naye ungumama ongayedwana obengasebenzi phezu kokuba aphothula izifundo zamakhomphyutha nezokuvakasha.
Ukhonze ukufunda kabanzi ngemvelo nanokusebenza ngayo kanti usezuze ulwazi olunzulu ngezindlela izinyoni eziziphatha ngazo.
Lukhulu futhi olunye ulwazi alutholile oselumenze wakwazi ukuhlalisana kahle nabavakashi kanti wethemba ukuthi ngelinye ilanga uyozivulela eyakhe inkampani ebhekele ukunakekela abavakashi.
Njengoba eneminyaka engu-20 uSiziwe Zungu nguye omncane kunabo bonke laba basebenzi. Lona ngumsebenzi wakhe wokuqala ngqa - kanti uyamsiza ekufundeni isiNgisi. Into ayikhonze kakhulu wukuzihlalela emthini nezinyoni.
UZinhle Dladla (21) ngowesimame osemusha ongumama oliqhamukisa eNquthu. Ukuqeqeshwa akuthola yikho okwamenza wathanda izinhlelo zokongiwa kwemvelo.
"Ngikuthanda kakhulu ukusebenzisana nabavakashi nokubafundisa ngokubaluleka kokongiwa kwemvelo," kusho yena. "Ngelinye ilanga ngifuna ukuzivulela isikole sami sokufundisa ngokubaluleka kokongiwa kwemvelo."
USiyabonga Mthethwa (21) nguye kuphela ongowesilisa kulezi zintokazi.
"Nami ngangingaqashiwe ndawo, kodwa njengamanje sekukhona olukhulu ushintsho empilweni yami," kusho yena.
Enye inhloso enkulu yalolu hlelo wukuxhasa izikole zemiphakathi eyayingenamathuba ngokuba bazifundise ngokongiwa kwemvelo kuma-workshop ababa nawo.[z]

Inqubo entsha yeNtela yeNgeniso, yenzelwe ukuphungula ukusetshenziswa kwamaphepha lapho kukhonakala khona, kanye nokwenza ukuthi izinto eziningi ezenziwa ngendlela ye-manual zihambe ngendlela yemishini , kodwa kube kuqinisekiswa ukuthi bonke abakhokhe bentela baphathwa ngendlela elinganayo. Ukungezelwa isikhathi sokukhokha kungacelwa ngendlela ye-elektroniki ngaphandle kokubhalisa.
Bhalisa imininingwane elandelayo enikezwa ngabe-SARS ngemuva kobhaliso :

i-password, ukuthola indlelay okungena kwi-SARS network
ikhodi ye-system identification enikezwa ngabe-SARS kwinhlangano
ikhodi ye-user identification  kanye ne-password yokungena kwi-server yamafayile e-SARS lapho okuzofakelwa khona ifayili ye-data
ikheli le-network, noma izinombolo zokudayala, uma kusetshenziswa ukuxhumana nge- Public Switched Ucingo Network  and Integrated Services Digital Network .

Thola i-software ye-data encryption, kanye nenqubo yokufakela i-software i-installation kwabe-SARS. Kuvamise ukuthi abe-SARS banikeze nge-software kwinhlangano.
Fakela i-data encryption software.
Fakela amafayile e-test data files, ebese udonsa izimpendulo ze-test kwabe-SARS.
Qinisekisa ukwamukelwa kwe-test data files nabe-SARS Interface Administrator, ebese uqala ukusebenzisa lendlela ye-elektroniki, ngokushitnsha i-data yamafayili akhona.
Xhumana no-SARS Administator, lapho kuphazamiseke amafayile e-data, kushoda amafayile e-data noma kunamafayile aziphinda-phindayo.

Izincazelo

Ukufakela amafomu ngendlela ye-elektroniki ngenye yezindlela eziyingxenye yohlelo lweSIYAKHA ngaphansi kophiki lwabezimali Ezingenayo i-South African Revenue Service . Inhloso enkulu yokufakela amafomu nge-inthanethi  wukusiza ukuthi ukufakelwa kwamafomu entela kanye nokukhokhwa kwayo kubelula kubakhokhi bentela kanye nabasebenzi bezentela.

Okwamanje kukhona inqubo yokulandelayo yokufakela amafomu entela:

Pay-As-You-Earn 
Skills Development Levy  Intela ye-Levy yokuThuthukiswa kwamaKhono 
Unemployment Insurance Fund  Intela yesiKhwama soMshuwalense wokulahlekelwa yimisebenzi

Secondary Tax 
Additional Payments

Abakhokhi bentela banikezwa ithuba lokwamukela, ukugcwalisa, ukufakela kanye nokukhokha intela ngendlela evikelekile ye-gateway kumahora angu-24 nsuku zonke.

Abakhokhi bentela, amafemu e-accounting, kanye nabasebenzi ababhekane nezentela abafisa uukfakela amafomu abo entela, noma abafuna ukufakela amafomu entela amaklayenti abo, bayakwazi ukurejista  nge-inthanethi. Akukho sidingo sokuba ne-software yesipesheli ukwenza lokhu – udinga nje ukuxhumana nge-web kanye ne-windows operating system evamile.

Phezulu

Izinyathelo okumele zilandelwe

Abakhokhi bentela abafisa ukufakela amafomu okukhokhela intele ngendlela ye-elektroniki, kumele babhalise kwinqubo ye-SARS e-filling.

Ngena kwi-website ye-SARS e-filing.
Khetha inkinobho yokurejista ngasesandleni sobunxele, ebese ukhetha kwi-registration type  olusebenza kwisimo esiqondena nawe.
Uma inqubo yobhaliso  isiphelele, uzothola ikhodi eyimfihlo yokungena  kanye ne-password ukuze ukwazi ukungena usebenzise lenqubo.
Ikhodi yokungena eyimfihlo  kanye ne-password izonikezwa kuphela lapho umkhokhi wentela noma ummeli womkhokhi wentela esemukelwe njengonegunya lokungena, ngokulandela inqubo yolawulo olusetshenziswayo kwisignesha ye-elektroniki.
Imininingwane efanele yomkhokhi wentela izoqinisekiswa ngokulandela idatabase egunyazisiwe yabakwa-SARS kanti umkhokhi wentela uzokwamukelwa njengosebenzisa lenqubo obizwa i-e-filer kwimikhakha efanele.
Lapho kukhishwa amafomu, abe-SARS bazokhipha amafomu ngendlela ye-elektroniki ngenqubo nasohlangothini lwabe-SARS e-filing. Umkhokhi wentela angagcwalisa nokufakele ifomu lentela ngendlela ye-elektroniki. Abakwa-SARS ngeke besanikeza amakhophi amafomu amaphepha lapho umkhokhi esebhalise njenge-e-Filer.
Inqubo ye-e-filing izokhipha izikhumbuzo kumkhokhi wentela, ngokuthumela i-SMS noma nge-email, ukumazisa ukuthi ifomu lakhe selilungile ukuligcwalisa noma ukulibuyisela.
Umkhokhi wentela uzosebenzisa ikhodi yakhe yokungena eyimfihlo kanye ne-password ukuthola amafomu entela.
Ukwenza isicelo nge-website kuzovele kukhombise lonke ulwazi maqondana namafomu njengokuvamile nakwifomu eliprintiwe. Umkhokhi wentela uzobe esegcwalisa ifomu kwi-website.
Uma umkhokhi wentela esegcwalise ifomu, ulwazi olufakela kwifomu luzoqinisekiswa ngokugcwele. Konke ukubalwa kwenziwa yinqubo ukuze kungabi namaphutha kulwazi olufakelwayo.
Umkhokhi wentela angakhetha ukukhokha ngesikhathi egcwalisa ifomu noma angakhokha ngaphambili kosuku olufanele.

Ngisho noma lenqubo ibonakala sengathi inzima inesixaka-xaka, kodwa empeleni, isebenzeka kalula futhi ngokushesha. Uma udinga usekelo, shayela ucingo, kwi-Call Centre enabasebenzi abaningi, kanye nakwi-Support Desk yokusizana nawe ngomkhombandlela kwinqubo.

Phezulu

Izinyathelo okumele zilandelwe

Isevisi nesevisi eqondene ne-EMIA ethize, inebhukwana lemikhombandlela yayo, equkethe ulwazi ngemibandela, izikhathi zokwenziwa komsebenzi kanye nenzuzo ehambelana nomkhakha nomkhakha.

Inyathelo lokuqala: Sebenzisa ibhukwana lemikhombandlela

Amafomu esicelo kanye namabhukwana emikhombandlela yakhona kumele kufundwe ngokuhambisana kwako. Isicelo siyophumelela kuphela uma sihambisana nezidingo ezibekwe kumaBhukwana emiKhombandlela .
Funda la madokhumende ngokucophelela ukuze uqondisise imitheshwana yolawulo  kanye nezinqubo.

Inyathelo lesibili: Gcwalisa ifomu lesicelo

Uhla oluphelele lwamadokhumende okumele afakelwe kanye nesicelo kunikeziwe. Amabhukwana emikhombandlela azokhombisa, uma kukhona amanye amadokhumende adingekayo.
Uma ufakela ulwazi olungaqondile, noma usebenzisa kabi izikimu ze-EMIA, ungakhishwa kuhlelo losizo ngaphansi kwesikimu se-EMIA noma se-TISA.

Isinyathelo sesithathu: Fakela isicelo

Amabhizinisi avunyelwe ukufakela izicelo ezifinyelela kweziyisithupha  ngonyaka, kodwa kufakelwa kuphela ezine kwisikimu esisodwa. Noma yini okunye okuhlukile kulokhu, kumele kugunyaziswe nguMininjela ophezulu  we-EMIA.
Amafomu esicelo kumele agcwaliswe kahle nakhona afakelwe ngesikhathi esibekiwe kwisevisi nesevisi ye-EMIA.
Izicelo ezifakelwa ngemuva kwesikhathi, ngeke zabonelelwa.

Inyathelo lesine: Ukubonelelwa kwesicelo

Abe-EMIA bazokuthumela incwadi yokwamukelwa kwesicelo sakho kumahhora angu-48 ngemuva kokwamukelwa kwesicelo sakho. Le ncwadi yokwamukelwa kwesicelo sakho kumele ifakelwe kukho konke ukuxhumana kwakho ne-EMIA.
Uma isicelo sakho siphelele futhi sihambisana nawo onke amadokhumende asekelayo kanyenokulandela imibandela yokwamukelwa, singabonelelwa ukuze sivunyelwe.

Isinyathelo sesihlanu: Ukuvunyelwa noma ukwalelwa kwesicelo

Abe-EMIA bazokwazisa ngokuthi ngabe isicelo sako sivunyelwe yini noma salelwe kumahora angu-48 ngemuva kokwenziwa kwesinqumo sokugcina.
Izicelo ngeke zavunyelwa ngomlomo. Kumele uqinisekise ukuthi uthola ukuvunywa kwesicelo sakho okubhalwe phansi ngaphambi kokuba uhambe.
Ikhophi yesazizo sokuvunyelwa kwesicelo kumele kuhambisane nakho konke ukuxhumana kanye/noma ama-submission amanye amadokhumende kwabe-EMIA. Uma abe-EMIA bethola ezinye izincwadi zokuxhumana nawe noma amadokhumende, angabandakanyi incwadi yokuvunyelwa kwesicelo, abe-EMIA, ngeke babekwa icala uma la madokhumende elahleka noma efakelwa kwenye indawo engafanele. Uma la madokhumende elahleka noma ebekwa kwenye indawo engafanele, lokhu kungaphazamisa noma ukulibazisa inqubo yezamahhovisi.

Uma isicelo sosizo sesivunyelwe, kumele kugcwaliswe ifomu lokukleyima le-EMIA, kanye namadokhumende asekelayo kanye nohla lwemibuzo  okumele kugcwaliswe ebese kufakelwa kwabe-EMIA kungakapheli izinyanga ezintathu ukusukela ngosuku okumele kubuyiswe ngalo ukusukela kwindawo yokwenziwa kwebhizinisi elivunyelwe.

Uma ama-ayithemu noma amadokhumende maqondana nekleyimi engekho ngemuva kwezinyanga ezintathu, ikleyimu ngeke isavunyelwa.

Abe-EMIA bazokwazisa ngokuvuma kwabo ezinsukwini ezingu-20 zokusebenza ngemuva kwekleyimu efakelwe kwabe-EMIA.

Izincazelo

Uma i-asosiyeshini, inkampani noma i-close corporation ingasakwazi ukukhoha izikweledu zayo, noma ukuhlangabezana nezibopho zayo , uDirector-General  wezoHwebo neZimboni angabhekana nokuchithwa nokuhlakazwa kwempahla yenkampani  noma ukuvalwa kwebhizinisi kanye nokwaba nokuthengiswa kwempahla yayo .

I-asosiyeshini noma i-asosiyeshini yesikhashana , noma yiluphi ilunga le-asosiyeshini noma omunye umuntu othintekayo, angenza isicelo enkantolo sokuthi i-asosiyeshini noma i-asosiyeshini yesikhashana impahla yayo ihlakazwe ngu-Director-General noma ivalwe kanye nokuthengiswa kwempahla yayo . Inkantolo elalela isicelo kumele kube yidivishini yeNkantolo ePhezulu  noma iNkantolo kaMantshi enamandla okubhekana nenqubo yobulungisa  endaweni lapho i-asosiyeshini etholakala khona noma esebenzela khona. Izinkantolo zingakhipha umyalelo kanjena uma kuyinto engcono nelungele isimo.

Uma inkantolo inquma ukuthi uDirector-General kumele ahlakaze i-asosiyeshini noma i-asosiyeshini yesikhashana, uyoba negunya lokumeneja izindaba ze-asosiyeshini noma i-asosiyeshini yesikhashana ngaphansi kwezimo zomthetho wezinkampani i-Companies Act, 1973

Uma i-asosiyeshini noma i-asosiyeshini yesikhashana yenza isicelo ngokubhalela u-Director-General, yena angayikhipha kuhla lokubhalisa  i-asosiyeshini noma i-asosiyeshini yesikhashana, uma eneliseka ngokuthi

isinqumo esivumelana nokukhipha kuhla lobhaliso samukelwe emhlanganweni owawuhanjelwe ngamalunga amaningi e-asosiyeshini noma e-asosiyeshini yesikhashana;
isinqumo sithathwe yiningi lamalunga abekhona noma abemele emhlanganweni; kanti futhi
zonke izinto ezifanele okumele kubhekwane nazo ngaphambi kokukhipha kuhla lobhaliso, ezibandakanya indlela impahla nezikweledu ze-asosiyeshini noma ze-asosiyeshini yesikhashana okuzobhekwana nazo ngayo, noma okuye kwabhekwana nazo ngayo.

Uma inkantolo ithatha isinqumo sokuvala  i-asosiyeshini, noma i-asosiyeshini yesikhashana, izonquma ngokuthi impahla ye-asosiyeshini noma ye-asosiyeshini yesikhashana kuzobhekwana kanjani nayo ngendlela elinganayo nelungile. Inkantolo izobheka noma yiziphi izincomo ezenziwe ngu-Director-General maqondana nokwabiwa kwempahla.

Uma u-Director-General noma i-asosiyeshini noma i-asosiyeshini yesikhashana, noma yiliphi ilunga le-asosiyeshini noma yimuphi omunye umuntu othintekayo, enza isicelo sokuthi i-asosiyeshini kumele ihlakazwe ngu-Director-General noma ivalwe, uNgqongqoshe angabeka inqubo i-asosiyeshini noma i-asosiyeshini yesikhashana okumele ihlakazwe ngayo wu-Director-General noma okumele ivalwe ngayo. Ungqongqoshe angabeka namandla nemisebenzi ka-Director-General, u-Registratin IHhovisir , i-asosiyeshini, amalunga noma abanye abathintekayo kulezi zimo.

Kwisimo senkamapni noma i-close corporation , noma yibaphi abantu abathintekayo, u-director , umhloli wamabhuku ezimali, noma abophiki lwezimali ezingenayo i-South African Revenue Service  noma u-Registrar of Companies, bangenza isicelo sokuthi inkampani ikhishwe kuhla lobhaliso lwezinkampni noma ama-CC.

Izincazelo

I-close corporation yinhlangano yebhizinisi enabanikazi abasukela koyedwa ukuya kubantu abangu-10. Amasheya e-corporation awanazo izimakethe zikawonkewonke. Ngisho noma i-CC kudingeke ukuthi ibe no-accounting iHhovisir, asikho isidingo sezitatimende ezihlowe ngabahloli bamabhuku ezimali .

Ngisho noma umthetho wezinkampani i-Companies Act, 1973, udinga ukuthi kube nemihlangano ephoqelekile yezinkampani, ikakhulukazi imihlangano kawonkewonke, asikho lesi sidingo kuma-CC. Imihlangano ivame ukubanjwa nje phakathi kwamalunga ngokubona kwabo noma kunini.

Asikho isidingo sokuthi onke amalunga e-CC adlale indima ebonakalayo njalo ekuqhubeni ibhizinisi. Kuma-CC amaningi, kuvame ukuthi amalunga abuye abengomininjela bebhizinisi.

Okubalulekile maqondana nokugcwaliswa kwefomu kufakelwe ngemuva kwekhasi 1 lefomu ye-CK1.

Ukuze uthole ulwazi olunabile, bheka kwi-website ethi: Companies and Intellectual Property Registration Office.

Gcina igama le-close corporation, CK7.

Izinyathelo okumele zilandelwe
Uma ungumuntu owemukela isondlo:
Yenza isicelo enkantolo kamantshi ekudistriki yalapho umuntu ukhokha isondlo ehlala khona.
Gcwalisa ifomu lesicelo elifanele ebese ulifakela, lihambisane nesitatimende somholo kanye nezindleko kwisikhulu sezondlo.

Uma ungumuntu okhokha isondlo, kodwa ungasafinyeleli inani:
Yenza isicelo sesichibiyelo somyalelo kwihhovisi likamantshi kudistriki yalapho umuntu owemukela isondlo ehlala khona.
Gcwalisa ifomu elifanele ebese ulifiakela kwisikulu sezondlo

Gcwalisa isitatimende somholo nezindleko, kanye nesitatimende esichaza izizathu zesicelo, ukufakele kwisikhulu sezondlo ngisho noma ngabe ungowemukela isondlo noma okhokha imali yesondlo. Inqubo efanayo naleyo eyalandelwa ngesikhathi kusungulwa udaba lwesondlo izolandelwa.

Izincazelo

Amagama ezindawo, ngamagama ayizinkomba nezimpawu emhlabeni angawemvelo noma athiwe ngabantu abe esehlelwa. Lezi zinkomba nezimpawu kungaba ngezinabantu noma ezingenabantu.

Amagama ezindawo  awela ngaphansi kwegunya lohulumeni bezindawo, abandakanya imigwaqo, amabhilidi omasipala nezikwele , amapaki endawo kanye namangcwaba, kanye namabhilidi angawabantu ziqu. Amagama ezindawo  awela ngaphansi kwegunya likahulumeni kazwelonke, abandakanya amadolobha, izindawo zokuhlala eziseduzane nedolobha , izindawo zokuhlalisa abantu , ammahhovisi amaposi, iziteshi, izikhululo zezindiza (aiports), izikhululo zemikhumbi (harbours), ama-highway, kanye nezindawo zemvelo zemihlaba (natural landforms) ezifana nezintaba, imifudlana (streams), imifula, amatheku (amabheyi), izinhlonhlo (amaphoyinti angenela olwandle), iziqhingi (islands), amaxhaphozi (wetlands) kanye namapaki kazwelonke.

Ngu/Ngobani abangenza isicelo sokwamukelwa kwegama: Yonke iminyango kazwelonke yohulumeni, ohulumeni bezifundazwe , ohulumeni bezindawo, abe-South African Post Office , abakhi nabathuthukisi beprophathi, noma yiyiphi enye inhlangano noma umuntu.

ulwimi igama elisuselwa kulo

idistriki kaMantshi noma isifundazwe  lapho indawo etholakala khona
ngabe ikude kangakanani noma iqonde ngakubi, inhlobo etholakala kuyo maqondana nedolobha eliseduzane noma indawo kamantshi eseduzane.



Fakela imephu kasayizi we-A4.
Fakela igama lomuntu ophakamise igama elisha.
Fakela ifomu lesicelo kwabe-Tribal Authority noma kwabamaGunya eNdawo  ukusayina noma ukufakela isitembu esisemthethweni.
Fakela ifomu eligcwalisiwe kwabe-South African Geographical Names Council, kuMnyango wezoBuciko namaSiko .

Izincazelo

Isitifikedi sokushona yidokhumende esemthethweni enikezwa umndeni oshonelwe lapho kubhaliswa  ukushona komuntu. Lapho umuntu wangaphandle eshona eNingizimu Afrika, irekhodi liyagcwaliswa ebese kukhishwa isitifikedi sokushona sinikezwa umndeni. Izicelo zingenziwa ehhovisi laboMnyango wezaseKhaya  noma kwinxusa laseNingizimu Afrika noma i-mission uma kwenziwa isicelo ngaphandle.

Phezulu

Izinyathelo okumele zilandelwe

Gcwalisa ifomu le-BI-132
Bhala incwadi enemininingwane yomuntu oshonile ebese iposelwa ehhovisi eliseduzane lezaseKhaya, uma lingekho ihhovisi lezaseKhaya endaweni yangakini.
Akukho mngcwabo oyokwenziwa ngaphandle komyalelo wokungcwaba. Umyalelo wokungcwaba yisitifikedi esinikeza isigunyaziso somngcwabo kanye nokuhanjiswa kwesidumbu ukusuka endaweni lapho umuntu ashone khona ukuya endaweni lapho azongcwatshwa khona. Umyalelo wokungcwaba ungakhishwa ngabe:

ngabasebenzi boMnyango wezaseKhaya
amalunga ezenkonzo yamaPhoyisa aseNingizimu Afrika, noma
ngabangcwabi  abanegunya lokukhipha umyalelo wokungcwaba.

Izincazelo

Noma yimuphi umuntu ofisa ukuba nendawo yokudla noma ukuhambisa  ukudla kumele abe nesitifikedi sokwamukeleka. Lesi sitifikedi sikhishwa ngemuva kokuba izipikitela  beziphathimandla zendawo behlole indawo noma imoto.

Ukuze uthole olunye ulwazi, ngena kwaboMnyango wezeMpilo

Izinyathelo okumele zilandelwe

Yenza isicelo semvume noma isitifikedi kwiziphathimandla zendawo  ukuhambisa noma ukuphatha ukudla
Yiba nendawo efanele ezosetshenziswa kuphela ukuphatha ukudla noma imoto ezosetshenziswa kuphela ukuhambisa  ukudla.
Gcina indawo noma imoto ihlanzekile ngazo zonke izikhathi, ukuqinisekisa ukuthi ukudla okuhanjiswa noma okuphathwayo kuleyo ndawo akoniwa zimpukane, ukungcola, nodoti, nokuxubana nezinye izinto ezingalungile noma ezinye izinto ezilimazayo.
Imoto noma indawo izohlolwa zipikitela  beziphathimandla zendawo ukubona ukuthi ngabe ikufanele yini ukuhambisa noma ukuphatha ukudla

Umthetho osetshenziswayo

General Notice No. 180 of 10 February 1967

Ukufa kwesakhamuzi sase South Africa sifela ezweni elingeyona i South Africa

Amazinga afanele okwenziwa komsebenzi

Izincazelo

Igatsha lezangaphandle lisebenzisana namanxusa alo kwamanye amazwe linikeza usizo lokuxhumana nokuthutha, nezeluleko kubomndeni wesakhamuzi sase South Africa esifele kwamanye amazwe.

Kuzinqomela kuni abanako abomndeni wesakhamuzi sase South Africa esifele kwamanye amazwe?

Inxusa lase South Africa lizokwelekelela abomndeni ukuthola ukuthi kuzobiza malini ukuze bakwazi ukuthatha isinqumo esiyisona.

Uma usebenzisa abangqwabi kubalulekile ukuthi wazi ukuthi kuyakhokhwa.

Indlela izinto zenziwa ngayo iyashiyana kulizwe ngelizwe, loko kuzoxhaphazela ukushesha komsebenzi. Inxusa noma igatsha lezangaphandle lizokweluleka.

Ukuzinqomela kokuqala: ukubuyiswa kwesidumbu e South Africa

Uma isidumbu sibuyiswa, kunemithetho iqinile mayelana nezokwethutha ezifunwa yigatsha lezempilo.
Ukusilungisa isidumbu, nokusithwala kwenza lendlela ibe ngebiza kakhulu. Abomndeni kumele bafunisise kubangqwabi baleyondawo ukuthi kuzobabiza malini ngaphambi kokuthi bathathe isinqumo, ngaphandle uma umufi enomshuwarensi. Inxusa lase South Africa lizokwelekelela.

Ukuzinqomela kwesibili: ukusishisa isidumbu ubuyise umlotha e South Africa

Abomndeni bangazikhethela ukusishisa isidumbu besebebuyisa umlotha.

Umngqabi kulelozwe angawenza lomsebenzi. Inxusa lase South Africa kulelozwe lingabekhona uma kushiswa isidumbu uma abomndeni befuna ufakazi kanti bona abaphumeleli ukuba khona.

Umlotha usetshenzwa ngemithetho yalelozwe.


Ukuzinqomela kwesithathu: ukungqwabela kulelozwe

Abomndeni bangazikhethela ukuthi bamngqwabele kulelozwe umufi.
Umngqabi kulelozwe angawenza lomsebenzi. Inxusa lase South Africa kulelozwe lingabekhona uma. kungqwatshwa isidumbu uma abomndeni befuna ufakazi kanti bona abaphumeleli ukuba khona.
Umngqwabi unikeze abomndeni ulwazi lokuthi ungqwatshwe kuphi owakubo.

Ukuzinqomela kwesine: ukungqwatshwa komfokazana

Uma abomndeni womufi bengatholakali noma bengenayo imali yokwenza loku okungaphezulu kungacelwa ukuthi umufi angqwatshwe njengomfokazana.
Iziphathimandla zalelozwe ziyamngqwaba umufi ngaphandle kokukhokha. Inxusa lase South Africa kulelozwe lingabekhona uma kungqwatshwa isidumbu uma abomndeni befuna ufakazi kanti bona abaphumeleli ukuba khona.
Iziphathimandla zalelozwe zinikeze abomndeni ulwazi lokuthi ungqwatshwe kuphi owakubo.

Uma usuthethe isinqumo ngendlela oyifunayo, sayina isitetimende esifungelwayo usithumele ehhovisi lomqondisi omkhulu: inxenye yamanxusa egatsheni lezamgaphandle.

Izincazelo

Umthetho we-Customary Marriages Act  waphasiswa njengomthetho ngomhlaka 15 Novemba 2000. Uma wawusumendweni wosiko ngaphansi komthetho wosiko ngaphambi kwalolu suku, kusho ukuthi umendo wakho wamukelwe ngaphansi kwalo mthetho omusha. Uma owesilisa esevele enamakhasikazi angaphezu koyedwa, yonke le mendo yamukelwe ngaphansi kwalo mthetho omusha. Lo Mthetho wamukela umendo wosiko ongenelwe ngemuva kwalolu suku, kanye nokubeka imitheshwane yolawulo yokuthi abantu abaganana ngaphansi komthetho wosiko, okumele bayilandela ukuze imendo yabo yamukelwe.

Umendo wosiko wamukelwe uma abantu abaganana ngaphansi kwalo mendo wosiko belandela izidingo ezilandelayo:

Bobabili abantu abagananayo beneminyaka engu-18 noma ngaphezulu kwayo
Bobabili abantu abagananayo bevumelana ukuganana ngaphansi komendo womthetho wemendo yosiko
Umendo kumele kuboniswane ngawo, kube nomgcagco kanti futhi ungenelwe ngokulandela umthetho wezamasiko
Ilobolo akusona isidingo esenza ukuthi lo mendo wosiko wamukeleke emthethweni
Qaphela ukuthi le mendo yokosiko ibihlala njalo yamukelekile ngaphansi komthetho wezamasiko.

Ngabe kumele ngiwubhalise nini umendo wami?

Uma wawushade ngaphansi komendo wezamasiko ngaphambi komhlaka-15 Novemba 2000, umendo wakho kumele ubhaliswe naboMnyango weZangaphakathi. Uma washada ngemuva kokuba kuphasiswe umthetho, kumele ubhalise umendo zingakapheli izinyanga ezintathu.

Imendo yoSiko kanye nokuHlanganyela impahla Yonke imendo yosiko engenelwe ngaphambi kokuba lo Mthetho uqale ukusebenza, kusho ukuthi ingenelwe ngaphansi kokuhlanganyela impahla . Lokhu kusho ukuthi umyeni nonkosikazi wakhe banesabelo esilinganayo empahleni, imali noma iprophathi, kanti lokhu kusho ukuthi bahlanganyele nezikweledu. Uma izinhlangothi zombili zithanda ukuthi umshado wabo ungabi ngohlanganyele impahla , kuzomele bangenele ikontilaki ngaphambi kokuganana eyaziwa ngelokuthi yi-ante nuptual contract. Uma befuna ukushintsha ngemuva kokuba sebeshadile, kumele benze isicelo eNkantolo ePhakeme.

Ngaphansi koMthetho womshado woSiko we-Customary Marriages Act, unkosikazi unelungelo nesikhundla esilinganayo nomyeni sokuthatha isinqumo ngokuthi kumele kwenzekeni ngempahla. Unkosikazi oganwe ngaphansi komthetho wosiko, unelungelo lokungenela isivumelwano  ngaphandle kosizo lomyeni.

Ngabe kwenzekani lapho umyeni wami efuna ukuganwa ngomunye unkosikazi?

Umyeni kumele angenele isivumelwano/ ikontilaki ebhaliwe, ezobeka ukuthi ngabe kumele kwenzekeni ngempahla, kanti futhi umyeni kumele enze isicelo enkantolo sokwamukelwa kwekontilaki ebhaliwe. Inkantolo kumele iqinisekise ukuthi amalungelo empahla awo wonke amakhosikazi avikelwe.

Kwenzekani lapho sifuna ukungenela umshado wesilungu ngemuva kokuba siganene ngaphansi komendo wokosiko?

Uma umyeni wakho engenawo amanye amakhosikazi, ningashada ngaphansi komthetho wesilungu  kanti futhi nangaphansi komthetho wosiko. Kodwa, wena noma yena, ngeke nakwazi ukungenela umendo wokosiko nabanye abantu lapho nisashadene ngaphansi komthetho wesilungu.

Phezulu

Izinyathelo okumele zilandelwe

Umyeni noma unkosikazi angabhalisa umendo emahhovisi aseduzane ezoMnyango weZangaphakathi Kweluleka ukuthi nihambe nobabili ukuyobhalisa umendo ukuze ubhaliso lusheshise.
Kodwa uma omunye phakathi kwenu enqaba, ungayobhalisa uwedwa, kodwa ngokuletha ubufakazi obufanele.
Hamba nomazisi  yakho futhi ugcwalise i-Form A: Application for registration/enquiry into existence of customary marriage  kudinga ukuthi uchaze ulwazi olulandelayo:

izinombolo zikamazisi  yakho, amagama, kanye nezinsuku zokuzalwa zakho  nezomyeni wakho
amagama abazali bomyeni kanye nakankosikazi, kanye negama  ababusi ombusi wendabuko 
imininingwane yesivumelwano selobola, kanti futhi
nabantu ababili ababengofakazi bomendo 
incwadi ebuya kumholi wendabuko noma isitatimende esifungelwe kwabomthetho .



Ifomu kulele liqinisekiswe futhi lisayinwe phambi:

kwesikhulu sobhaliso, noma
umuntu obekwe ngokomthetho, ogunyaziswe nguMqondisi-Jikelele  ukwenza leyo misebenzi ngokulandela imitheshwana yenqubo .



Isicelo kumele sinikezwe isikhulu sobhaliso, noma umuntu ogunyazwe ukwenza lokho, okufanele aninikeze irisidi lokwamukela isicelo ngokusebenzisa i-Form B: Acknowledgement of receipt of application for registration of customary marriage .
Isikhulu sobhaliso, noma umuntu ogunyazwe ukwenza lokho, uzothumela isicelo kwabehhovisi eliseduzane lesifunda noma ledistriki, laboMnyango, ukuze bafakele lolu lwazi kurejista yobhaliso lwabo bonke abantu .
Isitifikedi sobhaliso noma i-Form C: Customary marriage certificate  nizonikezwa sona.
Gcina isitifikedi endaweni ephephile, ngoba sibalulekile.

I-close corporation  kungenzeka isikhule kakhulu kangangokuba ifuna ukuqhubeka nokukhula, kudingeka abathengi bamasheya ukuze bafakele enye imali kwi-CC.

Noma, mhlawumbi i-CC iqhudelana nezinkampani ezinkulu nakhona ifuna ukuba yinkampani ukuze ikwaze ikwazi ukwenza imisebenzi yayo iqhubeke kakhulu nokwazi ukuqhudelana kakhulu.

Ukuze uthole olunye ulwazi ngena kwi-website ethi Companies and Intellectual Property Registration Office.

Uma igama le-CC lizoshintshwa, kudingeka ukuthi kugcwaliswe ifomu le-CM5.
Yenza amakhophi efomu le-CMI ukuya kwi-CM44C
Fakela isitatimende esibuya kwi-accounting iHhovisir we-close corporation
Uma kuzobakhona izinguquko  olwenziwayo, njengalapho ilunga lishiya phansi, ukuphela konyaka wezimali, noma kuqashwa u-accounting iHhovisir, kumele kugcwaliswe amafomu e-CK2 no-CK2A ngaphambi kokuba kushintshwe, noma ngemuva kokushintsha. Amafomu okushintsha i-close corporation angatholakala kwi-online .

U-accounting iHhovisir kanye no-auditor we-close corporation asikho isidingo sokuthi kube ngumuntu oyedwa.

Izincazelo

I-Crime Stop inezikhungo zokushayela izingcingo eziningi ezibhekene nokuqokelela ulwazi oluvela emphakathini ngezigebengu kanye nemisebenzi yazo yobugebengu. Amalunga omphakathi asizwa ngabasebenzi bama-call centre  abaqeqeshwe kahle ngokuphendulana nezingcingo nokuthola ulwazi olufanele. Lokhu kwenza ukuthi abantu bakwazi ukwazisa abeNkonzo yezamaphoyisa aseNingizimu Afrika  ngobugebengu ngendlela ephephile futhi engabafaki kwisimo sengozi. Uma ufisa ungakhetha ukuthi ungazidaluli ukuthi ungubani. Ama-agent arekhoda nanikeza ulwazi ngezingcingo nokuthi ngobani abashayelayo awavunyelwe kwi-Crime Stop ukwenzela ukuthi abashayela izingcingo bakwazi ukuhlala bengaziwa uma bengafuni ukwaziwa. Ulwazi olunikezwayo luthunyelwa kumafokisi .

Izikhungo ezithile zokushayela izingcingo ze-Crime Stop Call Centres, zibuye zixhumanise abashayela kule nombolo namafokisi  ngendlela ye-conference calling. Lokhu kwenza ukuthi izikhulu zabaphenyisisi  akwazi ukubuza imibuzo koshayela ukwazisa ngobugebengu.

Qaphela: lokhu kwenziwa kuphela ngokuthola imvume yakho.

Ungabika ubugebengu ngokusebenzisa indlela ye-elektroniki kwi-website ye South African Police Service nayo futhi enesiqiniseko sokuthi ungaziwa ukuthi ungubani, ngaphandle kokuba ufuna wena ukuzazisa.

Phezulu

Izinyathelo okumele zilandelwe

Shayela inombolo ye-Crime Stop ethi: 08600 10 111.
Oxhumana naye kwisikhungo sezingcingo  uzokubuza imibuzo, kanti uma ulwazi onikezela ngalo, lungasetshenziswa, uzokunikeza inombolo yekhodi yakho wedwa.
Uma ulwazi lungeke lwasetshenziswa, oxhumana naye uzokuchazela ukuthi kungani lungeke lwasetshenziswa nokukunikeza iseluleko sendlela ongathola ngalo olunye ulwazi olubanzi.
Ulwazi olungasetshenziswa luxhunyaniswa nenombolo yekhodi onikezwe yona.
Uzocelwa ukuthi ushayele ucingo e-Crime Stop kwinombolo ethi: 08600 10 111 ngesikhathi esithile ukuchazelwa ukuthi ngabe ulwazi lube wusizo yini kanye nokuthola umklomelo uma ukufanele ukuwuthola. 
Ngesikhathi esilandelayo, labo okuxhunyanwa nabo ngocingo , bayoxoxisana nawe ngecala uma inombolo yekhodi onikeze ngayo kuyiyo, kanti futhi ukuzazisa kwakho kuhambelana ne-profile ekurekhodi labo.
Okuxhunyanwa naye ngocingo uzobeka phansi ucingo uma engakholwa ukuthi usenguye lomuntu oke washayela ucingo kuqala. Lena yindlela yokuvikeleka esetshenziswayo futhi ngeke kwabanezingxoxo ngayo.
Uma ubika ubugebengu ngendlela ye-eletroniki, gcwalisa ifomu lemibono kwi-website yabakwa-SAPS. Kuzovezwa inombolo yereferensi lapho usufakele ifomu.
Abe-Crime Stop bazodlulisela ulwazi olunikezwe kwabeyunithi ethize ephenyisisayo, ukuze balandelele indaba, kanti futhi nokubanikeza isicelo sokuthi babuyise umbiko kumahora angu-24 ngomphumela wophenyisiso ngokushesha ngendlela okungakhonakala ngayo.
Uma oshayela ucingo ukubika ngobugebengu ekufanele ukuthola umklomelo, isikhulu esiphenyisisayo, yisona okumele sibhekane nodaba lomklomelo kanye nendlela yokuthola umklomelo, ngokulandela inqubo yokukleyima ye-NI2/2001.
Uma umklomelo usukhona, abe-Crime Stop bazoxhumana nawe ukulungiselela ukukukhokhela umklomelo.

Abe-Crime Stop bazodlulisela ulwazi olunikezwe kwabeyunithi ethize ephenyisisayo, ukuze balandelele indaba, kanti futhi nokubanikeza isicelo sokuthi babuyise umbiko kumahora angu-24 ngomphumela wophenyisiso ngokushesha ngendlela okungakhonakala ngayo.
Uma wena oshayela ucingo ukubika ngobugebengu ukufanele ukuthola umklomelo, isikhulu esiphenyisisayo, yisona okumele sibhekane nodaba lomklomelo kanye nendlela yokuthola umklomelo, ngokulandela inqubo yokukleyima ye-National Information 2/2001.
Uma umklomelo usukhona, abe-Crime Stop bazoxhumana nawe ukulungiselela ukukukhokhela umklomelo.

Izincazelo

Imvume yokushintshisana ingakhishwa kumuntu wangaphandle obamba iqhaza kwezokushintshisana kuhlelo lwezamasiko, ezonomnotho nezenhlalisano yabantu, olugqugquzelelwa noma oluphethwe yinhlangano yangaphandle noma umkhakha wumbuso, noma umkhakha wesikhungo semfundo ephakeme ngokuhambisana nomkhakha kahulumeni wangaphandle. Yenza isicelo semvume yokushintshisana kwinxusa  yaseNingizimu Afrika noma kwi-mission eseduzane nawe.

Izinyathelo okumele zilandelwe

Gcwalisa ifomu le-BI-1738.
Fakela ipasipoti yakho kanye nesicelo.
Khipha incwadi ye-entity, yenhlangano, noma umndeni lapho ofuna ukuyokwenza khona uhlelo eNingizimu Afrika, eqinisa isimo noma ubukhona balolo hlelo lokushintshisana. Incwadi kumele ibe wubufakazi bokuthi ukufanele ukubhalisela  noma ukubamba iqhaza kuhlelo, kanti futhi kumele kukhombise ukuthi i-entity, inhlangano noma umndeni uzobhekana nawe ngesikhathi uhlezi eNingizimu Afrika.
Ukuthola incwadi evela kumkhakha kahulumeni ofanele noma ovela kwinhlangano esekelayo  ezweni lakini, eqinisa isimo noma ubukhona bohlelo lokushintshisana neNingizimu Afrika kanye neqiniso lokuthi wamukelwe ukubhalisa kuhlelo.

Isimo


Umthetho wezobudlelwane emisebenzini kubaqashi nabasebenzi we-Labour Relations Act, 1995, wamukela ilungelo lokuphiketha. Inyunyane ebhalisiwe  ingagunyaza iphikethi yamalunga ayo kanye nabasekeli ngenhloso yedimonstreshini yokuthula .

Iphikethi ingabanjwa noma kukuphi lapho abantu abanelungelo lokungena, kodwa ngaphandle kwendawo yomqashi, noma ngemvume yomqashi, ngaphakathi kwendawo yomqashi.

Inyunyane ebhalisiwe  noma umqashi bangacela abekhomishana yokubuyisana nolamulo i- Commission for Conciliation, Mediation and Arbitration  ukuzama ukuthola isivumelwano phakathi kwezinhlangothi ezithintekayo kwingxabano ngemitheshwana yolawulo okumele isetshenziswe kunoma yiyiphi iphikethi maqondana nesiteleka noma ukukhiyela ngaphandle. Uma kungenasivumelwano esifinyelelwayo, abe-CCMA kumele benze imitheshwane yolawulo lwamaphiketi, ngokubonelela izimo emsebenzini noma kwezinye izindawo zokuphiketha kanye nenqubo yokuziphatha kahle i-code of good practice.

Imitheshwana yolawulo ivumela abasebenzi ukuthi baphikethe endaweni yomqashi uma i-CCMA ibona ukuthi umqashi wenze okungalungile ngokunqabela iphikethi ngaphakathi kwendawo yakhe.



Ukuthola olunye ulwazi, hamba uye kwaboMnyango weCommission for Conciliation, Mediation and Arbitration 




Inqubo okumele ilandelwe
Inyunyane ebhalisiwe noma umqashi bangagcwalisa ifomu le-LRA 4.1 ukucela i-CCMA ukuthi ithole isivumelwano ngemitheshwana yolawulo lwamaphikethi ngesikhathi sesiteleka noma ukukhiyelwa ngaphandle.
Nikeza uhlangothi oluthintekayo ikhophi yalelil fomu.

Ikhophi lesilipi sokurejista ePosini;

isitatimende esisayinelwe esivela kumuntu odilive ifomu ukuqinisekisa ukuthi lokhu kwenziwe; noma
Isiliphi sesiqinisekiso sokuthumela ikhophi ngefekisi, noma obunye ubufakazi obunelisayo bokwenza lokhu.

Thumela ifomu eligcwalisiwe ku-Registrar: Kwihhovisi lesifundazwe  le-CCMA.

Izincazelo

ILayisense yobuSakazi beMiphakathi inenhloso yokuhlangabezana nezidingo zobusakazi kumphakathi ukufinyelela kwiminyaka emine. Iyavuseleleka, ngaphansi kwesimo sokuthi wenze isicelo sokuvuselela ilayisense kungafiki izinyanga eziyisithupha futhi kungakadluli izinyanga ezintathu ngaphambi kosuku lokuphela kwesikhathi selayisense ekhona. Ivuseleleka kuphela ngaphansi kwesimo sokuthi onelayisense  ulandela izimo ezibekwe yiziphathimandla zelayisense. Ilayisense inikezwa imiphakathi efuna ukusungula inkampani engu-Section 21, iTrust, ivoluntary association noma okunye okuyinhlangano evunyelwe ngumthetho engenzi inzuzo. Izinjongo zokubeka iminyaka emine yeLayisense yoBusakazi ukufezekisa okulandelayo:

ikuqhubela phambili ilungelo lokuxhumana kanye nokukhululeka ukuveza imibono novo 
ukwenzela ukuthi kube nemikhakha ehlukahlukene  yezokusakaza embonini
ukubandakanya imiphakathi njengabakhiqizi, omininjela kanye nabalaleli ekwenziweni kwezokuxhumana nokuxhumanisa
ukuba yizwi lemiphakathi
ukwenziwa kwezinhlelo ezikhombisa okuthokozelwayo okuyisipesheli kanye nezidingo zesipesheli zomphakathi, okubandakanya amasiko, ulwimi, izinkolo kanye nezidingo zokuhleleka kwemikhakha ehlukene yomphakathi.

ILayisense yeminyaka emine yoBusakazi boMphakathi inganikezwa kwimikhakha elandelayo:

Inkonzo yobusakazi bamarediyo.
Inkonzo yobusakazi beThelevishini .

Ilayisense isebenza iminyaka emine.

UMnyango wezokuXhumana usekela abamalayisense yeminyaka emine ngobusakazi kanye nemishini yokukhiqiza , kodwa uma belandela izidingo zoMnyango.

Phezulu

Izinyathelo okumele zilandelwe

I-ICASA izokhipha isimemo sokwenza isicelo senkonzo yobusakazi bomphakathi kanye nokunikeza ngamafrikhwensi akhona ezindaweni ezehlukene. Njengomenzi wesicelo selayisense, kumele wenze okulandelayo:

Sungula iqembu lokusebenzisana  elizobhekana nenqubo yesicelo kanye nokuba ngumenzi wesicelo  egameni lomphakathi.
Qinisekisani ukuthi iqembu lokusebenzisana, lenza okulandelayo:

ukuqoqa amasignesha emphakathini
ukubhala iplani yebhizinisi
ukugqugquzelela ukukhethwa kwamalunga eBhodi ngenqubo yedimokhrasi 
ukubheka indawo isiteshi sokusakaza esizosakazela kuyo.

Ukucela inkonzo yobusakazi kanye nefomu lesicelo sokusabalaliswa kwesignali.
Gcwalisa ifomu lesicelo ngokuprinta, ngokusebenzisa amagama amakhulu .
Fakelani ifomu lesicelo lokuqala  kanye namakhophi aqinisikisiwe angu-16 kwabe ICASA nemali yesicelo.

Izicelo ezingagcwalisiwe ngokuphelele, zizobuyiselwa kumenzi wesicelo kanti ngeke samukela emahlombe ethu ukuphazamiseka okungabakhona.

Izincazelo

Uma i-close corporation ingasaqhubi ibhizinisi, ingacela u-Registrar of Companies  ukuthi ayikhiphe ku-database  lwezinkampani. Kulesi simo, amalunga e-corporation kumele azise u-Registrar of Companies ngalokho okwenzekayo.

I-CC ingayeka ukuqhuba umsebenzi nakhona ifise ukuzikhipha kuhla lobhaliso , noma ingavalwa ngokuhluleka ukukhokha izikweledu  Lezi zimo zingaba ngeziyisixaka-xaka  kanye nezitheknikhali, okanti u-Registrar of Companies kumele anikezwe ulwazi lwesipesheli.

Ukuvalwa  kusho ukuthi i-CC

ayikwazi ukukhokhela izikweledu zayo;
ayisakwazi ukuqhubeka nemisebenzi yayo (ngokuvamile, ngenxa yezinkinga zezimali; noma
amalunga afuna ukwabelana ngempahla ye-CC.

I-CC ingavalwa ngenxa yenqubo yenkantolo , noma kungenzeka ivalwe ngokuzikhethela  lokhu . Uma amalunga e-CC enza isicelo sokuvala ngokuzikhethela kwawo, kudingeka kugcwaliswe ifomu lezokuvikeleka  elivela ku-Registrar of Companies .

Ukukhishwa kuhla  kusho ukuthi i-CC iyakhishwa ku-database nakhona i-CC ngeke isabakhona. Ibhizinisi ingaqhubeka ngenye indlela, isibonelo njengebhizinisi lomuntu oyedwa , ngemuva kokuba kuphethiwe ngokukhishiwa kuhla .

Isitatimende esifakelwa ngabathintekayo,  kumele sifakelwe ku-Registrar of Companies.

Ukuze uthole ulwazi olunabile, bheka kwi-website yo Companies and Intellectual Property Registration Office

Izikhundla zemisebenzi kwizikhundla eziphezulu, emkhakheni wezokuphatha ophezulu, kumele zikhangiswe kuzwelonke ngaphakathi nangaphandle kweNkonzo yokusebenzela uHulumeni.

Izikhundla zikhangiswa kwi-Public Service Vacancy Circular eqokelelwa njalo ngeviki ngaboMnyango wemisebenzi kahulumeni nezokuphatha . Uma kufunwa abantu abangasebenzeli uHulumeni, lowo Mnyango kazwelonke noma wesifundazwe  uzokhangisa ngalezo zikhala zemisebenzi kwabezindaba zamaphepha.

I-website yekheli elithi: Public Service Vacancy Circular, yazisa abasebenzi bakahulumeni ngezikhundla zemisebenzi ezikhona ngaphakathi kweNkonzo yemisebenzi kaHulumeni. Abantu abangasebenzeli uhulumeni, kodwa abathokozela izikhundla ezikhangisiwe, kumele baqale babuze kulowo mnyango okhangisayo uma bengenza izicelo. Imininingwane yokuxhumana nalowo mnyango okhangisile inikezwa kwi-Circular.

Eminye iminyango efana nawoMbutho wezokuVikela  ungacela ukuthi wenze uhlolo lwezempilo ngaphambi kokuba kubonelelwe isicelo sakho.

Ukuze uthola , ngena kwi-website yoMnyango weMisebenzi kaHulumeni nokuPhatha .

Inkcazelo




Umqashi angenza isicelo ngencwadi ebhaliweyo kwikomiti yeenkonzo eziyimfuneko engundoqo sokuba iqulungqe ukuba ingaba ishishini lomqashi lilonke, okanye inxenye yalo, liyinkonzo yokuxhasa nokugcina indawo ethile yokusebenza, ifektri, okanye oomatshini, ingatshabalali na.



Inkonzo iyinkonzo yokuxhasa nokugcina  ukubangaba ukuphazamiseka kwaloo nkonzo kungadala ukutshabalala okunembonakalo nokubambekayo kuyo nayiphina indawo yokusebenza, ifektri okanye oomatshini.

Nabaphina abanye ababandakanyeki abanomnqweno, bangathumela impendulo kwiNkonzo eyiMfuneko eNgundoqo, kwisithuba seentsuku ezingama 21 befumene esi sicelo.





Ukuze ufumane inkcazelo ebanzi yiya kwiSebe lezaBasebenzi

Inkqubo emayilandelwe


Yenza isicelo kwiNkonzo eyiMfuneko eNgundoqo yeKomishoni yoXolelwaniso, uLamlo kunye noMiselo-Sigqibo, ekuthiwa yi-Commission for Conciliation Mediation and Arbitration 
Gcwalisa ifom 4.3 ye-LRA uze uyithumele kwiKomiti yeeNkonzo eziyiMfuneko eNgundoqo  kwi-CCMA
Ikopi yale fom kufuneka ithunyelwe komnye umbandakanyeki kwaye kufuneka kunikwe ubungqina bokuba ikopi yale fom isiwe komnye umbandakanyeki, ngokufaka ezi zinto zilandelayo:
Makufakwe ikopi yesiliphu serejista esiphuma ePosini.
Makufakwe ikopi yerisiti esayiniweyo ukubangaba ikopi isiwe ngesandla.
Ingxelo esayiniweyo engqina ukuhanjiswa kwekopi ngulo mntu uhambise ifom kufuneka ihambe nesicelo.
Makufakwe ikopi yesiliphu esingqinayo sefeksi okanye nabuphina obunye ubungqina obanelisayo.
